evidence_en: Prisoners of War -LRB- original title in -RRB- is an Israeli television drama series made by Keshet and originally aired on Israel 's Channel 2 from March to May 2010 . A second season aired in Israel from October to December 2012 , and a third season is planned . The series was created by Israeli director , screenwriter and producer Gideon Raff . In 2010 it won the Israeli Academy Award for Television for Best Drama Series .   The programme was acquired by 20th Century Fox Television before it aired in Israel , and was adapted into the acclaimed series Homeland for Showtime in the United States . In India it was officially adapted as finite 126 episode television series P.O.W. - Bandi Yuddh Ke by Nikhil Advani in 2016 with Hatufim creator Gideon Raff consulting for the series .

evidence_da: Girls ' Generation , også kendt som SNSD , er en sydkoreansk pige gruppe dannet af SM Entertainment . Gruppen består af otte medlemmer : Taeyeon , Sunny , Tiffany , Hyoyeon , Yuri , Sooyoung , Yoona , og Seohyun . Oprindeligt en ni-delt gruppe -LRB- med Jessica , der senere afgik fra gruppen i september 2014 -RRB- , Girls ' Generation debuterede i 2007 med deres koreanske eponyme debut album . Selv om albummet fik en vis opmærksomhed , var det først i 2009, at gruppen steg til berømmelse med singlen '' Gee '', som hævdede topplacering på KBS 's Music Bank for en rekord-breaking ni på hinanden følgende uger og blev udnævnt til den mest populære sang i 2000'erne i Sydkorea  af Melon . Girls ' Generation yderligere konsolideret deres popularitet på den sydkoreanske musikscene med opfølgende singler '' Fortæl mig dit ønske -LRB- Genie -RRB- '' , '' Oh ! '' og '' Run Devil Run '', som blev udgivet i midten af 2009 og begyndelsen af 2010 .   I midten af 2010 skrev Girls ' Generation kontrakt med Nayutawave Records -LRB- nutidens EMI Records Japan -RRB - for at vove sig ind i den japanske musikscene . Deres juni 2011 selvbetitlede japanske debut album toppede på toppen af den japanske Oricon Albums Chart og blev det første album af en ikke-japansk pige gruppe til at blive certificeret millioner af Recording Industry Association of Japan . Gruppens tredje koreanske studiealbum The Boys blev udgivet i oktober 2011 og blev det bedst sælgende album i 2011 i Sydkorea med salg på over 380.000 eksemplarer . En engelsk version af singlen '' The Boys '' blev udgivet af Interscope Records i et forsøg på at udvide gruppens bestræbelse til den globale musikscene . Gruppens 2013 fjerde koreanske studiealbum I Got a Boy blev støttet af singlen '' I Got a Boy '', som blev udsat for stor opmærksomhed fra vestlige medier efter sin sejr video of the Year prisen ved den konstituerende YouTube Music Awards . Deres femte koreanske studiealbum , Lion Heart , blev udgivet i 2015 .   Girls ' Generations karakteristiske musikalske stilarter er karakteriseret som electropop og bubblegum pop , selv om deres lyde har varieret meget , der omfatter forskellige genrer, herunder hip hop , R&B , og EDM . De har solgt over 4,4 millioner albums og 30 millioner digitale singler fra 2012 . Gruppens enorme popularitet i deres hjemland Sydkorea har tjent dem talrige udmærkelser og titlerne '' The Nation 's Singers '' og '' The Nation 's Girl Group ''. Girls ' Generation anses også for at være en af de fremtrædende skikkelser i den koreanske bølge og en af de mest populære K-pop-handlinger internationalt . De er den første asiatiske pige gruppe til at opnå fem musikvideoer med over 100 millioner visninger på YouTube: '' Gee '' , '' Jeg fik en dreng '', '' The Boys '', '' Mr. Taxi '', og '' Oh ! '' . I Japan , blev de den første ikke-japanske pige gruppe til at have tre nummer et albums på den japanske Oricon Albums Chart , og deres tre japanske koncertture tiltrak en rekordstor 550.000 tilskuere , mere end nogen anden koreansk pige grupper .
evidence_en: Girls ' Generation , also known as SNSD , is a South Korean girl group formed by S.M. Entertainment . The group is composed of eight members : Taeyeon , Sunny , Tiffany , Hyoyeon , Yuri , Sooyoung , Yoona , and Seohyun . Originally a nine-piece group -LRB- with Jessica , who later departed from the group in September 2014 -RRB- , Girls ' Generation debuted in 2007 with their Korean eponymous debut album . Though the album gained some attention , it was not until 2009 that the group rose to fame with the single `` Gee '' , which claimed the top spot on KBS 's Music Bank for a record-breaking nine consecutive weeks and was named the most popular song of the 2000s in South Korea by Melon . Girls ' Generation further consolidated their popularity on the South Korean music scene with follow-up singles `` Tell Me Your Wish -LRB- Genie -RRB- '' , `` Oh ! '' , and `` Run Devil Run '' , which were released in mid-2009 and early 2010 .   In mid-2010 , Girls ' Generation signed with Nayutawave Records -LRB- present-day EMI Records Japan -RRB- to venture into the Japanese music scene . Their June 2011 self-titled Japanese debut album peaked atop the Japanese Oricon Albums Chart and became the first album by a non-Japanese girl group to be certified million by the Recording Industry Association of Japan . The group 's third Korean studio album The Boys was released in October 2011 and became the best-selling album of 2011 in South Korea with sales of over 380,000 copies . An English version of the single `` The Boys '' was released by Interscope Records in an attempt to expand the group 's endeavor to the global music scene . The group 's 2013 fourth Korean studio album I Got a Boy was supported by the single `` I Got a Boy '' , which was subjected to major attention from Western media following its winning the Video of the Year award at the inaugural YouTube Music Awards . Their fifth Korean studio album , Lion Heart , was released in 2015 .   Girls ' Generation 's signature musical styles are characterized as electropop and bubblegum pop , though their sounds have varied widely , incorporating various genres including hip hop , R&B , and EDM . They have sold over 4.4 million albums and 30 million digital singles as of 2012 . The group 's immense popularity in their native country South Korea has earned them numerous accolades and the titles `` The Nation 's Singers '' and `` The Nation 's Girl Group '' . Girls ' Generation is also deemed one of the prominent figures of the Korean Wave and one of the most popular K-pop acts internationally . They are the first Asian girl group to achieve five music videos with over 100 million views on YouTube : `` Gee '' , `` I Got a Boy '' , `` The Boys '' , `` Mr. Taxi '' , and `` Oh ! '' . In Japan , they became the first non-Japanese girl group to have three number-one albums on the Japanese Oricon Albums Chart , and their three Japanese concert tours attracted a record-breaking 550,000 spectators , more than any other Korean girl groups .

evidence_da: Fargo er en amerikansk sort komedie - kriminalitet drama antologi tv-serie skabt og primært skrevet af Noah Hawley . Showet er inspireret af filmen fra 1996 af samme navn skrevet og instrueret af Coen-brødrene , der fungerer som udøvende producenter i serien sammen med Hawley . April 15 , 2014 , på FX . Serien følger en antologi format , med hver sæson sat i en anden æra med en anden historie , støbt , og sæt af tegn ; hver sæson deler dog en fælles kronologi med den originale film .   Den første sæson , der foregår i 2006 og stjernespækket Billy Bob Thornton , Allison Tolman , Colin Hanks , og Martin Freeman , blev mødt med kritikerros . Det vandt Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Miniseries , Outstanding Ledelse og Outstanding Casting , og modtog femten yderligere nomineringer, herunder Outstanding Writing , en anden Outstanding Directing nominering , og handler nomineringer for alle fire kundeemner . Det vandt også Golden Globe Awards for bedste miniserie eller tv-film og bedste skuespiller - Miniseries eller tv-film for Thornton .   Den anden sæson , der foregår i 1979 og stjernespækket Kirsten Dunst , Patrick Wilson , Jesse Plemons , Jean Smart , og Ted Danson , blev mødt med endnu større anerkendelse . Det modtog tre Golden Globe nomineringer , sammen med flere Emmy nomineringer, herunder Outstanding Miniseries og handler nomineringer til Dunst , Plemons , Smart , og Bokeem Woodbine .   Den tredje sæson , der foregår i 2010 og stjernespækket Ewan McGregor , Carrie Coon , Mary Elizabeth Winstead , Goran Bogdan og David Thewlis havde premiere på April 19 , 2017 .
evidence_en: Fargo is an American black comedy -- crime drama anthology television series created and primarily written by Noah Hawley . The show is inspired by the 1996 film of the same name written and directed by the Coen brothers , who serve as executive producers on the series alongside Hawley . It premiered on April 15 , 2014 , on FX . The series follows an anthology format , with each season set in a different era with a different story , cast , and set of characters ; however , each season shares a common chronology with the original film .   The first season , set in 2006 and starring Billy Bob Thornton , Allison Tolman , Colin Hanks , and Martin Freeman , was met with critical acclaim . It won the Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Miniseries , Outstanding Directing and Outstanding Casting , and received fifteen additional nominations including Outstanding Writing , another Outstanding Directing nomination , and acting nominations for all four leads . It also won the Golden Globe Awards for Best Miniseries or Television Film and Best Actor -- Miniseries or Television Film for Thornton .   The second season , set in 1979 and starring Kirsten Dunst , Patrick Wilson , Jesse Plemons , Jean Smart , and Ted Danson , was met with even greater acclaim . It received three Golden Globe nominations , along with several Emmy nominations including Outstanding Miniseries and acting nominations for Dunst , Plemons , Smart , and Bokeem Woodbine .   The third season , set in 2010 and starring Ewan McGregor , Carrie Coon , Mary Elizabeth Winstead , Goran Bogdan and David Thewlis premiered on April 19 , 2017 .

evidence_da: A Song of Ice and Fire er en serie af episke fantasy romaner af den amerikanske forfatter og manuskriptforfatter George R. R. Martin . Han begyndte det første bind af serien , A Game of Thrones , i 1991 og havde det offentliggjort i 1996 . Martin , der oprindeligt forestillede sig serien som en trilogi , har udgivet fem ud af en planlagt syv bind . Den femte og seneste bind af serien offentliggjort i 2011 , A Dance with Dragons , tog Martin fem år at skrive . Han er stadig ved at skrive den sjette roman , The Winds of Winter .   En sang af is og ild finder sted på de fiktive kontinenter Westeros og Essos . Det enkelte kapitel i historien er et begrænset perspektiv på en række tegn , der vokser fra ni , i den første roman , til 31 efter den femte . Tre hovedhistorier flette en dynastisk krig mellem flere familier for kontrol af Westeros , den stigende trussel fra de overnaturlige andre i den nordligste del af Westeros , og ambitionen om Daenerys Targaryen , den afsatte kongens landsforviste datter , at påtage sig jerntronen.   Martin 's inspirationer omfattede Wars of the Roses og den franske historiske romaner The Accursed Kings af Maurice Druon . En Song of Ice and Fire fik ros for sin forskelligartede skildring af kvinder og religion , samt dens realisme . Et udvalg af forskellige og subjektive synspunkter konfronterer læseren , og succesen eller overlevelsen af synspunkttegn er aldrig sikret . Inden for den ofte moralsk tvetydige verden af A Song of Ice and Fire opstår spørgsmål om loyalitet , stolthed , menneskelig seksualitet , fromhed og moralen i vold ofte .   I april 2015 har bøgerne solgt mere end 60 millioner eksemplarer på verdensplan og er pr . Den fjerde og femte bind nåede toppen af The New York Times Best Seller lister på deres udgivelser . Blandt de mange afledte værker er flere prequel novellas , en tv-serie , en tegneserie tilpasning , og flere kort , bord, og videospil .
evidence_en: A Song of Ice and Fire is a series of epic fantasy novels by the American novelist and screenwriter George R. R. Martin . He began the first volume of the series , A Game of Thrones , in 1991 and had it published in 1996 . Martin , who initially envisioned the series as a trilogy , has published five out of a planned seven volumes . The fifth and most recent volume of the series published in 2011 , A Dance with Dragons , took Martin five years to write . He is still writing the sixth novel , The Winds of Winter .   A Song of Ice and Fire takes place on the fictional continents Westeros and Essos . The point of view of each chapter in the story is a limited perspective of a range of characters growing from nine , in the first novel , to thirty-one by the fifth . Three main stories interweave a dynastic war among several families for control of Westeros , the rising threat of the supernatural Others in the northernmost reaches of Westeros , and the ambition of Daenerys Targaryen , the deposed king 's exiled daughter , to assume the Iron Throne .   Martin 's inspirations included the Wars of the Roses and the French historical novels The Accursed Kings by Maurice Druon . A Song of Ice and Fire received praise for its diverse portrayal of women and religion , as well as its realism . An assortment of disparate and subjective points of view confronts the reader , and the success or survival of point of view characters is never assured . Within the often morally ambiguous world of A Song of Ice and Fire , questions concerning loyalty , pride , human sexuality , piety , and the morality of violence frequently arise .   As of April 2015 , the books have sold more than 60 million copies worldwide and , as of January 2017 , have been translated into 47 languages . The fourth and fifth volumes reached the top of The New York Times Best Seller lists upon their releases . Among the many derived works are several prequel novellas , a TV series , a comic book adaptation , and several card , board , and video games .

evidence_da: Ser Gregor Clegane , med tilnavnet The Mountain , er en fiktiv karakter i A Song of Ice and Fire serie af fantasy romaner af den amerikanske forfatter George R. R. Martin , og dens tv-tilpasning Game of Thrones . Han er en holder til House Lannister . En enorm mand , han er kendt for sin størrelse , dygtighed i kamp og grusomhed .   Indført i 1996 's A Game of Thrones , Gregor er den ældre bror til Sandor Clegane , fra den fiktive kongerige Westeros . Han optrådte efterfølgende i Martin 's A Clash of Kings-LRB- 1998 -RRB- , A Storm of Swords-LRB- 2000 -RRB- og i A Dance with Dragons -LRB- 2011 -RRB- som Ser Robert Strong .   Ridder Gregor Clegane er en stor ridder og den ældre bror til Sandor Clegane . Kaldet '' The Mountain That Rides '', han er kendt for sin utroligt grusomme natur og ukontrollabel temperament . Hans størrelse og styrke gør ham til en frygtindgydende kriger , og han har tjent et ry for grusomhed og brutalitet . Han er i stand til at svinge en to-hånds sværd en hånd . Da de var børn , Skubbede Gregor Sandors ansigt ind i en brazier , grusomt ardannelse ham .   Gregor Clegane er portrætteret af Conan Stevens i sæson et , af Ian Whyte i sæson to , og af Hafþór Júlíus Björnsson i sæson fire , fem og seks i HBO tv-tilpasning .
evidence_en: Ser Gregor Clegane , nicknamed The Mountain , is a fictional character in the A Song of Ice and Fire series of fantasy novels by American author George R. R. Martin , and its television adaptation Game of Thrones . He is a retainer to House Lannister . An enormous man , he is well known for his size , prowess in battle and cruelty .   Introduced in 1996 's A Game of Thrones , Gregor is the older brother of Sandor Clegane , from the fictional kingdom of Westeros . He subsequently appeared in Martin 's A Clash of Kings -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , A Storm of Swords -LRB- 2000 -RRB- and in A Dance with Dragons -LRB- 2011 -RRB- as Ser Robert Strong .   Ser Gregor Clegane is a huge knight and the elder brother of Sandor Clegane . Called `` The Mountain That Rides '' , he is known for his incredibly cruel nature and uncontrollable temper . His size and strength make him a fearsome warrior , and he has earned a reputation for cruelty and brutality . He is able to wield a two-handed sword one handed . When they were children , Gregor shoved Sandor 's face into a brazier , gruesomely scarring him .   Gregor Clegane is portrayed by Conan Stevens in season one , by Ian Whyte in season two , and by Hafþór Júlíus Björnsson in seasons four , five , and six in the HBO television adaptation .

evidence_da: A Game of Thrones er den første roman i A Song of Ice and Fire , en række fantasy romaner af den amerikanske forfatter George R. R. Martin . Den blev første gang udgivet den 1 . Romanen vandt Locus Award fra 1997 og blev nomineret til både Nebula-prisen i 1997 og World Fantasy Award i 1997 . Novellen Blood of the Dragon , bestående af Daenerys Targaryen kapitler fra romanen , vandt i 1997 Hugo Award for bedste Novella . I januar 2011 romanen blev en New York Times bestseller og nåede # 1 på listen i juli 2011 .   I romanen , fortælle begivenheder fra forskellige synspunkter , Martin introducerer plot-linjer af de ædle huse i Westeros , Muren , og Targaryens . Romanen har inspireret flere spin-off værker , herunder flere spil . Det er også grundlaget for den første sæson af Game of Thrones , en HBO tv-serie , der havde premiere i april 2011 . En marts 2013 paperback TV tie-in re-udgave var også titlen Game of Thrones , eksklusive den ubestemte artiklen '' A ''.
evidence_en: A Game of Thrones is the first novel in A Song of Ice and Fire , a series of fantasy novels by American author George R. R. Martin . It was first published on August 1 , 1996 . The novel won the 1997 Locus Award and was nominated for both the 1997 Nebula Award and the 1997 World Fantasy Award . The novella Blood of the Dragon , comprising the Daenerys Targaryen chapters from the novel , won the 1997 Hugo Award for Best Novella . In January 2011 the novel became a New York Times bestseller and reached # 1 on the list in July 2011 .   In the novel , recounting events from various points of view , Martin introduces the plot-lines of the noble houses of Westeros , the Wall , and the Targaryens . The novel has inspired several spin-off works , including several games . It is also the basis for the first season of Game of Thrones , an HBO television series that premiered in April 2011 . A March 2013 paperback TV tie-in re-edition was also titled Game of Thrones , excluding the indefinite article `` A '' .

evidence_da: George Washington -LRB- -LSB- dķיdķdייייtən -RSB- -- , 1799 -RRB- var en amerikansk politiker og soldat, der fungerede som den første præsident for USA fra 1789 til 1797 og var en af grundlæggerne af USA . Han fungerede som øverstkommanderende for den kontinentale hær under den amerikanske uafhængighedskrig , og senere præsiderede over 1787-konventionen, der udarbejdede USA's forfatning . Han betragtes populært som drivkraften bag nationens etablering og blev kendt som "" landets far , "" både i hans levetid og den dag i dag .   Washington var meget beundret for sine stærke lederegenskaber og blev enstemmigt valgt til præsident af Electoral College i de første to nationale valg . Han førte tilsyn med oprettelsen af en stærk , velfinansieret national regering , der opretholdt neutralitet i de franske revolutionære krige , undertrykte Whisky oprør , og vandt accept blandt amerikanere af alle typer . Washingtons incumbency etableret mange fortilfælde stadig i brug i dag , såsom kabinettet system , den konstituerende tale , og titlen Mr. President . Hans pensionering fra embedet efter to vilkår etableret en tradition, der varede indtil 1940, da Franklin Delano Roosevelt vandt en hidtil uset tredje periode . 22. Ændring -LRB- 1951 -RRB- nu begrænser præsidenten til to valgte vilkår .   Han blev født ind i provinsen sadel af Colonial Virginia til en familie af velhavende plantageejere, der ejede tobak plantager og slaver , som han arvede . I sin ungdom blev han højtstående officer i kolonimilitsen i de første faser af den franske og indiske krig . I 1775 bestilte den anden kontinentale kongres ham som øverstkommanderende for den kontinentale hær i den amerikanske revolution . I denne kommando tvang Washington briterne ud af Boston i 1776, men blev besejret og næsten fanget senere samme år, da han mistede New York City .   Efter at have krydset Delaware-floden midt om vinteren , besejrede han briterne i to slag -LRB- Trenton og Princeton -RRB- generobrede New Jersey , og genoprettede momentum til Patriot årsag . Hans strategi gjorde det muligt for kontinentale styrker at erobre to store britiske hære ved Saratoga i 1777 og Yorktown i 1781 . Historikere lovpriser Washington for udvælgelse og overvågning af hans generaler; bevarelse og kommando af hæren; koordinering med Kongressen, statslige guvernører, og deres milits ; og opmærksomhed på forsyninger, logistik og uddannelse . I kamp blev Washington imidlertid gentagne gange udmanøvreret af britiske generaler med større hære .   Efter sejren var blevet afsluttet i 1783 , Washington trådte tilbage som øverstkommanderende i stedet for at tage magten , bevise sin modstand mod diktatur og hans engagement i amerikansk republikanisme . Washington ledede forfatningskonventet i 1787 , som udtænkte en ny form for føderal regering for USA . Efter sit valg som præsident i 1789 arbejdede han på at forene rivaliserende fraktioner i den spirende nation . Han støttede Alexander Hamiltons programmer til at tilfredsstille al gæld , føderale og statslige , etableret et permanent sæde for regeringen , gennemført et effektivt skattesystem , og skabte en national bank . Ved at undgå krig med Storbritannien garanterede han et årti med fred og profitabel handel ved at sikre Jay-traktaten i 1795 på trods af intens modstand fra Jeffersonians . Han forblev upartisk , aldrig tiltræder det føderalistiske parti , selv om han i vid udstrækning støttede sin politik . Washington 's Farewell Address var en indflydelsesrig primer på borgerlige dyd , advarsel mod partipolitik , sektionalisme , og deltagelse i udenlandske krige . Han trak sig tilbage fra præsidentembedet i 1797 , vender tilbage til sit hjem og plantage på Mount Vernon .   Ved sin død blev Washington lovprist som '' først i krig , først i fred , og først i hjerterne på hans landsmænd '' af repræsentant Henry Lee III i Virginia . Han blev æret i livet og i døden; videnskabelige og offentlige afstemninger konsekvent rangerer ham blandt de tre bedste præsidenter i amerikansk historie . Han er blevet afbildet og husket i monumenter , offentlige arbejder, valuta og andre dedikationer til i dag .
evidence_en: George Washington -LRB- -LSB- ˈdʒɔɹdʒ_ˈwɒʃɪŋtən -RSB- -- , 1799 -RRB- was an American politician and soldier who served as the first President of the United States from 1789 to 1797 and was one of the Founding Fathers of the United States . He served as Commander-in-Chief of the Continental Army during the American Revolutionary War , and later presided over the 1787 convention that drafted the United States Constitution . He is popularly considered the driving force behind the nation 's establishment and came to be known as the `` father of the country , '' both during his lifetime and to this day .   Washington was widely admired for his strong leadership qualities and was unanimously elected president by the Electoral College in the first two national elections . He oversaw the creation of a strong , well-financed national government that maintained neutrality in the French Revolutionary Wars , suppressed the Whiskey Rebellion , and won acceptance among Americans of all types . Washington 's incumbency established many precedents still in use today , such as the cabinet system , the inaugural address , and the title Mr. President . His retirement from office after two terms established a tradition that lasted until 1940 when Franklin Delano Roosevelt won an unprecedented third term . The 22nd Amendment -LRB- 1951 -RRB- now limits the president to two elected terms .   He was born into the provincial gentry of Colonial Virginia to a family of wealthy planters who owned tobacco plantations and slaves , which he inherited . In his youth , he became a senior officer in the colonial militia during the first stages of the French and Indian War . In 1775 , the Second Continental Congress commissioned him as commander-in-chief of the Continental Army in the American Revolution . In that command , Washington forced the British out of Boston in 1776 but was defeated and nearly captured later that year when he lost New York City .   After crossing the Delaware River in the middle of winter , he defeated the British in two battles -LRB- Trenton and Princeton -RRB- , retook New Jersey , and restored momentum to the Patriot cause . His strategy enabled Continental forces to capture two major British armies at Saratoga in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781 . Historians laud Washington for the selection and supervision of his generals ; preservation and command of the army ; coordination with the Congress , state governors , and their militia ; and attention to supplies , logistics , and training . In battle , however , Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies .   After victory had been finalized in 1783 , Washington resigned as commander-in-chief rather than seize power , proving his opposition to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism . Washington presided over the Constitutional Convention in 1787 , which devised a new form of federal government for the United States . Following his election as president in 1789 , he worked to unify rival factions in the fledgling nation . He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to satisfy all debts , federal and state , established a permanent seat of government , implemented an effective tax system , and created a national bank . In avoiding war with Great Britain , he guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing the Jay Treaty in 1795 , despite intense opposition from the Jeffersonians . He remained non-partisan , never joining the Federalist Party , although he largely supported its policies . Washington 's Farewell Address was an influential primer on civic virtue , warning against partisanship , sectionalism , and involvement in foreign wars . He retired from the presidency in 1797 , returning to his home and plantation at Mount Vernon .   Upon his death , Washington was eulogized as `` first in war , first in peace , and first in the hearts of his countrymen '' by Representative Henry Lee III of Virginia . He was revered in life and in death ; scholarly and public polling consistently ranks him among the top three presidents in American history . He has been depicted and remembered in monuments , public works , currency , and other dedications to the present day .

evidence_en: Lisa Valerie Kudrow -LRB- -LSB- ` kuːdroʊ -RSB- born July 30 , 1963 -RRB- is an American actress , comedian , writer and producer . She gained worldwide recognition for her ten-season run as Phoebe Buffay and Ursula Buffay on the television sitcom Friends , for which she received many accolades , including six Emmy Award nominations , winning once in 1998 , and twelve Screen Actors Guild Award nominations , winning twice in 1996 and 2000 .   She went on to produce , write and star in the 2005 HBO series The Comeback , which was revived nine years later and began airing its second season in November 2014 . She received a nomination for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series for both seasons , in 2006 and 2015 respectively . She also starred in Web Therapy , which aired for four seasons on Showtime . As a producer of the series , she was nominated for an Emmy Award for Outstanding Special Class -- Short-Format Live-Action Entertainment Program for the show in 2012 . She is also one of the executive producers of the TLC reality program Who Do You Think You Are and was nominated for an Emmy Award for Outstanding Reality-Program for the series in 2012 and 2014 .   Away from television , Kudrow has also appeared in many films , including Romy and Michele 's High School Reunion -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , The Opposite of Sex -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , Analyze This -LRB- 1999 -RRB- and its sequel Analyze That -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , Dr. Dolittle 2 -LRB- 2001 -RRB- , Wonderland -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , Happy Endings -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , P.S. I Love You -LRB- 2007 -RRB- , Bandslam -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , Hotel for Dogs -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , Easy A -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Neighbors -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , its sequel Neighbors 2 : Sorority Rising -LRB- 2016 -RRB- and The Girl on the Train -LRB- 2016 -RRB- .

evidence_da: Cordozar Calvin Broadus , Jr. -LRB- født 20 oktober , 1971 -RRB-, kendt professionelt som Snoop Dogg-LRB- undertiden forkortet til Snoop og tidligere kaldet Snoop Doggy Dogg og Snoop Lion-RRB-, er en amerikansk rapper og skuespiller fra Long Beach , Californien . Hans musikkarriere begyndte i 1992, da han blev opdaget af Dr. Dre af N.W.A , og som følge heraf var fremtrædende figurerede i hele Dr. Dre 's solo debut album , The Chronic-LRB- 1992 -RRB- . Han har siden solgt over 23 millioner albums i USA og femogtredive millioner albums på verdensplan .   Snoop 's debut album , Doggystyle , blev udgivet i 1993 under Death Row Records , debuterede som nummer et på både Billboard 200 og Billboard Top R&B / Hip-Hop Albums hitlister . Salg næsten en million eksemplarer i den første uge af sin udgivelse , Doggystyle blev certificeret 4 × platin i 1994 og opfostrede flere hit singler , herunder '' Hvad 's My Name? '' og '' Gin & Juice ''. I 1994 snoop udgivet et soundtrack på Death Row Records for kortfilmen Murder Was The Case , stjernespækket sig selv . Hans andet album Tha Doggfather -LRB- 1996 -RRB- debuterede også som nummer et på begge hitlister med '' Snoop 's Upside Ya Head '', som den ledende single . Albummet blev certificeret dobbelt platin i 1997 .   Efter at have forladt Death Row Records , skrev Snoop kontrakt med No Limit Records , hvor han indspillede sine næste tre album . Da Game skal sælges , ikke at blive fortalt -LRB- 1998 -RRB-, No Limit Top Dogg -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , og Tha Last Meal -LRB- 2000 -RRB- . Snoop derefter underskrevet med Priority / Capitol / EMI Records i 2002 , hvor han udgav Betalt tha Cost to Be da Boss . Han skrev derefter kontrakt med Geffen Records i 2004 for sine næste tre albums R&G -LRB- Rhythm & Gangsta -RRB- : The Masterpiece , Tha Blue Carpet Treatment og Ego Trippin ' . Ondskab 'n Wonderland -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , og Doggumentary -LRB- 2011 -RRB- blev udgivet på Prioritet . Snoop Dogg har medvirket i film og været vært for flere tv-shows , herunder Doggy Fizzle Televizzle , Snoop Dogg 's Father Hood , og Dogg After Dark . Han træner også en ungdomsfodbold liga og high school fodboldhold . I september 2009 blev Snoop ansat af EMI som formand for en genaktiveret prioritetsjournal .   I 2012 , efter en tur til Jamaica , annoncerede Snoop en konvertering til Rastafari-bevægelsen og et nyt alias , Snoop Lion . Under den nye moniker , udgav han en reggae album , Reincarnated , og en dokumentarfilm af samme navn , af hans jamaicanske oplevelse , i begyndelsen af 2013 . Hans fjortende solo studiealbum , Coolaid , blev udgivet i juli 2016 .   Snoop Dogg har den tvivlsomme ære at have sytten Grammy nomineringer uden en sejr .   I marts 2016 , aftenen før WrestleMania 32 i Arlington , Texas , Snoop blev optaget i berømthed fløj af WWE Hall of Fame har gjort flere optrædener for virksomheden , herunder som Master of Ceremonies under en kamp på Wrestlemania XXIV .
evidence_en: Cordozar Calvin Broadus , Jr. -LRB- born October 20 , 1971 -RRB- , known professionally as Snoop Dogg -LRB- sometimes shortened to Snoop and formerly called Snoop Doggy Dogg and Snoop Lion -RRB- , is an American rapper and actor from Long Beach , California . His music career began in 1992 when he was discovered by Dr. Dre of N.W.A , and as a result was prominently featured throughout Dr. Dre 's solo debut album , The Chronic -LRB- 1992 -RRB- . He has since sold over twenty-three million albums in the United States and thirty-five million albums worldwide .   Snoop 's debut album , Doggystyle , was released in 1993 under Death Row Records , debuting at number one on both the Billboard 200 and Billboard Top R&B / Hip-Hop Albums charts . Selling almost a million copies in the first week of its release , Doggystyle became certified 4 × platinum in 1994 and spawned several hit singles , including `` What 's My Name ? '' and `` Gin & Juice '' . In 1994 Snoop released a soundtrack on Death Row Records for the short film Murder Was The Case , starring himself . His second album Tha Doggfather -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , also debuted at number one on both charts with `` Snoop 's Upside Ya Head '' , as the lead single . The album was certified double platinum in 1997 .   After leaving Death Row Records , Snoop signed with No Limit Records , where he recorded his next three albums . Da Game Is to Be Sold , Not to Be Told -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , No Limit Top Dogg -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , and Tha Last Meal -LRB- 2000 -RRB- . Snoop then signed with Priority/Capitol/EMI Records in 2002 , where he released Paid tha Cost to Be da Boss . He then signed with Geffen Records in 2004 for his next three albums R&G -LRB- Rhythm & Gangsta -RRB- : The Masterpiece , Tha Blue Carpet Treatment , and Ego Trippin ' . Malice 'n Wonderland -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , and Doggumentary -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , were released on Priority . Snoop Dogg has starred in motion pictures and hosted several television shows , including Doggy Fizzle Televizzle , Snoop Dogg 's Father Hood , and Dogg After Dark . He also coaches a youth football league and high school football team . In September 2009 , Snoop was hired by EMI as the chairman of a reactivated Priority Records .   In 2012 , after a trip to Jamaica , Snoop announced a conversion to the Rastafari movement and a new alias , Snoop Lion . Under the new moniker , he released a reggae album , Reincarnated , and a documentary film of the same name , of his Jamaican experience , in early 2013 . His fourteenth solo studio album , Coolaid , was released in July 2016 .   Snoop Dogg holds the dubious distinction of having seventeen Grammy nominations without a win .   In March 2016 , the night before WrestleMania 32 in Arlington , Texas , Snoop was inducted into the celebrity wing of the WWE Hall of Fame having made several appearances for the company , including as Master of Ceremonies during a match at Wrestlemania XXIV .

evidence_da: William Harrison Clanton -LRB- 1862 - 26 oktober 1881 -RRB- var en fredløs Cowboy i Cochise County , Arizona Territory . Han , sammen med sin far Newman Clanton og bror Ike Clanton , arbejdede en ranch nær Tombstone og stjal husdyr fra Mexico og senere amerikanske ranchers .   Han var medlem af gruppen af løst organiserede fredløse, der havde igangværende konflikter med lawmen Wyatt , Virgil , og Morgan Earp . Den Clantons gentagne gange truede Earps, fordi de blandede sig i Cowboys 'ulovlige aktiviteter . Oktober 26 , 1881 , Billy , Tom McLaury , og Frank McLaury blev dræbt i Gunfight på OK Corral i boomtown af Tombstone , Arizona Territory . Hans bror Ike var ubevæbnet og løb fra skyderiet . Skyderiet var hans eneste ildkamp. Ike indgivet mord anklager mod Earps , der senere blev frikendt for at have handlet i deres pligt som lovmænd .
evidence_en: William Harrison Clanton -LRB- 1862 -- October 26 , 1881 -RRB- was an outlaw Cowboy in Cochise County , Arizona Territory . He , along with his father Newman Clanton and brother Ike Clanton , worked a ranch near Tombstone and stole livestock from Mexico and later U.S. ranchers .   He was a member of group of loosely organized outlaws who had ongoing conflicts with lawmen Wyatt , Virgil , and Morgan Earp . The Clantons repeatedly threatened the Earps because they interfered with the Cowboys ' illegal activities . On October 26 , 1881 , Billy , Tom McLaury , and Frank McLaury were killed in the Gunfight at the O.K. Corral in the boomtown of Tombstone , Arizona Territory . His brother Ike was unarmed and ran from the gunfight . The shootout was his only gunfight . Ike filed murder charges against the Earps , who were later exonerated as having acted within their duty as lawmen .

evidence_da: En hadegruppe er en social gruppe , der går ind for og praktiserer had , fjendtlighed eller vold mod medlemmer af en race , etnicitet , nation , religion , køn , kønsidentitet , seksuel orientering eller enhver anden udpeget del af samfundet . Ifølge usa Federal Bureau of Investigation -LRB- FBI -RRB- en hadgruppe 's '' primære formål er at fremme fjendskab , fjendtlighed og ondskab mod personer , der tilhører en race , religion , handicap, seksuel orientering , eller etnicitet / national oprindelse , som adskiller sig fra, at medlemmerne af organisationen . '' Lærde har svært ved at definere udtrykket hadgruppe og '' om en bestemt gruppe skal klassificeres som en hadgruppe er undertiden i øjnene af beskueren . '' I USA , to private organisationer, der overvåger intolerance og hadgrupper er Anti-Bagvaskelse League-LRB- ADL-RRB- og Southern Poverty Law Center -LRB- SPLC-RRB-. De har lister over , hvad de anser for at være hadegrupper , overherredømmegrupper og antisemitiske , regeringsfjendtlige eller ekstremistiske grupper , der har begået hadforbrydelser . SPLC 's definition af en '' hadgruppe '' omfatter enhver gruppe med overbevisninger eller praksis, der angriber eller ondarter en hel klasse af mennesker - især når de egenskaber, der udskældte er uforanderlige . I det mindste for SPLC indebærer optagelse af en gruppe på listen »« imidlertid ikke en gruppe , der går ind for eller udøver vold eller anden kriminel aktivitet . »« Ifølge SPLC oplevede hadgruppeaktiviteten fra 2000 til 2008 en stigning på 50 procent i USA med i alt 926 aktive grupper . For nylig udtrykket alt-højre , kort for '' alternativ ret , '' er kommet i brug . Dette brede udtryk omfatter en række mennesker, der afviser mainstream konservatisme til fordel for former for konservatisme, der omfatter implicit eller eksplicit racisme eller hvid overherredømme . Alt-højre beskrives som "" en underlig blanding af gammeldags nynazister, konspirationsteoretikere , antiglobalister og unge højreorienterede internettrolde – alle forenet i den tro, at hvid mandlig identitet angribes af multikulturelle ,'politisk korrekte '' kræfter . '' FBI offentliggør ikke en liste over hadegrupper , og '' -LSB- I-RSB-nvestigations udføres kun, når der fremsættes en trussel eller fortalervirksomhed for magtanvendelse; når gruppen tilsyneladende har evnen til at udføre den proklamerede handling; og når handlingen ville udgøre en potentiel overtrædelse af føderale lovgivning . FBI vedligeholder statistikker om hadforbrydelser.
evidence_en: A hate group is a social group that advocates and practices hatred , hostility , or violence towards members of a race , ethnicity , nation , religion , gender , gender identity , sexual orientation or any other designated sector of society . According to the United States Federal Bureau of Investigation -LRB- FBI -RRB- , a hate group 's `` primary purpose is to promote animosity , hostility , and malice against persons belonging to a race , religion , disability , sexual orientation , or ethnicity/national origin which differs from that of the members of the organization . '' Scholars find it difficult to define the term hate group and `` whether a particular group is to be classified as a hate group is sometimes in the eye of the beholder . ''   In the US , two private organizations that monitor intolerance and hate groups are the Anti-Defamation League -LRB- ADL -RRB- and the Southern Poverty Law Center -LRB- SPLC -RRB- . They maintain lists of what they deem to be hate groups , supremacist groups and anti-Semitic , anti-government or extremist groups that have committed hate crimes . The SPLC 's definition of a `` hate group '' includes any group with beliefs or practices that attack or malign an entire class of people -- particularly when the characteristics being maligned are immutable . However , at least for the SPLC , inclusion of a group in the list `` does not imply a group advocates or engages in violence or other criminal activity . '' According to the SPLC , from 2000 to 2008 , hate group activity saw a 50 percent increase in the US , with a total of 926 active groups . Recently the term alt-right , short for `` alternative right , '' has come into usage . This broad term includes a range of people who reject mainstream conservatism in favor of forms of conservatism that embrace implicit or explicit racism or white supremacy . The alt-right is described as `` a weird mix of old-school neo-Nazis , conspiracy theorists , anti-globalists , and young right-wing internet trolls -- all united in the belief that white male identity is under attack by multicultural , `` politically correct '' forces . ''   The FBI does not publish a list of hate groups , and '' -LSB- I -RSB- nvestigations are conducted only when a threat or advocacy of force is made ; when the group has the apparent ability to carry out the proclaimed act ; and when the act would constitute a potential violation of federal law . The FBI maintains statistics on hate crimes .

evidence_en: Tokyo Ghoul is an upcoming Japanese dark fantasy action horror film based on the manga series Tokyo Ghoul by Sui Ishida . The film is directed by Kentarō Hagiwara and stars Masataka Kubota as Ken Kaneki and Fumika Shimizu as Tōka Kirishima . It is scheduled for release in Japan by Shochiku in the 29 July 2017 .

evidence_da: Bradford -LSB- 出brædfərd-RSB- er i Metropolitan Borough of the City of Bradford i West Yorkshire , England , ved foden af Pennines 8,6 mi vest for Leeds , og 16 mi nordvest for Wakefield . Bradford blev en kommunal bydel i 1847 , og fik sit charter som en by i 1897 . Efter kommunalreformen i 1974 blev bystatus skænket den bredere storbybyby .   Bradford er en del af byområdet West Yorkshire Urban Area, som i 2001 havde en befolkning på 1,5 millioner, og det er det fjerdestørste byområde i Det Forenede Kongerige med Bradford-underopdelingen af ovennævnte byområde med en befolkning på 528.155 .   Historisk set en del af West Riding of Yorkshire , Bradford steg til fremtrædende i løbet af 1800-tallet som et internationalt center for tekstilfremstilling , især uld . Det var en boomtown af den industrielle revolution, og blandt de tidligste industrialiserede bosættelser, hurtigt ved at blive den "" uld hovedstad i verden ''. Områdets adgang til en forsyning af kul, jernmalm og blødt vand lettede væksten i Bradfords produktionsgrundlag , hvilket i takt med tekstilproduktionen voksede , førte til en eksplosion i befolkningen og var et incitament til civile investeringer; Bradford har en stor mængde af børsnoterede victorianske arkitektur, herunder grand Italianate City Hall.   Tekstilsektoren i Bradford faldt fra midten af 1900-tallet . Siden da har Bradford vist sig som et turistmål , bliver den første UNESCO City of Film med attraktioner som National Science and Media Museum , Bradford City Park , Alhambra teater og Cartwright Hall . Bradford har imidlertid stået over for lignende udfordringer som resten af det postindustrielle område i Nordengland , herunder afindustrialisering , social uro og økonomisk afsavn .
evidence_en: Bradford -LSB- ˈbrædfərd -RSB- is in the Metropolitan Borough of the City of Bradford in West Yorkshire , England , in the foothills of the Pennines 8.6 mi west of Leeds , and 16 mi northwest of Wakefield . Bradford became a municipal borough in 1847 , and received its charter as a city in 1897 . Following local government reform in 1974 , city status was bestowed upon the wider metropolitan borough .   Bradford forms part of the West Yorkshire Urban Area conurbation which in 2001 had a population of 1.5 million and it is the fourth largest urban area in the United Kingdom with the Bradford subdivision of the aforementioned urban area having a population of 528,155 .   Historically a part of the West Riding of Yorkshire , Bradford rose to prominence during the 19th century as an international centre of textile manufacture , particularly wool . It was a boomtown of the Industrial Revolution , and amongst the earliest industrialised settlements , rapidly becoming the `` wool capital of the world '' . The area 's access to a supply of coal , iron ore and soft water facilitated the growth of Bradford 's manufacturing base , which , as textile manufacture grew , led to an explosion in population and was a stimulus to civic investment ; Bradford has a large amount of listed Victorian architecture including the grand Italianate City Hall .   The textile sector in Bradford fell into decline from the mid-20th century . Since this time , Bradford has emerged as a tourist destination , becoming the first UNESCO City of Film with attractions such as the National Science and Media Museum , Bradford City Park , the Alhambra theatre and Cartwright Hall . However , Bradford has faced similar challenges to the rest of the post-industrial area of Northern England , including deindustrialisation , social unrest and economic deprivation .

evidence_da: Jane Austen 's Emma er en tilpasning af 1815 roman af samme navn . Det blev tilpasset til det britiske tv-net ITV i 1996 , instrueret af Diarmuid Lawrence og dramatiseret af Andrew Davies , samme år som Miramax 's filmatisering af Emma stjernespækket Gwyneth Paltrow . Denne produktion af Emma stjerner Kate Beckinsale som titelkarakter , og også funktioner Samantha Morton som Harriet Smith og Mark Strong som Mr. Knightley .   Davies havde for nylig tilpasset en anden Austen roman som den vellykkede 1995 tv-serie Pride and Prejudice for BBC, da han foreslog at tilpasse romanen Emma til netværket . BBC havde allerede lavet en sådan aftale med en anden manuskriptforfatter dog , hvilket førte Davies til at nærme ITV .   Emma modtog generelt positive anmeldelser fra kritikere , der mente, at det var bedre end 1996 Miramax film . Mest fokuserede på Beckinsale 's præstation som en positiv højdepunkt . Det blev sendt på ITV på 24 November 1996 og høstet en anslået 12 millioner seere . Den blev også sendt på den amerikanske kanal A&E den 16. februar 1997 .
evidence_en: Jane Austen 's Emma is an adaptation of the 1815 novel of the same name . It was adapted for the British television network ITV in 1996 , directed by Diarmuid Lawrence and dramatised by Andrew Davies , the same year as Miramax 's film adaptation of Emma starring Gwyneth Paltrow . This production of Emma stars Kate Beckinsale as the title character , and also features Samantha Morton as Harriet Smith and Mark Strong as Mr. Knightley .   Davies had recently adapted another Austen novel as the successful 1995 television serial Pride and Prejudice for BBC when he proposed to adapt the novel Emma for the network . BBC had already made such an agreement with another screenwriter however , leading Davies to approach ITV .   Emma received generally positive reviews from critics , who believed it to be superior to the 1996 Miramax film . Most focused on Beckinsale 's performance as a positive highlight . It aired on ITV on the 24 November 1996 and garnered an estimated 12 million viewers . It also was broadcast on the American channel A&E in 16 February 1997 .

evidence_da: Stagira -LRB- -LSB- stəיdķdķaיrə -RSB- -RRB- , Stagirus -LRB- -LSB- stəיdķaיrəs -RSB- -RRB- , eller Stageira -LRB- Στάγειρα eller Στάγειρος -RRB- var en gammel græsk by , beliggende i det centrale Makedonien , nær østkysten af halvøen Chalkidice , og er hovedsageligt kendt for at være fødestedet for Aristoteles , som var en græsk filosof og polymath , en elev af Platon og lærer af Alexander den Store. Byen ligger ca. 8 km nordøst for den nuværende landsby Stagira, tæt på byen Olympiada.   Stagira blev grundlagt i 655 f.Kr. af ioniske bosættere fra Andros . Xerxes Jeg af Persien besatte det i 480 f.Kr. Byen sluttede sig senere til Delian League , ledet af Athen , men forlod i 424 f.Kr .: som følge heraf , den athenske demagog Cleon belejrede den i 422 f.Kr . Men Cleon var en dårlig strateg og hans adfærd af belejringen var meget ineffektiv : så meget, at den antikke græske komedie forfatter Aristophanes satirised ham i stykket The Knights . Cleon døde i samme år, i slaget ved Amphipolis . Senere , under den peloponnesiske krig , Stagira sidet med Sparta mod athenerne .   I 348 f.Kr. besatte og ødelagde Philip II af Macedon byen. Til gengæld for Aristoteles 's vejledning af sin søn Alexander , Philip senere genopbygget byen og genbosatte den gamle bys indbyggere, der var blevet gjort til slaver. Mange nye strukturer blev bygget på dette tidspunkt, herunder en akvædukt, to helligdomme til Demeter, og mange huse.
evidence_en: Stagira -LRB- -LSB- stəˈdʒaɪrə -RSB- -RRB- , Stagirus -LRB- -LSB- stəˈdʒaɪrəs -RSB- -RRB- , or Stageira -LRB- Στάγειρα or Στάγειρος -RRB- was an ancient Greek city , located in central Macedonia , near the eastern coast of the peninsula of Chalkidice , and is chiefly known for being the birthplace of Aristotle , who was a Greek philosopher and polymath , a student of Plato and teacher of Alexander the Great . The city lies approximately 8 km north northeast of the present-day village of Stagira , close to the town of Olympiada .   Stagira was founded in 655 BC by Ionian settlers from Andros . Xerxes I of Persia occupied it in 480 BC . The city later joined the Delian League , led by Athens , but left in 424 BC : as a result , the Athenian demagogue Cleon laid siege to it in 422 BC . However , Cleon was a poor strategist and his conduct of the siege was very inefficient : so much so that the ancient Greek comedy writer Aristophanes satirised him in the play The Knights . Cleon died in the same year , in the battle of Amphipolis . Later , during the Peloponnesian War , Stagira sided with Sparta against the Athenians .   In 348 BC , Philip II of Macedon occupied and destroyed the city . In return for Aristotle 's tutoring of his son Alexander , Philip later rebuilt the city and resettled the old city 's inhabitants , who had been enslaved . Many new structures were built at this time , including an aqueduct , two shrines to Demeter , and many houses .

evidence_en: Labor Pains -LRB- also known as Almost Pregnant in Mexico -RRB- is a 2009 romantic comedy film written by Stacy Kramer . evidence_da: Led Zeppelin II er det eponyme andet studiealbum af det engelske rockband Led Zeppelin , udgivet den 22. Indspilninger til albummet fandt sted flere steder i både Storbritannien og Nordamerika fra januar til august 1969 . Albummets produktion blev krediteret bandets lead guitarist og sangskriver Jimmy Page , og det fungerede også som Led Zeppelin 's første album til at udnytte optagelse teknikker ingeniør Eddie Kramer . Indarbejde flere elementer af blues og folkemusik , Led Zeppelin II udstillet bandets udviklende musikalske stil blues-afledt materiale og deres guitar riff-baseret lyd . Det er blevet beskrevet som bandets tungeste album .   Led Zeppelin II var en kommerciel succes , og var bandets første album til at nå nummer et på hitlisterne i Storbritannien og USA . I 1970 blev albummets coverdesigner David Juniper nomineret til en Grammy Award for Bedste Indspilningspakke . november 1999 blev albummet certificeret 12 × Platinum af Recording Industry Association of America -LRB- RIAA -RRB - for salg , der passerer 12 millioner eksemplarer . Siden sin udgivelse , forskellige forfattere og musikkritikere har regelmæssigt nævnt Led Zeppelin II som en af de største og mest indflydelsesrige rock albums gennem tiderne .
evidence_en: Led Zeppelin II is the eponymous second studio album by the English rock band Led Zeppelin , released on 22 October 1969 in the United States and on 31 October 1969 in the United Kingdom by Atlantic Records . Recording sessions for the album took place at several locations in both the United Kingdom and North America from January to August 1969 . The album 's production was credited to the band 's lead guitarist and songwriter Jimmy Page , and it also served as Led Zeppelin 's first album to utilise the recording techniques of the engineer Eddie Kramer . Incorporating several elements of blues and folk music , Led Zeppelin II exhibited the band 's evolving musical style of blues-derived material and their guitar riff-based sound . It has been described as the band 's heaviest album .   Led Zeppelin II was a commercial success , and was the band 's first album to reach number one on charts in the UK and the US . In 1970 , the album 's cover designer David Juniper was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Recording Package . On 15 November 1999 , the album was certified 12 × Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America -LRB- RIAA -RRB- for sales passing 12 million copies . Since its release , various writers and music critics have regularly cited Led Zeppelin II as one of the greatest and most influential rock albums of all time .

evidence_da: Peter Gene Hernandez -LRB- født 8 oktober , 1985 -RRB- , kendt professionelt som Bruno Mars -LRB- -LSB- -LSB- 出m-RSB- -RRB-, er en amerikansk singer-songwriter , multi-instrumentalist , pladeproducer , og koreograf . Født og opvokset i Honolulu , Hawaii , af en familie af musikere , Mars begyndte at lave musik i en ung alder og udføres i forskellige musikalske spillesteder i sin hjemby i hele sin barndom . Han dimitterede fra high school og flyttede til Los Angeles for at forfølge en musikalsk karriere . Efter at være blevet droppet af Motown Records , Mars underskrevet en pladekontrakt med Atlantic Records i 2009 .   I 2009 var han medstifter af produktionsteamet The Smeezingtons , der var ansvarlig for singlerne '' Nothin ' on You '' af B.o.B og '' Billionaire '' af Travie McCoy . Han optrådte på krogene for begge singler , bliver anerkendt som en solo kunstner . Hans debutstudiealbum Doo-Wops & Hooligans -LRB- 2010 -RRB- omfattede den amerikanske Billboard Hot 100 chart-topping singler '' Just the Way You Are '' og '' Grenade '' , samt nummer fire single '' The Lazy Song ''. Hans andet album , Uortodoks Jukebox -LRB- 2012 -RRB- toppede som nummer et i USA . Albummet affødte de internationale singler '' Locked Out of Heaven '', '' When I Was Your Man '' og '' Treasure ''. I 2014 lånte Mars sin vokal til Mark Ronson 's '' Uptown Funk '. I 2016 udgav han sit tredje studiealbum 24K Magic med den ledende single af samme titel udgivet den 7. Til dato har han solgt over 115 millioner singler og 9 millioner albums på verdensplan , hvilket gør ham til en af de bedst sælgende kunstnere gennem tiderne . Mars har landet syv nummer et singler på Billboard Hot 100 siden hans karriere blev lanceret i 2010 , nå sine første fem hurtigere end nogen mandlig kunstner siden Elvis Presley .   Mars har modtaget mange priser og nomineringer , herunder fem Grammy Awards , og blev udnævnt til en af Times 100 mest indflydelsesrige mennesker i verden i 2011 . I december 2013 , han rangeret nummer et på Forbes 30 under 30 liste . Mars er kendt for sine sceneforestillinger og retro showmanship . Han er ledsaget af sit band , The Hooligans , der spiller en række instrumenter såsom elektrisk guitar, bas, klaver, keyboards, trommer og horn , og også tjene som backup sangere og dansere . Mars udfører i en bred vifte af musikalske stilarter .
evidence_en: Peter Gene Hernandez -LRB- born October 8 , 1985 -RRB- , known professionally as Bruno Mars -LRB- -LSB- ˈmɑrz -RSB- -RRB- , is an American singer-songwriter , multi-instrumentalist , record producer , and choreographer . Born and raised in Honolulu , Hawaii , by a family of musicians , Mars began making music at a young age and performed in various musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood . He graduated from high school and moved to Los Angeles to pursue a musical career . After being dropped by Motown Records , Mars signed a recording contract with Atlantic Records in 2009 .   In 2009 , he co-founded the production team The Smeezingtons , responsible for the singles `` Nothin ' on You '' by B.o.B and `` Billionaire '' by Travie McCoy . He featured on the hooks for both singles , becoming recognized as a solo artist . His debut studio album Doo-Wops & Hooligans -LRB- 2010 -RRB- included the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart-topping singles `` Just the Way You Are '' and `` Grenade '' , as well as the number-four single `` The Lazy Song '' . His second album , Unorthodox Jukebox -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , peaked at number one in the United States . The album spawned the international singles `` Locked Out of Heaven '' , `` When I Was Your Man '' and `` Treasure '' . In 2014 , Mars lent his vocals to Mark Ronson 's `` Uptown Funk '' . In 2016 , he released his third studio album 24K Magic with the lead single of the same title released on October 7 , 2016 . To date , he has sold over 115 million singles and 9 million albums worldwide , making him one of the best-selling artists of all time . Mars has landed seven number-one singles on the Billboard Hot 100 since his career launched in 2010 , attaining his first five faster than any male artist since Elvis Presley .   Mars has received many awards and nominations , including five Grammy Awards , and was named one of Times 100 most influential people in the world in 2011 . In December 2013 , he ranked number one on the Forbes 30 under 30 list . Mars is known for his stage performances and retro showmanship . He is accompanied by his band , The Hooligans , who play a variety of instruments such as electric guitar , bass , piano , keyboards , drums and horns , and also serve as backup singers and dancers . Mars performs in a wide range of musical styles .

evidence_da: Zinedine Yazid Zidane -LRB- -LSB- zinedin zidan -RSB- født 23 Juni 1972 -RRB- , med tilnavnet '' Zizou '' , er en pensioneret fransk fodboldspiller og nuværende manager for Real Madrid . Han spillede som en angribende midtbanespiller for frankrigs landshold , Cannes , Bordeaux , Juventus og Real Madrid . En elite playmaker , kendt for sin elegance , vision, bold kontrol og teknik , Zidane blev udnævnt til den bedste europæiske fodboldspiller i de seneste 50 år i UEFA Golden Jubilee Poll . Han er bredt anerkendt som en af de største spillere gennem tiderne .   På klubniveau vandt Zidane La Liga-titlen og UEFA Champions League med Real Madrid , to Serie A-ligamesterskaber med Juventus og en Intercontinental Cup og en UEFA Super Cup hver med begge førnævnte hold . Hans 2001 overførsel fra Juventus til Real Madrid sat en verdensrekord gebyr på en tilsvarende 75 millioner dollars . Hans venstre-fod volleyed vinder i 2002 UEFA Champions League-finalen anses for at være en af de største mål i konkurrencens historie . På den internationale scene med Frankrig vandt Zidane FIFA World Cup i 1998 , hvor han scorede to gange i finalen og UEFA Euro 2000 , hvor han blev kåret som Player of the Tournament . Vm-triumfen gjorde ham til en national helt i Frankrig , og han modtog Légion d'honneur i 1998 .   Zidane blev udnævnt til FIFA World Player of the Year tre gange , i 1998 , 2000 og 2003 , og vandt ballon d'Or i 1998 . Han var Ligue 1 Player of the Year i 1996 , Serie A Footballer of the Year i 2001 og La Liga Bedste udenlandske spiller i 2002 . I 2004 blev han nævnt i FIFA 100 , en liste over verdens største levende spillere udarbejdet af Pelé . Zidane modtog Golden Ball for spiller i turneringen ved VM i 2006 , på trods af hans berygtede sende ud i finalen mod Italien for headbutting Marco Materazzi i brystet . Forud for VM , meddelte han, at han ville gå på pension i slutningen af turneringen .   Efter pensionering , Zidane blev assistent træner i Real Madrid under Carlo Ancelotti for 2013 - 14 sæsonen . Efter et succesfuldt år, hvor klubben vandt UEFA Champions League og Copa del Rey , Zidane blev træner for Real Madrid 's B hold , Real Madrid Castilla . I 2010 var Zidane ambassadør for Qatars vellykkede forsøg på at iscenesætte VM i fodbold i 2022 , det første arabiske land , der var vært for turneringen . Zidane er i øjeblikket manager for Real Madrid , der overtager stillingen i januar 2016 . I sin første sæson som manager vandt Zidane UEFA Champions League-titlen .
evidence_en: Zinedine Yazid Zidane -LRB- -LSB- zinedin zidan -RSB- , born 23 June 1972 -RRB- , nicknamed `` Zizou '' , is a retired French footballer and current manager of Real Madrid . He played as an attacking midfielder for the France national team , Cannes , Bordeaux , Juventus and Real Madrid . An elite playmaker , renowned for his elegance , vision , ball control and technique , Zidane was named the best European footballer of the past 50 years in the UEFA Golden Jubilee Poll . He is widely regarded as one of the greatest players of all time .   At club level , Zidane won the La Liga title and the UEFA Champions League with Real Madrid , two Serie A league championships with Juventus and an Intercontinental Cup and a UEFA Super Cup each with both aforementioned teams . His 2001 transfer from Juventus to Real Madrid set a world record fee of an equivalent $ 75 million . His left-foot volleyed winner in the 2002 UEFA Champions League Final is considered to be one of the greatest goals in the competition 's history . On the international stage with France , Zidane won the 1998 FIFA World Cup , scoring twice in the final , and UEFA Euro 2000 where he was named Player of the Tournament . The World Cup triumph made him a national hero in France , and he received the Légion d'honneur in 1998 .   Zidane was named the FIFA World Player of the Year three times , in 1998 , 2000 and 2003 , and won the 1998 Ballon d'Or . He was Ligue 1 Player of the Year in 1996 , Serie A Footballer of the Year in 2001 and La Liga Best Foreign Player in 2002 . In 2004 , he was named in the FIFA 100 , a list of the world 's greatest living players compiled by Pelé . Zidane received the Golden Ball for player of the tournament at the 2006 World Cup , despite his infamous sending off in the final against Italy for headbutting Marco Materazzi in the chest . Prior to the World Cup , he announced he would retire at the end of the tournament .   After retirement , Zidane became assistant coach at Real Madrid under Carlo Ancelotti for the 2013 -- 14 season . After a successful year in which the club won the UEFA Champions League and Copa del Rey , Zidane became the coach of Real Madrid 's B team , Real Madrid Castilla . In 2010 , Zidane was an ambassador for Qatar 's successful bid to stage the 2022 FIFA World Cup , the first Arab country to host the tournament . Zidane is currently the manager of Real Madrid , taking over the position in January 2016 . In his first season as manager , Zidane won the UEFA Champions League title .

evidence_da: Association fodbold , mere almindeligt kendt som fodbold eller fodbold , er et hold sport spillet mellem to hold af elleve spillere med en sfærisk bold . Det spilles af 250 millioner spillere i over 200 lande og afhængigheder gør det til verdens mest populære sport . Spillet spilles på et rektangulært felt med et mål i hver ende . Formålet med spillet er at score ved at få bolden ind i det modsatte mål .   Spillere er ikke tilladt at røre bolden med deres hænder eller arme, mens det er i spil, medmindre de er målmænd -LRB- og derefter kun når inden for deres straffesparksfelt-RRB- . Andre spillere primært bruge deres fødder til at strejke eller passere bolden, men kan også bruge deres hoved eller torso . Det hold, der scorer flest mål ved udgangen af kampen vinder . Hvis scoren er niveau i slutningen af spillet , enten en uafgjort er erklæret eller spillet går ind i ekstra tid eller en straffesparkskonkurrence afhængigt af formatet af konkurrencen . Lovene i spillet blev oprindeligt kodificeret i England af The Football Association i 1863 . Association football styres internationalt af International Federation of Association Football -LRB- FIFA; Fédération Internationale de Football Association -RRB- , som arrangerer VM for både mænd og kvinder hvert fjerde år .
evidence_en: Association football , more commonly known as football or soccer , is a team sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball . It is played by 250 million players in over 200 countries and dependencies making it the world 's most popular sport . The game is played on a rectangular field with a goal at each end . The object of the game is to score by getting the ball into the opposing goal .   Players are not allowed to touch the ball with their hands or arms while it is in play , unless they are goalkeepers -LRB- and then only when within their penalty area -RRB- . Other players mainly use their feet to strike or pass the ball , but may also use their head or torso . The team that scores the most goals by the end of the match wins . If the score is level at the end of the game , either a draw is declared or the game goes into extra time or a penalty shootout depending on the format of the competition . The Laws of the Game were originally codified in England by The Football Association in 1863 . Association football is governed internationally by the International Federation of Association Football -LRB- FIFA ; Fédération Internationale de Football Association -RRB- , which organises World Cups for both men and women every four years .

evidence_da: Sir Andrew Maxwell '' Andy '' Dwyer KBE -LSB- יdwaי.ər -RSB- er en fiktiv karakter i NBC komedie Parker og Fritid portrætteret af Chris Pratt . Oprindeligt beregnet til at være en midlertidig karakter , Andy var så likable, at producenterne spurgte Pratt tilbage som en serie regelmæssig . Han optræder i den første sæson som Ann Perkins ' arbejdsløse slacker kæreste , så tager et job som sko-shiner på Pawnee City Hall i den anden sæson . Andy i sidste ende gifter april Ludgate og er senere forfremmet til Leslie Knope 's assistent . Pratt blev krediteret som gæst stjerne for den første sæson, på trods af optræder i hver episode; han er en del af de vigtigste stemmer for hver sæson efter sæson et .   Andy er en af de få stjernespækket tegn ikke at blive vist i hver episode , da han var fraværende for en multi-episode bue i sæson seks, mens Chris Pratt filmede Guardians of the Galaxy .
evidence_en: Sir Andrew Maxwell `` Andy '' Dwyer KBE -LSB- ˈdwaɪ.ər -RSB- is a fictional character in the NBC comedy Parks and Recreation portrayed by Chris Pratt . Originally meant to be a temporary character , Andy was so likable that producers asked Pratt back as a series regular . He appears in the first season as Ann Perkins ' unemployed slacker boyfriend , then takes a job as a shoe-shiner at Pawnee City Hall in the second season . Andy eventually marries April Ludgate and is later promoted to Leslie Knope 's assistant . Pratt was credited as a guest star for the first season , despite appearing in every episode ; he is part of the main cast for every season after season one .   Andy is one of the few starring characters not to appear in every episode , as he was absent for a multi-episode arc in season six while Chris Pratt was filming Guardians of the Galaxy .

evidence_da: Memento er en 2000 amerikansk neo-noir psykologisk thriller film instrueret og skrevet af Christopher Nolan , og produceret af Suzanne og Jennifer Todd . Filmens manuskript var baseret på en pitch af Jonathan Nolan , der senere skrev historien '' Memento Mori '' fra konceptet . Det stjerner Guy Pearce , Carrie-Anne Moss , og Joe Pantoliano .   Pearce stjerner som en mand, der , som følge af en tidligere traumer , lider af anterograde hukommelsestab , den manglende evne til at danne nye erindringer og lider kortsigtede hukommelsestab cirka hvert femte minut . Han søger efter de personer, der angreb ham og dræbte sin kone , ved hjælp af et indviklet system af Polaroid fotografier og tatoveringer til at spore oplysninger, han ikke kan huske . Memento præsenteres som to forskellige sekvenser af scener afbrudt under filmen : en serie i sort-hvid, der er vist kronologisk , og en række farvesekvenser vist i omvendt rækkefølge -LRB- simulerer for publikum den mentale tilstand af hovedperson -RRB- . De to sekvenser '' mødes '' i slutningen af filmen, der producerer en komplet og sammenhængende fortælling .   September 2000 havde Memento premiere på Venedig International Film Festival og blev udgivet i europæiske teatre, der starter i oktober . Det blev en blockbuster succes , at blive rost af kritikere, der roste sin ikke-lineære narrative struktur og motiver af hukommelse , perception , sorg, og selvbedrag , og tjener 39.700 tusind dollars over en $ 9 millioner budget . Det modtog mange udmærkelser , herunder Academy Award nomineringer for bedste originale manuskript og bedste filmredigering . Filmen blev efterfølgende rangeret en af de bedste film i 2000'erne af flere kritikere og medier .
evidence_en: Memento is a 2000 American neo-noir psychological thriller film directed and written by Christopher Nolan , and produced by Suzanne and Jennifer Todd . The film 's script was based on a pitch by Jonathan Nolan , who later wrote the story `` Memento Mori '' from the concept . It stars Guy Pearce , Carrie-Anne Moss , and Joe Pantoliano .   Pearce stars as a man who , as a result of a past trauma , suffers from anterograde amnesia , the inability to form new memories and suffers short-term memory loss approximately every five minutes . He is searching for the persons who attacked him and killed his wife , using an intricate system of Polaroid photographs and tattoos to track information he can not remember . Memento is presented as two different sequences of scenes interspersed during the film : a series in black-and-white that is shown chronologically , and a series of color sequences shown in reverse order -LRB- simulating for the audience the mental state of the protagonist -RRB- . The two sequences `` meet '' at the end of the film , producing one complete and cohesive narrative .   Memento premiered on September 5 , 2000 , at the Venice International Film Festival and was released in European theaters starting in October . It became a blockbuster success , being acclaimed by critics who praised its nonlinear narrative structure and motifs of memory , perception , grief , and self-deception , and earning $ 39.7 million over a $ 9 million budget . It received numerous accolades , including Academy Award nominations for Best Original Screenplay and Best Film Editing . The film was subsequently ranked one of the best films of the 2000s by several critics and media outlets .

evidence_da: Joseph Michael Manganiello -LRB- -LSB- יmķיəיייי-RSB- ; -LSB- maķaķnjķllo -RSB- ; født December 28 , 1976 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller , instruktør , producent , forfatter og filantrop . Han spillede Flash Thompson i Sam Raimi 's Spider-Man trilogi og havde forskellige tilbagevendende roller i tv på ER , Hvordan jeg mødte din mor , og One Tree Hill , før landing hans breakout rolle som varulv Alcide Herveaux på HBO tv-serien True Blood . evidence_en: Joseph Michael Manganiello -LRB- -LSB- ˌmæŋɡəˈnɛloʊ -RSB- ; -LSB- maŋɡaˈnjɛllo -RSB- ; born December 28 , 1976 -RRB- is an American actor , director , producer , author and philanthropist . He played Flash Thompson in Sam Raimi 's Spider-Man trilogy and had various recurring roles in television on ER , How I Met Your Mother , and One Tree Hill , before landing his breakout role as werewolf Alcide Herveaux on the HBO television series True Blood . In 2011 , he was voted `` Favorite Pop-Culture Werewolf of All Time '' by the readers of Entertainment Weekly , and one of Men 's Health `` 100 Fittest Men of All Time '' .   Manganiello has appeared in films such as Magic Mike , What to Expect When You 're Expecting , and Sabotage . In late 2013 , he became a published author when his first book , Evolution , was released by Simon & Schuster 's Gallery Books . He is active with several charities , including Children 's Hospital of Pittsburgh of UPMC , and he serves on the committee of The Art of Elysium .
