I 2003 blev hun valgt som Californiens første african american kvindelige District Attorney of San Francisco , besejre etablerede Terence Hallinan . Hun blev genvalgt i 2007 og tjente fra 2004 til 2011 .   Harris blev valgt til Californiens justitsminister i 2010 og genvalgt i 2014 . Harris var den første kvinde , den første jamaicanske amerikaner , den første asiatiske amerikaner , den første indiske amerikaner , og den første afroamerikanske justitsminister i Californien .   November 8 , 2016 , hun besejrede Loretta Sanchez i 2016 amerikanske Senat valg til at erstatte afgående demokratiske senator Barbara Boxer , bliver den tredje kvinde af farve , første indiske amerikanske , og første biracial kvinde -LRB- sammen med Tammy Duckworth og Catherine Cortez Masto -RRB- valgt til at tjene i USA's Senat .
evidence_en: Kamala Devi Harris -LRB- -LSB- ˈkɑːmələ -RSB- born October 20 , 1964 -RRB- is an American attorney and politician who is the junior United States Senator from California . She is a member of the Democratic Party and served as the 32nd Attorney General of California .   Harris graduated from Howard University and University of California , Hastings College of the Law . She worked as a Deputy District Attorney in Alameda County , California -LRB- 1990 -- 98 -RRB- . She served as Managing Attorney of the Career Criminal Unit in the San Francisco District Attorney 's Office -LRB- 1998-2000 -RRB- and as Chief of the Community and Neighborhood Division in the office of San Francisco City Attorney -LRB- 2000 -- 03 -RRB- . In 2003 , she was elected as California 's first African American female District Attorney of San Francisco , defeating incumbent Terence Hallinan . She was re-elected in 2007 and served from 2004 to 2011 .   Harris was elected California 's Attorney General in 2010 and re-elected in 2014 . Harris was the first woman , the first Jamaican American , the first Asian American , the first Indian American , and the first African American attorney general in California .   On November 8 , 2016 , she defeated Loretta Sanchez in the 2016 U.S. Senate election to replace outgoing Democratic senator Barbara Boxer , becoming the third woman of color , first Indian American , and first biracial woman -LRB- alongside Tammy Duckworth and Catherine Cortez Masto -RRB- elected to serve in the United States Senate .

evidence_da: Jackson familien er en amerikansk familie af sangere, der opstod i Gary , Indiana . Optræder som medlemmer af The Jackson 5 og som solo kunstnere , børn af Joseph Walter og Katherine Esther Jackson var meget vellykket inden for populærmusik fra slutningen af 1960'erne og fremefter . Som en gruppe , de ældste sønner Jackie , Tito , Jermaine , Marlon , Randy og Michael , gjorde familiens omdømme, lette den efterfølgende succes søskende Rebbie , La Toya , og Janet . Jackson 5 blev kendt som '' First Family of Soul '' -LRB- en titel, der første gang blev afholdt af Five Stairsteps -RRB- . Den fortsatte succes Michael og Janet 's karriere som solo kunstnere førte Jacksons at blive kendt som '' Royal Family of Pop ''. Alle ni af De Jackson søskende har guld optegnelser til deres kreditter med La Toya holder den ære at være den første Jackson søster til at nå en-LRB-tildelt af Frankrigs SNEP for '' Reggae Night '', en sang hun co-skrev for Jimmy Cliff-RRB-. .   I de senere år er visse familiemedlemmer blevet hædret for deres arbejde; i 1997 Jackson 5 blev optaget til Rock and Roll Hall of Fame . Michael ville følge gruppen til hallen i 2001 . The Jacksons , Michael og Janet alle modtaget stjerner på Hollywood Walk of Fame i 1980 , 1984 og 1990 henholdsvis . evidence_en: The Jackson family is an American family of singers who originated in Gary , Indiana . Performing as members of The Jackson 5 and as solo artists , the children of Joseph Walter and Katherine Esther Jackson were very successful in the field of popular music from the late 1960s onwards . As a group , the eldest sons Jackie , Tito , Jermaine , Marlon , Randy and Michael , made the family 's reputation , facilitating the subsequent success of siblings Rebbie , La Toya , and Janet . The Jackson 5 became known as the `` First Family of Soul '' -LRB- a title first held by the Five Stairsteps -RRB- . The continued success of Michael and Janet 's careers as solo artists led the Jacksons to become known as the `` Royal Family of Pop '' . All nine of the Jackson siblings have gold records to their credits with La Toya holding the distinction of being the first Jackson sister to attain one -LRB- awarded by France 's SNEP for `` Reggae Night '' , a song she co-wrote for Jimmy Cliff -RRB- .   In recent years , certain members of the family have been honored for their work ; in 1997 The Jackson 5 was inducted to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame . Michael would follow the group to the hall in 2001 . The Jacksons , Michael and Janet all received stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1980 , 1984 and 1990 respectively . In 2009 a new series from A&E entitled The Jacksons : A Family Dynasty premiered documenting the Jackson brothers dealing with the sudden loss of Michael and preparing for a Jackson 5 Reunion tour .

evidence_da: Holland , -LRB- -LSB- יnəðərləndz -RSB- Nederland -LSB- יneיdərיlיnt -RSB- ; Nederlân -RRB , også uformelt kendt som Holland , er det vigtigste konstituerende land i Kongeriget Nederlandene . Det er et tætbefolket land beliggende i Vesteuropa med tre ø-territorier i Caribien.designated Bonaire , Sint Eustatius og Saba inden for ISO ISO 3166-1 . Den europæiske del af Nederlandene grænser op til Tyskland mod øst , Belgien mod syd og Nordsøen mod nordvest , der deler søgrænserne med Belgien , Det Forenede Kongerige og Tyskland .   De fire største byer i Holland er Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Haag og Utrecht -LRB- kollektivt kendt som G4 -RRB- . Amsterdam er landets hovedstad , mens Haag har det nederlandske sæde for parlament og regering . Rotterdamhavn er verdens største havn uden for Østasien og den største havn i Europa . Navnet Holland bruges uformelt til at henvise til hele Nederlandenes land.Formelt « Holland ' henviser kun til to af landets tolv provinser : Nordholland og Sydholland .   »« Nederlandene »« betyder bogstaveligt »« lavere lande »« , påvirket af dets lave land og flade geografi , idet kun ca. 50 % af landets jord overstiger en meter over havets overflade . De fleste af områderne under havets overflade er kunstige . Siden slutningen af 1500-tallet er store områder -LRB - polders -RRB - blevet tilbagebetalt fra havet og søerne , svarende til næsten 17 % af landets nuværende landmasse . Med en befolkningstæthed på 412 personer pr. km2 - 507 -LRB- januar 2017 -RRB - hvis vand er udelukket - klassificeres Nederlandene som et meget tætbefolket land . Kun Bangladesh , Sydkorea og Taiwan har både en større befolkning og højere befolkningstæthed . Ikke desto mindre er Nederlandene verdens næststørste eksportør af fødevarer og landbrugsprodukter efter USA . Dette skyldes til dels jordens frugtbarhed og det milde klima . Nederlandene var det tredje land i verden , der havde et valgt parlament , og siden 1848 har det været regeret som et parlamentarisk demokrati og et konstitutionelt monarki , organiseret som en enhedsstat . Nederlandene har en lang tradition for social tolerance og betragtes generelt som et liberalt land , der har legaliseret abort , prostitution og dødshjælp , samtidig med at der opretholdes en progressiv narkotikapolitik . I 2001 blev det verdens første land til at legalisere ægteskab mellem personer af samme køn .   Nederlandene er stiftende medlem af EU , Eurozonen , G-10 , NATO , OECD og WTO . ud over at være en del af Schengenområdet og den trilaterale Benelux-union . Landet er vært for Organisationen for Forbud mod Kemiske Våben og fem internationale domstole : Den Permanente Voldgiftsret , Den Internationale Domstol , Den Internationale Krigsforbryderdomstol for det Tidligere Jugoslavien , Den Internationale Straffedomstol og Den Særlige Domstol for Libanon . De første fire er beliggende i Haag , og det samme gælder EU 's kriminalefterretningsagentur Europol og det retlige samarbejdsagentur Eurojust . Dette har ført til byen bliver døbt '' verdens juridiske hovedstad . '' Landet rangerer også næsthøjest i verdens 2016 Press Freedom Index , som offentliggjort af Journalister Uden Grænser .   Nederlandene har en markedsbaseret blandet økonomi , der rangerer som nummer 17 af 177 lande i henhold til indekset for økonomisk frihed . Det havde den trettende højeste indkomst pr. indbygger i verden i 2013 ifølge Den Internationale Valutafond . I 2013 rangerede FN's verdenslykkerapport Nederlandene som det syvende lykkeligste land i verden , hvilket afspejler dets høje livskvalitet . Nederlandene rangerer også i fælles tredjehøjeste niveau i indekset for ulighedskorrigeret human udvikling sammen med Australien .
evidence_en: The Netherlands , -LRB- -LSB- ˈnɛðərləndz -RSB- Nederland -LSB- ˈneːdərˌlɑnt -RSB- ; Nederlân -RRB- also known informally as Holland , is the main constituent country of the Kingdom of the Netherlands . It is a densely populated country located in Western Europe with three island territories in the Caribbean.designated Bonaire , Sint Eustatius and Saba within ISO ISO 3166-1 . The European part of the Netherlands borders Germany to the east , Belgium to the south , and the North Sea to the northwest , sharing maritime borders with Belgium , the United Kingdom , and Germany .   The four largest cities in the Netherlands are Amsterdam , Rotterdam , The Hague and Utrecht -LRB- collectively known as G4 -RRB- . Amsterdam is the country 's capital , while The Hague holds the Dutch seat of parliament and government . The port of Rotterdam is the world 's largest port outside East-Asia , and the largest port in Europe . The name Holland is used informally to refer to the whole of the country of the Netherlands.Formally ` Holland ' refers only to two of the country 's twelve provinces : North Holland and South Holland .   `` Netherlands '' literally means `` lower countries '' , influenced by its low land and flat geography , with only about 50 % of its land exceeding one metre above sea level . Most of the areas below sea level are artificial . Since the late 16th century , large areas -LRB- polders -RRB- have been reclaimed from the sea and lakes , amounting to nearly 17 % of the country 's current land mass . With a population density of 412 people per km2 -- 507 -LRB- January 2017 -RRB- if water is excluded -- the Netherlands is classified as a very densely populated country . Only Bangladesh , South Korea , and Taiwan have both a larger population and higher population density . Nevertheless , the Netherlands is the world 's second-largest exporter of food and agricultural products , after the United States . This is partly due to the fertility of the soil and the mild climate . The Netherlands was the third country in the world to have an elected parliament , and since 1848 it has been governed as a parliamentary democracy and a constitutional monarchy , organised as a unitary state . The Netherlands has a long history of social tolerance and is generally regarded as a liberal country , having legalised abortion , prostitution and euthanasia , while maintaining a progressive drugs policy . In 2001 , it became the world 's first country to legalise same-sex marriage .   The Netherlands is a founding member of the EU , Eurozone , G-10 , NATO , OECD and WTO ; as well as being a part of the Schengen Area and the trilateral Benelux Union . The country is host to the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons and five international courts : the Permanent Court of Arbitration , the International Court of Justice , the International Criminal Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia , the International Criminal Court and the Special Tribunal for Lebanon . The first four are situated in The Hague , as is the EU 's criminal intelligence agency Europol and judicial co-operation agency Eurojust . This has led to the city being dubbed `` the world 's legal capital . '' The country also ranks second highest in the world 's 2016 Press Freedom Index , as published by Reporters Without Borders .   The Netherlands has a market-based mixed economy , ranking 17th of 177 countries according to the Index of Economic Freedom . It had the thirteenth-highest per capita income in the world in 2013 according to the International Monetary Fund . In 2013 , the United Nations World Happiness Report ranked the Netherlands as the seventh-happiest country in the world , reflecting its high quality of life . The Netherlands also ranks joint third highest in the Inequality-adjusted Human Development Index , along with Australia .

evidence_en: Geraldine Leigh Chaplin -LRB- born July 31 , 1944 -RRB- is a prolific actress of English , French , and Spanish language films , the fourth child of Charlie Chaplin , the first of eight with fourth wife Oona O'Neill . After beginnings in dance and modeling , she turned her attention to acting , and made her American acting debut -LRB- and came to prominence in what would be a Golden Globe -- nominated role -RRB- in her portrayal of Tonya in David Lean 's Doctor Zhivago -LRB- 1965 -RRB- . She made her Broadway acting debut in Lillian Hellman 's The Little Foxes in 1967 , and received her second Golden Globe nomination for Robert Altman 's Nashville -LRB- 1975 -RRB- . She also appeared in his other pictures , including Buffalo Bill and the Indians , or Sitting Bull 's History Lesson -LRB- 1976 -RRB- , and A Wedding -LRB- 1978 -RRB- . She received a BAFTA nomination for her role in Welcome to L.A. -LRB- 1976 -RRB- , and then appeared in Roseland -LRB- 1977 -RRB- and Remember My Name -LRB- 1978 -RRB- . She played her grandmother Hannah Chaplin in the biopic , Chaplin -LRB- 1992 -RRB- for which she received her third Golden Globe nomination . She also appeared in The Age of Innocence -LRB- 1993 -RRB- , Jane Eyre -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , Mother Teresa : In the Name of God 's Poor -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , and a decade later , in The Wolfman -LRB- 2010 -RRB- .   Chaplin has appeared in a wide variety of critically recognised Spanish and French films . She starred in Claude Lelouch 's Les Uns et les Autres -LRB- 1981 -RRB- , the Alain Resnais comedy Life Is a Bed of Roses -LRB- 1983 -RRB- and the Jacques Rivette experimental film Love on the Ground -LRB- 1984 -RRB- . She enjoyed her greatest critical success collaborating with Carlos Saura , starring in several notable films by the director , including Ana and the Wolves -LRB- 1973 -RRB- , Cría cuervos -LRB- 1976 -RRB- , Elisa , vida mía -LRB- 1977 -RRB- , and Mamá cumple cien años -LRB- 1979 -RRB- . She collaborated with Pedro Almodóvar in Talk to Her -LRB- 2002 -RRB- . She was awarded a Goya Award for her role in En la ciudad sin límites -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , and was nominated again for The Orphanage -LRB- 2007 -RRB- . Her contribution to Spanish cinema culminated in her being awarded the Gold medal by the Spanish Academy of Cinematographic Arts and Sciences in 2006 .   Chaplin had a long term relationship with Spanish film director Carlos Saura , giving birth to their son , Shane Suara , in 1976 . A subsequent long-term relationship with Chilean cinematographer Patricio Castilla -LRB- married , 2006 -RRB- , gave her a daughter , Oona , born 1986 . As of 2011 , Chaplin maintained homes in Miami , Florida , in the United States , and in Madrid , Spain , and Corsier-sur-Vevey , Switzerland .

evidence_da: Dwight David '' Ike '' Eisenhower -LRB- -LSB- יaķzənķ.ər -RSB- ; 14. oktober 1890 - 28. Han var en fem-stjernet general i den amerikanske hær under Anden Verdenskrig og fungerede som øverstbefalende for de allierede ekspeditionsstyrker i Europa . Han var ansvarlig for at planlægge og føre tilsyn med invasionen af Nordafrika i Operation Torch i 1942 - 43 og den vellykkede invasion af Frankrig og Tyskland i 1944 - 45 fra Vestfronten .   Eisenhower blev født i Denison , Texas , og opvokset i Kansas i en stor familie af det meste Pennsylvania hollandskafstamning af forældre med en stærk religiøs baggrund . Hans mor blev født en luthersk , gift som en flod brødre og senere konverteret til Jehovas Vidner . Eisenhower tilhørte ikke nogen pålydende værdi, før han var præsident . Han dimitterede fra West Point i 1915 og giftede sig senere med Mamie Doud , med hvem han havde to sønner . Verdenskrig blev han nægtet en anmodning om at tjene i Europa , i stedet for at lede en enhed uddannelse tank besætninger . Efter krigen gjorde han tjeneste under flere bemærkelsesværdige generaler og blev forfremmet til brigadegeneral i 1941 . Efter USA trådte Anden Verdenskrig , Eisenhower førte tilsyn med den vellykkede invasioner af Nordafrika og Sicilien, før tilsyn med invasionerne af Frankrig og Tyskland . Efter krigen fungerede Eisenhower som stabschef for hæren og derefter i en ubehagelig rolle som præsident for Columbia University . I 1951 - 52 , fungerede han som den første øverstbefalende for NATO .   Eisenhower kom ind i 1952 præsidentvalget race som en republikaner , for at blokere den udenlandske politik senator Robert A. Taft . Han vandt to jordskredsvalg , bliver den første republikanske vinder til at gøre det siden 1928 . Eisenhowers vigtigste mål i embedet var at dæmme op for Sovjetunionens udvidelse og reducere de føderale underskud . I 1953 truede han med at bruge atomvåben , indtil Kina indvilligede i at indgå betingelser vedrørende krigsfanger i Koreakrigen . En våbenhvile afsluttede den fastlåste konflikt . Hans New Look politik nukleare afskrækkelse prioriteret billige atomvåben og samtidig reducere finansieringen af dyre hær divisioner . Han fortsatte Trumans politik med at anerkende Republikken Kina som Kinas legitime regering , og han vandt Kongressens godkendelse af Formosa-resolutionen . Hans administration ydede stor støtte til at hjælpe franskmændene med at bekæmpe vietnamesiske kommunister i den første indokinakrig . Efter den franske venstre han gav stærk økonomisk støtte til den nye stat Sydvietnam . Han støttede lokale militærkup mod fjendtlige regeringer i Iran og Guatemala. Under Suez-krisen i 1956 fordømte Eisenhower den israelske , britiske og franske invasion af Egypten og tvang dem til at trække sig tilbage . Han fordømte også den sovjetiske invasion under den ungarske revolution i 1956, men tog ingen handling . Efter Sovjetunionen lancerede Sputnik i 1957 , Eisenhower godkendt oprettelsen af NASA , som førte til rumkapløbet . Under den syriske krise i 1957 godkendte han en CIA-MI6-plan om at iscenesætte falske grænsehændelser som en undskyldning for en invasion af Syriens provestlige naboer. Han indsatte 15.000 soldater under Krisen i Libanon i 1958. Ved afslutningen af sin embedsperiode kollapsede hans bestræbelser på at arrangere et topmøde med sovjetterne, da et amerikansk spionfly blev skudt ned over Rusland .   På den hjemlige front var Eisenhower en moderat konservativ , der fortsatte New Deal agenturer og udvidet Social Security . Han modsatte sig i det skjulte Joseph McCarthy og bidrog til afslutningen af McCarthyism ved åbent at påberåbe sig udøvende privilegium . Eisenhower var tilbageholdende med at støtte borgerlige rettigheder, men underskrev civilrights Act af 1957 og sendte hærens tropper til at håndhæve føderale retskendelser, der integrerede skoler i Little Rock , Arkansas . Hans største program var Interstate Highway System . Han fremmede etableringen af en stærk videnskab uddannelse via National Defense Education Act . Eisenhowers to betingelser oplevede udbredt økonomisk velstand med undtagelse af en mindre recession i 1958 . I sin afskedstale til nationen udtrykte Eisenhower sin bekymring over farerne ved massive militærudgifter , især underskudsudgifter og offentlige kontrakter til private militære producenter . Stemte Gallup 's mest beundrede mand tolv gange, han opnåede udbredt folkelig agtelse både i og uden for kontoret . Siden slutningen af 1900-tallet har konsensus blandt vestlige forskere konsekvent holdt Eisenhower som en af de største amerikanske præsidenter .
evidence_en: Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower -LRB- -LSB- ˈaɪzənˌhaʊ.ər -RSB- ; October 14 , 1890 -- March 28 , 1969 -RRB- was an American politician and Army general who served as the 34th President of the United States from 1953 until 1961 . He was a five-star general in the United States Army during World War II and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Forces in Europe . He was responsible for planning and supervising the invasion of North Africa in Operation Torch in 1942 -- 43 and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944 -- 45 from the Western Front .   Eisenhower was born in Denison , Texas , and raised in Kansas in a large family of mostly Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry by parents with a strong religious background . His mother was born a Lutheran , married as a River Brethren and later converted to Jehovah 's Witnesses . Eisenhower did not belong to any denomination until he was President . He graduated from West Point in 1915 and later married Mamie Doud , with whom he had two sons . During World War I , he was denied a request to serve in Europe , instead commanding a unit training tank crews . Following the war , he served under several notable generals , and was promoted to the rank of brigadier general in 1941 . After the U.S. entered World War II , Eisenhower oversaw the successful invasions of North Africa and Sicily before supervising the invasions of France and Germany . After the war , Eisenhower served as Army Chief of Staff and then in an uncomfortable role as president of Columbia University . In 1951 -- 52 , he served as the first Supreme Commander of NATO .   Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican , in order to block the foreign policies of Senator Robert A. Taft . He won two landslide elections , becoming the first Republican winner to do so since 1928 . Eisenhower 's main goals in office were to contain the expansion of the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits . In 1953 , he threatened the use of nuclear weapons until China agreed to terms regarding POWs in the Korean War . An armistice ended the stalemated conflict . His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence prioritized inexpensive nuclear weapons while reducing funding for expensive Army divisions . He continued Truman 's policy of recognizing the Republic of China as the legitimate government of China , and he won congressional approval of the Formosa Resolution . His administration provided major aid to help the French fight off Vietnamese Communists in the First Indochina War . After the French left he gave strong financial support to the new state of South Vietnam . He supported local military coups against hostile governments in Iran and Guatemala . During the Suez Crisis of 1956 , Eisenhower condemned the Israeli , British and French invasion of Egypt , and forced them to withdraw . He also condemned the Soviet invasion during the Hungarian Revolution of 1956 but took no action . After the Soviet Union launched Sputnik in 1957 , Eisenhower authorized the establishment of NASA , which led to the space race . During the Syrian Crisis of 1957 he approved a CIA-MI6 plan to stage fake border incidents as an excuse for an invasion by Syria 's pro-western neighbours . He deployed 15,000 soldiers during the 1958 Lebanon crisis . Near the end of his term , his efforts to set up a summit meeting with the Soviets collapsed when an American spy plane was shot down over Russia .   On the domestic front , Eisenhower was a moderate conservative who continued New Deal agencies and expanded Social Security . He covertly opposed Joseph McCarthy and contributed to the end of McCarthyism by openly invoking executive privilege . Eisenhower was reluctant to support civil rights but signed the Civil Rights Act of 1957 and sent Army troops to enforce federal court orders that integrated schools in Little Rock , Arkansas . His largest program was the Interstate Highway System . He promoted the establishment of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act . Eisenhower 's two terms saw widespread economic prosperity except for a minor recession in 1958 . In his farewell address to the nation , Eisenhower expressed his concerns about the dangers of massive military spending , particularly deficit spending and government contracts to private military manufacturers . Voted Gallup 's most admired man twelve times , he achieved widespread popular esteem both in and out of office . Since the late 20th century , consensus among Western scholars has consistently held Eisenhower as one of the greatest U.S. Presidents .

evidence_da: Stephen Robert Irwin -LRB- 22 Februar 1962 - 4 September 2006 -RRB-, med tilnavnet '' The Crocodile Hunter '' , var en australsk natur ekspert og tv-personlighed . Irwin opnået verdensomspændende berømmelse fra tv-serien The Crocodile Hunter , en internationalt broadcast dyreliv dokumentarfilm serie, som han co-vært med sin kone Terri . Sammen , parret også ejet og drevet Australien Zoo , grundlagt af Irwin 's forældre i Beerwah , omkring 80 km nord for Queensland state hovedstad Brisbane .   September 2006 efter at være blevet gennemboret i brystet af en stingray modhager, mens du optager en undervands dokumentarfilm med titlen Ocean 's Dødeligste . Sea Shepherd Conservation Society skibet blev opkaldt i hans ære .
evidence_en: Stephen Robert Irwin -LRB- 22 February 1962 -- 4 September 2006 -RRB- , nicknamed `` The Crocodile Hunter '' , was an Australian nature expert and television personality . Irwin achieved worldwide fame from the television series The Crocodile Hunter , an internationally broadcast wildlife documentary series which he co-hosted with his wife Terri . Together , the couple also owned and operated Australia Zoo , founded by Irwin 's parents in Beerwah , about 80 km north of the Queensland state capital city of Brisbane .   Irwin died on 4 September 2006 after being pierced in the chest by a stingray barb while filming an underwater documentary film titled Ocean 's Deadliest . The Sea Shepherd Conservation Society ship was named in his honour .

evidence_da: Super Nintendo Entertainment System-LRB- officielt forkortet Super NES eller SNES , og almindeligvis forkortet til Super Nintendo-RRB- er en 16-bit hjemme video spillekonsol udviklet af Nintendo, der blev udgivet i 1990 i Japan og Sydkorea , 1991 i Nordamerika , 1992 i Europa og Australasien -LRB- Oceanien -RRB- , og 1993 i Sydamerika . I Japan kaldes systemet forkortet . I Sydkorea , det er kendt som Super Comboy-LRB- 出出出出出出出 Syupeo Keomboi -RRB- og blev distribueret af Hyundai Electronics . Selv om hver version stort set er den samme , forhindrer flere former for regional lockout de forskellige versioner i at være kompatible med hinanden . Det blev udgivet i Brasilien september 2 , 1992 , af Playtronic .   Den SNES er Nintendos anden hjemmekonsol , efter Nintendo Entertainment System -LRB- NES -RRB- . Konsollen introducerede avanceret grafik og lydfunktioner sammenlignet med andre systemer på det tidspunkt . Udviklingen af en række ekstraudstyr spåner integreret i spil patroner bidraget til at holde det konkurrencedygtige på markedet .   Den SNES var en global succes , bliver den bedst sælgende konsol i 16-bit æra på trods af sin relativt sene start og den hårde konkurrence, det står over for i Nordamerika og Europa fra Sega 's Genesis / Mega Drive konsol . Den SNES forblev populær langt ind i 32-bit æra, og fortsætter med at være populær blandt fans , samlere , retro gamere, og emulering entusiaster , hvoraf nogle stadig gøre homebrew ROM billeder .
evidence_en: The Super Nintendo Entertainment System -LRB- officially abbreviated the Super NES or SNES , and commonly shortened to Super Nintendo -RRB- is a 16-bit home video game console developed by Nintendo that was released in 1990 in Japan and South Korea , 1991 in North America , 1992 in Europe and Australasia -LRB- Oceania -RRB- , and 1993 in South America . In Japan , the system is called the , or SFC for short . In South Korea , it is known as the Super Comboy -LRB- 슈퍼 컴보이 Syupeo Keomboi -RRB- and was distributed by Hyundai Electronics . Although each version is essentially the same , several forms of regional lockout prevent the different versions from being compatible with one another . It was released in Brazil on September 2 , 1992 , by Playtronic .   The SNES is Nintendo 's second home console , following the Nintendo Entertainment System -LRB- NES -RRB- . The console introduced advanced graphics and sound capabilities compared with other systems at the time . The development of a variety of enhancement chips integrated in game cartridges helped to keep it competitive in the marketplace .   The SNES was a global success , becoming the best-selling console of the 16-bit era despite its relatively late start and the fierce competition it faced in North America and Europe from Sega 's Genesis/Mega Drive console . The SNES remained popular well into the 32-bit era , and continues to be popular among fans , collectors , retro gamers , and emulation enthusiasts , some of whom still make homebrew ROM images .

evidence_da: Nintendo Co. , Ltd . Nintendo er en af verdens største videospil virksomheder ved markedsværdi . den blev grundlagt den 23 . I 1963 havde virksomheden prøvet flere små nichevirksomheder, såsom taxakørsel og kærlighedshoteller. Ordet Nintendo kan groft oversat fra japansk til engelsk som '' forlade held til himlen ''.   Opgive tidligere ventures til fordel for legetøj i 1960'erne , Nintendo derefter udviklet sig til et videospil selskab i 1970'erne , i sidste ende bliver en af de mest indflydelsesrige i branchen og Japans tredje mest værdifulde selskab med en markedsværdi på over 85 milliarder dollars . Fra 1992 til 2016 var Nintendo også hovedaktionær i Major League Baseball 's Seattle Mariners .   , Nintendo har et samlet salg på over 670,43 mio . Virksomheden har skabt og udgivet nogle af de mest kendte og bedst sælgende videospil franchises , såsom Mario , The Legend of Zelda , og Pokémon .
evidence_en: Nintendo Co. , Ltd. is a Japanese multinational consumer electronics and video game company headquartered in Kyoto , Japan . Nintendo is one of the world 's largest video game companies by market capitalization . Founded on 23 September 1889 by Fusajiro Yamauchi , it originally produced handmade hanafuda playing cards . By 1963 , the company had tried several small niche businesses , such as cab services and love hotels . The word Nintendo can be roughly translated from Japanese to English as `` leave luck to heaven '' .   Abandoning previous ventures in favor of toys in the 1960s , Nintendo then developed into a video game company in the 1970s , ultimately becoming one of the most influential in the industry and Japan 's third most-valuable company with a market value of over $ 85 billion . From 1992 until 2016 , Nintendo was also the majority shareholder of Major League Baseball 's Seattle Mariners .   , Nintendo has cumulative sales of over 670.43 million hardware units and 4.23 billion software units . The company has created and released some of the best-known and top-selling video game franchises , such as Mario , The Legend of Zelda , and Pokémon .

evidence_da: Willie Hugh Nelson -LRB- født April 29 , 1933 -RRB- er en amerikansk musiker , sanger , sangskriver , forfatter , digter , skuespiller , og aktivist . Den kritiske succes albummet Shotgun Willie -LRB- 1973 -RRB-, kombineret med den kritiske og kommercielle succes Red Headed Stranger-LRB- 1975 -RRB- og Stardust -LRB- 1978 -RRB-, gjorde Nelson en af de mest anerkendte kunstnere i country musik . Han var en af hovedpersonerne i fredløse land , en undergenre af country musik, der udviklede sig i slutningen af 1960'erne som en reaktion på de konservative restriktioner i Nashville lyd . Nelson har handlet i over 30 film , medforfatter flere bøger , og har været involveret i aktivisme for brugen af biobrændstoffer og legalisering af marihuana.   Født under den store depression , og rejst af hans bedsteforældre , Nelson skrev sin første sang i en alder af syv og sluttede sig til sit første band på ti . Under high school turnerede han lokalt med Den Bøhmiske Polka som deres forsanger og guitarist . Efter eksamen fra high school i 1950 , han sluttede sig til Air Force, men blev senere udskrevet på grund af rygproblemer . Efter sin tilbagevenden , Nelson deltog Baylor University i to år, men droppede ud, fordi han var lykkedes i musik . I løbet af denne tid, arbejdede han som en disk jockey i Texas radiostationer og en sanger i honky-tonks . Nelson flyttede til Vancouver , Washington , hvor han skrev '' Family Bible '' og indspillede sangen '' Lumberjack '' i 1956 . I 1958 flyttede han til Houston , Texas , efter at have underskrevet en kontrakt med D Records . Han sang på Esquire Ballroom ugentlige, og han arbejdede som en disk jockey . I løbet af denne tid , skrev han sange, der ville blive land standarder , herunder '' Funny How Time Slips Away '', '' Hello Walls '', '' Pretty Paper '' , og '' Crazy ''. I 1960 flyttede han til Nashville , Tennessee , og senere underskrevet en udgivelse kontrakt med Pamper Music, som tillod ham at slutte Ray Price 's band som bassist . I 1962 indspillede han sit første album , ... Og så skrev jeg . På grund af denne succes skrev Nelson kontrakt med RCA Victor i 1964 og sluttede sig til Grand Ole Opry det følgende år . Efter midten af diagrammet hits i slutningen af 1960'erne og begyndelsen af 1970'erne , Nelson pensioneret i 1972 og flyttede til Austin , Texas . Den igangværende musikscene af Austin motiverede Nelson til at vende tilbage fra pensionering , optræder ofte på Armadillo World Headquarters .   I 1973 , efter undertegnelsen med Atlantic Records , Nelson vendte sig til fredløse land , herunder albums som Shotgun Willie og Faser og Stages . I 1975 skiftede han til Columbia Records , hvor han indspillede det anmelderroste album Red Headed Stranger . Samme år, han indspillede en anden fredløs land album, Wanted ! The Outlaws , sammen med Waylon Jennings , Jessi Colter , og Tompall Glaser . I midten af 1980'erne , samtidig med at skabe hit albums som Honeysuckle Rose og optagelse hit sange som '' On the Road Again '', '' Til alle de piger, jeg 'har elsket før '' , og '' Pancho og Lefty '', han sluttede sig til landet supergruppe The Highwaymen , sammen med kolleger sangere Johnny Cash , Waylon Jennings , og Kris Kristofferson .   I 1990 blev Nelsons aktiver beslaglagt af Internal Revenue Service , som hævdede , at han skyldte . Vanskeligheden ved at betale sin udestående gæld blev forværret af svage investeringer , han havde foretaget i 1980'erne . I 1992 udgav Nelson IRS Tapes: Hvem 'll Buy My Memories ? ; overskuddet af dobbeltalbum - bestemt til IRS - og auktionen af Nelson 's aktiver ryddet hans gæld . I løbet af 1990'erne og 2000'erne fortsatte Nelson med at turnere i udstrakt grad og udgav albums hvert år . Anmeldelser varierede fra positiv til blandet . Han udforskede genrer som reggae, blues, jazz og folkemusik. Nelson gjorde sin første film optræden i 1979 filmen The Electric Horseman , efterfulgt af andre optrædener i film og på tv . Nelson er en stor liberal aktivist og medformand for det rådgivende organ for National Organization for the Reform of Marijuana Laws -LRB- NORML -RRB-, som går ind for marihuana legalisering . På miljøområdet ejer Nelson biodieselmærket Willie Nelson Biodiesel , som er fremstillet af vegetabilsk olie . Nelson er også æresformand for Advisory Board of the Texas Music Project , den officielle musik velgørenhed af staten Texas .
evidence_en: Willie Hugh Nelson -LRB- born April 29 , 1933 -RRB- is an American musician , singer , songwriter , author , poet , actor , and activist . The critical success of the album Shotgun Willie -LRB- 1973 -RRB- , combined with the critical and commercial success of Red Headed Stranger -LRB- 1975 -RRB- and Stardust -LRB- 1978 -RRB- , made Nelson one of the most recognized artists in country music . He was one of the main figures of outlaw country , a subgenre of country music that developed in the late 1960s as a reaction to the conservative restrictions of the Nashville sound . Nelson has acted in over 30 films , co-authored several books , and has been involved in activism for the use of biofuels and the legalization of marijuana .   Born during the Great Depression , and raised by his grandparents , Nelson wrote his first song at age seven and joined his first band at ten . During high school , he toured locally with the Bohemian Polka as their lead singer and guitar player . After graduating from high school in 1950 , he joined the Air Force but was later discharged due to back problems . After his return , Nelson attended Baylor University for two years but dropped out because he was succeeding in music . During this time , he worked as a disc jockey in Texas radio stations and a singer in honky-tonks . Nelson moved to Vancouver , Washington , where he wrote `` Family Bible '' and recorded the song `` Lumberjack '' in 1956 . In 1958 , he moved to Houston , Texas , after signing a contract with D Records . He sang at the Esquire Ballroom weekly and he worked as a disk jockey . During that time , he wrote songs that would become country standards , including `` Funny How Time Slips Away '' , `` Hello Walls '' , `` Pretty Paper '' , and `` Crazy '' . In 1960 he moved to Nashville , Tennessee , and later signed a publishing contract with Pamper Music which allowed him to join Ray Price 's band as a bassist . In 1962 , he recorded his first album , ... And Then I Wrote . Due to this success , Nelson signed in 1964 with RCA Victor and joined the Grand Ole Opry the following year . After mid-chart hits in the late 1960s and the early 1970s , Nelson retired in 1972 and moved to Austin , Texas . The ongoing music scene of Austin motivated Nelson to return from retirement , performing frequently at the Armadillo World Headquarters .   In 1973 , after signing with Atlantic Records , Nelson turned to outlaw country , including albums such as Shotgun Willie and Phases and Stages . In 1975 , he switched to Columbia Records , where he recorded the critically acclaimed album Red Headed Stranger . The same year , he recorded another outlaw country album , Wanted ! The Outlaws , along with Waylon Jennings , Jessi Colter , and Tompall Glaser . During the mid-1980s , while creating hit albums like Honeysuckle Rose and recording hit songs like `` On the Road Again '' , `` To All the Girls I 've Loved Before '' , and `` Pancho and Lefty '' , he joined the country supergroup The Highwaymen , along with fellow singers Johnny Cash , Waylon Jennings , and Kris Kristofferson .   In 1990 , Nelson 's assets were seized by the Internal Revenue Service , which claimed that he owed . The difficulty of paying his outstanding debt was aggravated by weak investments he had made during the 1980s . In 1992 , Nelson released The IRS Tapes : Who 'll Buy My Memories ? ; the profits of the double album -- destined to the IRS -- and the auction of Nelson 's assets cleared his debt . During the 1990s and 2000s , Nelson continued touring extensively , and released albums every year . Reviews ranged from positive to mixed . He explored genres such as reggae , blues , jazz , and folk . Nelson made his first movie appearance in the 1979 film The Electric Horseman , followed by other appearances in movies and on television . Nelson is a major liberal activist and the co-chair of the advisory board of the National Organization for the Reform of Marijuana Laws -LRB- NORML -RRB- , which is in favor of marijuana legalization . On the environmental front , Nelson owns the bio-diesel brand Willie Nelson Biodiesel , which is made from vegetable oil . Nelson is also the honorary chairman of the Advisory Board of the Texas Music Project , the official music charity of the state of Texas .

evidence_da: Paul Michael Levesque -LRB- født 27 juli , 1969 -RRB-, bedre kendt under ringnavnet Triple H-LRB- en forkortelse af hans oprindelige WWE ring navn Hunter Hearst Helmsley-RRB-, er en amerikansk business executive og professionel wrestler . Levesque er Executive Vice President for Talent , Live Events og Creative for WWE , samt at være grundlægger og senior producent af NXT og skaberen af NXT tv-serien .   Levesque begyndte sin professionelle wrestling karriere i International Wrestling Federation-LRB- IWF -RRB- i 1992 under ringnavnet Terra Ryzing . I 1994 sluttede han sig til World Championship Wrestling -LRB- WCW -RRB- hvor han snart blev ompakket som Jean-Paul Lévesque , en fransk canadisk aristokrat . I 1995 flyttede Levesque til World Wrestling Federation -LRB- WWF , nu WWE -RRB- , hvor han blev Hunter Hearst Helmsley og senere , Triple H . I 1997 var Triple H medstifter af den indflydelsesrige D-Generation X-stald , som blev et vigtigt element i WWF 's '' Attitude Era ''. Efter at have vundet sit første WWF Championship og begynder en historie ægteskab med Stephanie McMahon i 1999 , Triple H blev bredt anerkendt som den bedste wrestler i Nordamerika og et armatur af selskabets vigtigste begivenhed scene . I løbet af de næste to årtier vandt han i alt 14 verdensmesterskaber og førte stalde McMahon-Helmsley Faction , Evolution og The Authority . Fra 2010 og fremefter , Triple H indskrænket hans in-ring optrædener, da han tog på en større bag-the-scenes rolle i WWE . Efter lovligt at have giftet sig med McMahon i 2003 , blev han medlem af McMahon familien , som opretholder majoritetsejerskab af WWE .   I løbet af sin karriere har Levesque afholdt i alt 25 mesterskaber , herunder ni regerer som WWF /WWE Champion og fem som WWE's World Heavyweight Champion . Triple H var også vinder af King of the Ring-turneringen i 1997 og Royal Rumbles i 2002 og 2016. Han har overskriften WrestleMania , WWE 's flagskib pay-per-view , en rekord syv gange -LRB-bundet med Hulk Hogan-RRB-.   Uden for professionel brydning har Levesque optrådt adskillige gæsteoptrædener i film og på tv , herunder hovedrollen i WWE Studios-produktionen The Chaperone i 2011 .
evidence_en: Paul Michael Levesque -LRB- born July 27 , 1969 -RRB- , better known by the ring name Triple H -LRB- an abbreviation of his original WWE ring name Hunter Hearst Helmsley -RRB- , is an American business executive and professional wrestler . Levesque is the Executive Vice President of Talent , Live Events and Creative for WWE , as well as being the founder and senior producer of NXT and the creator of the NXT television series .   Levesque commenced his professional wrestling career in the International Wrestling Federation -LRB- IWF -RRB- in 1992 under the ring name Terra Ryzing . In 1994 , he joined World Championship Wrestling -LRB- WCW -RRB- , where he was soon repackaged as Jean-Paul Lévesque , a French Canadian aristocrat . In 1995 , Levesque moved to the World Wrestling Federation -LRB- WWF , now WWE -RRB- , where he became Hunter Hearst Helmsley and , later , Triple H . In 1997 , Triple H co-founded the influential D-Generation X stable , which became a major element of the WWF 's `` Attitude Era '' . After winning his first WWF Championship and beginning a storyline marriage with Stephanie McMahon in 1999 , Triple H became widely regarded as the best wrestler in North America and a fixture of the company 's main event scene . Over the next two decades , he won a total of 14 world championships and led stables The McMahon-Helmsley Faction , Evolution and The Authority . From 2010 onwards , Triple H curtailed his in-ring appearances as he took on a greater behind-the-scenes role within WWE . After legitimately marrying McMahon in 2003 , he became a member of the McMahon family , which maintains majority ownership of WWE .   In the course of his career , Levesque has held a total of 25 championships , including nine reigns as WWF/WWE Champion and five as WWE 's World Heavyweight Champion . Triple H was also the winner of the 1997 King of the Ring tournament and the 2002 and 2016 Royal Rumbles . He has headlined WrestleMania , WWE 's flagship pay-per-view , a record seven times -LRB- tied with Hulk Hogan -RRB- .   Outside of professional wrestling , Levesque has made numerous guest appearances in film and on television , including the lead role in the 2011 WWE Studios production The Chaperone .

evidence_da: Portal 2 er en 2011 first-person puzzle-platform videospil udviklet og udgivet af Valve Corporation . Det er efterfølgeren til Portal -LRB- 2007 -RRB- og blev udgivet den 19. Detailversionerne af spillet distribueres af Electronic Arts, mens onlinedistribution af Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X og Linux versioner håndteres af Valves indholdsleveringstjeneste Steam . Portal 2 blev annonceret i marts 5 , 2010 , efter en uge-lang alternativ virkelighed spil baseret på nye patches til det oprindelige spil . Før spillets udgivelse på Steam udgav virksomheden kartoffelsækken , et andet multiugealternativt reality-spil , der omfattede 13 uafhængigt udviklede titler , som kulminerede i en distribueret computerspoof for at frigive Portal 2 flere timer for tidligt .   Spillet bevarer Portals gameplay elementer , og tilføjer nye funktioner , herunder traktor bjælker , laser omdirigering , broer lavet af lys , og maling-lignende ' geler ' fremskynde spillerens hastighed , så spilleren-karakter til at hoppe højere eller placere portaler på nogen Overflade. Disse geler blev skabt af holdet fra Independent Games Festival-vindende DigiPen studerende projekt Tag: The Power of Paint . I single-player kampagne , spilleren styrer hovedpersonEn Chell , vækket fra suspenderet animation efter mange år , der skal navigere i den nu faldefærdige Aperture Science Enrichment Center under sin genopbygning af den genaktiverede GLaDOS , en kraftfuld Supercomputer. Historien introducerer nye figurer , herunder Wheatley -LRB- Stephen Merchant -RRB- og Cave Johnson -LRB- Jk Simmons -RRB- . Ellen McLain reprised rollen som GLaDOS . Jonathan Coulton og The National hver produceret en sang til spillet . Portal 2 indeholder også en to-player kooperativ mode, hvor robot spiller-tegn Atlas og P-Body-LRB- begge udtrykt af Dee Bradley Baker-RRB- er hver givet en portal pistol og er forpligtet til at arbejde sammen om at løse gåder . Valve forudsat post-release støtte til spillet, herunder yderligere downloades indhold og en forenklet kort editor til at give spillerne mulighed for at skabe og dele test kamre med andre .   Selv om nogle anmeldere i første omgang udtrykte bekymring over vanskeligheden ved at udvide Portal til en fuld efterfølger , modtog Portal 2 kritikerros , især for sin skrivning , pacing og mørk humor . Stemmearbejdet i McLain , Merchant og Simmons blev også rost , ligesom de nye gameplay elementer , den udfordrende, men overvindelige indlæringskurve , og den ekstra kooperative tilstand . Nogle journalister rangeret Portal 2 blandt de bedste spil i 2011 , og flere kaldte det deres Game of the Year . Portal 2 er siden blevet hyldet som en af de største videospil gennem tiderne .
evidence_en: Portal 2 is a 2011 first-person puzzle-platform video game developed and published by Valve Corporation . It is the sequel to Portal -LRB- 2007 -RRB- and was released on April 19 , 2011 , for Microsoft Windows , OS X , Linux , PlayStation 3 , and Xbox 360 . The retail versions of the game are distributed by Electronic Arts while online distribution of the Microsoft Windows , Mac OS X and Linux versions is handled by Valve 's content delivery service Steam . Portal 2 was announced on March 5 , 2010 , following a week-long alternate reality game based on new patches to the original game . Before the game 's release on Steam , the company released the Potato Sack , a second multi-week alternate reality game , involving 13 independently developed titles which culminated in a distributed computing spoof to release Portal 2 several hours early .   The game retains Portals gameplay elements , and adds new features , including tractor beams , laser redirection , bridges made of light , and paint-like ` gels ' accelerating the player 's speed , allowing the player-character to jump higher or place portals on any surface . These gels were created by the team from the Independent Games Festival-winning DigiPen student project Tag : The Power of Paint . In the single-player campaign , the player controls protagonist Chell , awoken from suspended animation after many years , who must navigate the now-dilapidated Aperture Science Enrichment Center during its reconstruction by the reactivated GLaDOS , a powerful supercomputer . The storyline introduces new characters , including Wheatley -LRB- Stephen Merchant -RRB- and Cave Johnson -LRB- J. K. Simmons -RRB- . Ellen McLain reprised the role of GLaDOS . Jonathan Coulton and The National each produced a song for the game . Portal 2 also includes a two-player cooperative mode , in which the robotic player-characters Atlas and P-Body -LRB- both voiced by Dee Bradley Baker -RRB- are each given a portal gun and are required to work together to solve puzzles . Valve provided post-release support for the game , including additional downloadable content and a simplified map editor to allow players to create and share test chambers with others .   Although some reviewers initially expressed concerns about the difficulty of expanding Portal into a full sequel , Portal 2 received critical acclaim , particularly for its writing , pacing , and dark humor . The voice work of McLain , Merchant , and Simmons were also praised , as were the new gameplay elements , the challenging but surmountable learning curve , and the additional cooperative mode . Some journalists ranked Portal 2 among the best games of 2011 , and several named it their Game of the Year . Portal 2 has since been hailed as one of the greatest video games of all time .

evidence_da: PlayStation 3 -LRB- PS3 -RRB - er en hjemmespillekonsol udviklet af Sony Interactive Entertainment. Det er efterfølgeren til PlayStation 2 , og er en del af PlayStation mærke af konsoller . november 2006 , i Japan , November 17 , 2006 , i Nordamerika , og marts 23 , 2007 , i Europa og Australien . PlayStation 3 konkurrerer primært mod konsoller som Microsofts Xbox 360 og Nintendos Wii som en del af den syvende generation af spillekonsoller .   Konsollen blev først officielt annonceret på E3 2005 , og blev udgivet i slutningen af 2006 . Det var den første konsol til at bruge Blu-ray Disc som sin primære lagermedium . Konsollen var den første PlayStation, der integrerer sociale spiltjenester , herunder at være den første til at introducere Sonys sociale spiltjeneste, PlayStation Network og dens fjernforbindelse til PlayStation Portable og PlayStation Vita , der kan fjern styre konsollen fra enhederne . I september 2009 blev Slim-modellen til PlayStation 3 udgivet . Det er ikke længere gav hardware evne til at køre PS2 spil . Det var lettere og tyndere end den oprindelige version , og fremhævede en nydesignet logo og markedsføring design, samt en mindre start-up ændring i software . En Super Slim variation blev derefter udgivet i slutningen af 2012 , yderligere raffinering og redesigne konsollen .   Systemet havde en langsom start på markedet , men det lykkedes at komme sig , især efter indførelsen af Slim-modellen . Fra marts 2016 har PlayStation 3 solgt 85 millioner enheder på verdensplan , hvilket har sat det på niveau med Xbox 360 , men bag Wii . Dens efterfølger , PlayStation 4 , blev udgivet senere i november 2013 . september 2015 bekræftede Sony , at salget af PlayStation 3 skulle ophøre i New Zealand , men systemet forbliver i produktion på andre markeder . I marts 2017 blev det officielle websted for PlayStation 3 i Japan opdateret for at fastslå , at det snart ville blive afbrudt .   maj 2017 blev PlayStation 3 afbrudt i Japan , fra 2015 , PS3 bliver afbrudt i visse dele af verden .  PlayStation 3 vil snart blive afbrudt på verdensplan .
evidence_en: The PlayStation 3 -LRB- PS3 -RRB- is a home video game console developed by Sony Interactive Entertainment . It is the successor to PlayStation 2 , and is part of the PlayStation brand of consoles . It was first released on November 11 , 2006 , in Japan , November 17 , 2006 , in North America , and March 23 , 2007 , in Europe and Australia . The PlayStation 3 mainly competes against consoles such as Microsoft 's Xbox 360 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles .   The console was first officially announced at E3 2005 , and was released at the end of 2006 . It was the first console to use Blu-ray Disc as its primary storage medium . The console was the first PlayStation to integrate social gaming services , including being the first to introduce Sony 's social gaming service , PlayStation Network , and its remote connectivity with PlayStation Portable and PlayStation Vita , being able to remote control the console from the devices . In September 2009 , the Slim model of the PlayStation 3 was released . It no longer provided the hardware ability to run PS2 games . It was lighter and thinner than the original version , and featured a redesigned logo and marketing design , as well as a minor start-up change in software . A Super Slim variation was then released in late 2012 , further refining and redesigning the console .   The system had a slow start in the market but managed to recover , particularly after the introduction of the Slim model . As of March 2016 , PlayStation 3 has sold 85 million units worldwide , putting it about on par with Xbox 360 , but behind the Wii . Its successor , the PlayStation 4 , was released later in November 2013 . On September 29 , 2015 , Sony confirmed that sales of the PlayStation 3 were to be discontinued in New Zealand , but the system remains in production in other markets . In March 2017 , the official site for PlayStation 3 in Japan was updated to state that it would be discontinued soon .   On 29 May 2017 , the PlayStation 3 was discontinued in Japan , as of 2015 , the PS3 is getting discontinued in certain parts of the world .  The PlayStation 3 will be discontinued worldwide soon .

evidence_da: '' Take a Bow '' er en sang af den amerikanske sanger Madonna fra hendes sjette studiealbum Bedtime Stories -LRB- 1994 -RRB- . Det blev udgivet som albummets anden single på November 29 , 1994 , af Maverick Records . Det er en midtempo pop ballade skrevet og produceret af Madonna og Babyface . Sangen vises også på hendes opsamlingsalbum Something to Remember -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , GHV2 -LRB- 2001 -RRB- og Celebration-LRB- 2009 -RRB- . Efter seksuelt eksplicit persona portrætteret af Madonna på hendes tidligere album , Erotica , sangeren ønskede at nedtone hendes billede for Bedtime Stories . Hun begyndte at samarbejde med Babyface , hvis arbejde med andre musikere havde imponeret hende. '' Take a Bow '' blev udviklet fra dette samarbejde , efter Madonna lyttede til beat og akkorder af demo struktur af sangen .   Optaget på The Hit Factory Studios i New York , '' Take a Bow '' blev bakket op af et fuldt orkester . Det var også første gang, at Babyface havde arbejdet med levende strenge, pr Madonna 's forslag. Indeholder orientalske pentatoniske strenge, hvilket giver indtryk af kinesisk eller japansk opera , '' Tag en bue '' lyrisk taler om ulykkelig kærlighed , og Madonna siger farvel. Det modtog positive anmeldelser fra musikkritikere , der roste sangens sjælfulde, poetiske tekster . Det var en kommerciel succes i USA , bliver Madonna 's ellevte nummer et single på Billboard Hot 100 , topping diagrammet i syv uger . Det nåede også nummer et i Canada , og top ti i Italien , Schweiz og New Zealand . Singlen havde moderat succes i Det Forenede Kongerige , nåede nummer 16 på uk Singles Chart , slutter Madonnas rekord-bedrift streng af 35 på hinanden følgende top-ti hits der .   Musikvideoen til '' Take a Bow '' blev instrueret af Michael Haussman , og blev filmet i Ronda , Spanien . Videoen skildrer Madonna som en tyrefægter 's-LRB- spillet af det virkelige liv spanske tyrefægter Emilio Muñoz-RRB-forsømt elsker, længsel efter sin kærlighed . Det vandt Best Female Video award på 1995 MTV Video Music Awards . Journalistisk og akademisk analyse af videoen omfattede dens plotline , brug af religiøse ikonografi , temaer og motiver af feminisme og underkastelse , samt dens indvirkning på moderne musikvideoer . For at fremme Bedtime Stories , Madonna udført '' Take a Bow '' ved et par lejligheder, herunder live med Babyface på 1995 American Music Awards . I 2016 føjede hun sangen til setlist en af de asiatiske og oceaniske ben af hendes Rebel Heart Tour og hendes engangs-Sydney koncert Madonna : Tears of a Clown .
evidence_en: `` Take a Bow '' is a song by American singer Madonna from her sixth studio album Bedtime Stories -LRB- 1994 -RRB- . It was released as the album 's second single on November 29 , 1994 , by Maverick Records . It is a midtempo pop ballad written and produced by Madonna and Babyface . The song also appears on her compilation albums Something to Remember -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , GHV2 -LRB- 2001 -RRB- and Celebration -LRB- 2009 -RRB- . Following the sexually explicit persona portrayed by Madonna on her previous album , Erotica , the singer wanted to tone down her image for Bedtime Stories . She started collaborating with Babyface , whose work with other musicians had impressed her . `` Take a Bow '' was developed from this collaboration , after Madonna listened to the beat and the chords of the demo structure of the song .   Recorded at The Hit Factory Studios in New York , `` Take a Bow '' was backed by a full orchestra . It was also the first time that Babyface had worked with live strings , per Madonna 's suggestion . Containing oriental pentatonic strings , giving the impression of Chinese or Japanese opera , `` Take a Bow '' lyrically talks about unrequited love , and Madonna saying goodbye . It received favorable reviews from music critics , who praised the song 's soulful , poetic lyrics . It was a commercial success in the United States , becoming Madonna 's eleventh number-one single on the Billboard Hot 100 , topping the chart for seven weeks . It also reached number one in Canada , and the top ten in Italy , Switzerland and New Zealand . The single had moderate success in the United Kingdom , reaching number 16 on the UK Singles Chart , ending Madonna 's record-holding string of 35 consecutive top-ten hits there .   The music video for `` Take a Bow '' was directed by Michael Haussman , and was filmed in Ronda , Spain . The video depicts Madonna as a bullfighter 's -LRB- played by real-life Spanish bullfighter Emilio Muñoz -RRB- neglected lover , yearning for his love . It won the Best Female Video award at the 1995 MTV Video Music Awards . Journalistic and academic analysis of the video included its plotline , usage of religious iconography , themes and motifs of feminism and submission , as well as its impact on contemporary music videos . In order to promote Bedtime Stories , Madonna performed `` Take a Bow '' on a few occasions , including live with Babyface at the 1995 American Music Awards . In 2016 , she added the song to the setlist of the Asian and Oceanian legs of her Rebel Heart Tour and her one-off Sydney concert Madonna : Tears of a Clown .

Episoden - der foregår i en alternativ virkelighed, hvor de fleste mennesker har '' korn '' optage alt, hvad de gør, se , eller høre , og giver dem mulighed for at afspille deres erindringer foran deres øjne eller på en skærm , fortæller historien om Liam-LRB- Toby Kebbell-RRB-, en mand, der s tarts mistanke om, at hans kone Ffion-LRB- Jodie Whittaker-RRB- kan have en affære . evidence_en: `` The Entire History of You '' is the third episode of the first series of British science fiction anthology series Black Mirror . It was written by the creator of Peep Show and Fresh Meat , Jesse Armstrong , making it the only episode of the series not written or co-written by creator and showrunner Charlie Brooker . It was directed by Brian Welsh , and first aired on Channel 4 on 18 December 2011 .   The episode , set in an alternative reality where most people have `` grains '' recording everything they do , see , or hear , and allowing them to play back their memories in front of their eyes or on a screen , tells the story of Liam -LRB- Toby Kebbell -RRB- , a man who starts suspecting that his wife Ffion -LRB- Jodie Whittaker -RRB- might have an affair .   `` The Entire History of You '' received positive reviews . In 2013 , Robert Downey , Jr. optioned the episode to potentially be made into a film by Warner Bros. and his own production company Team Downey .

evidence_da: Outkast -LRB- stiliseret som OutKast -RRB- er en amerikansk hip hop duo dannet i 1991 , i East Point , Atlanta , Georgia , bestående af Atlanta-baserede rappere André '' André 3000 '' Benjamin -LRB- tidligere kendt som Dré -RRB- og Antwan '' Big Boi '' Patton . Duoen opnåede både kritikerros og kommerciel succes i 1990'erne og begyndelsen af 2000'erne , hvilket var med til at popularisere det sydlige hiphop, samtidig med at den udviklede særprægede personas og eksperimenterede med forskellige genrer som funk , psykedelia , techno og gospel .   Benjamin og Patton dannede gruppen som gymnasieelever i 1991 . OutKast udgav deres debutalbum Southernplayalisticadillacmuzik i 1994 , som fik popularitet efter singlen '' Player 's Ball '' nåede nummer et på Billboard Hot Rap Tracks chart . Med successive udgivelser, herunder ATLiens -LRB- 1996 -RRB- og Aquemini -LRB- 1998 -RRB- udviklede duoen yderligere deres lyd , eksperimenterede med en række forskellige stilarter og opnåede kommerciel succes . I 2000 udgav Outkast den kritikerroste Stankonia , som omfattede singlerne '' Ms Jackson '' og '' B.O.B. '' I 2003 udgav duoen det dobbelte album Speakerboxxx/The Love Below , som indeholdt nummer et singler '' Hey Ya ! '' og '' Den måde, du bevæger dig . '' Albummet ville i sidste ende vinde Grammy Award for Album of the Year og blev certificeret Diamond af Recording Industry Association of America . Outkast udgav derefter soundtracket til musicalfilmen Idlewild fra 2006 , som de også medvirkede i . I 2007 , duoen gik på pause, og begge medlemmer har siden forfulgt solo karriere . I 2014 blev Outkast genforenet for at fejre deres 20 års jubilæum ved at optræde på mere end 40 festivaler verden over i 2014 , begyndende på Coachella Festival i april .   Duoen er en af de mest succesfulde hip-hop grupper gennem tiderne, efter at have modtaget seks Grammy Awards . Mellem seks studiealbum og en greatest hits udgivelse , Outkast har solgt over 25 millioner plader . I mellemtiden har de høstet udbredt kritikerros , med publikationer som Rolling Stone og Pitchfork Media notering albums som Aquemini og Stankonia blandt de bedste af deres æra .
evidence_en: Outkast -LRB- stylized as OutKast -RRB- is an American hip hop duo formed in 1991 , in East Point , Atlanta , Georgia , composed of Atlanta-based rappers André `` André 3000 '' Benjamin -LRB- formerly known as Dré -RRB- and Antwan `` Big Boi '' Patton . The duo achieved both critical acclaim and commercial success in the 1990s and early 2000s , helping to popularize Southern hip hop while developing distinctive personas and experimenting with diverse genres such as funk , psychedelia , techno , and gospel .   Benjamin and Patton formed the group as high school students in 1991 . OutKast released their debut album Southernplayalisticadillacmuzik in 1994 , which gained popularity after the single `` Player 's Ball '' reached number one on the Billboard Hot Rap Tracks chart . With successive releases including ATLiens -LRB- 1996 -RRB- and Aquemini -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , the duo further developed their sound , experimenting with a variety of styles and achieving commercial success . In 2000 , Outkast released the critically acclaimed Stankonia , which included the singles `` Ms. Jackson '' and `` B.O.B. ''   In 2003 , the duo released the double album Speakerboxxx/The Love Below , which featured the number one singles `` Hey Ya ! '' and `` The Way You Move . '' The album would eventually win the Grammy Award for Album of the Year and was certified Diamond by the Recording Industry Association of America . Outkast next released the soundtrack for the 2006 musical film Idlewild , which they also starred in . In 2007 , the duo went on hiatus and both members have since pursued solo careers . In 2014 , Outkast reunited to celebrate their 20th anniversary by performing at more than 40 festivals worldwide in 2014 , beginning at the Coachella Festival in April .   The duo is one of the most successful hip-hop groups of all time , having received six Grammy Awards . Between six studio albums and a greatest hits release , Outkast has sold over 25 million records . Meanwhile , they have garnered widespread critical acclaim , with publications such as Rolling Stone and Pitchfork Media listing albums such as Aquemini and Stankonia among the best of their era .

evidence_en: The President of Iraq is the head of state of Iraq and `` safeguards the commitment to the Constitution and the preservation of Iraq 's independence , sovereignty , unity , the security of its territories in accordance with the provisions of the Constitution '' . The President is elected by the Council of Representatives by a two-thirds majority , and is limited to two four-year terms . The President is responsible for ratifying treaties and laws passed by the Council of Representatives , issues pardons on the recommendation of the Prime Minister , and performs the `` duty of the Higher Command of the armed forces for ceremonial and honorary purposes '' .

evidence_da: William Ray Cyrus -LRB- født August 25 , 1961 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , sangskriver og skuespiller .   Efter at have udgivet 12 studiealbum og 44 singler siden 1992 , er han bedst kendt for sin nummer et single '' Achy Breaky Heart '', som blev den første single nogensinde til at opnå tredobbelt Platinum status i Australien . Det var også den bedst sælgende single i samme land i 1992 og blev oversat til mere end 100 sprog . Takket være videoen af dette hit, linjen dans slynget ind i mainstream, bliver en verdensomspændende dille .   Cyrus , en multi-platin sælgende musiker , har scoret i alt otte top-ti singler på Billboard Country Songs chart . Hans mest succesfulde album til dato er hans debut Some Gave All , som er blevet certificeret 9 × Multi-Platinum i USA og er den længste tid brugt af en debut kunstner som nummer et på Billboard 200-LRB- 17 på hinanden følgende uger -RRB- og mest på hinanden følgende chart-top ping uger i SoundScan æra . Det er det eneste album -LRB- fra enhver genre -RRB- i SoundScan æra til at logge 17 på hinanden følgende uger som nummer et og er også den øverste rangerende debut album af en mandlig land kunstner . Det rangeret 43 uger i top 10 , en samlet toppet af kun ét land album i historien , Ropin ' the Wind af Garth Brooks . Nogle Gav All var også det første debutalbum, der blev nummer et på Billboard Country Albums-hitlisten . Albummet har også solgt mere end 20 millioner eksemplarer på verdensplan og er den bedst sælgende debut album gennem tiderne for en solo mandlig kunstner . Nogle Gav All var også den bedst sælgende album i 1992 i USA med 4.832.000 eksemplarer . I sin karriere har han udgivet 35 kortlagte singler , hvoraf 16 kortlagt i top 40 .   Fra 2001 til 2004 medvirkede Cyrus i tv-serien Doc . Showet handlede om et land læge, der flyttede fra Montana til New York City . Fra 2006 til 2011 medvirkede han i Disney Channel-serien Hannah Montana med sin datter Miley Cyrus . Pr. 2016 , han stjerner som Vernon Brownmule på CMT-serien Still the King .
evidence_en: William Ray Cyrus -LRB- born August 25 , 1961 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter and actor .   Having released 12 studio albums and 44 singles since 1992 , he is best known for his number one single `` Achy Breaky Heart '' , which became the first single ever to achieve triple Platinum status in Australia . It was also the best-selling single in the same country in 1992 and was translated into more than 100 languages . Thanks to the video of this hit , the line dance catapulted into the mainstream , becoming a worldwide craze .   Cyrus , a multi-platinum selling recording artist , has scored a total of eight top-ten singles on the Billboard Country Songs chart . His most successful album to date is his debut Some Gave All , which has been certified 9 × Multi-Platinum in the United States and is the longest time spent by a debut artist at number one on the Billboard 200 -LRB- 17 consecutive weeks -RRB- and most consecutive chart-topping weeks in the SoundScan era . It is the only album -LRB- from any genre -RRB- in the SoundScan era to log 17 consecutive weeks at number one and is also the top-ranking debut album by a male country artist . It ranked 43 weeks in the top 10 , a total topped by only one country album in history , Ropin ' the Wind by Garth Brooks . Some Gave All was also the first debut album to enter at number one on the Billboard Country Albums chart . The album has also sold more than 20 million copies worldwide and is the best-selling debut album of all time for a solo male artist . Some Gave All was also the best-selling album of 1992 in the US with 4,832,000 copies . In his career , he has released 35 charted singles , of which 16 charted in the top 40 .   From 2001 to 2004 , Cyrus starred in the television show Doc . The show was about a country doctor who moved from Montana to New York City . From 2006 to 2011 , he co-starred in the Disney Channel series Hannah Montana with his daughter Miley Cyrus . As of 2016 , he stars as Vernon Brownmule on the CMT series Still the King .

evidence_da: Dummere og dummere er en amerikansk komedievejfilm fra 1994 med Jim Carrey og Jeff Daniels i hovedrollerne . Det blev skrevet af Farrelly brødrene og Bennett Yellin , og er Farrelly brødrenes instruktør debut . Filmen fortæller historien om Lloyd Christmas og Harry Dunne , to uintelligente, men velmenende venner fra Providence , Rhode Island, der satte sig på en langrendstur til Aspen , Colorado for at returnere en mappe fuld af penge til sin ejer , kun for at blive forfulgt af en gruppe af  kriminelle, der er efter mappen .   Filmen blev udgivet den 16. Det indtjente $ 247 millioner på box office og har udviklet en kult følgende i årene siden dens udgivelse . Succesen med Dummere og dummere lancerede karriere Farrelly brødrene og størknede Carrey 's . Filmen også opfostrede en animeret tv-serie , en 2003 prequel , og en 2014 efterfølger .
evidence_en: Dumb and Dumber is a 1994 American comedy road film starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels . It was written by the Farrelly brothers and Bennett Yellin , and is the Farrelly brothers ' directorial debut . The film tells the story of Lloyd Christmas and Harry Dunne , two unintelligent but well-meaning friends from Providence , Rhode Island who set out on a cross-country trip to Aspen , Colorado to return a briefcase full of money to its owner , only to be pursued by a group of criminals who are after the briefcase .   The film was released on December 16 , 1994 . It grossed $ 247 million at the box office and has developed a cult following in the years since its release . The success of Dumb and Dumber launched the career of the Farrelly brothers and solidified Carrey 's . The film also spawned an animated TV series , a 2003 prequel , and a 2014 sequel .

evidence_da: Hacksaw Ridge er en 2016 biografiske krig drama film om Anden Verdenskrig erfaringer med Desmond Doss , en amerikansk pacifist bekæmpe medic, der var en syvende-dages adventist kristen , nægter at bære eller bruge et skydevåben eller våben af nogen art . Doss blev den første militærnægter, der blev tildelt Medal of Honor , for tjeneste ud over call of duty under slaget ved Okinawa .   Filmen blev instrueret af Mel Gibson og skrevet af Andrew Knight og Robert Schenkkan , baseret på en 2004 dokumentarfilm om Doss , og stjerner Andrew Garfield som Doss , med Sam Worthington , Luke Bracey , Teresa Palmer , Hugo Weaving , Rachel Griffiths og Vince Vaughn i suppo rting roller . Det blev udgivet i USA november 4 , 2016 , modtaget positive anmeldelser og indtjente $ 175.3 millioner på verdensplan .   Hacksaw Ridge blev valgt af American Film Institute som en af sine top ti Film of the Year , og har modtaget adskillige priser og nomineringer . Filmen modtog seks Oscar-nomineringer ved 89th Academy Awards , herunder Best Picture , Bedste Instruktør , Bedste Skuespiller for Garfield og bedste lydredigering , vinde priser for bedste lydblanding og bedste filmredigering . Det har også modtaget Golden Globe nomineringer for bedste film , bedste instruktør og bedste skuespiller , og 12 AACTA Awards nomineringer , vinde de fleste , herunder Bedste Film , Best Direction , Best Original Manuskript , Bedste skuespiller for Garfield , og bedste mandlige birolle for Vævning.
evidence_en: Hacksaw Ridge is a 2016 biographical war drama film about the World War II experiences of Desmond Doss , an American pacifist combat medic who was a Seventh-day Adventist Christian , refusing to carry or use a firearm or weapons of any kind . Doss became the first conscientious objector to be awarded the Medal of Honor , for service above and beyond the call of duty during the Battle of Okinawa .   The film was directed by Mel Gibson and written by Andrew Knight and Robert Schenkkan , based on a 2004 documentary about Doss , and stars Andrew Garfield as Doss , with Sam Worthington , Luke Bracey , Teresa Palmer , Hugo Weaving , Rachel Griffiths and Vince Vaughn in supporting roles . It was released in the United States on November 4 , 2016 , received positive reviews and grossed $ 175.3 million worldwide .   Hacksaw Ridge was chosen by the American Film Institute as one of its top ten Movies of the Year , and has received numerous awards and nominations . The film received six Oscar nominations at the 89th Academy Awards , including Best Picture , Best Director , Best Actor for Garfield and Best Sound Editing , winning the awards for Best Sound Mixing and Best Film Editing . It also received Golden Globe nominations for Best Picture , Best Director and Best Actor , and 12 AACTA Awards nominations , winning the majority , including Best Film , Best Direction , Best Original Screenplay , Best Actor for Garfield , and Best Supporting Actor for Weaving .

evidence_da: Valg er en amerikansk sort komedie-dramafilm fra 1999 instrueret og skrevet af Alexander Payne og tilpasset af ham og Jim Taylor fra Tom Perrotta 's 1998 roman af samme titel . Plottet drejer sig om en high school valg og satirizes både forstæder high school liv og politik . Filmen stjerner Matthew Broderick som Jim McAllister , en populær high school samfundsfag lærer i forstæderne Omaha , Nebraska , og Reese Witherspoon som Tracy Flick , omkring tidspunktet for skolens studerende organ valg . Når Tracy kvalificerer sig til at køre for klasse præsident , McAllister mener, at hun ikke fortjener titlen og forsøger sit bedste for at stoppe hende fra at vinde .   Selv om en box office bombe , Election modtaget kritikerros . Filmen modtog en Oscar nominering for bedste tilpassede manuskript , en Golden Globe nominering for Witherspoon i kategorien bedste kvindelige hovedrolle , og Independent Spirit Award for bedste film i 1999 .
evidence_en: Election is a 1999 American black comedy-drama film directed and written by Alexander Payne and adapted by him and Jim Taylor from Tom Perrotta 's 1998 novel of the same title . The plot revolves around a high school election and satirizes both suburban high school life and politics . The film stars Matthew Broderick as Jim McAllister , a popular high school social studies teacher in suburban Omaha , Nebraska , and Reese Witherspoon as Tracy Flick , around the time of the school 's student body election . When Tracy qualifies to run for class president , McAllister believes she does not deserve the title and tries his best to stop her from winning .   Although a box office bomb , Election received critical acclaim . The film received an Academy Award nomination for Best Adapted Screenplay , a Golden Globe nomination for Witherspoon in the Best Actress category , and the Independent Spirit Award for Best Film in 1999 .

evidence_da: Patrick Bateman er en fiktiv karakter , skurken hovedperson og fortælleren af romanen American Psycho af Bret Easton Ellis , og dens filmatisering . He is a wealthy , materialistic Wall Street investment banker who leads a double life as a serial killer . Bateman has also briefly appeared in other Ellis novels .
