evidence_da: Star Wars : The Force Awakens -LRB - også kendt som Star Wars : Episode VII - The Force Awakens -RRB - er en amerikansk episk rumoperafilm fra 2015 instrueret, co-produceret og co-skrevet af J. J. Abrams . Den direkte efterfølger til 1983 's Return of the Jedi , The Force Awakens er den første rate af Star Wars efterfølger trilogi , og stjerner Harrison Ford , Mark Hamill , Carrie Fisher , Adam Driver , Daisy Ridley , John Boyega , Oscar Isaac , Lupita Nyong ' o , Andy Serkis , Do mhnall Gleeson , Anthony Daniels , Peter Mayhew , og Max von Sydow . Produceret af Lucasfilm Ltd og Abrams ' produktionsselskab Bad Robot Productions og distribueret over hele verden af Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures , The Force Awakens markerer en pause i kreativ kontrol fra den oprindelige serie som den første Star Wars film ikke produceret af franchise skaberen George Lucas . Set 30 år efter Return of the Jedi , det følger Rey , Finn og Poe Dameron 's søgen efter Luke Skywalker og deres kamp sammen med modstandsbevægelsen , ledet af veteraner fra Rebel Alliance , mod Kylo Ren og den første orden , en efterfølger organisation til Galactic Empir E.   The Force Awakens blev annonceret efter The Walt Disney Company 's overtagelse af Lucasfilm i oktober 2012 . Det blev produceret af Abrams , hans mangeårige samarbejdspartner Bryan Burk , og Lucasfilm præsident Kathleen Kennedy . Abrams og Lawrence Kasdan , medforfatter af den oprindelige trilogi film The Empire Strikes Back-LRB- 1980 -RRB- og Return of the Jedi-LRB- 1983 -RRB-, omskrev en indledende manuskript af Michael Arndt . John Williams , komponist for de foregående seks film , vendte tilbage for at komponere filmens score . Lucas fungerede som kreativ konsulent under filmens tidlige produktion . Optagelserne begyndte i april 2014 i Abu Dhabi og Island , med vigtigste fotografering også finder sted i Irland og Pinewood Studios i England , og konkluderede i november 2014 . Det er den første live-action film i franchisen siden Star Wars : Episode III - Revenge of the Sith , udgivet ti år før i 2005 .   Star Wars : The Force Awakens var længe ventet , og Disney støttede filmen med omfattende marketingkampagner . December 2015 havde det premiere i Los Angeles . Filmen fik positive anmeldelser , med sit ensemble stemmer , retning , musikalske score , visuelle effekter, og handling sekvenser modtager særlig ros , selv om det fik en vis kritik for at være afledt af den oprindelige trilogi . Filmen brød forskellige box office optegnelser og blev , ujusteret for inflation , den højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren rate i franchisen , den højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film i Nordamerika , og den tredje-højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film af hele tiden , med en verdensomspændende brutto på over $ 2 og et nettooverskud på over 780 millioner dollar . Det modtog fem Academy Award nomineringer og fire British Academy Film Award nomineringer , hvor det vandt Best Special Visual Effects . To efterfølgere , The Last Jedi og Episode IX , er planlagt til udgivelse i henholdsvis 2017 og 2019 .
evidence_en: Star Wars : The Force Awakens -LRB- also known as Star Wars : Episode VII -- The Force Awakens -RRB- is a 2015 American epic space opera film directed , co-produced , and co-written by J. J. Abrams . The direct sequel to 1983 's Return of the Jedi , The Force Awakens is the first installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy , and stars Harrison Ford , Mark Hamill , Carrie Fisher , Adam Driver , Daisy Ridley , John Boyega , Oscar Isaac , Lupita Nyong ` o , Andy Serkis , Domhnall Gleeson , Anthony Daniels , Peter Mayhew , and Max von Sydow . Produced by Lucasfilm Ltd. and Abrams ' production company Bad Robot Productions and distributed worldwide by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures , The Force Awakens marks a break in creative control from the original series as the first Star Wars film not produced by franchise creator George Lucas . Set 30 years after Return of the Jedi , it follows Rey , Finn and Poe Dameron 's search for Luke Skywalker and their fight alongside the Resistance , led by veterans of the Rebel Alliance , against Kylo Ren and the First Order , a successor organization to the Galactic Empire .   The Force Awakens was announced after The Walt Disney Company 's acquisition of Lucasfilm in October 2012 . It was produced by Abrams , his longtime collaborator Bryan Burk , and Lucasfilm president Kathleen Kennedy . Abrams and Lawrence Kasdan , co-writer of the original trilogy films The Empire Strikes Back -LRB- 1980 -RRB- and Return of the Jedi -LRB- 1983 -RRB- , rewrote an initial script by Michael Arndt . John Williams , composer for the previous six films , returned to compose the film 's score . Lucas served as creative consultant during the film 's early production . Filming began in April 2014 in Abu Dhabi and Iceland , with principal photography also taking place in Ireland and Pinewood Studios in England , and concluded in November 2014 . It is the first live-action film in the franchise since Star Wars : Episode III -- Revenge of the Sith , released ten years prior in 2005 .   Star Wars : The Force Awakens was widely anticipated , and Disney backed the film with extensive marketing campaigns . It premiered in Los Angeles on December 14 , 2015 , four days before its wide release . The film received positive reviews , with its ensemble cast , direction , musical score , visual effects , and action sequences receiving particular praise , though it received some criticism for being derivative of the original trilogy . The film broke various box office records and became , unadjusted for inflation , the highest-grossing installment in the franchise , the highest-grossing film in North America , and the third-highest-grossing film of all time , with a worldwide gross of over $ 2 billion and a net profit of over $ 780 million . It received five Academy Award nominations and four British Academy Film Award nominations , where it won Best Special Visual Effects . Two sequels , The Last Jedi and Episode IX , are scheduled for release in 2017 and 2019 , respectively .

evidence_da: Patricia Campbell '' Patty '' Hearst -LRB- født 20 februar , 1954 -RRB-, nu kendt som Patricia Hearst Shaw , er barnebarn af amerikanske forlagsmagnat William Randolph Hearst . Hun blev nationalt kendt for begivenheder efter hendes 1974 kidnapning, mens hun var en 19-årig studerende, der bor i Berkeley , Californien . Hearst blev bortført af en venstreorienteret terrorgruppe kendt som Symbionese Liberation Army . Efter at være blevet isoleret og truet med døden , blev hun støttende for deres sag , hvilket gjorde propaganda meddelelser for dem og deltage i ulovlige aktiviteter .   Hearst blev fundet 19 måneder efter hendes kidnapning , på hvilket tidspunkt hun var en flygtning eftersøgt for alvorlige forbrydelser . Hun blev varetægtsfængslet , på trods af spekulationer om, at hendes families ressourcer ville forhindre hende tilbringe tid i fængsel . Under retssagen antydede anklagemyndigheden, at hun havde tilsluttet sig Symbionese Liberation Army af egen fri vilje , og at seksuelle aktiviteter mellem hende og SLA medlemmer ikke havde udgjort voldtægt . Hun blev fundet skyldig i bankrøveri. Hearst 's sætning blev omstødt af præsident Jimmy Carter , og hun blev benådet af præsident Bill Clinton .
evidence_en: Patricia Campbell `` Patty '' Hearst -LRB- born February 20 , 1954 -RRB- , now known as Patricia Hearst Shaw , is the granddaughter of American publishing magnate William Randolph Hearst . She became nationally known for events following her 1974 kidnapping while she was a 19-year-old student living in Berkeley , California . Hearst was abducted by a left-wing terrorist group known as the Symbionese Liberation Army . After being isolated and threatened with death , she became supportive of their cause , making propaganda announcements for them and taking part in illegal activities .   Hearst was found 19 months after her kidnapping , by which time she was a fugitive wanted for serious crimes . She was held in custody , despite speculation that her family 's resources would prevent her spending time in jail . At her trial , the prosecution suggested that she had joined the Symbionese Liberation Army of her own volition , and that sexual activities between her and SLA members had not amounted to rape . She was found guilty of bank robbery . Hearst 's sentence was commuted by President Jimmy Carter , and she was pardoned by President Bill Clinton .

evidence_da: The Girl on the Train er en amerikansk mystery thriller-dramafilm fra 2016 instrueret af Tate Taylor og skrevet af Erin Cressida Wilson , baseret på Paula Hawkins ' debutroman af samme navn i 2015 . Filmen stjerner Emily Blunt , Rebecca Ferguson , Haley Bennett , Justin Theroux , Luke Evans , Allison Janney , Édgar Ramírez , og Lisa Kudrow , og følger en alkoholiker divorcée, der bliver involveret i en forsvundne personer undersøgelse .   Principal fotografering begyndte november 4 , 2015 i New York City . Produceret af Marc Platt og DreamWorks Pictures , The Girl on the Train var den første DreamWorks Pictures film, der skal distribueres af Universal Pictures , som en del af DreamWorks 'nye distribution aftale via Amblin Partners . September 20 , 2016 og blev teatralsk udgivet i USA oktober 7 , 2016 . Filmen indtjente $ 173 millioner på verdensplan , og modtog blandede anmeldelser , selv om Blunt 's præstation modtaget ros og fik en nominering på 23:e Screen Actors Guild Awards , samt en nominering til BAFTA Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle i en hovedrolle på 70:e Brit ish Academy Film Awards .
evidence_en: The Girl on the Train is a 2016 American mystery thriller drama film directed by Tate Taylor and written by Erin Cressida Wilson , based on Paula Hawkins ' 2015 debut novel of the same name . The film stars Emily Blunt , Rebecca Ferguson , Haley Bennett , Justin Theroux , Luke Evans , Allison Janney , Édgar Ramírez , and Lisa Kudrow , and follows an alcoholic divorcée who becomes involved in a missing persons investigation .   Principal photography began on November 4 , 2015 in New York City . Produced by Marc Platt and DreamWorks Pictures , The Girl on the Train was the first DreamWorks Pictures film to be distributed by Universal Pictures , as part of DreamWorks ' new distribution deal via Amblin Partners . It premiered in London on September 20 , 2016 and was theatrically released in the United States on October 7 , 2016 . The film grossed $ 173 million worldwide , and received mixed reviews , although Blunt 's performance received praise and gained a nomination at the 23rd Screen Actors Guild Awards , as well as a nomination for BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role at the 70th British Academy Film Awards .

evidence_da: Artemis -LRB- -LSB- -----RSB- 出ρτεμις , Moderne græsk : Άρτεμις , Ártemis , -LSB- ár.te.mis -RSB- -RRB- var en af de mest æret af de antikke græske guder . Hendes romerske tilsvarende er Diana . Nogle forskere mener, at navnet , og faktisk gudinden selv , oprindeligt var præ-græsk . Homer refererer til hende som Artemis Agrotera , Potnia Theron : '' Artemis af wildland , Mistress of Animals ''. Arcadians troede, hun var datter af Demeter .   I den klassiske periode med græsk mytologi blev Artemis ofte beskrevet som datter af Zeus og Leto og Apollos tvillingesøster. Hun var den græske gudinde for jagten , vilde dyr, vildmark, fødsel, jomfruelighed og beskytter af unge piger , bringe og lindre sygdom hos kvinder; hun ofte blev afbildet som en huntress transporterer en bue og pile . Hjortene og cypressen var hellige for hende . I senere hellenistiske tider , hun selv påtaget sig den gamle rolle Eileithyia i medvirken fødsel .
evidence_en: Artemis -LRB- -LSB- ˈɑːrtᵻmᵻs -RSB- Ἄρτεμις , Modern Greek : Άρτεμις , Ártemis , -LSB- ár.te.mis -RSB- -RRB- was one of the most widely venerated of the Ancient Greek deities . Her Roman equivalent is Diana . Some scholars believe that the name , and indeed the goddess herself , was originally pre-Greek . Homer refers to her as Artemis Agrotera , Potnia Theron : `` Artemis of the wildland , Mistress of Animals '' . The Arcadians believed she was the daughter of Demeter .   In the classical period of Greek mythology , Artemis was often described as the daughter of Zeus and Leto , and the twin sister of Apollo . She was the Hellenic goddess of the hunt , wild animals , wilderness , childbirth , virginity and protector of young girls , bringing and relieving disease in women ; she often was depicted as a huntress carrying a bow and arrows . The deer and the cypress were sacred to her . In later Hellenistic times , she even assumed the ancient role of Eileithyia in aiding childbirth .

evidence_en: Davis Entertainment is an American independent film production company , founded by John Davis in 1984 .   Davis 's three divisions -- - feature film , independent film , and television - -- develop and produce film and television projects for the major studios , independent distributors , networks and cable broadcasters . The Company has enjoyed a long-standing first-look production deal at 20th Century Fox , though also produces projects for all studios and mini-majors .

evidence_da: Joseph Roland '' Joe '' Barbera -LRB- -LSB- bķrיrə -RSB- eller -LSB- יb出rbərə -RSB- ; -LSB- barיbķיra -RSB- ; 24 marts , 1911 - December 18 , 2006 -RRB- var en amerikansk animator , instruktør , producent , storyboard kunstner , og tegneseriekunstner , hvis film og tv tegneseriefigurer underholdt millioner af fans over hele verden for en stor del af det 20 .   Gennem sine unge voksne år , Barbera boede , deltog college , og begyndte sin karriere i New York City . Efter at have arbejdet småjobs og som bankmand kom Barbera til Van Beuren Studios i 1932 og efterfølgende Terrytoons i 1936 . I 1937 flyttede han til Californien, og mens han arbejdede på Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer -LRB- MGM -RRB- , Barbera mødte William Hanna . De to mænd begyndte et samarbejde, der var i første omgang bedst kendt for at producere Tom og Jerry og live action / animerede hybrid film . I 1957 , efter MGM opløst deres animation afdeling , de medstifter Hanna-Barbera , som blev den mest succesfulde tv-animation studie i branchen, der producerer programmer som The Flintstones , Yogi Bear , Scooby-Doo , Top Cat , The Smurfs , Huckleberry Hound og The Jetsons . I 1967 blev Hanna-Barbera solgt til Taft Broadcasting for 12 millioner dollars , men Hanna og Barbera forblev ledere af virksomheden indtil 1991 . På det tidspunkt blev studiet solgt til Turner Broadcasting System , som igen blev fusioneret med Time Warner , ejere af Warner Bros. , i 1996 ; Hanna og Barbera opholdt sig på som rådgivere.   Hanna og Barbera vandt syv Academy Awards og otte Emmy Awards . Deres tegneserieshows er blevet kulturelle ikoner , og deres tegneseriefigurer er dukket op i andre medier såsom film , bøger og legetøj . Hanna-Barbera 's viser havde et verdensomspændende publikum på over 300 millioner mennesker i 1960'erne og er blevet oversat til mere end 20 sprog .
evidence_en: Joseph Roland `` Joe '' Barbera -LRB- -LSB- bɑrˈbɛrə -RSB- or -LSB- ˈbɑrbərə -RSB- ; -LSB- barˈbɛːra -RSB- ; March 24 , 1911 -- December 18 , 2006 -RRB- was an American animator , director , producer , storyboard artist , and cartoon artist , whose film and television cartoon characters entertained millions of fans worldwide for much of the 20th century .   Through his young adult years , Barbera lived , attended college , and began his career in New York City . After working odd jobs and as a banker , Barbera joined Van Beuren Studios in 1932 and subsequently Terrytoons in 1936 . In 1937 , he moved to California and while working at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer -LRB- MGM -RRB- , Barbera met William Hanna . The two men began a collaboration that was at first best known for producing Tom and Jerry and live action/animated hybrid films . In 1957 , after MGM dissolved their animation department , they co-founded Hanna-Barbera , which became the most successful television animation studio in the business , producing programs such as The Flintstones , Yogi Bear , Scooby-Doo , Top Cat , The Smurfs , Huckleberry Hound and The Jetsons . In 1967 , Hanna-Barbera was sold to Taft Broadcasting for $ 12 million , but Hanna and Barbera remained heads of the company until 1991 . At that time , the studio was sold to Turner Broadcasting System , which in turn was merged with Time Warner , owners of Warner Bros. , in 1996 ; Hanna and Barbera stayed on as advisors .   Hanna and Barbera won seven Academy Awards and eight Emmy Awards . Their cartoon shows have become cultural icons , and their cartoon characters have appeared in other media such as films , books , and toys . Hanna-Barbera 's shows had a worldwide audience of over 300 million people in the 1960s and have been translated into more than 20 languages .

evidence_da: Gennady Gennadyevich Golovkin -LRB- Геннадий Геннадьевич Головкин født 8 April 1982 -RRB- er en kasakhstansk professionel bokser, der i øjeblikket har den forenede WBA -LRB- Super-RRB- WBC , IBF , og IBO mellemvægt titler . Pr. maj 2017 er han rangeret som verdens bedste mellemvægt af BoxRec og Transnational Boxing Rankings Board , og næstbedste af Ringen . Han er også rangeret som verdens tredje bedste bokser , pund for pund , af The Ring , femte af BoxRec , og syvende af transnationale Boksning Rankings Board .   Golovkin vandt sit første store verdensmesterskab , WBA foreløbige mellemvægt titel , ved at besejre Milton Núñez i 2010 . Han blev ophøjet til WBA -LRB- Regular -RRB-mester i samme år , og i 2011 ville vinde den ledige IBO mellemvægt titel ved at besejre Lajuan Simon . I 2014 blev Golovkin ophøjet til sin nuværende status som WBA -LRB- Super-RRB-mester og forsvarede med succes begge sine titler mod Daniel Geale . Senere samme år besejrede han Marco Antonio Rubio at tilføje WBC foreløbige mellemvægt titel til sin samling , og besejrede David Lemieux i 2015 for at vinde IBF mellemvægt titel . Efter Canelo Álvarez forlod sin WBC mellemvægt titel i 2016 , Golovkin blev ophøjet til fuld mester og nu holder verdenstitler med tre af de fire store boksning sanktioner organer .   En beregnende tryk fighter , Golovkin er kendt for sin kraftfulde og præcise stansning , balance , og metodiske bevægelse . Med en stribe på 23 knockouts, der strakte sig fra 22 November 2008 til 18 marts 2017 , han har den højeste knockout procent - 89,8 % - i mellemvægt mesterskabet historie . I 2016 opnåede han sit 17. titelforsvar ved knockout , hvilket svarede til den rekord , som Wilfredo Gómez satte i 1982 . Golovkin siges også at have en af de bedste hager i moderne boksning, der aldrig er blevet slået ned eller slået ud i alt 387 kampe , hverken som professionel eller amatør .   I sin amatør karriere , Vandt Golovkin en guldmedalje i mellemvægt division ved VM i 2003 . Han fortsatte med at repræsentere Kasakhstan i 2004 Sommer-OL , vinde en mellemvægt sølvmedalje .
evidence_en: Gennady Gennadyevich Golovkin -LRB- Геннадий Геннадьевич Головкин born 8 April 1982 -RRB- is a Kazakhstani professional boxer who currently holds the unified WBA -LRB- Super -RRB- , WBC , IBF , and IBO middleweight titles . As of May 2017 , he is ranked as the world 's best middleweight by BoxRec and the Transnational Boxing Rankings Board , and second best by The Ring . He is also ranked as the world 's third best boxer , pound for pound , by The Ring , fifth by BoxRec , and seventh by the Transnational Boxing Rankings Board .   Golovkin won his first major world championship , the WBA interim middleweight title , by defeating Milton Núñez in 2010 . He was elevated to WBA -LRB- Regular -RRB- champion in the same year , and in 2011 would win the vacant IBO middleweight title by defeating Lajuan Simon . In 2014 , Golovkin was elevated to his current status of WBA -LRB- Super -RRB- champion and successfully defended both his titles against Daniel Geale . Later that year he defeated Marco Antonio Rubio to add the WBC interim middleweight title to his collection , and defeated David Lemieux in 2015 to win the IBF middleweight title . After Canelo Álvarez vacated his WBC middleweight title in 2016 , Golovkin was elevated to full champion and now holds world titles by three of the four major boxing sanctioning bodies .   A calculating pressure fighter , Golovkin is known for his powerful and precise punching , balance , and methodical movement . With a streak of 23 knockouts that spanned from 22 November 2008 to 18 March 2017 , he holds the highest knockout percentage -- 89.8 % -- in middleweight championship history . In 2016 , he achieved his 17th title defense by knockout , which equalled the record set by Wilfredo Gómez in 1982 . Golovkin is also said to have one of the best chins in modern boxing , having never been knocked down or knocked out in a total of 387 fights , neither as a professional nor amateur .   In his amateur career , Golovkin won a gold medal in the middleweight division at the 2003 World Championships . He went on to represent Kazakhstan at the 2004 Summer Olympics , winning a middleweight silver medal .

evidence_da: Kasakhstan deltog ved sommer-OL 2004 i Athen , Grækenland , fra den 13 . Dette var nationens tredje optræden ved sommer-OL i den post-sovjetiske æra .   Den Nationale Olympiske Komité for Republikken Kasakhstan sendte i alt 114 atleter til legene , 71 mænd og 43 kvinder for at konkurrere i 17 sportsgrene . Nationens hold størrelse var omtrent mindre af 16 atleter fra Sydney , og havde den tredje største andel af mænd i sin sommer olympiske historie . Vandpolo var den eneste holdbaserede sport, hvor Kasakhstan havde sin repræsentation i disse olympiske lege . Blandt de sportsgrene, der spilles af atleterne , markerede Kasakhstan sin officielle olympiske debut i rytmisk gymnastik .   Bemærkelsesværdige kasakhiske atleter featured tilbagevendende olympiske medaljevindere Alexander Vinokourov i landevejscykling og islam Bairamukov i mænds freestyle wrestling . Grigoriy Yegorov gjorde sit officielle comeback for sit andet olympiske bud , da han vandt bronzemedalje i mændenes pole hvælving i 1988 Sommer-OL i Seoul , der repræsenterer Sovjetunionen . Pistol shooter Galina Belyayeva var den ældste og mest gennemførte medlem af holdet i en alder af 55 . I mellemtiden satte rygsvømning svømmer Anastassiya Prilepa en historisk milepæl for det kasakhiske hold som den yngste nogensinde atlet , i alderen 14 , at konkurrere ved OL .   Kasakhstan forlod Athen med i alt otte olympiske medaljer -LRB - et guld, fire sølv, og tre bronze -RRB- , efterbehandling forbinding i den samlede medalje tæller . Dette var også nationens fattigste olympiske præstation i historien siden sovjetunionens opløsning , der kun indsamlede en enkelt guldmedalje fra weltervægtbokseren Bakhtiyar Artayev . Tre af disse medaljer blev tildelt hver til atleter i boksning og brydning , herunder Artayev 's berømte guld , mens Dmitriy Karpov tilføjet en anden olympisk medalje for Kasakhstan i atletik ved at kræve bronze i mænds decathlon .   Vægtløfter Sergey Filimonov oprindeligt fanget en bronze i mændenes 77 kg klasse . Februar 12 , 2013 , Den Internationale Olympiske Komité strippet Ruslands Oleg Perepetchenov af hans 2004 olympiske medalje efter begge sonder blev testet igen og viste spor af anabolske steroider , opgradering Filimonov 's medalje til sølv .
evidence_en: Kazakhstan competed at the 2004 Summer Olympics in Athens , Greece , from 13 to 29 August 2004 . This was the nation 's third appearance at the Summer Olympics in the post-Soviet era .   National Olympic Committee of the Republic of Kazakhstan sent a total of 114 athletes to the Games , 71 men and 43 women , to compete in 17 sports . The nation 's team size was roughly smaller by 16 athletes from Sydney , and had the third largest share of men in its Summer Olympic history . Water polo was the only team-based sport in which Kazakhstan had its representation in these Olympic games . Among the sports played by the athletes , Kazakhstan marked its official Olympic debut in rhythmic gymnastics .   Notable Kazakh athletes featured returning Olympic medalists Alexander Vinokourov in road cycling and Islam Bairamukov in men 's freestyle wrestling . Grigoriy Yegorov made his official comeback for his second Olympic bid , since he won the bronze medal in the men 's pole vault at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul , representing the Soviet Union . Pistol shooter Galina Belyayeva was the oldest and most accomplished member of the team at age 55 . Meanwhile , backstroke swimmer Anastassiya Prilepa set a historic milestone for the Kazakh team as the youngest ever athlete , aged 14 , to compete at the Olympics .   Kazakhstan left Athens with a total of eight Olympic medals -LRB- one gold , four silver , and three bronze -RRB- , finishing fortieth in the overall medal count . This was also the nation 's poorest Olympic performance in history since the breakup of the Soviet Union , collecting only a single gold medal from welterweight boxer Bakhtiyar Artayev . Three of these medals were awarded each to the athletes in boxing and wrestling , including Artayev 's illustrious gold , while Dmitriy Karpov added a second Olympic medal for Kazakhstan in track and field by claiming the bronze in men 's decathlon .   Weightlifter Sergey Filimonov originally captured a bronze in the men 's 77 kg class . On February 12 , 2013 , the International Olympic Committee stripped Russia 's Oleg Perepetchenov of his 2004 Olympic medal after both probes were retested and showed traces of anabolic steroids , upgrading Filimonov 's medal to silver .

evidence_da: Sanjay Gupta -LRB- -LSB- født 23 oktober , 1969 -RRB- er en amerikansk neurokirurg og medier reporter . Han fungerer som associeret chef for neurokirurgi tjeneste på Grady Memorial Hospital i Atlanta , Georgia , og som adjunkt i neurokirurgi på Emory University School of Medicine .   Et medie personlighed om sundhedsrelaterede spørgsmål, han er bedst kendt som CNN 's flere Emmy Award-vindende chef medicinsk korrespondent , hosting netværkets weekend sundhedsprogram Sanjay Gupta , MD , og gøre hyppige optrædener på deres American Morning , Larry King Live og Anderson Cooper 360 ° programmer . Hans rapporter fra Charity Hospital , New Orleans , Louisiana , i kølvandet på orkanen Katrina førte til ham at vinde en 2006 Emmy Award for Outstanding Feature Story i en regelmæssigt planlagt Nyhedsudsendelse . Derudover udgiver Gupta en klumme i Time Magazine og er en særlig korrespondent for CBS News . Hans bøger Chasing Life og Snyd Death var New York Times og nationale bestsellere . Hans seneste bog , Monday Mornings , en roman , blev udgivet i marts 2012 og blev en øjeblikkelig New York Times bestseller . Det blev tilpasset som en 2013 tv-serie med David E. Kelley og Gupta tjener som udøvende producenter .   Fra 1997 til 1998 fungerede han som en af femten Hvide Hus Fellows , primært som rådgiver for Hillary Clinton . I januar 2009 , blev det rapporteret, at Gupta blev tilbudt stillingen som Surgeon General i USA i Obama administration , men han trak sit navn fra overvejelse . I januar 2011 blev han udnævnt til '' en af de 10 mest indflydelsesrige berømtheder '' af Forbes magazine .
evidence_en: Sanjay Gupta -LRB- -LSB- ˈsɑːndʒeɪ_ˈɡuːptə -RSB- ; born October 23 , 1969 -RRB- is an American neurosurgeon and media reporter . He serves as associate chief of the neurosurgery service at Grady Memorial Hospital in Atlanta , Georgia , and as assistant professor of neurosurgery at the Emory University School of Medicine .   A media personality on health-related issues , he is best known as CNN 's multiple Emmy Award-winning chief medical correspondent , hosting the network 's weekend health program Sanjay Gupta , M.D. , and making frequent appearances on their American Morning , Larry King Live and Anderson Cooper 360 ° programs . His reports from Charity Hospital , New Orleans , Louisiana , in the wake of Hurricane Katrina led to him winning a 2006 Emmy Award for Outstanding Feature Story in a Regularly Scheduled Newscast . Additionally , Gupta publishes a column in Time magazine and is a special correspondent for CBS News . His books Chasing Life and Cheating Death were New York Times and national bestsellers . His latest book , Monday Mornings , a novel , was released in March 2012 and became an instant New York Times bestseller . It was adapted as a 2013 television series with David E. Kelley and Gupta serving as executive producers .   From 1997 to 1998 , he served as one of fifteen White House Fellows , primarily as an advisor to Hillary Clinton . In January 2009 , it was reported that Gupta was offered the position of Surgeon General of the United States in the Obama administration , but he withdrew his name from consideration . In January 2011 , he was named `` one of the 10 most influential celebrities '' by Forbes magazine .

evidence_da: Anni-Frid Synni , Prinsesse Reuss af Plauen -LRB- Anni-Frid Synni , Prinzessin Reuss von Plauen født Anni-Frid Synni Lyngstad , -LSB- ²出יייייייייst -RSB- ; -LSB- ² anיייייdייייייייst -RSB- , 15 November 1945 -RRB- , almindeligt kendt som Frida Lyngstad eller af blot mononym Frida -LRB- -LSB- ² friķd -RSB- ; -LSB- ² friיda -RSB- -RRB- er en svensk pop- og jazzsanger. Født i Norge til en norsk mor og en tysk far , hun voksede op i Sverige og nåede international stjernestatus som medlem af popgruppen ABBA , som har solgt over 380 millioner albums og singler på verdensplan , hvilket gør dem til en af de bedst sælgende musikkunstnere i historien . Efter opløsningen af ABBA , fortsatte hun en international solo sangkarriere med blandet succes , frigive albums Something 's Going On -LRB- 1982 -RRB- og Shine-LRB- 1984 -RRB- ; sidstnævnte er hendes sidste internationale album til dato . I 1996 indspillede Frida et sidste album i svensk -LRB- Djupa andetag -RRB - før ' trak sig tilbage ' fra musik .   I april 1964 , i en alder af 18 år giftede hun sig med Ragnar Fredriksson . Umiddelbart efter deres skilsmisse i 1970 bejlede Lyngstad til eventuel ABBA-bandmedlem Benny Andersson , der boede sammen med at bo sammen , indtil de officielt blev gift i 1978 . Parret blev separeret i 1980 og skilt i 1981 . I 1992 giftede Lyngstad sig med Heinrich Ruzzo , prins Reuss of Plauen , som var prins af det tidligere suveræne Reuss - siden da har hun titlerne på prinsesse Reuss og grevinde af Plauen med stil af hendes Serene Højhed . Prinsen døde af lymfom i oktober 1999 . Lyngstad bor i øjeblikket i Zermatt , Schweiz , deler et hjem med sin britiske kæreste , Henry Smith , 5:e Viscount Hambleden , siden 2008 .
evidence_en: Anni-Frid Synni , Princess Reuss of Plauen -LRB- Anni-Frid Synni , Prinzessin Reuss von Plauen born Anni-Frid Synni Lyngstad , -LSB- ² ɑnːɪˌfriːd ˈlʏŋstɑ -RSB- ; -LSB- ² anːɪˌfriːd ˈlʏŋstɑːd -RSB- , 15 November 1945 -RRB- , widely known as Frida Lyngstad or by just the mononym Frida -LRB- -LSB- ² friːdɑ -RSB- ; -LSB- ² friːda -RSB- -RRB- , is a Swedish pop and jazz singer . Born in Norway to a Norwegian mother and a German father , she grew up in Sweden and reached international stardom as a member of the pop group ABBA , which has sold over 380 million albums and singles worldwide , making them one of the best-selling music artists in history . After the break-up of ABBA , she continued an international solo singing career with mixed success , releasing the albums Something 's Going On -LRB- 1982 -RRB- and Shine -LRB- 1984 -RRB- ; the latter being her last international album to date . In 1996 , Frida recorded a final album in Swedish -LRB- Djupa andetag -RRB- before ` retiring ' from music .   In April 1964 , aged 18 she married Ragnar Fredriksson . Immediately after their divorce in 1970 , Lyngstad courted eventual ABBA band member Benny Andersson , co-habiting until they officially married in 1978 . The couple separated in 1980 and divorced in 1981 . In 1992 , Lyngstad married Heinrich Ruzzo , Prince Reuss of Plauen , who was a prince of the former sovereign House of Reuss ; since then she holds the titles of Princess Reuss and Countess of Plauen with the style of Her Serene Highness . The prince died of lymphoma in October 1999 . Lyngstad currently lives in Zermatt , Switzerland , sharing a home with her British boyfriend , Henry Smith , 5th Viscount Hambleden , since 2008 .

evidence_da: '' Pilot '' er den første episode af tv-serien Supernatural . September 2005 , og blev skrevet af serien sereric Kripke og instrueret af David Nutter . Den overnaturlige pilot introducerede karaktererne af Sam -LRB- Jared Padalecki -RRB- og Dean Winchester -LRB- Jensen Ackles -RRB-, brødre, der rejser over hele landet jagt overnaturlige skabninger , da de kæmpede en spøgelsesagtig kvinde i hvid -LRB- Sarah Shahi -RRB- mens de søger efter deres forsvundne far-LRB- Jeffrey Dean Morgan -RRB- .   Kripke var ved at udvikle konceptet i ti år, før det blev greenlit som en tv-serie . Før det kunne blive filmet , scriptet gennemgik talrige revisioner . Episoden blev produceret i Los Angeles , selvom fremtidige episoder blev filmet i Vancouver , British Columbia , for at spare penge . Episoden etablerede seriens tradition for et rock-musik soundtrack , og omfattede baggrundsmusik scoret af Kripke 's ven Christopher Lennertz . Den modtog blandede anmeldelser , hvor kritikere roste de rædselselementer , men havde forskellige meninger om de ledende aktørers præstationer .
evidence_en: `` Pilot '' is the first episode of the television series Supernatural . It premiered on The WB on September 13 , 2005 , and was written by series creator Eric Kripke and directed by David Nutter . The Supernatural pilot introduced the characters of Sam -LRB- Jared Padalecki -RRB- and Dean Winchester -LRB- Jensen Ackles -RRB- , brothers who travel throughout the country hunting supernatural creatures , as they battled a ghostly Woman in White -LRB- Sarah Shahi -RRB- while searching for their missing father -LRB- Jeffrey Dean Morgan -RRB- .   Kripke was developing the concept for ten years before it was greenlit as a television series . Before it could be filmed , the script underwent numerous revisions . The episode was produced in Los Angeles , though future episodes were filmed in Vancouver , British Columbia , to save money . The episode established the series ' tradition of a rock-music soundtrack , and included background music scored by Kripke 's friend Christopher Lennertz . It received mixed reviews , with critics praising the horror elements but having varying opinions of the lead actors ' performances .

evidence_da: Kristoffer '' Kris '' Kristofferson -LRB- født 22 juni 1936 -RRB- er en amerikansk singer-songwriter , musiker , og skuespiller . Han skrev og indspillede sangene '' Me and Bobby McGee '', '' For the Good Times '', '' Sunday Mornin ' Comin 'Down', og '' Help Me Make It Through the Night ''. Kristofferson komponerede sine egne sange og samarbejdede med Nashville sangskrivere som Shel Silverstein . evidence_en: Kristoffer `` Kris '' Kristofferson -LRB- born June 22 , 1936 -RRB- is an American singer-songwriter , musician , and actor . He wrote and recorded the songs `` Me and Bobby McGee '' , `` For the Good Times '' , `` Sunday Mornin ' Comin ' Down '' , and `` Help Me Make It Through the Night '' . Kristofferson composed his own songs and collaborated with Nashville songwriters such as Shel Silverstein . In 1985 , Kristofferson joined fellow country artists Waylon Jennings , Willie Nelson , and Johnny Cash in forming the country music supergroup The Highwaymen .  In 2004 , Kristofferson was inducted into the Country Music Hall of Fame . He is also known for his starring roles in Alice Does n't Live Here Anymore and A Star Is Born , for the latter of which he won a Golden Globe Award for Best Actor .

evidence_da: Rain Man er en amerikansk road comedy-drama film fra 1988 instrueret af Barry Levinson og skrevet af Barry Morrow og Ronald Bass . Det fortæller historien om en slibende og egoistisk ung wheeler-forhandler , Charlie Babbitt -LRB- Tom Cruise-RRB-, der opdager, at hans fremmedgjorte far er død og testamenteret alle hans multimillion-dollar ejendom til sin anden søn , Raymond -LRB- Dustin Hoffman -RRB-, en autistiske savant , hvis eksistens Charlie var uvidende . Charlie står tilbage med kun sin fars bil og samling af rosenbuske. Ud over de to fører , Valeria Golino stjerner som Charlie 's kæreste, Susanna .   Morrow skabte karakter raymond efter mødet Kim Peek , en real-life savant ; hans karakteristik var baseret på både Peek og Bill Sackter , en god ven af Morrow, der var genstand for Bill , en tidligere film, som Morrow skrev .   Rain Man modtog overvældende positive anmeldelser , roser Hoffman 's rolle og vid og raffinement af manuskriptet , og var den højest indtjenende film i 1988 . Filmen vandt fire Oscars på 61st Academy Awards -LRB- Marts 1989 -RRB- , herunder Bedste Billede , Bedste Originale Manuskript , Bedste Instruktør , og bedste skuespiller i en hovedrolle for Hoffman . Dens besætning modtog yderligere fire nomineringer . Filmen vandt også Golden Bear på 39th Berlin International Film Festival .
evidence_en: Rain Man is a 1988 American road comedy-drama film directed by Barry Levinson and written by Barry Morrow and Ronald Bass . It tells the story of an abrasive and selfish young wheeler-dealer , Charlie Babbitt -LRB- Tom Cruise -RRB- , who discovers that his estranged father has died and bequeathed all of his multimillion-dollar estate to his other son , Raymond -LRB- Dustin Hoffman -RRB- , an autistic savant , of whose existence Charlie was unaware . Charlie is left with only his father 's car and collection of rose bushes . In addition to the two leads , Valeria Golino stars as Charlie 's girlfriend , Susanna .   Morrow created the character of Raymond after meeting Kim Peek , a real-life savant ; his characterization was based on both Peek and Bill Sackter , a good friend of Morrow who was the subject of Bill , an earlier film that Morrow wrote .   Rain Man received overwhelmingly positive reviews , praising Hoffman 's role and the wit and sophistication of the screenplay , and was the highest-grossing film of 1988 . The film won four Oscars at the 61st Academy Awards -LRB- March 1989 -RRB- , including Best Picture , Best Original Screenplay , Best Director , and Best Actor in a Leading Role for Hoffman . Its crew received an additional four nominations . The film also won the Golden Bear at the 39th Berlin International Film Festival .

evidence_da: Demon Days er det andet studiealbum af det britiske virtuelle band Gorillaz , udgivet den 11 maj 2005 i Japan og den 23 maj internationalt af Parlophone Records og i USA af Virgin Records . Albummet indeholder bidrag fra De La Soul , Neneh Cherry , Martina Topley-Bird , Roots Manuva , MF DOOM , Ike Turner , Bootie Brown fra Pharcyde , Shaun Ryder , Dennis Hopper , London Community Gospel Choir , og et børnekor . Albarn bragt i Danger Mouse som producent .   Demon Days trådte den britiske hitlister på # 1 og den amerikanske hitlister på # 6 , udkonkurrerer bandets eponyme 2001 debut album . Albummet har solgt otte millioner eksemplarer på verdensplan . Albummet indeholder singlerne '' Feel Good Inc. '' , '' DARE '' , '' Dirty Harry '', '' Kids with Guns '' og '' El Mañana ''. Som med deres debutalbum var udgivelsen af Demon Days og dets respektive live-optrædener begge ledsaget af forskellige multimedier . Disse omfattede interaktive funktioner på Gorillaz hjemmeside , i alt fire animerede musikvideoer, virtuelle interview sessioner med bandet og animatics for hver sang . Næsten alle de visuelle forbundet med albummet blev designet af Gorillaz medskaber Jamie Hewlett som hans design selskab , Zombie Flesh Eaters . Spin rangeret Demon Days som den fjerde-bedste album i 2005 , mens Mojo rangeret det som nummer atten på deres årets udgang liste og hyldet albummet som en '' genre-sprænge , moderne pop milepæl . '' NME placeret det 98:e på deres liste over 100 største albums i dette årti . Uncut rangeret det på 75 på deres liste over top 150 albums i dette årti . Complex inkluderede det på deres liste over 100 bedste albums i det komplekse årti , hvilket placerer det som nummer 43 . Spin senere inkluderet det i deres liste over de 300 bedste albums af 1985 - 2014 .
evidence_en: Demon Days is the second studio album by British virtual band Gorillaz , released on 11 May 2005 in Japan and on 23 May internationally by Parlophone Records and in the United States by Virgin Records . The album features contributions from De La Soul , Neneh Cherry , Martina Topley-Bird , Roots Manuva , MF DOOM , Ike Turner , Bootie Brown of the Pharcyde , Shaun Ryder , Dennis Hopper , the London Community Gospel Choir , and a children 's choir . Albarn brought in Danger Mouse as producer .   Demon Days entered the UK charts at # 1 and the US charts at # 6 , outperforming the band 's eponymous 2001 debut album . The album has sold eight million copies worldwide . The album features the singles `` Feel Good Inc. '' , `` DARE '' , `` Dirty Harry '' , `` Kids with Guns '' , and `` El Mañana '' . As with their debut album , the release of Demon Days and its respective live performances were both accompanied by various multimedia . These included interactive features on the Gorillaz website , a total of four animated music videos , virtual interview sessions with the band and animatics for each song . Almost all of the visuals associated with the album were designed by Gorillaz co-creator Jamie Hewlett as his design company , Zombie Flesh Eaters . Spin ranked Demon Days as the fourth-best album of 2005 , while Mojo ranked it at number eighteen on their year-end list and hailed the album as a `` genre-busting , contemporary pop milestone . '' NME placed it 98th on their list of 100 greatest albums of the decade . Uncut ranked it at 75 on their list of top 150 albums of the decade . Complex included it on their list of 100 Best Albums of the Complex Decade , placing it at number 43 . Spin later included it in their list of The 300 Best Albums of 1985 -- 2014 .

evidence_da: Hotel Hell er en amerikansk reality tv-serie skabt , hostet og fortalt af Gordon Ramsay, der havde premiere på Fox-netværket august 13, 2012 . Det er Ramsay 's fjerde serie for Fox netværk og airs mandag aften kl 8 ET / PT . August 17, 2015 , Fox fornyet Hotel Hell for en tredje sæson , som blev sendt fra maj 24 til juli 26 , 2016 .   Serien funktioner Ramsay besøger forskellige kæmper logi virksomheder i hele USA i et forsøg på at vende deres ulykker , efter et lignende koncept etableret i Ramsay 's andre programmer , Ramsay 's Kitchen Nightmares og dens amerikanske modstykke , Kitchen Nightmares .
evidence_en: Hotel Hell is an American reality television series created , hosted and narrated by Gordon Ramsay that premiered on the Fox network on August 13 , 2012 . It is Ramsay 's fourth series for the Fox network and airs on Monday nights at 8 pm ET/PT . On August 17 , 2015 , Fox renewed Hotel Hell for a third season , which aired from May 24 to July 26 , 2016 .   The series features Ramsay visiting various struggling lodging establishments throughout the United States in an attempt to reverse their misfortunes , following a similar concept established in Ramsay 's other programs , Ramsay 's Kitchen Nightmares and its American counterpart , Kitchen Nightmares .

evidence_da: eleveneleven er et pladeselskab grundlagt i 2010 af Mike Hamlin , Ellen DeGeneres og hendes produktionsselskab , A Very Good Production , i samarbejde med mangeårige affiliate Warner Bros. . DeGeneres annoncerede det på hendes show siger, at etiketten ville koncentrere sig om mindre kendte kunstnere, og at hun havde været på udkig efter videoer af forestillinger på YouTube . DeGeneres forklarede hendes valg af navn, hævder, at hun ofte ser antallet 11:11, når man ser på hendes ure, at hun fandt Greyson Chance på 11th , og at sangerens fodbold trøje har nummer 11 . Alle kunstnere på etiketten er indtil videre blevet distribueret via Interscope Geffen A&M .
evidence_en: eleveneleven is a record label founded in 2010 by Mike Hamlin , Ellen DeGeneres and her production company , A Very Good Production , in association with longtime affiliate Warner Bros. . DeGeneres announced it on her show saying that the label would concentrate on less known artists and that she had been looking for videos of performances on YouTube . DeGeneres explained her choice of name , claiming that she often sees the number 11:11 when looking at her clocks , that she found Greyson Chance on the 11th , and that the singer 's soccer jersey has the number 11 . All of the artists on the label have , thus far , been distributed via Interscope Geffen A&M .

evidence_da: Giacomo Girolamo Casanova -LRB- -LSB- -DB- --dķiיrķיlamo kazaיnķיva -RSB- eller -LSB- kasaיnķva-RSB- 2 April 1725 -- 4 Juni 1798 -RRB- var en italiensk eventyrer og forfatter fra Republikken Venedig . Hans selvbiografi , Histoire de ma vie -LRB- Story of My Life-RRB- betragtes som en af de mest autentiske kilder til skikke og normer for det europæiske sociale liv i løbet af 1700-tallet .   Som det ikke var ualmindeligt på det tidspunkt , Casanova , afhængigt af omstændighederne , brugt mere eller mindre fiktive navne , såsom baron eller optælling af Farussi-LRB- navnet på sin mor -RRB- eller Chevalier de Seingalt -LRB- udtales Saint-Galle , som på fransk -RRB-. Han underskrev ofte sine værker Jacques Casanova de Seingalt, efter at han begyndte at skrive på fransk efter sit andet eksil fra Venedig .   Han er blevet så berømt for sine ofte komplicerede og udførlige affærer med kvinder, at hans navn nu er synonymt med '' womanizer ''. Han er forbundet med europæiske kongelige , paver og kardinaler , sammen med lysarmaturer som Voltaire , Goethe , og Mozart . Han tilbragte sine sidste år i Bøhmen som bibliotekar i Grev Waldsteins husholdning , hvor han også skrev historien om sit liv .
evidence_en: Giacomo Girolamo Casanova -LRB- -LSB- ˈdʒaːkomo dʒiˈrɔːlamo kazaˈnɔːva -RSB- or -LSB- kasaˈnɔːva -RSB- 2 April 1725 -- 4 June 1798 -RRB- was an Italian adventurer and author from the Republic of Venice . His autobiography , Histoire de ma vie -LRB- Story of My Life -RRB- , is regarded as one of the most authentic sources of the customs and norms of European social life during the 18th century .   As was not uncommon at the time , Casanova , depending on circumstances , used more or less fictitious names , such as baron or count of Farussi -LRB- the name of his mother -RRB- or Chevalier de Seingalt -LRB- pronounced Saint-Galle , as in French -RRB- . He often signed his works Jacques Casanova de Seingalt after he began writing in French following his second exile from Venice .   He has become so famous for his often complicated and elaborate affairs with women that his name is now synonymous with `` womanizer '' . He associated with European royalty , popes , and cardinals , along with luminaries such as Voltaire , Goethe , and Mozart . He spent his last years in Bohemia as a librarian in Count Waldstein 's household , where he also wrote the story of his life .

evidence_da: Ellyse Alexandra Perry -LRB- født 3 November 1990 -RRB- er en australsk sportskvinde, der fik sin debut for både den australske cricket og den australske kvinders fodboldlandshold i en alder af 16 . Hun spillede sin første cricket international i juli 2007, før hun tjente sin første fodbold kasket til Australien en måned senere . Perry er den yngste person til at repræsentere Australien i cricket og den første australske at have optrådt i både cricket og fodbold World Cups .   Perry var fast-track at gøre hende One Day International-LRB-ODI-RRB-debut for Australien mod New Zealand , tre måneder før du spiller en enkelt kamp for hendes stat New South Wales i Women 's National Cricket League-LRB-WNCL-RRB-. . I 2007 - 08 , hun fik sin debut for New South Wales og vandt WNCL med dem , og i slutningen af sæsonen , hun fik sin Test debut i Bowral mod England . I løbet af sæsonen , hun var den spiller i kampen i hendes Twenty20 internationale debut mod England , og gjorde sin jomfru ODI halve århundrede mod New Zealand .   Perry tog 4 / 23 i finalen i 2008 - 09 WNCL at hjælpe New South Wales forsvare deres titel . Hun tog derefter ni wickets som Australien kom fjerde i 2009 World Cup afholdt i Australien . Hun var ineffektiv i løbet af 2009 ICC Women 's World Twenty20 i England , idet kun to wickets i Australiens fire kampe .   I 2009 - 10 , Perry tog 22 wickets og scorede 148 kører som New South Wales vandt WNCL igen . Hun tog derefter 18 wickets i 10 ODI'er mod New Zealand i slutningen af sæsonen , som australierne vandt alle kampe . Under disse kampe tog Perry sin jomfru fem-wicket ODI træk . Perry spillede i hver af Australiens kampe på 2010 World Twenty20 i Vestindien , idet 3 / 18 og blive udnævnt til spiller af kampen i finalen som Australien besejrede New Zealand med tre kørsler til at kræve titlen .   En forsvarer , Perry repræsenterede Australien ved 2008 Asian Cup , og scorede i en af kampene . Hun spillede for Central Coast Mariners i den australske W-League i løbet af 2008 - 09 sæsonen , før de overføres til Canberra United det følgende år . I juni 2010 , Perry begyndte sin mediekarriere ved at være vært for fodbold-relaterede show Football Stars of Tomorrow , screenet på den digitale sportskanal One HD .
evidence_en: Ellyse Alexandra Perry -LRB- born 3 November 1990 -RRB- is an Australian sportswoman who made her debut for both the Australian cricket and the Australian women 's national soccer team at the age of 16 . She played her first cricket international in July 2007 before earning her first soccer cap for Australia a month later . Perry is the youngest person to represent Australia in cricket and the first Australian to have appeared in both cricket and soccer World Cups .   Perry was fast-tracked to make her One Day International -LRB- ODI -RRB- debut for Australia against New Zealand , three months before playing a single match for her state New South Wales in the Women 's National Cricket League -LRB- WNCL -RRB- . In 2007 -- 08 , she made her debut for New South Wales and won the WNCL with them , and at the end of the season , she made her Test debut in Bowral against England . During the season , she was the player of the match in her Twenty20 international debut against England , and made her maiden ODI half-century against New Zealand .   Perry took 4/23 in the final of the 2008 -- 09 WNCL to help New South Wales defend their title . She then took nine wickets as Australia came fourth in the 2009 World Cup held in Australia . She was ineffective during the 2009 ICC Women 's World Twenty20 in England , taking only two wickets in Australia 's four matches .   In 2009 -- 10 , Perry took 22 wickets and scored 148 runs as New South Wales won the WNCL again . She then took 18 wickets in 10 ODIs against New Zealand at the end of the season , as the Australians won all the matches . During these matches , Perry took her maiden five-wicket ODI haul . Perry played in each of Australia 's matches at the 2010 World Twenty20 in the West Indies , taking 3/18 and being named player of the match in the final as Australia defeated New Zealand by three runs to claim the title .   A defender , Perry represented Australia at the 2008 Asian Cup , and scored in one of the matches . She played for the Central Coast Mariners in the Australian W-League during the 2008 -- 09 season , before transferring to Canberra United the following year . In June 2010 , Perry began her media career by hosting the soccer-related show Football Stars of Tomorrow , screened on the digital sports channel One HD .

evidence_en: Jennifer Joanna Aniston -LRB- born February 11 , 1969 -RRB- is an American actress , producer , and businesswoman . She is the daughter of Greek-born actor John Aniston and American actress Nancy Dow . Aniston gained worldwide recognition for portraying Rachel Green on the popular television sitcom Friends -LRB- 1994 -- 2004 -RRB- , a role which earned her a Primetime Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award . The character was widely popular during the airing of the series and was later recognized as one of the 100 greatest female characters in United States television .   Aniston has played the female protagonist in a number of comedies and romantic comedies . Her box office hits include Bruce Almighty -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , The Break-Up -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Marley & Me -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , Just Go with It -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , Horrible Bosses -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , and We 're the Millers -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , each of which have grossed over 200 million in worldwide receipts . Her most critically acclaimed roles included the role of Olivia in Friends with Money -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , The Good Girl -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , for which she was nominated for an Independent Spirit Award for Best Female Lead , and the drama Cake -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , for which she received nominations for the Golden Globe Award and the Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Actress . Her other films include Along Came Polly -LRB- 2004 -RRB- and He 's Just Not That Into You -LRB- 2009 -RRB- . In 2008 , she co-founded the production company Echo Films .   In 2012 , Aniston received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame . She is one of the highest paid actresses in Hollywood , and as of 2014 , her net worth is estimated to be 150 million . She has also been included in magazines ' lists of the world 's most beautiful women . evidence_da: Hotel Transsylvanien er en amerikansk 3D-computerkomediefilm fra 2012 produceret af Sony Pictures Animation for Columbia Pictures. Det blev instrueret af Genndy Tartakovsky og produceret af Michelle Murdocca , og stjerner stemmer Adam Sandler , Andy Samberg , Selena Gomez , Kevin James , Fran Drescher , Steve Buscemi , Molly Shannon , David Spade , og CeeLo Green . Filmen fortæller en historie om Grev Dracula , ejeren af et hotel kaldet Hotel Transsylvanien, hvor verdens monstre kan tage en pause fra den menneskelige civilisation. Dracula inviterer nogle af de mest berømte monstre til at fejre 118-års fødselsdag af sin datter Mavis . Når '' menneskefri hotel '' uventet besøges af en almindelig 21-årig rejsende ved navn Jonathan, skal Dracula beskytte Mavis fra at forelske sig i ham, før hotellets gæster lærer, at der er et menneske på slottet , hvilket kan bringe hotellets fremtid og hans karriere .   Filmen blev udgivet den 28. september 2012 og blev mødt med blandet kritisk modtagelse , mens offentligheden modtog den positivt . På trods af dette tjente Hotel Transsylvanien i alt 358 millioner dollars mod et budget på 85 millioner dollars på billetkontoret . Filmen blev nomineret til en Golden Globe Award for bedste animerede spillefilm . Det lancerede en franchise med en efterfølger med titlen Hotel Transsylvanien 2 , som finder sted syv år efter filmen , udgivet i 2015 , og en tredje film planlagt til 2018 . En tv-serie baseret på filmen er planlagt til premiere på Disney Channel i juni 2017 , og det vil fokusere på teenage år Mavis og hendes venner på Hotel Transsylvanien .
evidence_en: Hotel Transylvania is a 2012 American 3D computer-animated fantasy comedy film produced by Sony Pictures Animation for Columbia Pictures . It was directed by Genndy Tartakovsky and produced by Michelle Murdocca , and stars the voices of Adam Sandler , Andy Samberg , Selena Gomez , Kevin James , Fran Drescher , Steve Buscemi , Molly Shannon , David Spade , and CeeLo Green . The film tells a story of Count Dracula , the owner of a hotel called Hotel Transylvania where the world 's monsters can take a rest from human civilization . Dracula invites some of the most famous monsters to celebrate the 118th birthday of his daughter Mavis . When the `` human-free hotel '' is unexpectedly visited by an ordinary 21-year-old traveler named Jonathan , Dracula must protect Mavis from falling in love with him before the hotel 's guests learn that there is a human in the castle , which may jeopardize the hotel 's future and his career .   The film was released on September 28 , 2012 and was met with mixed critical reception , while the general public received it favorably . Despite this , Hotel Transylvania earned a total of $ 358 million against a budget of $ 85 million at the box office . The film was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for Best Animated Feature Film . It launched a franchise with a sequel titled Hotel Transylvania 2 , which takes place seven years after the film , released in 2015 , and a third film scheduled for 2018 . A television series based on the film is planned to premiere on Disney Channel in June 2017 , and it will focus on the teenage years of Mavis and her friends at the Hotel Transylvania .

evidence_en: Christie Brinkley -LRB- born Christie Lee Hudson , February 2 , 1954 -RRB- is an American model and actress . Brinkley gained worldwide fame beginning in the late 1970s with three consecutive Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue covers through 1981 . She spent twenty five years as the face of CoverGirl -LRB- the longest running cosmetics contract of any model in history -RRB- , has appeared on over 500 magazine covers , and has signed contracts with major brands -- both fashion and non-fashion .   Brinkley went on to work as an actress , illustrator , television personality , photographer , writer , designer , and activist for human and animal rights and the environment .   Brinkley has been married four times , most notably to musician Billy Joel , several of whose music videos she appeared in . Her fourth marriage , to architect Peter Cook , ended in a much-publicized 2008 divorce .   With a career spanning more than three decades , magazines such as Allure , Playboy , and Men 's Health have named Brinkley one of the most attractive women of all time . Her financial holdings in 2008 were worth an estimated US$ 80 million , primarily as the owner of real estate . In February 2012 , she was ranked third in the Daily Mail list `` World 's 20 richest models . ''

evidence_da: Mao Zedong eller Mao Tse-tung -LRB- -LSB- -LB- יmaי_dzəיי, _ zə - , _ - dķķ -RSB- December 26 , 1893September 9 , 1976 -RRB- også kendt som formand Mao , var en kinesisk kommunistisk revolutionær og stiftende far til Folkerepublikken Kina , som han regerede som Chai fra det kommunistiske parti i Kina fra dets oprettelse i 1949 , indtil han døde i 1976 . Hans marxistiske - leninistiske teorier, militære strategier og politiske politikker er kollektivt kendt som maoisme eller marxisme-leninisme-maoisme .   Født søn af en velhavende landmand i Shaoshan , Hunan , Mao vedtaget en kinesisk nationalistisk og anti-imperialistiske udsigter i det tidlige liv , især påvirket af begivenhederne i Xinhai revolutionen i 1911 og maj fjerde bevægelse i 1919 . Mao vedtog marxisme - Leninism, mens han arbejdede på Peking University og blev stiftende medlem af Det Kommunistiske Parti i Kina -LRB- CPC -RRB-, der fører efteråret Høst opstand i 1927 . Under den kinesiske borgerkrig mellem Kuomintang-LRB- KMT -RRB- og CPC , hjalp Mao med at grundlægge de kinesiske arbejderes og bøndernes røde hær , ledede Jiangxi-sovjetiske radikale jordpolitikker og blev i sidste ende chef for CPC i den lange marts . Selv om CPC midlertidigt allieret med KMT under United Front under den anden kinesisk-japanske krig -LRB-1937 - 45 -RRB- , efter Japans nederlag Kinas borgerkrig genoptaget og i 1949 Mao 's styrker besejrede nationalister, der trak sig tilbage til Taiwan .   oktober 1949 proklamerede Mao grundlaget for Folkerepublikken Kina -LRB- Kina -RRB - en enpartistat , der kontrolleres af CPC . I de følgende år mao størknet sin kontrol gennem en kampagne for klassicid mod udlejere, og en masse udrensning af opfattede fjender af staten, han kaldte som '' kontrarevolutionære '' angiveligt at have forårsaget mellem 2.000.000 til 6.000.000 dødsfald . -LRB- Mao selv indrømme 800.000 dødsfald i klassicid og 712.000 i undertrykkelsen af Kontrarevolutionære -RRB- I 1957 lancerede han Great Leap Forward kampagne, der havde til formål hurtigt at omdanne Kinas økonomi fra en landbrugsøkonomi til en landbrugsøkonomi til en industrielle en . Kampagnen bidrog til en udbredt hungersnød , hvis dødstal anslås til mellem 15.000.000 og 55.000.000 . I 1966 indledte han den store proletariske kulturrevolution , et program til at fjerne '' kontrarevolutionære '' elementer i det kinesiske samfund, der varede 10 år, og som var præget af voldelig klasse kamp, der dræbte 400.000 til 10.000.000 mennesker, udbredt ødelæggelse af kulturelle artefakter og hidtil uset højde af Mao 's personlighed kult . I 1972 bød Mao den amerikanske præsident Richard Nixon velkommen i Beijing , hvilket signalerer en politik om åbning af Kina , som blev fremmet under deng Xiaoping-LRB-LRB- 1978 - 1992 -RRB- . Mao fik en række hjerteanfald i 1976 og døde i september i en alder af 82 år. Han blev efterfulgt som Paramount leder af Hua Guofeng -LRB- 1976 - 1978 -RRB-, der blev hurtigt sat ud af spillet og erstattet af Deng .   En kontroversiel figur , Mao betragtes som en af de vigtigste personer i moderne verdenshistorie, og er også kendt som en etotør, militær strateg , digter og visionær . Tilhængere kreditere ham med at køre imperialisme ud af Kina , modernisere Kina og bygge det ind i en verdensmagt , fremme kvinders status , forbedre uddannelse og sundhedspleje , og øge den forventede levetid som Kinas befolkning voksede fra omkring 550 millioner til over 900 millioner under hans ledelse . I modsætning hertil betragter kritikere ham som en diktator, der kan sammenlignes med Adolf Hitler og Josef Stalin, som skadede den traditionelle kinesiske kultur - samt betragter ham som en gerningsmand til krænkelser af menneskerettighederne , og de anslår, at Mao var ansvarlig for 40 til 70 millioner dødsfald gennem sult , fængselsarbejde og henrettelser , hvilket ville rangere hans embedstid som den største forekomst af overdødelighed i menneskets historie .
evidence_en: Mao Zedong or Mao Tse-tung -LRB- -LSB- ˈmaʊ_dzəˈdʊŋ , _ zə - , _ - dɒŋ -RSB- December 26 , 1893September 9 , 1976 -RRB- , also known as Chairman Mao , was a Chinese communist revolutionary and founding father of the People 's Republic of China , which he governed as the Chairman of the Communist Party of China from its establishment in 1949 , until his death in 1976 . His Marxist -- Leninist theories , military strategies , and political policies are collectively known as Maoism or Marxism-Leninism-Maoism .   Born the son of a wealthy farmer in Shaoshan , Hunan , Mao adopted a Chinese nationalist and anti-imperialist outlook in early life , particularly influenced by the events of the Xinhai Revolution of 1911 and May Fourth Movement of 1919 . Mao adopted Marxism -- Leninism while working at Peking University and became a founding member of the Communist Party of China -LRB- CPC -RRB- , leading the Autumn Harvest Uprising in 1927 . During the Chinese Civil War between the Kuomintang -LRB- KMT -RRB- and the CPC , Mao helped to found the Chinese Workers ' and Peasants ' Red Army , led the Jiangxi Soviet 's radical land policies and ultimately became head of the CPC during the Long March . Although the CPC temporarily allied with the KMT under the United Front during the Second Sino-Japanese War -LRB- 1937 -- 45 -RRB- , after Japan 's defeat China 's civil war resumed and in 1949 Mao 's forces defeated the Nationalists who withdrew to Taiwan .   On 1 October 1949 , Mao proclaimed the foundation of the People 's Republic of China -LRB- PRC -RRB- , a one-party state controlled by the CPC . In the following years Mao solidified his control through a campaign of classicide against landlords , and a mass purge of perceived enemies of the state he termed as `` counter-revolutionaries '' alleged to have caused between 2,000,000 to 6,000,000 deaths . -LRB- Mao himself admitting 800,000 deaths in the classicide and 712,000 in the suppression of Counterrevolutionaries -RRB- In 1957 , he launched the Great Leap Forward campaign that aimed to rapidly transform China 's economy from an agrarian economy to an industrial one . The campaign contributed to a widespread famine , whose death toll is estimated at between 15,000,000 and 55,000,000 . In 1966 , he initiated the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution , a program to remove `` counter-revolutionary '' elements of Chinese society that lasted 10 years and which was marked by violent class struggle that killed 400,000 to 10,000,000 people , widespread destruction of cultural artifacts and unprecedented elevation of Mao 's personality cult . In 1972 , Mao welcomed American President Richard Nixon in Beijing , signalling a policy of opening China , which was furthered under the rule of Deng Xiaoping -LRB- 1978 -- 1992 -RRB- . Mao suffered a series of heart attacks in 1976 , and died in September , aged 82 . He was succeeded as Paramount leader by Hua Guofeng -LRB- 1976 -- 1978 -RRB- , who was quickly sidelined and replaced by Deng .   A controversial figure , Mao is regarded as one of the most important individuals in modern world history , and is also known as a theorist , military strategist , poet and visionary . Supporters credit him with driving imperialism out of China , modernising China and building it into a world power , promoting the status of women , improving education and health care , and increasing life expectancy as China 's population grew from around 550 million to over 900 million under his leadership . In contrast , critics consider him a dictator comparable to Adolf Hitler and Joseph Stalin who damaged traditional Chinese culture , as well as considering him a perpetrator of human rights abuses , and they estimate that Mao was responsible for 40 to 70 million deaths through starvation , prison labour and executions , which would rank his tenure as the top incidence of excess mortality in human history .

evidence_da: Lewis Carl Davidson Hamilton , MBE -LRB- født 7 Januar 1985 -RRB- er en britisk Formula One racerkører fra England , i øjeblikket racing for Mercedes AMG Petronas team . En tre-tiden Formula One verdensmester , han betragtes af kolleger og tidligere chauffører som en af de største Formula One drivere i historien om sporten . Han vandt sin første titel med McLaren i 2008, før han flyttede til Mercedes , hvor han vandt back-to-back titler i 2014 og 2015 .   I december 1995 , i en alder af ti , han nærmede McLaren teamchef Ron Dennis på Autosport Awards ceremoni og fortalte ham, '' Jeg ønsker at race for dig en dag ... Jeg ønsker at race for McLaren . '' Mindre end tre år senere mclaren og Mercedes-Benz underskrevet ham til deres Young Driver Support Programme . Efter at have vundet den britiske Formel Renault , Formel Tre Euroseries , og GP2 mesterskaber på vej op racing karriere stigen , kørte han for McLaren i 2007 , hvilket gør hans Formula One debut 12 år efter hans første møde med Dennis . Hamilton 's kontrakt for McLaren driver udviklingsprogram gjorde ham til den yngste nogensinde chauffør til at sikre en kontrakt, som senere resulterede i en Formula One drev .   Kommer fra en blandet baggrund , med en sort far og hvid mor , Hamilton er den første sorte chauffør til race i Formel 1 . Hamilton kommenterede dette, siger '' Den måde jeg ser det , min farve er en fordel i, at det 'er noget folk taler om '' , '' At være den første sorte mand gør n't noget meget for mig personligt , men for sporten selv betyder det sandsynligvis en hel del . '' I sin første sæson i Formel 1 satte Hamilton adskillige rekorder, mens han sluttede på andenpladsen i Formel 1-mesterskabet i 2007 - blot et point efter Kimi Räikkönen . Han vandt WORLD Championship den følgende sæson i dramatisk måde , bliver den daværende yngste Formel 1 verdensmester i historien, før Sebastian Vettel brød rekorden to år senere . Efter sin anden verdenstitel i 2014 blev han kåret som BBC Sports Personality of the Year . I 2015 blev han den første britiske kører i historien til at vinde i træk F1 titler , og den anden britiske chauffør til at vinde tre titler efter Jackie Stewart . Han blev også den første engelske chauffør til at nå denne milepæl . Han er den første kører i historien om F1 at have gjort podiet efter start 20:e sted eller lavere mindst 3 gange . Han er den eneste kører i sportens historie, der har vundet mindst et løb i hver sæson , han har konkurreret til dato , med McLaren fra 2007 til 2012 , og med Mercedes siden 2013 . Han har flere race sejre end nogen anden britisk chauffør i historien om Formula One . Hans Grand Prix sejre er den næsthøjeste af all-time at have overgået Alain Prost 's samlede 51 på 2016 brasilianske Grand Prix , bag kun Michael Schumacher på 91 . Hamilton har også rekorden for de fleste sejre i sæsonen uden at vinde World Championship , efter at have vundet 10 gange i 2016-sæsonen, hvor han sluttede runner-up til holdkammerat Nico Rosberg .
evidence_en: Lewis Carl Davidson Hamilton , MBE -LRB- born 7 January 1985 -RRB- is a British Formula One racing driver from England , currently racing for the Mercedes AMG Petronas team . A three-time Formula One World Champion , he is regarded by fellow and former drivers as one of the greatest Formula One drivers in the history of the sport . He won his first title with McLaren in 2008 before moving to Mercedes , where he won back-to-back titles in 2014 and 2015 .   In December 1995 , at the age of ten , he approached McLaren team principal Ron Dennis at the Autosport Awards ceremony and told him , `` I want to race for you one day ... I want to race for McLaren . '' Less than three years later McLaren and Mercedes-Benz signed him to their Young Driver Support Programme . After winning the British Formula Renault , Formula Three Euroseries , and GP2 championships on his way up the racing career ladder , he drove for McLaren in 2007 , making his Formula One debut 12 years after his initial encounter with Dennis . Hamilton 's contract for the McLaren driver development program made him the youngest ever driver to secure a contract which later resulted in a Formula One drive .   Coming from a mixed background , with a black father and white mother , Hamilton is the first black driver to race in Formula One . Hamilton commented on this , saying `` The way I see it , my colour is an advantage in that it 's something people talk about '' , `` Being the first black man does n't matter much to me personally , but for the sport itself it probably means quite a lot . ''   In his first season in Formula One , Hamilton set numerous records while finishing second in the 2007 Formula One Championship , just one point behind Kimi Räikkönen . He won the World Championship the following season in dramatic fashion , becoming the then-youngest Formula One World Champion in history before Sebastian Vettel broke the record two years later . Following his second world title in 2014 , he was named BBC Sports Personality of the Year . In 2015 , he became the first British driver in history to win consecutive F1 titles , and the second British driver to win three titles after Jackie Stewart . He also became the first English driver to reach that milestone . He is the first driver in the history of F1 to have made the podium after starting 20th place or lower at least 3 times . He is the only driver in the history of the sport to have won at least one race in each season he has competed to date , with McLaren from 2007 until 2012 , and with Mercedes since 2013 . He has more race victories than any other British driver in the history of Formula One . His Grand Prix victories is the second highest of all-time having surpassed Alain Prost 's total of 51 at the 2016 Brazilian Grand Prix , behind only Michael Schumacher at 91 . Hamilton also holds the record for most wins in the season without winning the World Championship , after winning 10 times in the 2016 season where he finished runner-up to teammate Nico Rosberg .

evidence_da: Elizabeth I -LRB- 7 September 1533 - 24 Marts 1603 -RRB- var dronning af England og Irland fra 17 November 1558 indtil hendes død . Undertiden kaldet Jomfru dronningen , Gloriana eller Good Queen Bess , den barnløse Elizabeth var den sidste monark i Tudor-dynastiet.   Elizabeth var datter af Henry VIII og Anne Boleyn , hans anden kone , der blev henrettet to og et halvt år efter Elizabeth 's fødsel . Anne 's ægteskab med Henry VIII blev annulleret, og Elizabeth blev erklæret illegitim . Hendes halvbror , Edward VI , regerede indtil sin død i 1553 , testamentere kronen til Lady Jane Grey og ignorerer påstandene fra hans to halvsøstre , Elizabeth og den romersk-katolske Mary , på trods af lov om det modsatte . Edward 's vilje blev afsat og Mary blev dronning, afsætte Lady Jane Grey . Under Marys regeringstid blev Elizabeth fængslet i næsten et år på mistanke om at støtte protestantiske oprørere .   I 1558 , Elizabeth lykkedes hendes halvsøster til tronen og satte sig for at regere efter gode råd . Hun afhang stærkt af en gruppe af betroede rådgivere , ledet af William Cecil , 1st Baron Burghley . En af hendes første handlinger som dronning var oprettelsen af en engelsk protestantisk kirke , hvoraf hun blev den øverste guvernør . Denne elizabethanske religiøse bosættelse skulle udvikle sig til Church of England . Det var forventet, at Elizabeth ville gifte sig og producere en arving til at fortsætte Tudor linje . Det gjorde hun aldrig , på trods af adskillige frierier. Da hun blev ældre, Elizabeth blev berømt for sin mødom . En kult voksede omkring hende, som blev fejret i portrætter, festspil, og litteratur af dagen .   I regeringen , Elizabeth var mere moderat end hendes far og halv-søskende havde været . Et af hendes mottoer var '' video et taceo '' -LRB- '' Jeg ser, men siger ikke noget '' -RRB- . I religion , hun var relativt tolerant og undgået systematisk forfølgelse . Efter paven erklærede hende illegitim i 1570 og frigivet hendes undersåtter fra lydighed mod hende , flere sammensværgelser truede hendes liv , som alle blev besejret med hjælp fra hendes ministres efterretningstjeneste . Elizabeth var forsigtig i udenrigsanliggender , manøvrering mellem stormagter frankrig og Spanien . Hun støttede kun halvhjertet en række ineffektive , dårligt ressourcestærke militære kampagner i Nederlandene , Frankrig og Irland . I midten af 1580'erne kunne England ikke længere undgå krig med Spanien . Englands nederlag i den spanske Armada i 1588 forbundet Elizabeth med en af de største militære sejre i engelsk historie .   Elizabeth 's regeringstid er kendt som den elizabethanske æra . Perioden er berømt for opblomstring af engelsk drama , ledet af dramatikere som William Shakespeare og Christopher Marlowe , og for den søfarende dygtighed af engelske eventyrere som Francis Drake . Nogle historikere skildrer Elizabeth som en korthærdet , undertiden ubeslutsom hersker , der nød mere end hendes andel af held . Mod slutningen af hendes regeringstid svækket en række økonomiske og militære problemer hendes popularitet . Elizabeth er anerkendt som en karismatisk performer og en stædig overlevende i en tid, hvor regeringen var faldefærdige og begrænset, og når monarker i nabolandene står over for interne problemer, der bragte deres troner i fare . Det var tilfældet med Elizabeths rival , Mary , Queen of Scots , som hun fængslede i 1568 og havde henrettet i 1587 . Efter den korte regeringstid af Elizabeth 's halv-søskende , hendes 44 år på tronen gav velkommen stabilitet for riget og hjalp skabe en følelse af national identitet .
evidence_en: Elizabeth I -LRB- 7 September 1533 -- 24 March 1603 -RRB- was Queen of England and Ireland from 17 November 1558 until her death . Sometimes called The Virgin Queen , Gloriana or Good Queen Bess , the childless Elizabeth was the last monarch of the Tudor dynasty .   Elizabeth was the daughter of Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn , his second wife , who was executed two-and-a-half years after Elizabeth 's birth . Anne 's marriage to Henry VIII was annulled , and Elizabeth was declared illegitimate . Her half-brother , Edward VI , ruled until his death in 1553 , bequeathing the crown to Lady Jane Grey and ignoring the claims of his two half-sisters , Elizabeth and the Roman Catholic Mary , in spite of statute law to the contrary . Edward 's will was set aside and Mary became queen , deposing Lady Jane Grey . During Mary 's reign , Elizabeth was imprisoned for nearly a year on suspicion of supporting Protestant rebels .   In 1558 , Elizabeth succeeded her half-sister to the throne and set out to rule by good counsel . She depended heavily on a group of trusted advisers , led by William Cecil , 1st Baron Burghley . One of her first actions as queen was the establishment of an English Protestant church , of which she became the Supreme Governor . This Elizabethan Religious Settlement was to evolve into the Church of England . It was expected that Elizabeth would marry and produce an heir to continue the Tudor line . She never did , despite numerous courtships . As she grew older , Elizabeth became famous for her virginity . A cult grew around her which was celebrated in the portraits , pageants , and literature of the day .   In government , Elizabeth was more moderate than her father and half-siblings had been . One of her mottoes was `` video et taceo '' -LRB- `` I see but say nothing '' -RRB- . In religion , she was relatively tolerant and avoided systematic persecution . After the pope declared her illegitimate in 1570 and released her subjects from obedience to her , several conspiracies threatened her life , all of which were defeated with the help of her ministers ' secret service . Elizabeth was cautious in foreign affairs , manoeuvring between the major powers of France and Spain . She only half-heartedly supported a number of ineffective , poorly resourced military campaigns in the Netherlands , France , and Ireland . By the mid-1580s , England could no longer avoid war with Spain . England 's defeat of the Spanish Armada in 1588 associated Elizabeth with one of the greatest military victories in English history .   Elizabeth 's reign is known as the Elizabethan era . The period is famous for the flourishing of English drama , led by playwrights such as William Shakespeare and Christopher Marlowe , and for the seafaring prowess of English adventurers such as Francis Drake . Some historians depict Elizabeth as a short-tempered , sometimes indecisive ruler , who enjoyed more than her share of luck . Towards the end of her reign , a series of economic and military problems weakened her popularity . Elizabeth is acknowledged as a charismatic performer and a dogged survivor in an era when government was ramshackle and limited , and when monarchs in neighbouring countries faced internal problems that jeopardised their thrones . Such was the case with Elizabeth 's rival , Mary , Queen of Scots , whom she imprisoned in 1568 and had executed in 1587 . After the short reigns of Elizabeth 's half-siblings , her 44 years on the throne provided welcome stability for the kingdom and helped forge a sense of national identity .

evidence_da: Paul Samuel Feig -LRB- -LSB- 出出出出出-RSB- født September 17 , 1962 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller , filminstruktør , producent , og manuskriptforfatter . Han er bedst kendt for at instruere filmen Bridesmaids fra 2011 , med Kristen Wiig og Melissa McCarthy og filmen Ghostbusters fra 2016, der også har Wiig og McCarthy i hovedrollerne . Feig også instrueret komedie film The Heat -LRB- 2013 -RRB- stjernespækket McCarthy og Sandra Bullock , og Spy-LRB- 2015 -RRB- som stjerner McCarthy , Jason Statham , og Jude Law .
