Dette karneval er også påvirket af afrikansk-brasiliansk kultur. Det er en seks-dages fest, hvor folkemængderne følger trioerne elétricos gennem byens gader, dans og sang. Også i nordøst, Olinda karneval funktioner unikke egenskaber , stærkt påvirket af lokale folklore og kulturelle manifestationer , såsom Frevo og Maracatu ''.   De typiske genrer af musik af brasilianske karneval er, i den sydøstlige region i almindelighed, for det meste byer Rio de Janeiro og São Paulo : samba-enredo, samba de bloco , samba de embalo og marchinha; og i den nordøstlige region, herunder Pernambuco -LRB- for det meste byer Olinda og Recife -RRB- : frevo og maracatu , og Bahia-LRB- for det meste byen Salvador -RRB- : samba-reggae , pagode -LRB- også en type Samba -RRB- og de vigtigste genre axé musik.   Carnival er den mest berømte ferie i Brasilien og er blevet en begivenhed af enorme proportioner. Bortset fra industriel produktion , detailvirksomheder såsom indkøbscentre og karnevalsrelaterede virksomheder , forener landet fuldstændigt i næsten en uge , og festlighederne er intense , dag og nat , hovedsagelig i kystbyer . Rio de Janeiro 's karneval alene trak 4,9 millioner mennesker i 2011 , med 400.000 er udlændinge .   Denne kulturelle manifestation kunne velsagtens være historisk spores tilbage til den portugisiske dag opdagelser, da deres karavels regelmæssigt passerede gennem Madeira , et område, der allerede fejrede eftertrykkeligt sin karnevalsæson, og hvor de blev lastet med varer, men også mennesker og deres ludiske og kulturelle udtryksformer.
evidence_en: Carnival of Brazil ' -LRB- Carnaval do Brasil , -LSB- kaʁnaˈvaw -RSB- -RRB- is an annual Brazilian festival held between the Friday afternoon -LRB- 51 days before Easter -RRB- and Ash Wednesday at noon , which marks the beginning of Lent , the forty-day period before Easter . On certain days of Lent , Roman Catholics and some other Christians traditionally abstained from the consumption of meat and poultry , hence the term `` carnival , '' from carnelevare , `` to remove -LRB- literally , `` raise '' -RRB- meat . ''   Rhythm , participation , and costumes vary from one region of Brazil to another . In the southeastern cities of Rio de Janeiro , São Paulo , and Vitória , huge organized parades are led by samba schools . Those official parades are meant to be watched by the public , while minor parades -LRB- `` blocos '' -RRB- allowing public participation can be found in other cities , like Belo Horizonte , also in the southeastern region . The northeastern cities of Recife , Olinda , Salvador , and Porto Seguro have organized groups parading through streets , and public interacts directly with them . This carnival is also influenced by African-Brazilian culture . It is a six-day party where crowds follow the trios elétricos through the city streets , dancing and singing . Also in northeast , Olinda carnival features unique characteristics , heavily influenced by local folklore and cultural manifestations , such as Frevo and Maracatu '' .   The typical genres of music of Brazilian carnival are , in the Southeast Region in general , mostly cities of Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo : the samba-enredo , the samba de bloco , the samba de embalo and the marchinha ; and in the Northeast Region including Pernambuco -LRB- mostly cities of Olinda and Recife -RRB- : frevo and maracatu , and Bahia -LRB- mostly the city of Salvador -RRB- : samba-reggae , pagode -LRB- also a type of Samba -RRB- and the main genre axé music .   Carnival is the most famous holiday in Brazil and has become an event of huge proportions . Except for industrial production , retail establishments such as malls , and carnival-related businesses , the country unifies completely for almost a week and festivities are intense , day and night , mainly in coastal cities . Rio de Janeiro 's carnival alone drew 4.9 million people in 2011 , with 400,000 being foreigners .   Arguably , this cultural manifestation could be historically traced to the Portuguese Age of Discoveries when their caravels passed regularly through Madeira , a territory which already celebrated emphatically its carnival season , and where they were loaded with goods but also people and their ludic and cultural expressions .

evidence_da: Kongeriget Ayutthaya -LRB- -LSB- -------juיtəjə -RSB- --LSB- ajútthajaי -RSB- ; også stavet Ayudhya eller Ayodhaya -RRB- var en siamesisk rige, der eksisterede fra 1351 til 1767 . Ayutthaya var venlig over for udenlandske handlende , herunder den kinesiske, vietnamesiske, indianere, japanske og persere, og senere den portugisiske, spanierne, hollandsk, engelsk og fransk , tillader dem at oprette landsbyer uden for væggene i hovedstaden, også kaldet Ayutthaya.   I det sekstende århundrede blev det beskrevet af udenlandske handlende som en af de største og rigeste byer i Østen . Retten i kong Narai -LRB- 1656 - 88 -RRB- havde stærke forbindelser med kong Louis XIV af Frankrig , hvis ambassadører sammenlignet byen i størrelse og rigdom til Paris .   I 1550 omfattede rigets vasaller nogle bystater på Malay-halvøen , Sukhothai , Lan Na og dele af Burma og Cambodja. Denne del af kongerigets historie omtales nogle gange som ' Det Ayutthayan-rige . ' I udenlandske regnskaber , Ayutthaya blev kaldt Siam , men mange kilder siger befolkningen i Ayutthaya kaldte sig Tai , og deres rige Krung Tai '' Tai land ''. Det blev også omtalt som Iudea i et maleri, der blev anmodet af den hollandske East India Company
evidence_en: The Kingdom of Ayutthaya -LRB- -LSB- ɑːˈjuːtəjə -RSB- อยุธยา , -LSB- ʔajúttʰajaː -RSB- ; also spelled Ayudhya or Ayodhaya -RRB- was a Siamese kingdom that existed from 1351 to 1767 . Ayutthaya was friendly towards foreign traders , including the Chinese , Vietnamese , Indians , Japanese and Persians , and later the Portuguese , Spaniards , Dutch , English and French , permitting them to set up villages outside the walls of the capital , also called Ayutthaya .   In the sixteenth century , it was described by foreign traders as one of the biggest and wealthiest cities in the East . The court of King Narai -LRB- 1656 -- 88 -RRB- had strong links with that of King Louis XIV of France , whose ambassadors compared the city in size and wealth to Paris .   By 1550 , the kingdom 's vassals included some city-states in the Malay Peninsula , Sukhothai , Lan Na and parts of Burma and Cambodia . This part of the Kingdom 's history is sometimes referred to as ` The Ayutthayan Empire . '   In foreign accounts , Ayutthaya was called Siam , but many sources say the people of Ayutthaya called themselves Tai , and their kingdom Krung Tai `` The Tai country '' . It was also referred to as Iudea in a painting that was requested by the Dutch East India Company

evidence_da: Spanierne er en nation og etnisk gruppe , der er hjemmehørende i Spanien , og som deler en fælles spansk kultur og taler et af spaniens nationale sprog , herunder mest spansk , som et primærsprog . I Spanien er der en række nationalisme og regionalismer , der afspejler landets komplekse historie og forskelligartede kultur . Selv om det officielle sprog i Spanien er almindeligt kendt som '' spansk '', er det kun et af de nationale sprog i Spanien , og er mindre tvetydigt kendt som casilian , et standardsprog baseret på den middelalderlige romantik tale i det tidlige Kongerige Tcatile i north-ce ntral Spanien og den mozarabic dialekt af Taifa af Toledo, som blev indarbejdet af den tidligere i det 11. Der er flere almindeligt talte regionale sprog, især baskisk -LRB- en Paleohispanic sprog -RRB-, catalansk og galicisk -LRB- begge romanske sprog som castiliansk -RRB- . Der er mange befolkninger uden for Spanien med forfædre, der emigrerede fra Spanien, og som deler en spansktalende kultur; især i spansktalende Amerika .   Den Romerske Republik erobrede Iberia i løbet af andet og 1. Som følge af den romerske kolonisering stammer størstedelen af de lokale sprog med undtagelse af baskisk fra det vulgære latinske . Den germanske vandaler og Suebi , med en del af den iranske Alans under kong Respendial erobrede halvøen i 409 E. Den Iberiske Halvø blev erobret og bragt under reglen om de arabiske Umayyads i 711 og af berber nordafrikanske dynastier Almohads og Almoravids i det 11. Efter det otte århundrede reconquista , den moderne spanske stat blev dannet med foreningen af kongerigerne Castille og Aragonien , erobringen af den sidste muslimske kongerige Granada og De Kanariske Øer i slutningen af 1400-tallet . i begyndelsen af 1500-tallet blev Kongeriget Navarra også erobret . Som Spanien udvidet sit imperium i USA 's, religiøse mindretal i Spanien blev enten konverteret eller udvist og den katolske kirke voldsomt forfulgt kætteri i en periode kendt som den spanske inkvisition . Parallelt hermed begyndte en bølge af udvandring til Amerika med over 16 millioner mennesker, der emigrerede til Amerika i kolonitiden -LRB- 1492-1832 -RRB- . I den post-koloniale periode -LRB- 1850 - 1950 -RRB- , yderligere 3,5 millioner spanske tilbage til Amerika, især Argentina , Uruguay, Mexico , Brasilien, Chile , Venezuela , Puerto Rico og Cuba . Som følge heraf er antallet af spanskefterkommere i Latinamerika i hundreder af millioner .   Spanien er hjemsted for en af de største samfund af Romani folk-LRB- almindeligvis kendt af den engelske exonym '' sigøjnere '', spansk : gitanos -RRB- . De spanske romaer , som tilhører undergruppen Iberian Kale -LRB- calé -RRB - er et tidligere nomadisk samfund , som spredte sig over Det Vestlige Asien , Nordafrika og Europa , og som først nåede Spanien i det 15 . Befolkningen i Spanien bliver mere og mere forskelligartet på grund af den seneste indvandring . Fra 2000 til 2010 havde Spanien en blandt de højeste indvandringsprocenter pr. indbygger i verden og den næsthøjeste absolutte nettomigration i verden - LRB - efter USA -RRB - og indvandrerne udgør nu ca . Ikke desto mindre reducerede den langvarige økonomiske krise mellem 2008 og 2015 betydeligt både indvandringsprocenten og det samlede antal udlændinge i landet , og Spanien blev endnu en gang et nettomigrantland .
evidence_en: Spaniards are a nation and ethnic group indigenous to Spain that share a common Spanish culture and speak one of the national languages of Spain , including most numerously Spanish , as a primary language . Within Spain , there are a number of nationalisms and regionalisms , reflecting the country 's complex history and diverse culture . Although the official language of Spain is commonly known as `` Spanish '' , it is only one of the national languages of Spain , and is less ambiguously known as Castilian , a standard language based on the medieval romance speech of the early Kingdom of Castile in north-central Spain and the Mozarabic dialect of the Taifa of Toledo which was incorporated by the former in the 11th century . There are several commonly spoken regional languages , most notably Basque -LRB- a Paleohispanic language -RRB- , Catalan and Galician -LRB- both Romance languages like Castilian -RRB- . There are many populations outside Spain with ancestors who emigrated from Spain and who share a Hispanic culture ; most notably in Hispanic America .   The Roman Republic conquered Iberia during the 2nd and 1st centuries BC . As a result of Roman colonization , the majority of local languages , with the exception of Basque , stem from the Vulgar Latin . The Germanic Vandals and Suebi , with part of the Iranian Alans under King Respendial conquered the peninsula in 409 AD . The Iberian Peninsula was conquered and brought under the rule of the Arab Umayyads in 711 and by the Berber North African dynasties the Almohads and the Almoravids in the 11th and 12th centuries . Following the eight century Reconquista , the modern Spanish state was formed with the union of the Kingdoms of Castille and Aragon , the conquest of the last Muslim kingdom of Granada and the Canary Islands in the late 15th century . In the early 16th century the Kingdom of Navarre was also conquered . As Spain expanded its empire in the America 's , religious minorities in Spain were either converted or expelled and the Catholic church fiercely persecuted heresy during a period known as the Spanish inquisition . In parallel , a wave of emigration began to the Americas began with over 16 million people emigrating to the Americas during the colonial period -LRB- 1492-1832 -RRB- . In the post-colonial period -LRB- 1850 -- 1950 -RRB- , a further 3.5 million Spanish left for the Americas , particularly Argentina , Uruguay , Mexico , Brazil , Chile , Venezuela , Puerto Rico and Cuba . As a result , Spanish-descendants in Latin America number in the hundreds of millions .   Spain is home to one of the largest communities of Romani people -LRB- commonly known by the English exonym `` gypsies '' , Spanish : gitanos -RRB- . The Spanish Roma , which belong to the Iberian Kale subgroup -LRB- calé -RRB- , are a formerly-nomadic community , which spread across Western Asia , North Africa , and Europe , first reaching Spain in the 15th century . The population of Spain is becoming increasingly diverse due to recent immigration . From 2000 to 2010 , Spain had among the highest per capita immigration rates in the world and the second highest absolute net migration in the World -LRB- after the USA -RRB- and immigrants now make up about 10 % of the population . Nevertheless , the prolonged economic crisis between 2008 and 2015 significantly reduced both immigration rates and the total number of foreigners in the country , Spain becoming once more a net emigrant country .

evidence_da: Grækenland -LRB- Ελλάδα , -LSB- eיlaða -RSB- -RRB-, officielt Den Hellenske Republik -LRB- Græsk : Ελληνικά Δημοκρατία , -LSB- elin iiיci ðimokraיti.a -RSB- -RRB- , historisk også kendt som Hellas -LRB- 出λλάς , -LSB- heיlas -RSB- , moderne udtale Ellás -RRB-, er en land i Sydøsteuropa med en befolkning på ca . Athen er nationens hovedstad og største by , efterfulgt af Thessaloniki .   Grækenland befinder sig strategisk ved skillevejen mellem Europa , Asien og Afrika . Beliggende på den sydlige spids af Balkan-halvøen , det deler landegrænser med Albanien mod nordvest , Republikken Makedonien og Bulgarien mod nord , og Tyrkiet mod nordøst . Grækenland består af ni geografiske regioner : Makedonien , Centralgrækenland , Peloponnes , Thessaly , Epirus , De Ægæiske Øer -LRB - herunder Dodekanesiske og Kykladerne -RRB- , Thrakien , Kreta og De Ioniske Øer . Det Ægæiske Hav ligger øst for fastlandet, Det Ioniske Hav mod vest , Det Kretensiske Hav og Middelhavet mod syd . Grækenland har den længste kystlinje ved Middelhavsområdet og den 11. længste kystlinje i verden med en længde på 13676 km med et stort antal øer , hvoraf 227 er beboede . Firs procent af Grækenland er bjergrig , med Olympen er den højeste top på 2918 m.   Grækenland betragtes som vugge vestlige civilisation , er fødestedet for demokrati , vestlige filosofi , De Olympiske Lege , vestlige litteratur , historiografi , statskundskab , store videnskabelige og matematiske principper , og vestlige drama . Fra det ottende århundrede f.Kr . Philip af Macedon forenet det meste af det græske fastland i det fjerde århundrede f.Kr., med sin søn Alexander den Store hurtigt erobre en stor del af den antikke verden, sprede græsk kultur og videnskab fra det østlige Middelhav til Indus-floden . Grækenland blev annekteret af Rom i det andet århundrede f.Kr ., bliver en integreret del af romerriget og dets efterfølger , det byzantinske imperium , hvori det græske sprog og kultur var dominerende . Den græsk-ortodokse kirke formede også moderne græsk identitet og transmitterede græske traditioner til den bredere ortodokse verden. Under osmannisk herredømme i midten af 1500-tallet opstod den moderne nationalstat Grækenland i 1830 efter en uafhængighedskrig . Grækenlands rige historiske arv afspejles af sine 18 UNESCO-verdensarvssteder , blandt de mest i Europa og verden .   Grækenland er et demokratisk og udviklet land med en avanceret højindkomstøkonomi , en høj livskvalitet og en meget høj levestandard . Grækenland var stiftende medlem af De Forenede Nationer og var det tiende medlem af De Europæiske Fællesskaber -LRB - forløber for Den Europæiske Union -RRB - og har været en del af euroområdet siden 2001 . Det er også medlem af en lang række andre internationale institutioner , herunder Europarådet , Den Nordatlantiske Traktats Organisation -LRB- NATO -RRB- Organisationen for Økonomisk Samarbejde og Udvikling -LRB- OECD -RRB- , Verdenshandelsorganisationen -LRB- WTO -RRB- , Organisationen for Sikkerhed og Samarbejde i Europa -LRB- OSCE -RRB- og Organisationen internationale de la Francophonie -LRB- OIF -RRB- . Grækenlands unikke kulturarv , stor turistindustri , fremtrædende skibsfartssektor og geostrategisk betydning klassificerer den som en mellemmagt . Det er den største økonomi på Balkan , hvor det er en vigtig regional investor .
evidence_en: Greece -LRB- Ελλάδα , -LSB- eˈlaða -RSB- -RRB- , officially the Hellenic Republic -LRB- Greek : Ελληνική Δημοκρατία , -LSB- eliniˈci ðimokraˈti.a -RSB- -RRB- , historically also known as Hellas -LRB- Ἑλλάς , -LSB- heˈlas -RSB- , modern pronunciation Ellás -RRB- , is a country in southeastern Europe , with a population of approximately 11 million as of 2015 . Athens is the nation 's capital and largest city , followed by Thessaloniki .   Greece is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe , Asia , and Africa . Situated on the southern tip of the Balkan peninsula , it shares land borders with Albania to the northwest , the Republic of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north , and Turkey to the northeast . Greece consists of nine geographic regions : Macedonia , Central Greece , the Peloponnese , Thessaly , Epirus , the Aegean Islands -LRB- including the Dodecanese and Cyclades -RRB- , Thrace , Crete , and the Ionian Islands . The Aegean Sea lies to the east of the mainland , the Ionian Sea to the west , the Cretan Sea and the Mediterranean Sea to the south . Greece has the longest coastline on the Mediterranean Basin and the 11th longest coastline in the world at 13676 km in length , featuring a vast number of islands , of which 227 are inhabited . Eighty percent of Greece is mountainous , with Mount Olympus being the highest peak at 2918 m.   Greece is considered the cradle of Western civilization , being the birthplace of democracy , Western philosophy , the Olympic Games , Western literature , historiography , political science , major scientific and mathematical principles , and Western drama . From the eighth century BC , the Greeks were organised into various independent city-states , known as polis , which spanned the entire Mediterranean region and the Black Sea . Philip of Macedon united most of the Greek mainland in the fourth century BC , with his son Alexander the Great rapidly conquering much of the ancient world , spreading Greek culture and science from the eastern Mediterranean to the Indus River . Greece was annexed by Rome in the second century BC , becoming an integral part of the Roman Empire and its successor , the Byzantine Empire , wherein the Greek language and culture were dominant . The Greek Orthodox Church also shaped modern Greek identity and transmitted Greek traditions to the wider Orthodox World . Falling under Ottoman dominion in the mid-15th century , the modern nation state of Greece emerged in 1830 following a war of independence . Greece 's rich historical legacy is reflected by its 18 UNESCO World Heritage Sites , among the most in Europe and the world .   Greece is a democratic and developed country with an advanced high-income economy , a high quality of life , and a very high standard of living . A founding member of the United Nations , Greece was the tenth member to join the European Communities -LRB- precursor to the European Union -RRB- and has been part of the Eurozone since 2001 . It is also a member of numerous other international institutions , including the Council of Europe , the North Atlantic Treaty Organization -LRB- NATO -RRB- , the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development -LRB- OECD -RRB- , the World Trade Organization -LRB- WTO -RRB- , the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe -LRB- OSCE -RRB- , and the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie -LRB- OIF -RRB- . Greece 's unique cultural heritage , large tourism industry , prominent shipping sector and geostrategic importance classify it as a middle power . It is the largest economy in the Balkans , where it is an important regional investor .

evidence_da: Avatar-LRB-markedsføres som James Cameron 's Avatar-RRB- er en 2009 amerikansk episke science fiction film instrueret, skrevet, produceret, og co-redigeret af James Cameron , og stjernespækket Sam Worthington , Zoe Saldana , Stephen Lang , Michelle Rodriguez , og Sigourney Weaver . Filmen foregår i midten af det 22. århundrede , når mennesker koloniserer Pandora , en frodig beboelig måne af en gasgigant i Alpha Centauri-stjernesystemet , for at udvinde mineralet unobtanium , en rumtemperatursuperleder . Udvidelsen af minekolonien truer den fortsatte eksistens af en lokal stamme af Na ' vi - en menneskelignende arter hjemmehørende i Pandora . Filmens titel refererer til en genetisk manipuleret Na ' vi krop med sindet af en fjernt placeret menneske, der bruges til at interagere med de indfødte i Pandora .   Udvikling af Avatar begyndte i 1994 , da Cameron skrev en 80-siders behandling for filmen . Optagelserne skulle finde sted efter afslutningen af Cameron 's 1997 film Titanic , for en planlagt udgivelse i 1999 , men ifølge Cameron , den nødvendige teknologi var endnu ikke til rådighed for at nå sin vision af filmen . Arbejdet med sproget i filmens udenjordiske væsener begyndte i 2005 , og Cameron begyndte at udvikle manuskriptet og fiktive univers i begyndelsen af 2006 . Avatar blev officielt budgetteret på 237 millioner dollars . Andre skøn sætte omkostningerne mellem $ 280 millioner og $ 310 millioner til produktion og på $ 150 millioner til forfremmelse . Filmen gjorde udstrakt brug af nye motion capture filme teknikker, og blev udgivet til traditionel visning , 3D visning-LRB- ved hjælp af RealD 3D , Dolby 3D , XpanD 3D , og IMAX 3D-formater -RRB- , og for '' 4D '' oplevelser i udvalgte sydkoreanske teatre . Den stereoskopiske filmproduktion blev udråbt som et gennembrud i filmisk teknologi .   Avatar havde premiere i London på , 2009 , og blev internationalt udgivet på og i USA og Canada på , til positive kritiske anmeldelser , med kritikere meget rose sin banebrydende visuelle effekter . Under sin teatralske køre , filmen brød flere box office optegnelser og blev den højest indtjenende film af hele tiden , samt i USA og Canada , overgår Titanic , som havde holdt disse poster i tolv år -LRB-og blev også instrueret af Cameron-R RB- . Det blev også den første film til brutto mere end og den bedst sælgende film i 2010 i USA . Avatar blev nomineret til ni Academy Awards , herunder Bedste Billede og bedste instruktør , og vandt tre , for Bedste Kunst Retning , Bedste Filmvidenskab og bedste visuelle effekter . Efter filmens succes , Cameron underskrevet med 20th Century Fox til at producere tre fortsættelser, hvilket gør Avatar den første af en planlagt tetralogi . April 14 , 2016 , Cameron bekræftet, at der nu var planer om fire fortsættelser . Avatar 2 var planlagt til udgivelse i december 2018, før de blev forsinket , med efterfølgere følgende i december 2020 , 2022 , og 2023 , henholdsvis . Efterfølgerne er planlagt til udgivelse i 2020 , 2021 , 2024 og 2025 .
evidence_en: Avatar -LRB- marketed as James Cameron 's Avatar -RRB- is a 2009 American epic science fiction film directed , written , produced , and co-edited by James Cameron , and starring Sam Worthington , Zoe Saldana , Stephen Lang , Michelle Rodriguez , and Sigourney Weaver . The film is set in the mid-22nd century , when humans are colonizing Pandora , a lush habitable moon of a gas giant in the Alpha Centauri star system , in order to mine the mineral unobtanium , a room-temperature superconductor . The expansion of the mining colony threatens the continued existence of a local tribe of Na ` vi -- a humanoid species indigenous to Pandora . The film 's title refers to a genetically engineered Na ` vi body with the mind of a remotely located human that is used to interact with the natives of Pandora .   Development of Avatar began in 1994 , when Cameron wrote an 80-page treatment for the film . Filming was supposed to take place after the completion of Cameron 's 1997 film Titanic , for a planned release in 1999 , but according to Cameron , the necessary technology was not yet available to achieve his vision of the film . Work on the language of the film 's extraterrestrial beings began in 2005 , and Cameron began developing the screenplay and fictional universe in early 2006 . Avatar was officially budgeted at $ 237 million . Other estimates put the cost between $ 280 million and $ 310 million for production and at $ 150 million for promotion . The film made extensive use of new motion capture filming techniques , and was released for traditional viewing , 3D viewing -LRB- using the RealD 3D , Dolby 3D , XpanD 3D , and IMAX 3D formats -RRB- , and for `` 4D '' experiences in select South Korean theaters . The stereoscopic filmmaking was touted as a breakthrough in cinematic technology .   Avatar premiered in London on , 2009 , and was internationally released on and in the United States and Canada on , to positive critical reviews , with critics highly praising its groundbreaking visual effects . During its theatrical run , the film broke several box office records and became the highest-grossing film of all time , as well as in the United States and Canada , surpassing Titanic , which had held those records for twelve years -LRB- and was also directed by Cameron -RRB- . It also became the first film to gross more than and the best-selling film of 2010 in the United States . Avatar was nominated for nine Academy Awards , including Best Picture and Best Director , and won three , for Best Art Direction , Best Cinematography and Best Visual Effects . Following the film 's success , Cameron signed with 20th Century Fox to produce three sequels , making Avatar the first of a planned tetralogy . On April 14 , 2016 , Cameron confirmed that there were now plans for four sequels . Avatar 2 was scheduled for release in December 2018 before being delayed , with the sequels following in December 2020 , 2022 , and 2023 , respectively . The sequels are scheduled for release in 2020 , 2021 , 2024 and 2025 .

evidence_da: Lahore -LRB- -LSB- lə ' həər -RSB- -RRB- -LRB- -LSB- , -LSB- -RRB- er hovedstaden i den pakistanske provins Punjab . Det er den næstmest folkerige by i Pakistan og den 32. Byen er beliggende i den nordøstlige ende af Pakistans Punjab-provinsen , nær grænsen til den indiske stat Punjab. Lahore er rangeret som en beta - verden by , og er en af Pakistans rigeste byer med en anslået BNP på $ 58.14 milliarder -LRB- PPP -RRB- som i 2014 .   Lahore er det historiske kulturelle centrum af Punjab-regionen, og er den største Punjabi by i verden. Byen har en lang historie, og var engang under reglen om hinduistiske Shahis, Ghaznavids, Ghurids og Delhi Sultanatet. Lahore nåede højden af sin pragt under Mughal Empire , der tjener som sin hovedstad i en årrække . Byen blev erobret af styrkerne i persiske Safavid kejser Nader Shah under hans invasion af Mughal Empire . Byen blev derefter anfægtet mellem forskellige magter, før den blev hovedstad i sikh-imperiet , og derefter hovedstaden i Punjab under britisk styre . Lahore var central for uafhængighedbevægelserne i både Indien og Pakistan , idet byen var stedet for både erklæringen om indisk uafhængighed og beslutningen om oprettelse af Pakistan . Efter Pakistans uafhængighed i 1947 blev Lahore hovedstad i Pakistans Punjab-provins .   Lahore er en af Pakistans mest liberale og kosmopolitiske byer. Det udøver en stærk kulturel indflydelse på Pakistan . Lahore er et vigtigt center for Pakistans forlagsindustri og er fortsat det førende centrum for Pakistans litterære scene . Byen er også et vigtigt center for uddannelse i Pakistan, med nogle af Pakistans førende universiteter baseret i byen . Lahore er også hjemsted for Pakistans filmindustri, Lollywood , og er et stort centrum for Qawwali musik . Byen er også vært for en stor del af Pakistans turistindustri, med store attraktioner, herunder den gamle murede by, og Badshahi og Wazir Khan moskeer. Lahore er også hjemsted for UNESCOs verdensarvssteder Lahore Fort og Shalimar Gardens.
evidence_en: Lahore -LRB- -LSB- lə ` hɔər -RSB- -RRB- -LRB- -LSB- , -LSB- -RRB- is the capital city of the Pakistani province of Punjab . It is the second most populous city in Pakistan and the 32nd most populous city in the world . The city is located in the north-eastern end of Pakistan 's Punjab province , near the border with the Indian state of Punjab . Lahore is ranked as a beta - world city , and is one of Pakistan 's wealthiest cities with an estimated GDP of $ 58.14 billion -LRB- PPP -RRB- as of 2014 .   Lahore is the historic cultural centre of the Punjab region , and is the largest Punjabi city in the world . The city has a long history , and was once under the rule of the Hindu Shahis , Ghaznavids , Ghurids , and the Delhi Sultanate . Lahore reached the height of its splendour under the Mughal Empire , serving as its capital city for a number of years . The city was captured by the forces of Persian Safavid Emperor Nader Shah during his invasion of the Mughal Empire . The city was then contested between different powers before it became capital of the Sikh Empire , and then the capital of the Punjab under British rule . Lahore was central to the independence movements of both India and Pakistan , with the city being the site of both the declaration of Indian Independence , and the resolution calling for the establishment of Pakistan . Following the independence of Pakistan in 1947 , Lahore became the capital of Pakistan 's Punjab province .   Lahore is one of Pakistan 's most liberal and cosmopolitan cities . It exerts a strong cultural influence over Pakistan . Lahore is a major centre for Pakistan 's publishing industry , and remains the foremost centre of Pakistan 's literary scene . The city is also a major centre of education in Pakistan , with some of Pakistan 's leading universities based in the city . Lahore is also home to Pakistan 's film industry , Lollywood , and is a major centre of Qawwali music . The city also hosts much of Pakistan 's tourist industry , with major attractions including the old Walled City , and the Badshahi and Wazir Khan mosques . Lahore is also home to the UNESCO World Heritage Sites of Lahore Fort and Shalimar Gardens .

evidence_da: Chicago -LRB- -LSB- --DB- officielt Byen Chicago - er den tredjemest folkerige by i USA . Med over 2,7 millioner indbyggere er det også den mest folkerige by i både staten Illinois og det midtvestlige USA . Det er amtet sæde Cook County. Chicago hovedstadsområdet , ofte omtalt som Chicagoland , har næsten 10 millioner mennesker og er den tredjestørste i USA Chicago er blevet kaldt en global arkitektur hovedstad . Med hensyn til rigdom og økonomi , Chicago betragtes som en af de vigtigste forretningscentre i verden .   Chicago blev indarbejdet som en by i 1837, nær en portage mellem de store søer og Mississippi-floden vandskel, og voksede hurtigt i midten af det nittende århundrede. Placeret langs Lake Michigan , byen er et internationalt knudepunkt for finansiering, handel, industri, teknologi, telekommunikation og transport: O'Hare International Airport er den næsttravleste lufthavn i verden, når målt ved flytrafik; regionen har også det største antal amerikanske motorveje og jernbanevejgodstransport. I 2012 blev Chicago opført som en alfa global by af Globalisering og World Cities Research Network , og rangeret syvende i verden i 2016 Global Cities Index . Chicago har den tredjestørste bruttonationalprodukt i USA - omkring 640 milliarder dollars ifølge 2015 skøn . Byen har en af verdens største og mest diversificerede økonomier med ingen enkelt industri , der beskæftiger mere end 14 % af arbejdsstyrken .   I 2016 , Chicago vært over 54 millioner indenlandske og internationale besøgende , en ny rekord gør det til en af de øverste besøgte byer i nationen . Vartegn i byen omfatter Millennium Park, Navy Pier, Magnificent Mile, Art Institute of Chicago, Museum Campus, Willis -LRB- Sears -RRB- Tower, Museum of Science and Industry og Lincoln Park Zoo. Chicagos kultur omfatter billedkunst , romaner, film, teater , især improvisationskomedie og musik , især jazz , blues, soul, hiphop , gospel og husmusik . Der er mange gymnasier og universiteter i Chicago-området; blandt disse , Northwestern University , University of Chicago , og University of Illinois i Chicago er klassificeret som '' højeste forskning '' ph.d.-universiteter . Derudover har Chicago professionelle sportshold i hver af de store professionelle ligaer . Byen har mange øgenavne, den mest kendte er Windy City.
evidence_en: Chicago -LRB- -LSB- ʃᵻˈkɑːɡoʊ -RSB- or -LSB- ʃᵻˈkɔːɡoʊ -RSB- -RRB- , officially the City of Chicago , is the third-most populous city in the United States . With over 2.7 million residents , it is also the most populous city in both the state of Illinois and the Midwestern United States . It is the county seat of Cook County . The Chicago metropolitan area , often referred to as Chicagoland , has nearly 10 million people and is the third-largest in the U.S. Chicago has been called a global architecture capital . In terms of wealth and economy , Chicago is considered one of the most important business centers in the world .   Chicago was incorporated as a city in 1837 , near a portage between the Great Lakes and the Mississippi River watershed , and grew rapidly in the mid-nineteenth century . Positioned along Lake Michigan , the city is an international hub for finance , commerce , industry , technology , telecommunications , and transportation : O'Hare International Airport is the second-busiest airport in the world when measured by aircraft traffic ; the region also has the largest number of U.S. highways and rail road freight . In 2012 , Chicago was listed as an alpha global city by the Globalization and World Cities Research Network , and ranked seventh in the world in the 2016 Global Cities Index . Chicago has the third-largest gross metropolitan product in the United States -- about $ 640 billion according to 2015 estimates . The city has one of the world 's largest and most diversified economies with no single industry employing more than 14 % of the workforce .   In 2016 , Chicago hosted over 54 million domestic and international visitors , a new record making it one of the top visited cities in the nation . Landmarks in the city include Millennium Park , Navy Pier , the Magnificent Mile , Art Institute of Chicago , Museum Campus , the Willis -LRB- Sears -RRB- Tower , Museum of Science and Industry , and Lincoln Park Zoo . Chicago 's culture includes the visual arts , novels , film , theater , especially improvisational comedy , and music , particularly jazz , blues , soul , hip hop , gospel and house music . There are many colleges and universities in the Chicago area ; among these , Northwestern University , University of Chicago , and the University of Illinois at Chicago are classified as `` highest research '' doctoral universities . Additionally , Chicago has professional sports teams in each of the major professional leagues . The city has many nicknames , the best-known being the Windy City .

evidence_da: Victoria Leigh Blum -LRB- født 15 oktober , 1955 -RRB-, kendt under kunstnernavnet Tanya Roberts , er en amerikansk skuespiller og producer . Hun er kendt for sin rolle som Stacey Sutton i James Bond filmen A View to a Kill-LRB- 1985 -RRB- , og som Midge Pinciotti på That '70s Show-LRB- 1998 -- 2004 -RRB- .
evidence_en: Victoria Leigh Blum -LRB- born October 15 , 1955 -RRB- , known by the stage name Tanya Roberts , is an American actress and producer . She is known for her role as Stacey Sutton in the James Bond film A View to a Kill -LRB- 1985 -RRB- , and as Midge Pinciotti on That '70s Show -LRB- 1998 -- 2004 -RRB- .

evidence_da: Ariana Grande-Butera -LRB- født 26. juni 1993 -RRB- kendt som Ariana Grande -LRB- -LSB- er en amerikansk sanger og skuespiller. Hun begyndte sin karriere i Broadway musical 13 , før landing rollen som Cat Valentine i Nickelodeon tv-serien Victorious i 2009 . Showet sluttede efter fire sæsoner , og Grande medvirkede i spinoff , Sam & Cat , som sluttede i 2014 . Hun har også optrådt i andre teater- og tv-roller , og har lånt sin stemme til animerede tv og film .   Grande 's musikkarriere begyndte med soundtracket Music fra Victorious-LRB- 2011 -RRB- . Hun underskrev en pladekontrakt med Republic Records og udgav sit debutstudiealbum , Yours Truly , i 2013 , som debuterede som nummer et på den amerikanske Billboard 200 . Albummets leadsingle , '' The Way '', debuterede i top 10 på Billboard Hot 100 , hvor kritikere sammenlignede hendes brede vokalrækkevidde med Mariah Careys .   Grande 's andet studiealbum , My Everything -LRB- 2014 -RRB-, debuterede som nummer et i USA og kortlagt i top 10 i 24 andre lande . Med den ledende single '' Problem '' og flere andre fra dette album , hun var løbende i top 10 af Billboard Hot 100 i 34 uger og havde de mest top 10 singler af enhver kunstner i 2014 . I 2015 promoverede Grande My Everything med sin første verdensturné , The Honeymoon Tour , gæstemedvirkede i Fox comedy horror tv-serien , Scream Queens og udgav en ferie EP , Christmas & Chill . I 2016 udgav hun sit tredje studiealbum , Dangerous Woman , og flere sange fra albummet . Titelnummeret debuterede som nummer 10 på Billboard Hot 100 , hvilket gør Grande den første person i historien om dette diagram til at have den ledende single fra hver af hendes første tre albums debut i top 10 . Albummet debuterede som nummer to på Billboard 200 . I januar 2017 var Grandes musikvideoer blevet set i alt mere end syv milliarder gange online .   Grande 's udmærkelser omfatter tre American Music Awards , en MTV Video Music Award , tre MTV Europe Music Awards og fire Grammy Award nomineringer . Alle tre af hendes albums er blevet certificeret platin af RIAA . Hun har aktivt støttet en række velgørende organisationer - og har en stor følge på de sociale medier - og hun har en stor følge af det - og hun har en stor følge af det på de sociale medier - og hun har en stor opbakning - og har en stor opbakning på de sociale hun er den næstmest fulgte person på Instagram . I 2016 , Time opkaldt Grande en af de 100 mest indflydelsesrige mennesker i verden på den årlige Time 100 liste .
evidence_en: Ariana Grande-Butera -LRB- born June 26 , 1993 -RRB- , known as Ariana Grande -LRB- -LSB- ˌɑriˈɑːnə_ˈɡrɑːndeɪ -RSB- -RRB- , is an American singer and actress . She began her career in the Broadway musical 13 , before landing the role of Cat Valentine in the Nickelodeon television series Victorious in 2009 . The show ended after four seasons , and Grande starred in the spinoff , Sam & Cat , which ended in 2014 . She has also appeared in other theatre and television roles , and has lent her voice to animated television and films .   Grande 's music career began with the soundtrack Music from Victorious -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . She signed a recording contract with Republic Records and released her debut studio album , Yours Truly , in 2013 , which debuted at number one on the US Billboard 200 . The album 's lead single , `` The Way '' , debuted in the top 10 of the Billboard Hot 100 , with critics comparing her wide vocal range to that of Mariah Carey .   Grande 's second studio album , My Everything -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , debuted at number one in the US and charted in the top 10 in 24 other countries . With the lead single `` Problem '' and several others from that album , she was continuously in the top 10 of the Billboard Hot 100 for 34 weeks and had the most top 10 singles of any artist in 2014 . In 2015 , Grande promoted My Everything with her first world tour , The Honeymoon Tour , guest-starred in the Fox comedy horror television series , Scream Queens and released a holiday EP , Christmas & Chill . In 2016 , she released her third studio album , Dangerous Woman , and several songs from the album . The title track debuted at number 10 on the Billboard Hot 100 , making Grande the first person in the history of that chart to have the lead single from each of her first three albums debut in the top 10 . The album debuted at number two on the Billboard 200 . As of January 2017 , Grande 's music videos had been viewed a total of more than seven billion times online .   Grande 's accolades include three American Music Awards , an MTV Video Music Award , three MTV Europe Music Awards and four Grammy Award nominations . All three of her albums have been certified platinum by the RIAA . She has actively supported a range of charities , and has a large following on social media ; she is the second most followed person on Instagram . In 2016 , Time named Grande one of the 100 most influential people in the world on the annual Time 100 list .

evidence_da: Marcus LeMarr Allen -LRB- født 26 marts 1960 -RRB- er en tidligere amerikansk fodbold running back og fodbold analytiker for CBS . Som professionel løb Allen for 12.243 yards og fangede 587 passerer for 5.412 yards i løbet af sin karriere for både Los Angeles Raiders og Kansas City Chiefs fra 1982 til 1997 . Han scorede 145 touchdowns , herunder en daværende liga rekord 123 farende touchdowns , og blev valgt til seks Pro Bowls i løbet af sin karriere . Han var også en ganske god forbipasserende for en running back , færdiggøre 12 af 27 passerer for 285 yards og seks touchdowns , med kun én aflytning . Allen var den første spiller nogensinde til at få mere end 10.000 farende værfter og 5.000 modtagende værfter i løbet af sin karriere .   Allen betragtes som en af de største mål linje og short-yard løbere i National Football League -LRB- NFL-RRB-historie . Hans yngre bror, Damon Allen , spillede quarterback i 23 sæsoner i den canadiske Football League og var professionel fodbold 's all-time leder i forbipasserende værfter .   Allen har den ære at være den eneste spiller i historien om fodbold at have vundet en Heisman Trophy , en NCAA National Championship , en Super Bowl , og blive udnævnt NFL MVP og Super Bowl MVP . Han er også blevet optaget i både College Football Hall of Fame og Pro Football Hall of Fame .
evidence_en: Marcus LeMarr Allen -LRB- born March 26 , 1960 -RRB- is a former American football running back and football analyst for CBS . As a professional , Allen ran for 12,243 yards and caught 587 passes for 5,412 yards during his career for both the Los Angeles Raiders and the Kansas City Chiefs from 1982 to 1997 . He scored 145 touchdowns , including a then league record 123 rushing touchdowns , and was elected to six Pro Bowls over the course of his career . He was also a fairly good passer for a running back , completing 12 of 27 passes for 285 yards and six touchdowns , with only one interception . Allen was the first player ever to gain more than 10,000 rushing yards and 5,000 receiving yards during his career .   Allen is considered one of the greatest goal line and short-yard runners in National Football League -LRB- NFL -RRB- history . His younger brother , Damon Allen , played quarterback for 23 seasons in the Canadian Football League and was professional football 's all-time leader in passing yards .   Allen has the distinction of being the only player in the history of football to have won a Heisman Trophy , an NCAA National Championship , a Super Bowl , and be named NFL MVP and Super Bowl MVP . He has also been inducted into both the College Football Hall of Fame and the Pro Football Hall of Fame .

evidence_da: The Godfather er en amerikansk krimifilm fra 1972 instrueret af Francis Ford Coppola og produceret af Albert S. Ruddy , baseret på Mario Puzos bedst sælgende roman af samme navn . Det stjerner Marlon Brando og Al Pacino som lederne af en fiktiv New York kriminalitet familie . Historien , der spænder fra 1945 til 1955 , krøniker familien under patriarken Vito Corleone , med fokus på omdannelsen af Michael Corleone-LRB- Pacino-RRB- fra tilbageholdende familie outsider til hensynsløs mafia boss .   Paramount Pictures opnået rettighederne til romanen til en pris af $ 80.000 , før det vundet popularitet . Studio ledere havde problemer med at finde en direktør; deres første par kandidater afviste stillingen . De og Coppola var uenige om, hvem der skulle spille flere tegn , især Vito og Michael . Optagelserne blev udført på stedet og afsluttet tidligere end planlagt . Den musikalske score blev komponeret primært af Nino Rota med yderligere stykker af Carmine Coppola .   Filmen var den højest indtjenende film fra 1972 og var for en tid den højest indtjenende film nogensinde er lavet . Det vandt Oscars for bedste film , bedste skuespiller -LRB- Brando -RRB- og bedst tilpassede manuskript -LRB- for Puzo og Coppola -RRB- . Dens syv andre Oscar-nomineringer omfattede Pacino , James Caan , og Robert Duvall for bedste mandlige birolle og Coppola for bedste instruktør . Det blev efterfulgt af efterfølgere The Godfather Del II -LRB- 1974 -RRB- og The Godfather Part III -LRB- 1990 -RRB- .   The Godfather er bredt anerkendt som en af de største film i verden biograf og en af de mest indflydelsesrige , især i gangster genren . Det blev udvalgt til bevarelse i den amerikanske National Film Registry of the Library of Congress i 1990 , anses for '' kulturelt , historisk , eller æstetisk signifikant '' og er rangeret den næststørste film i amerikansk film -LRB- bag Citizen Kane - RRB- af American Film Institute .
evidence_en: The Godfather is a 1972 American crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola and produced by Albert S. Ruddy , based on Mario Puzo 's best-selling novel of the same name . It stars Marlon Brando and Al Pacino as the leaders of a fictional New York crime family . The story , spanning 1945 to 1955 , chronicles the family under the patriarch Vito Corleone , focusing on the transformation of Michael Corleone -LRB- Pacino -RRB- from reluctant family outsider to ruthless mafia boss .   Paramount Pictures obtained the rights to the novel for the price of $ 80,000 , before it gained popularity . Studio executives had trouble finding a director ; their first few candidates turned down the position . They and Coppola disagreed over who would play several characters , in particular , Vito and Michael . Filming was done on location and completed earlier than scheduled . The musical score was composed primarily by Nino Rota with additional pieces by Carmine Coppola .   The film was the highest-grossing film of 1972 and was for a time the highest-grossing film ever made . It won the Oscars for Best Picture , Best Actor -LRB- Brando -RRB- and Best Adapted Screenplay -LRB- for Puzo and Coppola -RRB- . Its seven other Oscar nominations included Pacino , James Caan , and Robert Duvall for Best Supporting Actor and Coppola for Best Director . It was followed by sequels The Godfather Part II -LRB- 1974 -RRB- and The Godfather Part III -LRB- 1990 -RRB- .   The Godfather is widely regarded as one of the greatest films in world cinema and one of the most influential , especially in the gangster genre . It was selected for preservation in the U.S. National Film Registry of the Library of Congress in 1990 , being deemed `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant '' and is ranked the second-greatest film in American cinema -LRB- behind Citizen Kane -RRB- by the American Film Institute .

evidence_da: Dame Jean Iris Murdoch -LRB- -LSB- -LB- -RSB- 15. juli 1919 - 8. februar 1999 -RRB - var en engelsk-irsk forfatter og filosof , bedst kendt for sine romaner om gode og onde , seksuelle relationer , moral og det ubevidstes magt . Hendes første udgivne roman , Under the Net , blev valgt i 1998 som en af Modern Library 's 100 bedste engelsksprogede romaner i det 20 . I 1987 blev hun gjort til damekommandør for det britiske imperiums orden. Hendes bøger omfatter The Bell -LRB- 1958 -RRB- , A Severed Head -LRB- 1961 -RRB- , The Red and the Green -LRB- 1965 -RRB- , The Nice and the Good -LRB- 1968 -RRB- , The Black Prince -LRB- 1973 -RRB- , Henry og Cato -LRB- 1976 -RRB- , Havet , Havet -LRB- 1978 , Booker Prize -RRB- , The Philosopher 's Pupil -LRB- 1983 -RRB- , The Good Apprentice -LRB- 1985 -RRB- , The Book and the Brotherhood -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , Budskabet til Planet -LRB- 1989 -RRB- og The Green Knight -LRB- 1993 -RRB- . I 2008 rangerede The Times Murdoch tolvte på en liste over '' De 50 største britiske forfattere siden 1945 ''.
evidence_en: Dame Jean Iris Murdoch -LRB- -LSB- ˈmɜrdɒk -RSB- 15 July 1919 -- 8 February 1999 -RRB- was an Anglo-Irish novelist and philosopher , best known for her novels about good and evil , sexual relationships , morality , and the power of the unconscious . Her first published novel , Under the Net , was selected in 1998 as one of Modern Library 's 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century . In 1987 , she was made a Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire . Her books include The Bell -LRB- 1958 -RRB- , A Severed Head -LRB- 1961 -RRB- , The Red and the Green -LRB- 1965 -RRB- , The Nice and the Good -LRB- 1968 -RRB- , The Black Prince -LRB- 1973 -RRB- , Henry and Cato -LRB- 1976 -RRB- , The Sea , the Sea -LRB- 1978 , Booker Prize -RRB- , The Philosopher 's Pupil -LRB- 1983 -RRB- , The Good Apprentice -LRB- 1985 -RRB- , The Book and the Brotherhood -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , The Message to the Planet -LRB- 1989 -RRB- , and The Green Knight -LRB- 1993 -RRB- . In 2008 , The Times ranked Murdoch twelfth on a list of `` The 50 greatest British writers since 1945 '' .

evidence_da: San Francisco -LRB- initialer SF -RRB- -LRB- -LSB- sæn_frənיsייי -RSB- spansk for Saint Francis ; Spansk : -LSB- san franיsisko -RSB- -RRB- officielt byen og Amtet San Francisco , er den kulturelle , kommercielle og finansielle centrum i det nordlige Californien . Beliggende i den nordlige ende af San Francisco-halvøen, San Francisco er omkring 47,9 sqmi i området, hvilket gør det til det mindste amt - og den eneste konsoliderede by-amt - inden for staten Californien . Med en tæthed på omkring 18.581 mennesker per kvadratkilometer -LRB- 7.174 mennesker pr km2 -RRB-, San Francisco er den tættest fast bosatte storby -LRB-befolkning større end 200.000 -RRB-i Californien og den næstmest tætbefolkede større by i USA efter New York City . San Francisco er den fjerdemest folkerige by i Californien , efter Los Angeles , San Diego , og San Jose , og den 13. Byen og dens omkringliggende områder er kendt som San Francisco Bay Area, og er en del af de større OMB-udpegede San Jose-San Francisco-Oakland kombineret statistiske område, den femte mest folkerige i nationen med en anslået befolkning på 8,7 millioner .   juni 1776 , da kolonister fra Spanien etablerede Presidio of San Francisco ved Golden Gate og Mission San Francisco de Asís et par miles væk , alle opkaldt efter St. Francis af Assisi . California Gold Rush af 1849 bragte hurtig vækst , hvilket gør det til den største by på vestkysten på det tidspunkt . San Francisco blev en konsolideret by-amt i 1856 .  Efter tre fjerdedele af byen blev ødelagt af jordskælvet og branden i 1906 , blev San Francisco hurtigt genopbygget , som var vært for Panama-Pacific International Exposition ni år senere . Verdenskrig var San Francisco en stor indskibningshavn for servicemedlemmer, der fragtede ud til Stillehavsteatret . Det blev derefter fødestedet for De Forenede Nationer i 1945 . Efter krigen , sammenløbet af tilbagevendende soldater , massiv indvandring , liberalisering af holdninger , sammen med stigningen i '' hippie '' modkultur , den seksuelle revolution , Fredsbevægelsen vokser fra modstand mod USA's engagement i Vietnamkrig , og andre faktorer førte til Summer of Love og homoseksuelles rettigheder bevægelse , cementering San Francisco som et centrum for liberal aktivisme i USA . Politisk stemmer byen kraftigt efter Liberale Demokratiske Partis linjer .   Et populært turistmål , San Francisco er kendt for sine kølige somre, tåge, stejle bølgende bakker, eklektisk blanding af arkitektur og vartegn, herunder Golden Gate Bridge, svævebaner, den tidligere Alcatraz Federal Penitentiary , Fisherman 's Wharf, og dens C hinatown distrikt . San Francisco er også hovedkvarter for fem store pengeinstitutter og forskellige andre virksomheder som Levi Strauss & Co. , Gap Inc. , Salesforce.com , Dropbox , Reddit , Square , Inc. , Dolby , Airbnb , Weebly , Pacific Gas and Electric Company , Yelp , Pinterest , T witter , Uber , Lyft , Mozilla , Wikimedia Foundation , Craigslist og Weather Underground . Det har flere kælenavne , herunder '' The City by the Bay '', '' Fog City '' , '' San Fran '' og '' Frisco '' samt ældre som '' Byen, der ved, hvordan '' , '' Bagdad ved bugten '', '' The Paris of the West '' , eller blot '' The City ''. , San Francisco er rangeret højt på verdens liveability placeringer .
evidence_en: San Francisco -LRB- initials SF -RRB- -LRB- -LSB- sæn_frənˈsɪskoʊ -RSB- , Spanish for Saint Francis ; Spanish : -LSB- san franˈsisko -RSB- -RRB- , officially the City and County of San Francisco , is the cultural , commercial , and financial center of Northern California . Located at the north end of the San Francisco Peninsula , San Francisco is about 47.9 sqmi in area , making it the smallest county -- and the only consolidated city-county -- within the state of California . With a density of about 18,581 people per square mile -LRB- 7,174 people per km2 -RRB- , San Francisco is the most densely settled large city -LRB- population greater than 200,000 -RRB- in California and the second-most densely populated major city in the United States after New York City . San Francisco is the fourth-most populous city in California , after Los Angeles , San Diego , and San Jose , and the 13th-most populous city in the United States -- with a census-estimated 2016 population of 870,887 . The city and its surrounding areas are known as the San Francisco Bay Area , and are a part of the larger OMB-designated San Jose-San Francisco-Oakland combined statistical area , the fifth most populous in the nation with an estimated population of 8.7 million .   San Francisco was founded on June 29 , 1776 , when colonists from Spain established Presidio of San Francisco at the Golden Gate and Mission San Francisco de Asís a few miles away , all named for St. Francis of Assisi . The California Gold Rush of 1849 brought rapid growth , making it the largest city on the West Coast at the time . San Francisco became a consolidated city-county in 1856 .  After three-quarters of the city was destroyed by the 1906 earthquake and fire , San Francisco was quickly rebuilt , hosting the Panama-Pacific International Exposition nine years later . In World War II , San Francisco was a major port of embarkation for service members shipping out to the Pacific Theater . It then became the birthplace of the United Nations in 1945 . After the war , the confluence of returning servicemen , massive immigration , liberalizing attitudes , along with the rise of the `` hippie '' counterculture , the Sexual Revolution , the Peace Movement growing from opposition to United States involvement in the Vietnam War , and other factors led to the Summer of Love and the gay rights movement , cementing San Francisco as a center of liberal activism in the United States . Politically , the city votes strongly along liberal Democratic Party lines .   A popular tourist destination , San Francisco is known for its cool summers , fog , steep rolling hills , eclectic mix of architecture , and landmarks , including the Golden Gate Bridge , cable cars , the former Alcatraz Federal Penitentiary , Fisherman 's Wharf , and its Chinatown district . San Francisco is also the headquarters of five major banking institutions and various other companies such as Levi Strauss & Co. , Gap Inc. , Salesforce.com , Dropbox , Reddit , Square , Inc. , Dolby , Airbnb , Weebly , Pacific Gas and Electric Company , Yelp , Pinterest , Twitter , Uber , Lyft , Mozilla , Wikimedia Foundation , Craigslist and Weather Underground . It has several nicknames , including `` The City by the Bay '' , `` Fog City '' , `` San Fran '' , and `` Frisco '' , as well as older ones like `` The City that Knows How '' , `` Baghdad by the Bay '' , `` The Paris of the West '' , or simply `` The City '' . , San Francisco is ranked high on world liveability rankings .

evidence_da: Chinatown centreret om Grant Avenue og Stockton Street i San Francisco, Californien, er den ældste Chinatown i Nordamerika og ved siden af Manhattans Chinatown, den største kinesiske enklave uden for Asien. Det er den ældste af de fire bemærkelsesværdige Chinatowns i byen. Siden oprettelsen i 1848 har det været meget vigtigt og indflydelsesrigt i etniske kinesiske indvandreres historie og kultur i Nordamerika . Chinatown er en enklave , der fortsætter med at bevare sine egne skikke , sprog, steder for tilbedelse , sociale klubber og identitet . Der er to hospitaler , mange parker og pladser , et posthus og anden infrastruktur . Mens de seneste indvandrere og ældre vælger at bo her på grund af tilgængeligheden af billige boliger og deres kendskab til kulturen, stedet er også en stor turistattraktion, tegning flere besøgende årligt end Golden Gate Bridge .
evidence_en: The Chinatown centered on Grant Avenue and Stockton Street in San Francisco , California , is the oldest Chinatown in North America and next to Manhattan 's Chinatown , the largest Chinese enclave outside Asia . It is the oldest of the four notable Chinatowns in the city . Since its establishment in 1848 , it has been highly important and influential in the history and culture of ethnic Chinese immigrants in North America . Chinatown is an enclave that continues to retain its own customs , languages , places of worship , social clubs , and identity . There are two hospitals , numerous parks and squares , a post office , and other infrastructure . While recent immigrants and the elderly choose to live in here because of the availability of affordable housing and their familiarity with the culture , the place is also a major tourist attraction , drawing more visitors annually than the Golden Gate Bridge .

evidence_da: Prison Break er en amerikansk tv-seriedrama skabt af Paul Scheuring , der blev udsendt på Fox i fire sæsoner fra august 29 , 2005 til maj 15 , 2009 , og en femte sæson, der havde premiere på April 4 , 2017 . Serien drejer sig om to brødre - hvoraf den ene er blevet dømt til døden for en forbrydelse, han ikke begik - og den anden, der udtænker en omfattende plan om at hjælpe sin bror med at flygte fra fængslet og rense sit navn . Serien blev produceret af Adelstein-Parouse Productions , i samarbejde med Original Television og 20th Century Fox Television . Sammen med skaberen Paul Scheuring , serien er udøvende produceret af Matt Olmstead , Kevin Hooks , Marty Adelstein , Dawn Parouse , Neal H. Moritz , og Brett Ratner, der instruerede pilot episode . Seriens temamusik , komponeret af Ramin Djawadi , blev nomineret til en Primetime Emmy Award i 2006 .   Serien blev oprindeligt afvist af Fox i 2003 , som var bekymret over de langsigtede udsigter for en sådan serie . Efter populariteten af serialiserede prime time tv-serie Lost og 24 , Fox besluttet at bakke produktionen i 2004 . Den første sæson modtog generelt positive anmeldelser og klarede sig godt i vurderingerne . Den første sæson var oprindeligt planlagt til en 13-episode køre , men blev udvidet til at omfatte en ekstra ni episoder på grund af sin popularitet . Prison Break blev nomineret til flere industri priser , herunder 2005 Golden Globe Award for bedste tv-serie Drama og 2006 People 's Choice Award for Favorit New TV Drama , som det vandt . I USA er alle fire sæsoner blevet udgivet på DVD og udgivet på Blu-ray internationalt .   Seriens succes har inspireret korte videoer til mobiltelefoner , flere officielle tie-ins på tryk og på internettet samt et videospil . En spin-off serie , Prison Break : Proof of Innocence , blev produceret udelukkende til mobiltelefoner . Serien har affødt et officielt magasin og en tie-in roman . Den fjerde sæson af Prison Break vendte tilbage fra sin mid-season pause i en ny tidsinterval april 17 , 2009 , for seriens sidste seks episoder . To yderligere episoder , med titlen '' The Old Ball and Chain '' og '' Free '' blev produceret , og blev senere omdannet til en standalone funktion , med titlen The Final Break . Begivenhederne i denne funktion finder sted før den sidste scene i serien finale , og er beregnet til at indgå ufærdige plotlines . Funktionen blev udgivet på DVD og Blu-ray 21 juli 2009 . En ni-episode femte sæson blev annonceret af Fox i januar 2016 og havde premiere på April 4 , 2017 , og luftet om tirsdagen kl 9:00 . Sæsonen sluttede den 30 maj 2017 .
evidence_en: Prison Break is an American television serial drama created by Paul Scheuring , that was broadcast on Fox for four seasons from August 29 , 2005 to May 15 , 2009 , and a fifth season which premiered on April 4 , 2017 . The series revolves around two brothers , one of whom has been sentenced to death for a crime he did not commit , and the other who devises an elaborate plan to help his brother escape prison and clear his name . The series was produced by Adelstein-Parouse Productions , in association with Original Television and 20th Century Fox Television . Along with creator Paul Scheuring , the series is executive produced by Matt Olmstead , Kevin Hooks , Marty Adelstein , Dawn Parouse , Neal H. Moritz , and Brett Ratner who directed the pilot episode . The series ' theme music , composed by Ramin Djawadi , was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 2006 .   The series was originally turned down by Fox in 2003 , which was concerned about the long-term prospects of such a series . Following the popularity of serialized prime time television series Lost and 24 , Fox decided to back production in 2004 . The first season received generally positive reviews , and performed well in the ratings . The first season was originally planned for a 13-episode run , but was extended to include an extra nine episodes due to its popularity . Prison Break was nominated for several industry awards , including the 2005 Golden Globe Award for Best Television Series Drama and the 2006 People 's Choice Award for Favorite New TV Drama , which it won . In the United States , all four seasons have been released on DVD and released on Blu-ray internationally .   The success of the series has inspired short videos for mobile phones , several official tie-ins in print and on the Internet , as well as a video game . A spin-off series , Prison Break : Proof of Innocence , was produced exclusively for mobile phones . The series has spawned an official magazine and a tie-in novel . The fourth season of Prison Break returned from its mid-season break in a new timeslot on April 17 , 2009 , for the series ' last six episodes . Two additional episodes , titled `` The Old Ball and Chain '' and `` Free '' were produced , and were later transformed into a standalone feature , titled The Final Break . The events of this feature take place before the last scene of the series finale , and are intended to conclude unfinished plotlines . The feature was released on DVD and Blu-ray July 21 , 2009 . A nine-episode fifth season was announced by Fox in January 2016 and premiered on April 4 , 2017 , and aired on Tuesdays at 9:00 pm . The season concluded on May 30 , 2017 .

evidence_da: Paul T. Scheuring -LRB- født November 20 , 1968 -RRB- er en amerikansk manuskriptforfatter og instruktør af film og tv-shows . Hans arbejde omfatter filmen A Man Apart fra fra 2003 og oprettelsen af tv-dramaet Prison Break , som han også blev krediteret for som executive producer og hovedforfatter .
evidence_en: Paul T. Scheuring -LRB- born November 20 , 1968 -RRB- is an American screenwriter and director of films and television shows . His work includes the 2003 film A Man Apart and the creation of the television drama Prison Break , for which he was also credited as an executive producer and head writer .

evidence_da: Gabourey Sidibe -LRB- -LSB- יæbəיreי_יsיdיbeי -RSB- ; født 6 maj , 1983 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller, der fik sin skuespillerdebut i 2009 filmen Precious , en rolle, der bragte hende en nominering til En Oscar for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle . Fra 2010 til 2013 var hun hovedmedlem af Showtime-serien The Big C.   Sidibe co-stjerne på tv-serien American Horror Story: Coven som Queenie og American Horror Story: Freak Show som Regina Ross , og senere reprised hendes rolle som Queenie i American Horror Story : Hotel . evidence_en: Precious : Base on Nol by Saf -LRB- Based on the Novel `` Push '' by Sapphire -RRB- , or simply Precious , is a 2009 American drama film , directed and co-produced by Lee Daniels . Precious is an adaptation by Geoffrey S. Fletcher of the 1996 novel Push by Sapphire . The film stars Gabourey Sidibe , Mo'Nique , Paula Patton , and Mariah Carey . This film marked the acting debut of Sidibe .   The film , then without a distributor , premiered to acclaim at both the 2009 Sundance Film Festival and the 2009 Cannes Film Festival , under its original title of Push : Based on the Novel by Sapphire . At Sundance , it won the Audience Award and the Grand Jury Prize for best drama , as well as a Special Jury Prize for supporting actress Mo'Nique . After Precious '' ' screening at Sundance in January 2009 , Tyler Perry announced that he and Oprah Winfrey would be providing promotional assistance to the film , which was released through Lionsgate Entertainment . Precious won the People 's Choice Award at the Toronto International Film Festival in September . The film 's title was changed from Push to Precious : Based on the Novel `` Push '' by Sapphire , to avoid confusion with the 2009 action film Push . Precious was also an official selection at the 62nd Cannes Film Festival -LRB- particularly the un certain regard section -RRB- .   Lionsgate gave the film a limited release in North America on November 6 , 2009 -LRB- the release was expanded on November 20 -RRB- . Precious received largely positive reviews from critics ; the acting , the story , and its message were generally praised . In the film 's opening weekend in limited release , it grossed $ 1.8 million , putting it in 12th place at the box office . As of February 2010 , the film had grossed over $ 47 million domestically , ranking no. 65 for 2009 , recouping its $ 10 million budget , and making it a box office success.Precious '' received six Academy Award nominations , including one for Best Picture , at the 82nd Academy Awards . Geoffrey Fletcher won for Best Adapted Screenplay . Mo'Nique won the award for Best Supporting Actress , for which she received a standing ovation at the ceremony , along with numerous other accolades .

evidence_da: Jerry Maguire er en amerikansk romantisk komedie-drama sportsfilm fra 1996, produceret og instrueret af Cameron Crowe , og stjerner Tom Cruise , Cuba Gooding Jr. og Renée Zellweger . Produceret til dels af lang tid Simpsons producent James L. Brooks , det var inspireret af sportsagent Leigh Steinberg , der fungerede som teknisk konsulent på besætningen . Det blev udgivet i nordamerikanske teatre på December 13 , 1996 , produceret af Gracie Films og distribueret af TriStar Pictures .   Filmen fik kritikerros , med kritikere roser sin handler og skriver . Filmen var en økonomisk succes , hvilket bringer i mere end $ 273 millioner på verdensplan , mod sin 50 millioner dollars budget . Det var den niende top-ekstrapolationsfaktoren film af 1996 .   Filmen blev nomineret til fem Academy Awards , herunder bedste film og bedste skuespiller for Tom Cruise , med Cuba Gooding Jr. vinde Academy Award for bedste mandlige birolle . Filmen blev også nomineret til tre Golden Globes , med Tom Cruise vinde for bedste skuespiller , og tre Screen Actors Guild Awards , med Cuba Gooding Jr. vindende bedste mandlige birolle .
evidence_en: Jerry Maguire is a 1996 American romantic comedy-drama sports film written , produced and directed by Cameron Crowe , and stars Tom Cruise , Cuba Gooding Jr. and Renée Zellweger . Produced in part by long time Simpsons producer James L. Brooks , it was inspired by sports agent Leigh Steinberg , who acted as Technical Consultant on the crew . It was released in North American theaters on December 13 , 1996 , produced by Gracie Films and distributed by TriStar Pictures .   The film received critical acclaim , with critics praising its acting and writing . The film was a financial success , bringing in more than $ 273 million worldwide , against its $ 50 million budget . It was the ninth top-grossing film of 1996 .   The film was nominated for five Academy Awards , including Best Picture and Best Actor for Tom Cruise , with Cuba Gooding Jr. winning the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor . The film was also nominated for three Golden Globes , with Tom Cruise winning for Best Actor , and three Screen Actors Guild Awards , with Cuba Gooding Jr. winning Best Supporting Actor .

evidence_da: Slaget ved Korinth var et slag mellem Den Romerske Republik og den græske bystat Korinth og dens allierede i Achaean League i 146 f.Kr., hvilket resulterede i en fuldstændig og total ødelæggelse af Korinth . Denne kamp markerede begyndelsen på perioden med romersk dominans i græsk historie.
evidence_en: The Battle of Corinth was a battle fought between the Roman Republic and the Greek city-state of Corinth and its allies in the Achaean League in 146 BC , which resulted in the complete and total destruction of Corinth . This battle marked the beginning of the period of Roman domination in Greek history .
