evidence_en: Amanda Peet -LRB- born January 11 , 1972 -RRB- is an American actress and author who has appeared in film , stage , and television . After studying with Uta Hagen at Columbia University , Peet began her career in television commercials , and progressed to small roles on television , before making her film debut in 1995 . Featured roles in the 2000 comedy film The Whole Nine Yards brought her wider recognition .   She has appeared in a variety of films , including the 2001 comedy Saving Silverman , the 2003 romantic comedy Something 's Got ta Give , the 2003 psychological thriller film Identity , the 2005 action-thriller Syriana , the 2006 comedy-drama remake Griffin & Phoenix , the 2007 romantic comedy The Ex , the 2008 science fiction film The X-Files : I Want to Believe and the 2009 disaster adventure drama 2012 . She has also appeared in the 1999 drama series Jack & Jill , the 2006 drama series Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip , and the 2015 comedy-drama series Togetherness .

evidence_da: George Wilcken Romney -LRB- Juli 8 , 1907 - Juli 26 , 1995 -RRB- var en amerikansk forretningsmand og republikanske parti politiker . Han var formand og formand for American Motors Corporation fra 1954 til 1962 , den 43. Han var far til tidligere guvernør i Massachusetts og 2012 republikanske præsidentkandidat Mitt Romney og mand til tidligere Michigan amerikanske Senat kandidat Lenore Romney .   Romney blev født af amerikanske forældre, der bor i mormonkolonierne i Mexico; begivenheder under den mexicanske revolution tvang sin familie til at flygte tilbage til USA, da han var barn . Familien boede i flere stater og endte i Salt Lake City , Utah , hvor de kæmpede under den store depression. Romney arbejdede i en række job , tjente som mormonmissionær i Det Forenede Kongerige og gik på flere gymnasier i USA, men tog ikke eksamen fra nogen af dem . I 1939 flyttede han til Detroit og sluttede sig til American Automobile Manufacturers Association , hvor han fungerede som chef talsmand for bilindustrien under Anden Verdenskrig og stod i spidsen for et samarbejde arrangement, hvor virksomhederne kunne dele produktionen Forbedringer. Han kom til Nash-Kelvinator i 1948 og blev den administrerende direktør for dens efterfølger , American Motors Corporation , i 1954 . Der vendte han rundt kæmper firma ved at fokusere alle bestræbelser på den kompakte Rambler bil . Romney hånede produkterne fra '' Big Three '' bilproducenter som '' gas-guzzling dinosaurer '' og blev en af de første højt profilerede, medie-kyndige virksomhedsledere . Hengivent religiøse , han præsiderede over Detroit Staven af Jesu Kristi Kirke af Sidste Dages Hellige .   Efter at have deltaget i politik ved at deltage i en stat forfatningskonvention til at omskrive Michigan forfatning i løbet af 1961 - 1962 , Romney blev valgt guvernør i Michigan i 1962 . Genvalgt af stadig større marginer i 1964 og 1966 , arbejdede han på at revidere statens finansielle og indtægter struktur , i høj grad at udvide størrelsen af statens regering og indføre Michigan 's første statslige indkomstskat . Romney var en stærk tilhænger af den amerikanske borgerrettighedsbevægelse . Han repræsenterede kortvarigt moderate republikanere mod den konservative republikaner Barry Goldwater under det amerikanske præsidentvalg i 1964 . Han anmodede om indgriben fra føderale tropper under 1967 Detroit optøjer .   Oprindeligt en frontløber for den republikanske nominering til præsident for USA i 1968 valget , han viste sig at være en ineffektiv forkæmper og faldt bag Richard Nixon i meningsmålinger . Efter en bemærkning fra midten af 1967 om, at hans tidligere støtte til Vietnamkrigen havde været på grund af en "" hjernevask "" af amerikanske militære og diplomatiske embedsmænd i Vietnam , hans kampagne vaklede endnu mere, og han trak sig tilbage fra konkurrencen i begyndelsen af 1968 . Efter Nixons valg som præsident udnævnte han Romney til sekretær for boliger og byudvikling . Romneys ambitiøse planer for boligproduktion stiger for de fattige og for åbne boliger til at adskille forstæder , var beskedent vellykket, men ofte forpurret af Nixon . Romney forlod administrationen i begyndelsen af Nixons anden embedsperiode i 1973 . Han vendte tilbage til privatlivet og gik ind for frivillighed og offentlig tjeneste og ledede National Center for Voluntary Action og dets efterfølgerorganisationer fra 1973 til 1991 . Han fungerede også som regional repræsentant for De Tolv i sin kirke.
evidence_en: George Wilcken Romney -LRB- July 8 , 1907 -- July 26 , 1995 -RRB- was an American businessman and Republican Party politician . He was chairman and president of American Motors Corporation from 1954 to 1962 , the 43rd Governor of Michigan from 1963 to 1969 , and the United States Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from 1969 to 1973 . He was the father of former Governor of Massachusetts and 2012 Republican presidential nominee Mitt Romney and the husband of former Michigan U.S. Senate candidate Lenore Romney .   Romney was born to American parents living in the Mormon colonies in Mexico ; events during the Mexican Revolution forced his family to flee back to the United States when he was a child . The family lived in several states and ended up in Salt Lake City , Utah , where they struggled during the Great Depression . Romney worked in a number of jobs , served as a Mormon missionary in the United Kingdom , and attended several colleges in the U.S. but did not graduate from any of them . In 1939 he moved to Detroit and joined the American Automobile Manufacturers Association , where he served as the chief spokesman for the automobile industry during World War II and headed a cooperative arrangement in which companies could share production improvements . He joined Nash-Kelvinator in 1948 , and became the chief executive of its successor , American Motors Corporation , in 1954 . There he turned around the struggling firm by focusing all efforts on the compact Rambler car . Romney mocked the products of the `` Big Three '' automakers as `` gas-guzzling dinosaurs '' and became one of the first high-profile , media-savvy business executives . Devoutly religious , he presided over the Detroit Stake of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints .   Having entered politics by participating in a state constitutional convention to rewrite the Michigan Constitution during 1961 -- 1962 , Romney was elected Governor of Michigan in 1962 . Re-elected by increasingly large margins in 1964 and 1966 , he worked to overhaul the state 's financial and revenue structure , greatly expanding the size of state government and introducing Michigan 's first state income tax . Romney was a strong supporter of the American Civil Rights Movement . He briefly represented moderate Republicans against conservative Republican Barry Goldwater during the 1964 U.S. presidential election . He requested the intervention of federal troops during the 1967 Detroit riot .   Initially a front runner for the Republican nomination for President of the United States in the 1968 election , he proved an ineffective campaigner and fell behind Richard Nixon in polls . After a mid-1967 remark that his earlier support for the Vietnam War had been due to a `` brainwashing '' by U.S. military and diplomatic officials in Vietnam , his campaign faltered even more and he withdrew from the contest in early 1968 . After Nixon 's election as president , he appointed Romney as Secretary of Housing and Urban Development . Romney 's ambitious plans for housing production increases for the poor , and for open housing to desegregate suburbs , were modestly successful but often thwarted by Nixon . Romney left the administration at the start of Nixon 's second term in 1973 . Returning to private life , he advocated volunteerism and public service , and headed the National Center for Voluntary Action and its successor organizations from 1973 through 1991 . He also served as a regional representative of the Twelve within his church .

evidence_da: 10 Cloverfield Lane er en amerikansk science fiction psykologisk thriller film instrueret af Dan Trachtenberg , produceret af JJ Abrams og Lindsey Weber og skrevet af Josh Campbell , Matthew Stucken og Damien Chazelle . Filmen stjerner John Goodman , Mary Elizabeth Winstead , og John Gallagher , Jr. , og er den anden film i Cloverfield franchise . Filmen blev udviklet fra et script med titlen The Cellar , men under produktion af Bad Robot , blev det forvandlet til en åndelig efterfølger af 2008-filmen Cloverfield . Filmen følger en ung kvinde, der - efter en bilulykke - vågner op i en underjordisk bunker med to mænd, der insisterer på, at en begivenhed har efterladt Jordens overflade ubeboelig .   Filmen præsenteres i en tredje-person fortælling , i modsætning til sin forgængers fundet-optagelser stil . Det blev udgivet i USA marts 11 , 2016 , i konventionelle og IMAX format . Filmen fik positive anmeldelser fra kritikere , med mange roser forestillinger af stemmer , samt filmens anspændte og spændingsfyldt atmosfære , og indtjente $ 110 millioner på verdensplan .
evidence_en: 10 Cloverfield Lane is a 2016 American science fiction psychological thriller film directed by Dan Trachtenberg , produced by J. J. Abrams and Lindsey Weber and written by Josh Campbell , Matthew Stucken and Damien Chazelle . The film stars John Goodman , Mary Elizabeth Winstead , and John Gallagher , Jr. , and is the second film in the Cloverfield franchise . The film was developed from a script titled The Cellar , but under production by Bad Robot , it was turned into a spiritual successor of the 2008 film Cloverfield . The film follows a young woman who , after a car crash , wakes up in an underground bunker with two men who insist that an event has left the surface of Earth uninhabitable .   The film is presented in a third-person narrative , in contrast to its predecessor 's found-footage style . It was released in the United States on March 11 , 2016 , in conventional and IMAX format . The film received positive reviews from critics , with many praising the performances of the cast , as well as the film 's tense and suspenseful atmosphere , and grossed $ 110 million worldwide .

evidence_da: Elvis & Nixon er en amerikansk komediedramafilm fra 2016 instrueret af Liza Johnson og skrevet af Joey Sagal , Hanala Sagal og Cary Elwes . Filmen stjerner Kevin Spacey som præsident Richard Nixon og Michael Shannon som sanger Elvis Presley , og fokuserer på december 21 , 1970 møde mellem de to mænd i Det Hvide Hus . Filmen også stjerner Alex Pettyfer , Johnny Knoxville , Colin Hanks , og Evan Peters . Filmen blev udgivet på April 22 , 2016 af Amazon Studios og Bleecker Street .
evidence_en: Elvis & Nixon is a 2016 American comedy-drama film directed by Liza Johnson and written by Joey Sagal , Hanala Sagal , and Cary Elwes . The film stars Kevin Spacey as President Richard Nixon and Michael Shannon as singer Elvis Presley , and focuses on the December 21 , 1970 meeting between the two men at the White House . The film also stars Alex Pettyfer , Johnny Knoxville , Colin Hanks , and Evan Peters . The film was released on April 22 , 2016 by Amazon Studios and Bleecker Street .

evidence_da: Montreal -LRB- -LSB- audio = Montreal-Engelsk-udtale . ogaķmיntriייייl -RSB- -RRB- , officielt Montréal -LRB- -LSB- mķ̃eal -RSB- -RRB-, er den mest folkerige kommune i den canadiske provins Quebec og den 2. Oprindeligt kaldet Ville-Marie , eller '' City of Mary , '' det menes at være opkaldt efter Mount Royal , selv om der er en vis debat om dette . Byen har en særskilt fire-sæson kontinental klima, med varme til varme somre og kolde, sneklædte vintre.   I 2016 havde Montreal en befolkning på 1.704.694 . Montreal 's hovedstadsområde havde en befolkning på 4.098.927 og en befolkning på 1.958.257 i byområdet bymæssige byområder , med alle de kommuner på øen Montreal inkluderet . Lovligt en fransktalende by , 60,5 % af Montrealers taler fransk hjemme , 21,2 % taler engelsk , og 19,8 % taler ingen af dem . Montreal er en af de mest tosprogede byer i Quebec og Canada , med 56 % af befolkningen i stand til at tale begge officielle sprog . Montreal er den næststørste primært fransktalende by i verden efter Paris.   Historisk set den kommercielle hovedstad i Canada , blev det overgået i befolkningen og økonomisk styrke af Toronto i 1970'erne . Det er fortsat et vigtigt centrum for handel , rumfart , finansiering , lægemidler , teknologi , design, uddannelse , kultur , turisme , spil , film og verdensanliggender . At være placeringen af hovedkvarteret for International Civil Aviation Organization , Montreal er en af tre nordamerikanske byer hjemsted for organisationer i FN-LRB- sammen med New York og Washington -RRB- og har også det 2. konsulater på kontinentet. Montreal blev også udnævnt til UNESCO City of Design. I 2009 blev Montreal udnævnt til Nordamerikas førende værtsby for internationale sammenslutningsbegivenheder , ifølge de foreløbige placeringer i 2009 af International Congress and Convention Association -LRB- ICCA -RRB- . Ifølge 2015 Global Liveability Ranking af Economist Intelligence Unit , Montreal rangeret 14:e ud af 140 byer .   I 2017-udgaven af deres Best Student Cities ranking , Quacquarelli Symonds -LRB- QS -RRB- rangeret Montreal som verdens bedste by at studere i udlandet . Montreal har også 11 universiteter med 170.000 tilmeldte studerende . Greater Montreal-regionen har det højeste antal universitetsstuderende pr. indbygger blandt alle storbyområder i Nordamerika . Det endda rangerer højere end Boston , den intellektuelle kapital i USA.   Montreal har været vært for flere internationale konferencer og begivenheder gennem hele sin historie , herunder 1967 International and Universal Exposition og De Olympiske Sommerlege i 1976 . Det er den eneste canadiske by, der har afholdt sommer-OL. I øjeblikket er byen vært for det canadiske Grand Prix i Formula One, Montreal International Jazz Festival og Just for Laughs festival. I 2012 blev Montreal rangeret som en Beta + verden by.
evidence_en: Montreal -LRB- -LSB- audio = Montreal-English-pronunciation . ogaˌmʌntriːˈɒl -RSB- -RRB- , officially Montréal -LRB- -LSB- mɔ̃ʁeal -RSB- -RRB- , is the most populous municipality in the Canadian province of Quebec and the 2nd-most populous in Canada , after Toronto . Originally called Ville-Marie , or `` City of Mary , '' it is believed to be named after Mount Royal , though there is some debate about this . The city has a distinct four-season continental climate , with warm-to-hot summers and cold , snowy winters .   In 2016 , Montreal had a population of 1,704,694 . Montreal 's metropolitan area had a population of 4,098,927 and a population of 1,958,257 in the urban agglomeration , with all of the municipalities on the Island of Montreal included . Legally a French-speaking city , 60.5 % of Montrealers speak French at home , 21.2 % speak English and 19.8 % speak neither . Montreal is one of the most bilingual cities in Quebec and Canada , with 56 % of the population able to speak both official languages . Montreal is the second-largest primarily French-speaking city in the world after Paris .   Historically the commercial capital of Canada , it was surpassed in population and economic strength by Toronto in the 1970s . It remains an important centre of commerce , aerospace , finance , pharmaceuticals , technology , design , education , culture , tourism , gaming , film and world affairs . Being the location of the headquarters of the International Civil Aviation Organization , Montreal is one of three North American cities home to organizations of the United Nations -LRB- along with New York and Washington -RRB- and also has the 2nd-highest number of consulates in the continent . Montreal was also named a UNESCO City of Design . In 2009 , Montreal was named North America 's leading host city for international association events , according to the 2009 preliminary rankings of the International Congress and Convention Association -LRB- ICCA -RRB- . According to the 2015 Global Liveability Ranking by the Economist Intelligence Unit , Montreal ranked 14th out of 140 cities .   In the 2017 edition of their Best Student Cities ranking , Quacquarelli Symonds -LRB- QS -RRB- ranked Montreal as the world 's best city to study abroad . Also , Montreal has 11 universities with 170,000 students enrolled . The Greater Montreal region has the highest number of university students per capita among all metropolitan areas in North America . It even ranks higher than Boston , the intellectual capital of the U.S.   Montreal has hosted multiple international conferences and events throughout its history , including the 1967 International and Universal Exposition and the 1976 Summer Olympic Games . It is the only Canadian city to have held the Summer Olympics . Currently , the city hosts the Canadian Grand Prix of Formula One , the Montreal International Jazz Festival and the Just for Laughs festival . In 2012 , Montreal was ranked as a Beta + world city .

evidence_da: Johnny Mnemonic er en 1995 canadisk-amerikansk cyberpunk action thriller film instrueret af Robert Longo i hans instruktør debut . Filmen stjerner Keanu Reeves og Dolph Lundgren . Filmen er baseret på historien om samme navn af William Gibson . Keanu Reeves spiller titelkarakter , en mand med en kybernetisk hjerne implantat designet til at gemme oplysninger . Filmen skildrer Gibson 's dystopiske syn på fremtiden med verden domineret af megacorporations og med stærke østasiatiske påvirkninger . Dette var Dolph Lundgren 's sidste teatralsk udgivet film indtil 2010 's The Expendables .   Filmen blev skudt på stedet i Canada , med Toronto og Montreal udfylde for filmens Newark og Beijing indstillinger . En række lokale steder, herunder Toronto 's Union Station og Montreal 's skyline og Jacques Cartier Bridge , har en fremtrædende plads .   Filmen havde premiere i Japan april 15 , 1995 , i en længere version -LRB- 103 min -RRB- det er tættere på instruktørens cut , og byder på en score af Mychael Danna og forskellige redigering . Filmen blev udgivet i USA den 26 maj 1995 .
evidence_en: Johnny Mnemonic is a 1995 Canadian-American cyberpunk action thriller film directed by Robert Longo in his directorial debut . The film stars Keanu Reeves and Dolph Lundgren . The film is based on the story of the same name by William Gibson . Keanu Reeves plays the title character , a man with a cybernetic brain implant designed to store information . The film portrays Gibson 's dystopian view of the future with the world dominated by megacorporations and with strong East Asian influences . This was Dolph Lundgren 's last theatrically released film until 2010 's The Expendables .   The film was shot on location in Canada , with Toronto and Montreal filling in for the film 's Newark and Beijing settings . A number of local sites , including Toronto 's Union Station and Montreal 's skyline and Jacques Cartier Bridge , feature prominently .   The film premiered in Japan on April 15 , 1995 , in a longer version -LRB- 103 mins -RRB- that is closer to the director 's cut , featuring a score by Mychael Danna and different editing . The film was released in the United States on May 26 , 1995 .

evidence_da: Naomi Ellen Watts -LRB- født 28. september 1968 -RRB , er en engelsk skuespiller og filmproducer . Hun fik sin filmdebut i den australske dramafilm For Love Alone -LRB- 1986 -RRB- og derefter dukkede op i den australske tv-serie Hey Dad . . ! -LRB- 1990 -RRB-, Brides of Christ -LRB- 1991 -RRB- og Home and Away -LRB- 1991 -RRB- og sammen med Nicole Kidman og Thandie Newton i den kommende-of-age komedie-drama film Flirting-LRB- 1991 -RRB- . Efter at være flyttet til Amerika , Watts dukkede op i film , herunder Tank Girl -LRB- 1995 -RRB-, Børn af Corn IV: The Gathering -LRB- 1996 -RRB- og Dangerous Beauty -LRB- 1998 -RRB- og havde hovedrollen i tv-serien Sleepwalkers -LRB- 1997 -- 1998 -RRB- .   Efter flere år som en kæmper skuespiller , Watts kom til opmærksomhed i David Lynch 's psykologiske thriller Mulholland Drive-LRB- 2001 -RRB- . Det følgende år nød hun box-office succes med sin rolle som Rachel Keller i The Ring-LRB- 2002 -RRB-, genindspilningen af en vellykket japansk horror film . Hun modtog derefter nomineringer ved Academy Awards og Screen Actors ' Guild Awards i best actress kategorier for sin skildring af Cristina Peck i Alejandro González Iñárritu 's neo-noir 21 Grams -LRB- 2003 -RRB- . Hendes efterfølgende film omfatter David O. Russell 's komedie I Heart Huckabees-LRB- 2004 -RRB-, i 2005 genindspilning af King Kong , kriminalitet-thriller Eastern Promises-LRB-2007 -RRB-og Tom Tykwer-instrueret thriller The International-LRB- 2009 -RRB- . Siden da har Watts portrætteret Valerie Plame Wilson i det biografiske drama Fair Game -LRB- 2010 -RRB- og Helen Gandy i Clint Eastwoods biografiske drama J. Edgar -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . For hendes ledende rolle som Maria Bennett i katastrofen filmen The Impossible-LRB- 2012 -RRB-, hun modtog anden nomineringer til Academy Award og Screen Actors Guild Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle og en nominering til Golden Globe Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle .   I 2002 , Watts blev inkluderet i People magazine 's 50 smukkeste mennesker. I 2006 blev hun goodwill-ambassadør for FN's fælles program for hiv/aids , som bidrager til at øge bevidstheden om aids-relaterede spørgsmål . Hun har deltaget i flere fundraisers for årsagen, og hun præsenteres som en konstituerende medlem af AIDS Red Ribbon Awards .
evidence_en: Naomi Ellen Watts -LRB- born 28 September 1968 -RRB- is an English actress and film producer . She made her screen debut in the Australian drama film For Love Alone -LRB- 1986 -RRB- and then appeared in the Australian television series Hey Dad . . ! -LRB- 1990 -RRB- , Brides of Christ -LRB- 1991 -RRB- and Home and Away -LRB- 1991 -RRB- and alongside Nicole Kidman and Thandie Newton in the coming-of-age comedy-drama film Flirting -LRB- 1991 -RRB- . After moving to America , Watts appeared in films , including Tank Girl -LRB- 1995 -RRB- , Children of the Corn IV : The Gathering -LRB- 1996 -RRB- and Dangerous Beauty -LRB- 1998 -RRB- and had the lead role in the television series Sleepwalkers -LRB- 1997 -- 1998 -RRB- .   After years as a struggling actress , Watts came to attention in David Lynch 's psychological thriller Mulholland Drive -LRB- 2001 -RRB- . The following year she enjoyed box-office success with her role as Rachel Keller in The Ring -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , the remake of a successful Japanese horror film . She then received nominations at the Academy Awards and the Screen Actors ' Guild Awards in the Best Actress categories for her portrayal of Cristina Peck in Alejandro González Iñárritu 's neo-noir 21 Grams -LRB- 2003 -RRB- . Her subsequent films include David O. Russell 's comedy I Heart Huckabees -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , the 2005 remake of King Kong , the crime-thriller Eastern Promises -LRB- 2007 -RRB- and the Tom Tykwer-directed thriller The International -LRB- 2009 -RRB- . Since then , Watts has portrayed Valerie Plame Wilson in the biographical drama Fair Game -LRB- 2010 -RRB- and Helen Gandy in Clint Eastwood 's biographical drama J. Edgar -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . For her leading role as Maria Bennett in the disaster film The Impossible -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , she received second nominations for the Academy Award and Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Actress and a nomination for the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress .   In 2002 , Watts was included in People magazine 's 50 Most Beautiful People . In 2006 , she became a goodwill ambassador for Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS , which helps to raise awareness of AIDS-related issues . She has participated in several fundraisers for the cause , and she is presented as an inaugural member of AIDS Red Ribbon Awards .

evidence_da: Black Widow -LRB- Чёрная вдова , translittereret Chyornaya Vdova -RRB- -LRB- Natalia Alianovna '' Natasha '' Romanova , Russisk : Наталяя Аляновна '' Натаьа '' Романова , også kendt som Natasha Romanoff -RRB- er en fiktiv superhelt, der optræder i amerikanske tegneserier udgivet af Marvel Comics . Skabt af redaktør og plotter Stan Lee , scripter Don Rico , og kunstner Don Heck , tegnet dukkede første gang op i Tales of Suspense No. 52 -LRB- April 1964 -RRB- . Tegnet blev først introduceret som en russisk spion , en antagonist af superhelten Iron Man . Hun senere hoppede til USA , at blive en agent for den fiktive spion agentur S.H.I.E.L.D. , og et medlem af superhelte team Avengers .   Scarlett Johansson portrætteret karakter i filmene Iron Man 2 -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , The Avengers -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Captain America : The Winter Soldier -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , Avengers : Age of Ultron -LRB- 2015 -RRB- og Captain America : Civil War -LRB- 2016 -RRB- som en del af Marvel Cinematic Universe franchise .
evidence_en: Black Widow -LRB- Чёрная вдова , transliterated Chyornaya Vdova -RRB- -LRB- Natalia Alianovna `` Natasha '' Romanova , Russian : Наталья Альяновна '' Наташа '' Романова , also known as Natasha Romanoff -RRB- is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics . Created by editor and plotter Stan Lee , scripter Don Rico , and artist Don Heck , the character first appeared in Tales of Suspense No. 52 -LRB- April 1964 -RRB- . The character was first introduced as a Russian spy , an antagonist of the superhero Iron Man . She later defected to the United States , becoming an agent of the fictional spy agency S.H.I.E.L.D. , and a member of the superhero team the Avengers .   Scarlett Johansson portrayed the character in the films Iron Man 2 -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , The Avengers -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Captain America : The Winter Soldier -LRB- 2014 -RRB- , Avengers : Age of Ultron -LRB- 2015 -RRB- and Captain America : Civil War -LRB- 2016 -RRB- as a part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe franchise .

evidence_da: Marie Skłodowska Curie -LRB- -LSB- יkjķri , _ kjķriי -RSB- -LSB- kyיi -RSB- ; -LSB- kjiיri -RSB- ; 7 November 18674 Juli 1934 -RRB- , født Maria Salomea Skłodowska -LRB- -LSB- -lsb- 出marja salķיmķa skwķיdķfska -RSB- -RRB-, var en polsk og naturaliseret-fransk fysiker og kemiker, der gennemførte banebrydende forskning i radioaktivitet . Hun var den første kvinde til at vinde en Nobelpris, den første person og eneste kvinde til at vinde to gange , den eneste person til at vinde en Nobelpris i to forskellige videnskaber, og var en del af Curie familie arv af fem Nobelpriser . Hun var også den første kvinde til at blive professor ved Universitetet i Paris , og i 1995 blev den første kvinde, der blev begravet på egne fortjenester i Panthéon i Paris .   Hun blev født i Warszawa , i hvad der dengang var Kongeriget Polen , en del af det russiske imperium . Hun studerede på Warszawas hemmelige Flydende Universitet og begyndte sin praktiske videnskabelige uddannelse i Warszawa . I 1891 , 24 år , fulgte hun sin storesøster Bronisława for at studere i Paris , hvor hun fik sine højere grader og udførte sit efterfølgende videnskabelige arbejde . Hun delte Nobelprisen i fysik fra 1903 med sin mand Pierre Curie og med fysikeren Henri Becquerel . Hun vandt nobelprisen i kemi i 1911.   Hendes resultater omfattede udvikling af teorien om radioaktivitet -LRB- et begreb , som hun opfandt -RRB-, teknikker til isolering af radioaktive isotoper, og opdagelsen af to elementer , polonium og radium . Under hendes ledelse blev verdens første undersøgelser udført i behandlingen af neoplasmer ved hjælp af radioaktive isotoper . Hun grundlagde Curie Institutter i Paris og i Warszawa , som fortsat er store centre for medicinsk forskning i dag . Verdenskrig udviklede hun mobile radiografienheder til at levere røntgentjenester til felthospitaler .   Mens en fransk statsborger , Marie Skłodowska Curie -LRB- hun brugte begge efternavne -RRB- aldrig mistet sin følelse af polsk identitet . Hun lærte sine døtre det polske sprog og tog dem på besøg i Polen . Hun kaldte det første element af kemiske elementer, som hun opdagedepolonium , som hun isolerede i 1898efter sit hjemland .   Curie døde i 1934 - i en alder af 66 år - på et sanatori i Sancellemoz -LRB- Haute-Savoie -RRB- , Frankrig , på grund af aplastisk anæmi forårsaget af udsættelse for stråling, mens de transporterer reagensglas af radium i hendes lommer under forskning , og i løbet af hendes arbejde på felthospitaler under Første Verdenskrig.
evidence_en: Marie Skłodowska Curie -LRB- -LSB- ˈkjʊri , _ kjʊˈriː -RSB- -LSB- kyʁi -RSB- ; -LSB- kʲiˈri -RSB- ; 7 November 18674 July 1934 -RRB- , born Maria Salomea Skłodowska -LRB- -LSB- ˈmarja salɔˈmɛa skwɔˈdɔfska -RSB- -RRB- , was a Polish and naturalized-French physicist and chemist who conducted pioneering research on radioactivity . She was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize , the first person and only woman to win twice , the only person to win a Nobel Prize in two different sciences , and was part of the Curie family legacy of five Nobel Prizes . She was also the first woman to become a professor at the University of Paris , and in 1995 became the first woman to be entombed on her own merits in the Panthéon in Paris .   She was born in Warsaw , in what was then the Kingdom of Poland , part of the Russian Empire . She studied at Warsaw 's clandestine Floating University and began her practical scientific training in Warsaw . In 1891 , aged 24 , she followed her older sister Bronisława to study in Paris , where she earned her higher degrees and conducted her subsequent scientific work . She shared the 1903 Nobel Prize in Physics with her husband Pierre Curie and with physicist Henri Becquerel . She won the 1911 Nobel Prize in Chemistry .   Her achievements included the development of the theory of radioactivity -LRB- a term that she coined -RRB- , techniques for isolating radioactive isotopes , and the discovery of two elements , polonium and radium . Under her direction , the world 's first studies were conducted into the treatment of neoplasms , using radioactive isotopes . She founded the Curie Institutes in Paris and in Warsaw , which remain major centres of medical research today . During World War I , she developed mobile radiography units to provide X-ray services to field hospitals .   While a French citizen , Marie Skłodowska Curie -LRB- she used both surnames -RRB- never lost her sense of Polish identity . She taught her daughters the Polish language and took them on visits to Poland . She named the first chemical element that she discoveredpolonium , which she isolated in 1898after her native country .   Curie died in 1934 , aged 66 , at a sanatorium in Sancellemoz -LRB- Haute-Savoie -RRB- , France , due to aplastic anemia brought on by exposure to radiation while carrying test tubes of radium in her pockets during research , and in the course of her work at field hospitals during World War I.

evidence_da: Patrick James Riley -LRB- født 20 marts , 1945 -RRB- er en amerikansk professionel basketball udøvende , og en tidligere træner og spiller i National Basketball Association -LRB- NBA -RRB- . Han har været team formand for Miami Heat siden 1995 og cheftræner i to separate ansættelser -LRB- 1995 gennem 2003 , og 2005 gennem 2008 -RRB-. Betragtes som en af de største NBA trænere gennem tiderne, har Riley fungeret som cheftræner for fem mesterskabhold , fire med Los Angeles Lakers og en med Heat .   Han blev udnævnt til NBA Coach of the Year tre gange -LRB- 1989 -- 90 , 1992 - 93 og 1996 - 97 , som cheftræner for Lakers , New York Knicks og Heat , henholdsvis -RRB- . Han var cheftræner for en NBA All-Star Game team ni gange : otte gange med Western Conference team -LRB- 1982 , 1983 , 1985 - 1990 , alle som cheftræner for Lakers-RRB- og en gang med det østlige hold -LRB- 1993 , som cheftræner for Knicks -RRB- . I 1996 blev han udnævnt til en af de 10 største trænere i NBA historie . Som spiller spillede han for Lakers ' mesterskabshold i 1972 . Riley senest vandt i 2012 og 2013 NBA mesterskaber med Heat som deres hold præsident . Han er den første nordamerikanske sportsfigur til at vinde et mesterskab som spiller, træner -LRB- både assistent og hoved -RRB- og executive . Han modtog Chuck Daly Lifetime Achievement Award fra NBA Coaches Association juni 20 , 2012 .
evidence_en: Patrick James Riley -LRB- born March 20 , 1945 -RRB- is an American professional basketball executive , and a former coach and player in the National Basketball Association -LRB- NBA -RRB- . He has been the team president of the Miami Heat since 1995 and head coach in two separate tenures -LRB- 1995 through 2003 , and 2005 through 2008 -RRB- . Regarded as one of the greatest NBA coaches of all time , Riley has served as the head coach of five championship teams , four with the Los Angeles Lakers and one with the Heat .   He was named NBA Coach of the Year three times -LRB- 1989 -- 90 , 1992 -- 93 and 1996 -- 97 , as head coach of the Lakers , New York Knicks and Heat , respectively -RRB- . He was head coach of an NBA All-Star Game team nine times : eight times with the Western Conference team -LRB- 1982 , 1983 , 1985 -- 1990 , all as head coach of the Lakers -RRB- and once with the Eastern team -LRB- 1993 , as head coach of the Knicks -RRB- . In 1996 , he was named one of the 10 Greatest Coaches in the NBA history . As a player , he played for the Lakers ' championship team in 1972 . Riley most recently won the 2012 and 2013 NBA championships with the Heat as their team president . He is the first North American sports figure to win a championship as a player , coach -LRB- both assistant and head -RRB- , and executive . He received the Chuck Daly Lifetime Achievement Award from the NBA Coaches Association on June 20 , 2012 .

evidence_da: Los Angeles -LRB- -LSB- lיs_יəəl -RSB- spansk for '' The Angels '' ; -LSB- los יaķxeles -RSB- -RRB- , officielt byen Los Angeles og ofte kendt under sine initialer LA , er den kulturelle , finansielle og kommercielle centrum i det sydlige Californien . Med en folketælling-anslået 2017 befolkning på 4.042.000 , det er den næstmest folkerige by i USA -LRB- efter New York City -RRB- og den mest folkerige by i staten Californien . Beliggende i et stort kystbassin omgivet på tre sider af bjerge nå op til og over 10000 ft, Los Angeles dækker et areal på omkring 469 kvmi . Byen er også sæde for Los Angeles County, den mest befolkede amt i landet. Los Angeles er centrum for Los Angeles hovedstadsområdet, og er en del af de større udpegede Los Angeles-Long Beach kombineret statistisk område -LRB- CSA-RRB-, den næstmest folkerige i nationen med en 2015 anslået befolkning på 18,7 millioner .   Historisk hjemsted for Chumash og Tongva , Los Angeles blev hævdet af Juan Rodríguez Cabrillo for Spanien i 1542 sammen med resten af, hvad der ville blive Alta Californien . Byen blev officielt grundlagt den 4. Det blev en del af Mexico i 1821 efter den mexicanske uafhængighedskrig . I 1848 , i slutningen af den mexicanske - American War , Los Angeles og resten af Californien blev købt som en del af traktaten guadalupe Hidalgo , og dermed blive en del af USA . Los Angeles blev indarbejdet som en kommune april 4 , 1850 , fem måneder før Californien opnåede status som stat . Opdagelsen af olie i 1890'erne bragte hurtig vækst til byen . Færdiggørelsen af Los Angeles Akvædukten i 1913 , der leverer vand fra det østlige Californien , forsikrede senere byens fortsatte hurtige vækst .   Med tilnavnet '' City of Angels '' , Los Angeles er kendt for sit middelhavsklima, etniske mangfoldighed, og spredte metropol . Byen er også en af de mest omfattende økonomiske motorer i nationen , med en forskelligartet økonomi på en bred vifte af faglige og kulturelle områder . Los Angeles er også berømt som hjemsted for Hollywood, et stort center for verdens underholdningsindustri. En global by , det er blevet rangeret 6:e i Global Cities Index og 9:e i Global Economic Power Index . Los Angeles kombineret statistiske område -LRB- CSA-RRB- har også en brutto storby produkt -LRB- GMP-RRB- på 831 milliarder dollars , hvilket gør det til den tredjestørste i verden , efter Greater Tokyo og New York storbyområder .
evidence_en: Los Angeles -LRB- -LSB- lɒs_ˈændʒəlᵻs -RSB- , Spanish for `` The Angels '' ; -LSB- los ˈaŋxeles -RSB- -RRB- , officially the City of Los Angeles and often known by its initials L.A. , is the cultural , financial , and commercial center of Southern California . With a census-estimated 2017 population of 4,042,000 , it is the second-most populous city in the United States -LRB- after New York City -RRB- and the most populous city in the state of California . Located in a large coastal basin surrounded on three sides by mountains reaching up to and over 10000 ft , Los Angeles covers an area of about 469 sqmi . The city is also the seat of Los Angeles County , the most populated county in the country . Los Angeles is the center of the Los Angeles metropolitan area , and is part of the larger designated Los Angeles-Long Beach combined statistical area -LRB- CSA -RRB- , the second most populous in the nation with a 2015 estimated population of 18.7 million .   Historically home to the Chumash and Tongva , Los Angeles was claimed by Juan Rodríguez Cabrillo for Spain in 1542 along with the rest of what would become Alta California . The city was officially founded on September 4 , 1781 , by Spanish governor Felipe de Neve . It became a part of Mexico in 1821 following the Mexican War of Independence . In 1848 , at the end of the Mexican -- American War , Los Angeles and the rest of California were purchased as part of the Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo , thereby becoming part of the United States . Los Angeles was incorporated as a municipality on April 4 , 1850 , five months before California achieved statehood . The discovery of oil in the 1890s brought rapid growth to the city . The completion of the Los Angeles Aqueduct in 1913 , delivering water from Eastern California , later assured the city 's continued rapid growth .   Nicknamed the `` City of Angels '' , Los Angeles is known for its Mediterranean climate , ethnic diversity , and sprawling metropolis . The city is also one of the most substantial economic engines within the nation , with a diverse economy in a broad range of professional and cultural fields . Los Angeles is also famous as the home of Hollywood , a major center of the world entertainment industry . A global city , it has been ranked 6th in the Global Cities Index and 9th in the Global Economic Power Index . The Los Angeles combined statistical area -LRB- CSA -RRB- also has a gross metropolitan product -LRB- GMP -RRB- of $ 831 billion , making it the third-largest in the world , after the Greater Tokyo and New York metropolitan areas .

evidence_da: Et middelhavsklima -LSB- er klimaet -LSB - det klima, der er typisk for områder i Middelhavsområdet . Middelhavsklimaet er normalt kendetegnet ved regnfulde vintre og tørre, varme til varme somre. Mens klimaet får sit navn fra Middelhavet , et område , hvor dette klima er hverdagskost , er det også til stede i andre områder af planeten , men med variationer i fordelingen af temperaturer . Ud over Middelhavsområdet findes klimaet også i det meste af Californien , i dele af det vestlige og sydlige Australien , i det sydvestlige Sydafrika , dele af det vestlige og centrale Asien og i Centralchile .   Uden for Middelhavsområdet ligger middelhavsklimaet normalt geografisk på de kontinentale massers vestkyst , typisk mellem oceaniske klimaer mod polerne , og halvtørre og tørre klimaer mod ækvator . I det væsentlige er et middelhavsklima en kombination af de tre klimaer med vintre, der i det store og hele efterligner vintre i oceaniske klimaer og somre, der efterligner tørre årstider i halvtørre og tørre klimaer . Derudover har middelhavsklimaet tendens til at være vådere poleward og tørrere jo tættere det kommer til Ækvator .   Den deraf følgende vegetation af Middelhavsklimaer er garnigue i Middelhavsområdet, chaparral i Californien , fynboerne i Sydafrika og det chilenske krati i Chile . Områder med dette klima er, hvor den såkaldte "" Middelhavstreenighed traditionelt har udviklet sig : hvede , vin og oliven . Sidstnævnte er et træ, der kun dyrkes i områder, der har dette klimatiske mønster .
evidence_en: A Mediterranean climate -LSB- ˌmɛdɪtəˈreɪniən -RSB- or dry summer climate , is the climate typical of areas in the Mediterranean Basin . The Mediterranean climate is usually characterized by rainy winters and dry , warm to hot summers . While the climate receives its name from the Mediterranean Sea , an area where this climate is commonplace , it is also present in other areas of the planet , although with variations in the distribution of temperatures . In addition to the Mediterranean Basin , the climate is also found in most of California , in parts of Western and South Australia , in southwestern South Africa , sections of Western and Central Asia , and in Central Chile .   Outside of the Mediterranean Basin , the Mediterranean climate is usually located geographically on the western coasts of continental masses , typically between oceanic climates towards the poles , and semi-arid and arid climates towards the Equator . In essence , a Mediterranean climate is a combination of the three climates with winters somewhat mimicking winters in oceanic climates and summers imitating dry seasons in semi-arid and arid climates . Additionally , Mediterranean climates tend to be wetter poleward and drier the closer it gets to the Equator .   The resulting vegetation of Mediterranean climates are the garrigue in the Mediterranean Basin , the chaparral in California , the fynbos in South Africa and the Chilean scrubland in Chile . Areas with this climate are where the so-called `` Mediterranean trinity '' has traditionally developed : wheat , vine and olive . The latter is a tree that is only grown in areas that have this climatic pattern .

evidence_da: Philip Davis Guggenheim -LRB- født November 3 , 1963 -RRB- er en amerikansk film-og tv-instruktør og producer . Hans kreditter omfatter NYPD Blue , ER , 24 , Alias , The Shield , Deadwood , og dokumentarfilm en ubekvem sandhed , The Road We 've Traveled , Venter på ' Superman ' og han kaldte mig Malala . Siden 2006 , Guggenheim er den eneste filmskaber til at frigive tre forskellige dokumentarfilm, der blev rangeret inden for top 100 højest indtjenende dokumentarfilm af hele tiden -LRB- En ubekvem sandhed , det kunne få loud , og venter på ' Superman ' -RRB-.
evidence_en: Philip Davis Guggenheim -LRB- born November 3 , 1963 -RRB- is an American film and television director and producer . His credits include NYPD Blue , ER , 24 , Alias , The Shield , Deadwood , and the documentaries An Inconvenient Truth , The Road We 've Traveled , Waiting for ` Superman ' and He Named Me Malala . Since 2006 , Guggenheim is the only filmmaker to release three different documentaries that were ranked within the top 100 highest-grossing documentaries of all time -LRB- An Inconvenient Truth , It Might Get Loud , and Waiting for ′ Superman ′ -RRB- .

evidence_da: Vitamin B12 , også kaldet cobalamin , er et vandopløseligt vitamin, der har en central rolle i den normale funktion af hjernen og nervesystemet , og dannelsen af røde blodlegemer . Det er en af otte B-vitaminer . Det er involveret i metabolismen af hver celle i den menneskelige krop, især påvirker DNA syntese, fedtsyre og aminosyre metabolisme . Ingen svampe , planter eller dyr -LRB- herunder mennesker -RRB - er i stand til at producere vitamin B12 . Kun bakterier og archaea har de enzymer, der er nødvendige for dens syntese. Nogle væsentlige kilder til B12 omfatter animalske produkter -LRB- skaldyr , kød -RRB- , berigede fødevarer og kosttilskud . B12 er det største og mest strukturelt komplicerede vitamin og kan kun produceres industrielt gennem bakteriel fermenteringssyntese , typisk anvendes til fremstilling af B12 til berigede fødevarer og kosttilskud .   Vitamin B12 består af en klasse af kemisk beslægtede forbindelser -LRB- vitamers -RRB- , som alle viser farmakologisk aktivitet . Den indeholder det biokemisk sjældne element kobolt -LRB- kemisk symbol Co-RRB- placeret i midten af en planar tetra-pyrrole ring kaldet en corrin ring . Vitameren fremstilles af bakterier som hydroxocobalamin, men omdannelse mellem forskellige former for vitamin forekommer i kroppen efter forbrug .   Vitamin B12 blev opdaget som følge af sin sammenhæng med sygdommen perniciøs anæmi , en autoimmun sygdom, hvor parietal celler i maven er ansvarlig for udskiller iboende faktor er ødelagt; disse celler er også ansvarlige for udskillesyre i maven . Da iboende faktor er afgørende for den normale absorption af B12 , forårsager dens mangel i nærvær af perniciøs anæmi en B12-vitaminmangel . Mange andre subtile former for Vitamin B12-mangel og deres biokemiske virkninger er siden blevet belyst . På grund af forringelse af vitamin B12 absorption under aldring, mennesker over 60 år er i risiko for mangel .
evidence_en: Vitamin B12 , also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble vitamin that has a key role in the normal functioning of the brain and nervous system , and the formation of red blood cells . It is one of eight B vitamins . It is involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body , especially affecting DNA synthesis , fatty acid and amino acid metabolism . No fungi , plants , or animals -LRB- including humans -RRB- are capable of producing vitamin B12 . Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes needed for its synthesis . Some substantial sources of B12 include animal products -LRB- shellfish , meat -RRB- , fortified food products , and dietary supplements . B12 is the largest and most structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation synthesis , typically used to manufacture B12 for fortified foods and supplements .   Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds -LRB- vitamers -RRB- , all of which show pharmacological activity . It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt -LRB- chemical symbol Co -RRB- positioned in the center of a planar tetra-pyrrole ring called a corrin ring . The vitamer is produced by bacteria as hydroxocobalamin , but conversion between different forms of the vitamin occurs in the body after consumption .   Vitamin B12 was discovered as a result of its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed ; these cells are also responsible for secreting acid in the stomach . Because intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12 , its lack in the presence of pernicious anemia causes a vitamin B12 deficiency . Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated . Due to impairment of vitamin B12 absorption during aging , people over age 60 are at risk of deficiency .

evidence_da: The New York Times -LRB- undertiden forkortet NYT og The Times-RRB- er en amerikansk dagblad , grundlagt og løbende offentliggjort i New York City siden september 18 , 1851 , af The New York Times Company . The New York Times har vundet 122 Pulitzer Præmier , mere end nogen anden avis .   Avisens trykte version i 2013 havde den næststørste omsætning , bag The Wall Street Journal , og den største omsætning blandt storbyaviser i USA . The New York Times er rangeret 18:e i verden ved omløb . Efter udviklingen i industrien var dens hverdagsomsætning faldet i 2009 til under en million .   Med tilnavnet '' The Gray Lady '' , The New York Times har længe været betragtet i branchen som en national '' avis record ''. Det har været ejet af Ochs-Sulzberger familien siden 1896; Arthur Ochs Sulzberger Jr. , udgiveren af Times og formanden for New York Times Company , er den fjerde generation af familien til at styre papiret . The New York Times internationale version , tidligere International Herald Tribune , kaldes nu New York Times International Edition .   Papirets motto , '' Alle nyheder, der 's Fit to Print '' , vises i øverste venstre hjørne af forsiden . Siden midten af 1970'erne har The New York Times i høj grad udvidet sit layout og sin organisation , tilføje særlige ugentlige sektioner om forskellige emner supplere de regelmæssige nyheder , ledere, sport og funktioner . Siden 2008 , The New York Times er blevet organiseret i følgende afsnit: Nyheder , Editorials / Udtalelser-Kolonner / Op-Ed , New York -LRB- metropolitan -RRB- , Business , Sport of The Times , Arts , Science , Styles , Home , Travel , og andre funktioner .   På søndag , The New York Times er suppleret med Sunday Review-LRB- tidligere uge i review-RRB-, The New York Times Book Review , The New York Times Magazine og T : The New York Times Style Magazine-LRB- T er offentliggjort 13 gange om året -RRB- . The New York Times opholdt sig med broadsheet helsides set-up-LRB- som nogle andre har ændret sig til en tabloid lay-out-RRB-og en otte-kolonne format i flere år , efter de fleste papirer skiftede til seks , og var en af de sidste aviser til at vedtage farvefotografering , især på forsiden .
evidence_en: The New York Times -LRB- sometimes abbreviated NYT and The Times -RRB- is an American daily newspaper , founded and continuously published in New York City since September 18 , 1851 , by The New York Times Company . The New York Times has won 122 Pulitzer Prizes , more than any other newspaper .   The paper 's print version in 2013 had the second-largest circulation , behind The Wall Street Journal , and the largest circulation among the metropolitan newspapers in the United States . The New York Times is ranked 18th in the world by circulation . Following industry trends , its weekday circulation had fallen in 2009 to fewer than one million .   Nicknamed `` The Gray Lady '' , The New York Times has long been regarded within the industry as a national `` newspaper of record '' . It has been owned by the Ochs-Sulzberger family since 1896 ; Arthur Ochs Sulzberger Jr. , the publisher of the Times and the chairman of the New York Times Company , is the fourth generation of the family to helm the paper . The New York Times international version , formerly the International Herald Tribune , is now called the New York Times International Edition .   The paper 's motto , `` All the News That 's Fit to Print '' , appears in the upper left-hand corner of the front page . Since the mid-1970s , The New York Times has greatly expanded its layout and organization , adding special weekly sections on various topics supplementing the regular news , editorials , sports , and features . Since 2008 , The New York Times has been organized into the following sections : News , Editorials/Opinions-Columns/Op-Ed , New York -LRB- metropolitan -RRB- , Business , Sports of The Times , Arts , Science , Styles , Home , Travel , and other features .   On Sunday , The New York Times is supplemented by the Sunday Review -LRB- formerly the Week in Review -RRB- , The New York Times Book Review , The New York Times Magazine and T : The New York Times Style Magazine -LRB- T is published 13 times a year -RRB- . The New York Times stayed with the broadsheet full page set-up -LRB- as some others have changed into a tabloid lay-out -RRB- and an eight-column format for several years , after most papers switched to six , and was one of the last newspapers to adopt color photography , especially on the front page .

evidence_da: Room er en 2015 uafhængig dramafilm instrueret af Lenny Abrahamson og skrevet af Emma Donoghue , baseret på hendes roman af samme navn . Det stjerner Brie Larson som en kvinde, der har været holdt fanget i syv år , og hvis 5-årige søn-LRB- Jacob Tremblay-RRB- blev født i fangenskab . Deres flugt gør det muligt for drengen at opleve omverdenen for første gang . Filmen også stjerner Joan Allen , Sean Bridgers , og William H. Macy .   En co-produktion af Canada og Irland , Room blev skudt i Toronto , med eponyme Room sæt bygget på Pinewood Toronto Studios . Besætningen designet hver del af rummet indstillet til at være aftageligt, så de passer til besætningen . Larson forsket traumer og ernæring for sin del , mens mange børn blev anset for rollen som Jack .   September 2015 havde værelset premiere på Telluride Film Festival og havde en begrænset udgivelse i USA den 16. Larson vandt flere priser for sin præstation , herunder Academy Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle , BAFTA Award , Golden Globe Award , og Screen Actors Guild Award . Room modtog også tre andre Academy Award nomineringer , herunder bedste billede og bedste instruktør .
evidence_en: Room is a 2015 independent drama film directed by Lenny Abrahamson and written by Emma Donoghue , based on her novel of the same name . It stars Brie Larson as a woman who has been held captive for seven years , and whose 5-year-old son -LRB- Jacob Tremblay -RRB- was born in captivity . Their escape allows the boy to experience the outside world for the first time . The film also stars Joan Allen , Sean Bridgers , and William H. Macy .   A co-production of Canada and Ireland , Room was shot in Toronto , with the eponymous Room set built at Pinewood Toronto Studios . The crew designed each part of the Room set to be removable to fit the crew . Larson researched trauma and nutrition for her part , while numerous children were considered for the role of Jack .   Room premiered at the Telluride Film Festival on 4 September 2015 and had a limited release in the United States on 16 October 2015 , to acclaim from critics . Larson won multiple awards for her performance , including the Academy Award for Best Actress , the BAFTA Award , Golden Globe Award , and the Screen Actors Guild Award . Room also received three other Academy Award nominations , including Best Picture and Best Director .

evidence_da: The Flash er en amerikansk tv-serie fra 1990 udviklet af skriveholdet danny Bilson og Paul De Meo, der blev sendt på CBS . Det er baseret på DC Comics karakter Barry Allen / Flash , en udklædt superhelt kriminalitet-fighter med magt til at bevæge sig på overmenneskelige hastigheder . The Flash medvirkede John Wesley Shipp som Allen , sammen med Amanda Pays , Alex Désert , og Paula Marshall . Det var den første nogensinde live-action skildring af DC superhelten .
evidence_en: The Flash is a 1990 American television series developed by the writing team of Danny Bilson and Paul De Meo that aired on CBS . It is based on the DC Comics character Barry Allen / Flash , a costumed superhero crime-fighter with the power to move at superhuman speeds . The Flash starred John Wesley Shipp as Allen , along with Amanda Pays , Alex Désert , and Paula Marshall . It was the first-ever live-action portrayal of the DC superhero .

evidence_da: Taiwan -LRB- -LSB- taייw-RSB- -RRB- officielt Republikken Kina -LRB- ROC -RRB- er en stat i Østasien . Dets naboer omfatter Kina -LRB - officielt Folkerepublikken Kina, Kina-RRB- mod vest , Japan mod nordøst , og Filippinerne mod syd .  Taiwan er den mest folkerige stat , der ikke er medlem af FN , og har også den største økonomi i enhver stat uden for FN .   Øen Taiwan , også kendt som Formosa , var hovedsageligt beboet af taiwanske aboriginals før 1600-tallet , da hollandske og spanske kolonier åbnede øen for Han kinesisk indvandring . Efter en kort regel af Kongeriget Tungning , øen blev annekteret af Qing-dynastiet , det sidste dynasti i Kina . Qing afkendte Taiwan til Japan i 1895 efter den sino-japanske krig . Mens Taiwan var under japansk styre , blev Republikken Kina -LRB- ROC -RRB - etableret på fastlandet i 1912 efter Qing-dynastiets fald . Efter den japanske overgivelse til de allierede i 1945 overtog ROC kontrollen med Taiwan . Genoptagelsen af den kinesiske borgerkrig førte imidlertid til , at ROC 's tab af fastlandet til kommunisterne og roc-regeringens flugt til Taiwan i 1949 . Selv om ROC fortsat hævder at være Kinas legitime regering , har dens effektive jurisdiktion siden 1949 været begrænset til Taiwan og de omkringliggende øer , idet hovedøen udgør 99 % af landets de facto-område . Som stiftende medlem af FN fortsatte ROC med at repræsentere Kina i FN indtil 1971 , hvor Kina overtog Kinas sæde , hvilket fik ROC til at miste sit FN-medlemskab .   I begyndelsen af 1960'erne gik Taiwan ind i en periode med hurtig økonomisk vækst og industrialisering , hvilket skabte en stabil industriøkonomi . I 1980'erne og begyndelsen af 1990'erne ændrede det sig fra et etpartimilitærdiktatur domineret af Kuomintang til et flerpartidemokrati med et semipræsidentielt system . Taiwan er den næststørste økonomi i verden , og landets højteknologiske industri spiller en central rolle i den globale økonomi . Det er rangeret højt med hensyn til pressefrihed , sundhedspleje , offentlig uddannelse , økonomisk frihed og menneskelig udvikling . Landet nyder godt af en højt kvalificeret arbejdsstyrke og er blandt de mest højtuddannede lande i verden med en af de højeste procentdele af dets borgere, der har en videregående uddannelse .   Kina har konsekvent gjort krav på suverænitet over Taiwan og hævdet , at roc ikke længere eksisterer lovligt . Under sin et-kina-politik afviste Kina diplomatiske forbindelser med ethvert land , der anerkender ROC . I dag anerkender kun nogle få mindre nationer ROC som Kinas eneste juridiske repræsentant , men mange andre stater opretholder uofficielle forbindelser gennem repræsentationskontorer og institutioner , der fungerer som de facto ambassader og konsulater . Selv om Taiwan er fuldt selvstyrende , nægter de fleste internationale organisationer , hvor Kina deltager , enten at give taiwanermedlemskab eller kun tillade det at deltage som ikke-statslig aktør . Internt er den største splittelse i politik mellem forhåbningerne om en eventuel kinesisk forening eller taiwansk uafhængighed , selv om begge parter har modereret deres holdninger for at udvide deres appel . Kina har truet med at anvende militær magt som reaktion på taiwanernes formelle uafhængighedserklæring , eller hvis Kinas ledere beslutter , at en fredelig forening ikke længere er mulig .
evidence_en: Taiwan -LRB- -LSB- taɪˈwɑːn -RSB- -RRB- , officially the Republic of China -LRB- ROC -RRB- , is a state in East Asia . Its neighbours include China -LRB- officially the People 's Republic of China , PRC -RRB- to the west , Japan to the northeast , and the Philippines to the south .  Taiwan is the most populous state that is not a member of the United Nations , and also possesses the largest economy of any state outside of the UN .   The island of Taiwan , also known as Formosa , was mainly inhabited by Taiwanese aborigines before the 17th century , when Dutch and Spanish colonies opened the island to Han Chinese immigration . After a brief rule by the Kingdom of Tungning , the island was annexed by the Qing dynasty , the last dynasty of China . The Qing ceded Taiwan to Japan in 1895 after the Sino-Japanese War . While Taiwan was under Japanese rule , the Republic of China -LRB- ROC -RRB- was established on the mainland in 1912 after the fall of the Qing dynasty . Following the Japanese surrender to the Allies in 1945 , the ROC took control of Taiwan . However , the resumption of the Chinese Civil War led to the ROC 's loss of the mainland to the Communists , and the flight of the ROC government to Taiwan in 1949 . Although the ROC continued to claim to be the legitimate government of China , its effective jurisdiction since 1949 has been limited to Taiwan and its surrounding islands , with the main island making up 99 % of its de facto territory . As a founding member of the United Nations , the ROC continued to represent China at the United Nations until 1971 , when the PRC assumed China 's seat , causing the ROC to lose its UN membership .   In the early 1960s , Taiwan entered a period of rapid economic growth and industrialization , creating a stable industrial economy . In the 1980s and early 1990s , it changed from a one-party military dictatorship dominated by the Kuomintang to a multi-party democracy with a semi-presidential system . Taiwan is the 22nd-largest economy in the world , and its high-tech industry plays a key role in the global economy . It is ranked highly in terms of freedom of the press , healthcare , public education , economic freedom , and human development . The country benefits from a highly skilled workforce and is among the most highly educated countries in the world with one of the highest percentages of its citizens holding a tertiary education degree .   The PRC has consistently claimed sovereignty over Taiwan and asserted the ROC is no longer in legitimate existence . Under its One-China Policy the PRC refused diplomatic relations with any country that recognizes the ROC . Today only a few smaller nations recognize the ROC as the sole legal representative of China , but many other states maintain unofficial ties through representative offices and institutions that function as de facto embassies and consulates . Although Taiwan is fully self-governing , most international organizations in which the PRC participates either refuse to grant membership to Taiwan or allow it to participate only as a non-state actor . Internally , the major division in politics is between the aspirations of eventual Chinese unification or Taiwanese independence , though both sides have moderated their positions to broaden their appeal . The PRC has threatened the use of military force in response to any formal declaration of independence by Taiwan or if PRC leaders decide that peaceful unification is no longer possible .

evidence_da: Travis Landon Barker -LRB- født November 14 , 1975 -RRB- er en amerikansk musiker og producer , og trommeslager for rockbandet Blink-182 . Barker har også optrådt som en hyppig samarbejdspartner med hip-hop kunstnere, og med det alternative rock band +44 , rap rock gruppe Transplantationer , den alternative rock band Box Car Racer , og senest med Antemasque . Han var en hyppig samarbejdspartner med den afdøde DJ AM , og sammen dannede de TRV $ DJAM .   Efter opdelingen af hans første band , Feeble , Barker begyndte at spille for Aquabats i 1996 som Baron Von Tito . Han indspillede et album med dem, The Fury of The Aquabats ! , i 1997 . Hans karriere steg, da han kom til Blink-182 i 1998 . Barker har siden etableret sig som en alsidig trommeslager , producerer og gør gæsteoptrædener i musikprojekter af mange musikgenrer, herunder hip hop , alternativ rock , pop og land . Han har fået betydelig accept inden for hip-hop samfund i særdeleshed og ofte samarbejder med kunstnere til at komponere rock-farvet remixes til deres sange . Barker samarbejdede med kunstnere -LRB - herunder Game , Yelawolf , Tom Morello , Corey Taylor , Slagteri , Raekwon , Busta Rhymes , RZA , Slash , og andre musikere -RRB- for hans solo debut album , Give trommeslageren Nogle , som blev udgivet i marts 15 , 2011 .   I 2011 arbejdede han sammen med Steve Aoki og Kid Cudi i Aoki 's hit single Cudi the Kid , som en del af hans album Wonderland , med Barker som ledende trommeslager .   Bortset fra trommespil , grundlagde han tøjfirma Famous Stars and Straps i 1999 og LaSalle Records i 2004 . Virksomheder som DC Sko og Zildjian bækkener har co-designede produkter i hans navn . Rolling Stone omtalte ham som '' punk 's første superstjerne trommeslager . ''
evidence_en: Travis Landon Barker -LRB- born November 14 , 1975 -RRB- is an American musician and producer , and the drummer for the rock band Blink-182 . Barker has also performed as a frequent collaborator with hip-hop artists , and with the alternative rock band +44 , the rap rock group the Transplants , the alternative rock band Box Car Racer , and most recently with Antemasque . He was a frequent collaborator with the late DJ AM , and together they formed TRV$ DJAM .   After the split of his first band , Feeble , Barker began playing for the Aquabats in 1996 as the Baron Von Tito . He recorded one album with them , The Fury of The Aquabats ! , in 1997 . His career rose when he joined Blink-182 in 1998 . Barker has since established himself as a versatile drummer , producing and making guest appearances in music projects of numerous music genres including hip hop , alternative rock , pop and country . He has gained significant acceptance within the hip-hop community in particular and often collaborates with artists to compose rock-tinged remixes to their songs . Barker collaborated with artists -LRB- including Game , Yelawolf , Tom Morello , Corey Taylor , Slaughterhouse , Raekwon , Busta Rhymes , RZA , Slash , and other musicians -RRB- for his solo debut album , Give the Drummer Some , which was released on March 15 , 2011 .   In 2011 , he worked with Steve Aoki and Kid Cudi in Aoki 's hit single Cudi the Kid , as part of his album Wonderland , with Barker as lead drummer .   Aside from drumming , he founded clothing company Famous Stars and Straps in 1999 and LaSalle Records in 2004 . Companies such as DC Shoes and Zildjian cymbals have co-designed products in his name . Rolling Stone referred to him as `` punk 's first superstar drummer . ''

evidence_en: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot is a 2016 American biographical war comedy-drama film directed by Glenn Ficarra and John Requa , and written by Robert Carlock , based on the memoir The Taliban Shuffle : Strange Days in Afghanistan and Pakistan by Kim Barker . The film stars Tina Fey , Margot Robbie , Martin Freeman , Christopher Abbott , Alfred Molina , and Billy Bob Thornton . It was released on March 4 , 2016 by Paramount Pictures , and was a box office bomb , grossing $ 24 million against its $ 35 million budget .

evidence_da: Michael Edward '' Mike '' Love-LRB- født 15 marts 1941 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger, sangskriver , musiker , og aktivist, der var medstifter af Beach Boys . Kendetegnet ved hans nasale , undertiden baryton sang , Love har været en af bandets vokalister og tekstbåndsfolk for det meste af deres karriere , bidrager til hver af deres studiealbum . Han er ofte betragtes som en ondartet figur i bandets historie , et ry, han anerkender: '' For dem, der mener, at Brian-LSB- Wilson-RSB- gåture på vandet, vil jeg altid være Antikrist . '' I 1960'erne samarbejdede Love med Wilson og var tekstforfatter på singler, herunder '' Fun , Fun , Fun '' -LRB- 1964 -RRB- og '' California Girls '' -LRB- 1965 -RRB- . I denne periode afspejlede hans tekster primært ungdomskulturen ved surfing, biler og romantik , som hjalp modepopkulturens opfattelse af '' California Dream ''. Starter i 1968 , Love blev en lærer i Transcendental Meditation under Maharishi Mahesh Yogi . Oplevelsen påvirkede hans tekster til at tage på temaer astrologi, meditation, politik og økologi . Efter dette skiftede Love 's lyriske retning til at forsøge at generobre bandets tidligere , munter lyd . I slutningen af 1970'erne , Love begyndte at arbejde på solo albums , frigive sin første og eneste i 1981 : Looking Back with Love . I 1988 , han , sammen med de andre stiftende medlemmer af Beach Boys , blev optaget i Rock and Roll Hall of Fame . Samme år , sangen , '' Kokomo '' , co-skrevet af Love , nåede nummer et i USA og blev nomineret til en Grammy .   I 1998, efter død fætter Carl Wilson , Love og longtime Beach Boy Bruce Johnston fik en eksklusiv licens til at turnere under navnet Beach Boys . De andre overlevende Beach Boys , Brian Wilson og Al Jardine , indledt solo bestræbelser . I 2011 blev gruppen genforenet for at producere et nyt album og gå i gang med en tur til deres 50 års jubilæum . Efter 50-årsdagen reunion viser, Love genoptaget touring kun med Johnston .
evidence_en: Michael Edward `` Mike '' Love -LRB- born March 15 , 1941 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter , musician , and activist who co-founded the Beach Boys . Characterized by his nasal , sometimes baritone singing , Love has been one of the band 's vocalists and lyricists for most of their career , contributing to each of their studio albums . He is often regarded as a malign figure in the band 's history , a reputation he acknowledges : `` For those who believe that Brian -LSB- Wilson -RSB- walks on water , I will always be the Antichrist . ''   In the 1960s , Love collaborated with Wilson and was a lyricist on singles including `` Fun , Fun , Fun '' -LRB- 1964 -RRB- and `` California Girls '' -LRB- 1965 -RRB- . During this period , his lyrics primarily reflected the youth culture of surfing , cars , and romance , which helped fashion pop culture 's perception of the `` California Dream '' . Starting in 1968 , Love became a teacher of Transcendental Meditation under Maharishi Mahesh Yogi . The experience influenced his lyrics to take on themes of astrology , meditation , politics and ecology . Following this , Love 's lyrical direction shifted to attempt to recapture the band 's earlier , lighthearted sound . In the late 1970s , Love began working on solo albums , releasing his first and only in 1981 : Looking Back with Love . In 1988 , he , along with the other founding members of the Beach Boys , was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame . The same year , the song , `` Kokomo '' , co-written by Love , reached number one in the United States and was nominated for a Grammy .   In 1998 , following the death of cousin Carl Wilson , Love and longtime Beach Boy Bruce Johnston were given an exclusive license to tour under the name the Beach Boys . The other surviving Beach Boys , Brian Wilson and Al Jardine , embarked on solo endeavors . In 2011 , the group reunited to produce a new album and embark on a tour for their 50th anniversary . Following the 50th anniversary reunion shows , Love resumed touring only with Johnston .
