August 2014 af Young Money Entertainment , Cash Money Records , og Republic Records som den anden single fra albummet . Sangen blev produceret af Polow da Don , Anonym , og Da Internz . Sangen stærkt prøver '' Baby Got Back '' af Sir Mix-a-Lot .   Sangen toppede som nummer to på den amerikanske Billboard Hot 100 , og blev dermed Minajs højeste hitlistesingle i USA til dato . Det gik på at tilbringe otte uger i top ti af Hot 100 diagram. Sangen toppede også inden for top ti i Australien , Canada , Irland , New Zealand og Det Forenede Kongerige .   En ledsagende video til sangen blev instrueret af Colin Tilley og udgivet den 19. Efter videoens udgivelse slog den 24-timers streamingrekord på Vevo ved at akkumulere 19,6 millioner visninger på sin første udgivelsesdag , overgået af Taylor Swifts '' Bad Blood '' i 2015 . For yderligere at fremme sangen , Minaj udført det live på 2014 MTV Video Music Awards og også udført det på Fashion Rocks og iHeartRadio Music Festival . '' Anaconda '' blev nomineret til Bedste Rap Song ved Grammy Awards 2015 . Sangen blev også nomineret til to kategorier på 2015 MTV Video Music Awards , Best Female Video og Best Hip-Hop Video , vinde sidstnævnte .
evidence_en: `` Anaconda '' is a song by Trinidadian-born American rapper Nicki Minaj , from her third studio album , The Pinkprint -LRB- 2014 -RRB- . It was released on August 4 , 2014 by Young Money Entertainment , Cash Money Records , and Republic Records as the second single from the album . The song was produced by Polow da Don , Anonymous , and Da Internz . The song heavily samples `` Baby Got Back '' by Sir Mix-a-Lot .   The song peaked at number two on the US Billboard Hot 100 , consequently becoming Minaj 's highest charting single in the United States to date . It went on to spend eight weeks in the top ten of the Hot 100 chart . The song also peaked within the top ten in Australia , Canada , Ireland , New Zealand and the United Kingdom .   An accompanying video for the song was directed by Colin Tilley and released on August 19 , 2014 . Following the video 's release , it broke the 24-hour streaming record on Vevo by accumulating 19.6 million views in its first day of release , being surpassed by Taylor Swift 's `` Bad Blood '' in 2015 . To further promote the song , Minaj performed it live at the 2014 MTV Video Music Awards and also performed it at Fashion Rocks and the iHeartRadio Music Festival . `` Anaconda '' was nominated for Best Rap Song at the 2015 Grammy Awards . The song was also nominated for two categories at the 2015 MTV Video Music Awards , Best Female Video and Best Hip-Hop Video , winning the latter .

evidence_da: Frihedsgudinden -LRB- Liberty oplyser verden; -LSB- La Liberté éclairant le monde , links = no-RSB- -RRB- er en kolossal neoklassisk skulptur på Liberty Island i New York Harbor i New York City , i USA . Kobberstatuen , en gave fra det franske folk til befolkningen i USA, blev designet af den franske billedhugger Frédéric Auguste Bartholdi og bygget af Gustave Eiffel. Statuen blev dedikeret den 28.   Frihedsgudinden er en røvet kvindelig figur, der repræsenterer Libertas, den romerske gudinde. Hun har en fakkel over hovedet , og i hendes venstre arm bærer en tabula ansata indskrevet i romertal med '' JULI IV MDCCLXXVI '' -LRB- Juli 4 , 1776 -RRB-, datoen for den amerikanske uafhængighedserklæring . En brækket kæde ligger for hendes fødder . Statuen blev et ikon for frihed og i USA, og var et indbydende syn til indvandrere, der ankommer fra udlandet.   Bartholdi var inspireret af fransk juraprofessor og politiker Édouard René de Laboulaye , der siges at have kommenteret i 1865, at ethvert monument rejst til usa's uafhængighed ville korrekt være et fælles projekt af det franske og amerikanske folk . På grund af ustabiliteten efter krigen i Frankrig begyndte arbejdet med statuen først i begyndelsen af 1870'erne . I 1875 foreslog Laboulaye, at den franske finansiere statuen og USA ville give stedet og bygge piedestal . Bartholdi afsluttede hovedet og den fakkelbærende arm, før statuen var fuldt designet, og disse stykker blev udstillet til reklame på internationale udstillinger.   Den fakkelbærende arm blev vist på Centennial Exposition i Philadelphia i 1876 , og i Madison Square Park på Manhattan fra 1876 til 1882 . Fundraising viste sig vanskeligt , især for amerikanerne , og i 1885 blev arbejdet på piedestalen truet på grund af manglende midler . Udgiver Joseph Pulitzer af New York World startede et drev for donationer til at fuldføre projektet, der tiltrak mere end 120.000 bidragydere , hvoraf de fleste gav mindre end en dollar . Statuen blev bygget i Frankrig, afsendt i udlandet i kasser og samlet på den færdige piedestal på det, der dengang blev kaldt Bedloe 's Island. Statuens afslutning var præget af New Yorks første ticker-tape parade og en indvielsesceremoni ledet af præsident Grover Cleveland .   Statuen blev administreret af United States Lighthouse Board indtil 1901 og derefter af Department of War; siden 1933 er det blevet vedligeholdt af National Park Service . Offentlig adgang til balkonen omkring faklen er blevet spærret af sikkerhedsmæssige årsager siden 1916 .
evidence_en: The Statue of Liberty -LRB- Liberty Enlightening the World ; -LSB- La Liberté éclairant le monde , links = no -RSB- -RRB- is a colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island in New York Harbor in New York City , in the United States . The copper statue , a gift from the people of France to the people of the United States , was designed by French sculptor Frédéric Auguste Bartholdi and built by Gustave Eiffel . The statue was dedicated on October 28 , 1886 .   The Statue of Liberty is a robed female figure representing Libertas , the Roman goddess . She holds a torch above her head , and in her left arm carries a tabula ansata inscribed in Roman numerals with `` JULY IV MDCCLXXVI '' -LRB- July 4 , 1776 -RRB- , the date of the U.S. Declaration of Independence . A broken chain lies at her feet . The statue became an icon of freedom and of the United States , and was a welcoming sight to immigrants arriving from abroad .   Bartholdi was inspired by French law professor and politician Édouard René de Laboulaye , who is said to have commented in 1865 that any monument raised to U.S. independence would properly be a joint project of the French and U.S. peoples . Due to the post-war instability in France , work on the statue did not commence until the early 1870s . In 1875 , Laboulaye proposed that the French finance the statue and the U.S. would provide the site and build the pedestal . Bartholdi completed the head and the torch-bearing arm before the statue was fully designed , and these pieces were exhibited for publicity at international expositions .   The torch-bearing arm was displayed at the Centennial Exposition in Philadelphia in 1876 , and in Madison Square Park in Manhattan from 1876 to 1882 . Fundraising proved difficult , especially for the Americans , and by 1885 work on the pedestal was threatened due to lack of funds . Publisher Joseph Pulitzer of the New York World started a drive for donations to complete the project that attracted more than 120,000 contributors , most of whom gave less than a dollar . The statue was constructed in France , shipped overseas in crates , and assembled on the completed pedestal on what was then called Bedloe 's Island . The statue 's completion was marked by New York 's first ticker-tape parade and a dedication ceremony presided over by President Grover Cleveland .   The statue was administered by the United States Lighthouse Board until 1901 and then by the Department of War ; since 1933 it has been maintained by the National Park Service . Public access to the balcony surrounding the torch has been barred for safety reasons since 1916 .

evidence_da: Justin Drew Bieber -LRB- -LSB- 出bbər -RSB- født 1 marts 1 , 1994 -RRB- er en canadisk sanger og sangskriver . Efter en talentmanager opdagede ham gennem hans YouTube-videoer, der dækker sange i 2008 og underskrevet til RBMG , Bieber udgivet sin debut EP , My World , i slutningen af 2009 . Det blev certificeret Platinum i USA. Han blev den første kunstner til at have syv sange fra en debut plade på Billboard Hot 100 . Bieber udgav sit første studiealbum i fuld længde , My World 2.0 , i 2010 . Det debuterede på eller i nærheden af nummer et i flere lande , blev certificeret triple Platinum i USA , og indeholdt sin single '' Baby ''.   Efter sit debutalbum havde han sin første hovedturné , My World Tour , udgivet remixalbummene My Worlds Acoustic og Never Say Never - The Remixes - og 3D-filmen Justin Bieber : Never Say Never . Han udgav sit andet studiealbum , Under the Mistletoe , i november 2011 , da det debuterede som nummer et på Billboard 200 . Bieber udgav sit tredje studiealbum , Believe , i 2012 . Hans fjerde studiealbum Purpose blev udgivet i november 2015 , gyder tre nummer et singler: '' Hvad mener du? '' , '' Undskyld '' og '' Love Yourself ''. Hans amerikanske album og singler salg i alt 44,7 millioner . Han har solgt en anslået 100 millioner plader , hvilket gør ham til en af verdens bedst sælgende musikkunstnere .   Bieber har vundet adskillige priser , herunder American Music Award for Artist of the Year i 2010 og 2012 . I sin karriere har han vundet en Grammy Award for Bedste Danseindspilning til sangen '' Where Are Ü Now '' ved ceremonien i 2016 . Han er blevet opført fire gange af Forbes magazine blandt de ti mest magtfulde berømtheder i verden i 2011 , 2012 , og 2013 . Bieber blev også den første kunstner til at overgå 10 milliarder samlede video visninger på Vevo .
evidence_en: Justin Drew Bieber -LRB- -LSB- ˈbiːbər -RSB- born March 1 , 1994 -RRB- is a Canadian singer and songwriter . After a talent manager discovered him through his YouTube videos covering songs in 2008 and signed to RBMG , Bieber released his debut EP , My World , in late 2009 . It was certified Platinum in the U.S. . He became the first artist to have seven songs from a debut record chart on the Billboard Hot 100 . Bieber released his first full-length studio album , My World 2.0 , in 2010 . It debuted at or near number one in several countries , was certified triple Platinum in the U.S. , and contained his single `` Baby '' .   Following his debut album , he had his first headlining tour , the My World Tour , released the remix albums My Worlds Acoustic and Never Say Never -- The Remixes -- and the 3D biopic-concert film Justin Bieber : Never Say Never . He released his second studio album , Under the Mistletoe , in November 2011 , when it debuted at number one on the Billboard 200 . Bieber released his third studio album , Believe , in 2012 . His fourth studio album Purpose was released in November 2015 , spawning three number one singles : `` What Do You Mean ? '' , `` Sorry '' , and `` Love Yourself '' . His U.S. album and singles sales total 44.7 million . He has sold an estimated 100 million records , making him one of the world 's best-selling music artists .   Bieber has won numerous awards , including the American Music Award for Artist of the Year in 2010 and 2012 . In his career , he has won one Grammy Award for Best Dance Recording for the song `` Where Are Ü Now '' at the 2016 ceremony . He has been listed four times by Forbes magazine among the top ten most powerful celebrities in the world in 2011 , 2012 , and 2013 . Bieber also became the first artist to surpass 10 billion total video views on Vevo .

evidence_da: Kong : Skull Island er en amerikansk action-eventyr monster film instrueret af Jordan Vogt-Roberts og skrevet af Dan Gilroy , Max Borenstein og Derek Connolly , fra en historie af John Gatins . Filmen er en genstart af King Kong franchise og fungerer som den anden film i Legendary 's MonsterVerse . Det stjerner et ensemble stemmer bestående af Tom Hiddleston , Samuel L. Jackson , John Goodman , Brie Larson , Jing Tian , Toby Kebbell , John Ortiz , Corey Hawkins , Jason Mitchell , Shea Whigham , Thomas Mann , Terry Notary og John C. Reilly . Filmen følger et team af forskere og Vietnam-krigen soldater, der rejser til en ukendt ø i Stillehavet og støder på frygtindgydende skabninger og den mægtige Kong .   Principal fotografering fandt sted fra oktober 2015 til marts 2016 i Hawaii og forskellige steder omkring Vietnam. Februar 2017 , i London og blev udgivet i USA den 10. Filmen var en kritisk og kommerciel succes , opregning $ 565 millioner på verdensplan mod sin $ 185 millioner budget og gøre det til den femte højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film af 2017 .
evidence_en: Kong : Skull Island is a 2017 American action-adventure monster film directed by Jordan Vogt-Roberts and written by Dan Gilroy , Max Borenstein and Derek Connolly , from a story by John Gatins . The film is a reboot of the King Kong franchise and serves as the second film in Legendary 's MonsterVerse . It stars an ensemble cast consisting of Tom Hiddleston , Samuel L. Jackson , John Goodman , Brie Larson , Jing Tian , Toby Kebbell , John Ortiz , Corey Hawkins , Jason Mitchell , Shea Whigham , Thomas Mann , Terry Notary and John C. Reilly . The film follows a team of scientists and Vietnam War soldiers who travel to an uncharted island in the Pacific and encounter terrifying creatures and the mighty Kong .   Principal photography took place from October 2015 to March 2016 in Hawaii and various locations around Vietnam . Kong : Skull Island premiered on February 28 , 2017 , in London and was released in the United States on March 10 , 2017 , in 2D , 3D , IMAX 3D and in Dolby Cinemas . The film was a critical and commercial success , grossing $ 565 million worldwide against its $ 185 million budget and making it the fifth highest-grossing film of 2017 .

evidence_da: Darth Vader , også kendt under sit fødenavn Anakin Skywalker , er en fiktiv karakter i Star Wars franchisen . Vader optræder i den oprindelige filmtrilogi som en central antagonist, hvis handlinger driver plottet , mens hans fortid som Anakin Skywalker og historien om hans korruption er centrale for fortællingen om prequel trilogien .   Tegnet blev skabt af George Lucas og er blevet portrætteret af mange skuespillere . Hans optrædener spænder over de første seks Star Wars film , samt Rogue One , og hans karakter er stærkt refereres i Star Wars : The Force Awakens . Han er også en vigtig karakter i Star Wars udvidet univers af tv-serier , videospil , romaner , litteratur og tegneserier . Oprindeligt en Jedi profeterede at bringe balance til Force , han falder til den mørke side af Kraften og tjener den onde Galaktiske Imperium på højre hånd af hans Sith master , kejser Palpatine-LRB- også kendt som Darth Sidious-RRB- . Han er også far til Luke Skywalker og prinsesse Leia Organa , hemmelige mand Padmé Amidala og bedstefar til Kylo Ren .   Darth Vader er blevet en af de mest ikoniske skurke i populærkulturen , og er blevet opført blandt de største skurke og fiktive figurer nogensinde. Den amerikanske Film Institute opført ham som den tredje største film skurk i biografhistorie på 100 År ... 100 Helte og skurke , bag Hannibal Lecter og Norman Bates . Men , andre kritikere betragter ham som en tragisk helt , citerer hans oprindelige motivationer for større gode, før hans fald til den mørke side .
evidence_en: Darth Vader , also known by his birth name Anakin Skywalker , is a fictional character in the Star Wars franchise . Vader appears in the original film trilogy as a pivotal antagonist whose actions drive the plot , while his past as Anakin Skywalker and the story of his corruption are central to the narrative of the prequel trilogy .   The character was created by George Lucas and has been portrayed by numerous actors . His appearances span the first six Star Wars films , as well as Rogue One , and his character is heavily referenced in Star Wars : The Force Awakens . He is also an important character in the Star Wars expanded universe of television series , video games , novels , literature and comic books . Originally a Jedi prophesied to bring balance to the Force , he falls to the dark side of the Force and serves the evil Galactic Empire at the right hand of his Sith master , Emperor Palpatine -LRB- also known as Darth Sidious -RRB- . He is also the father of Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia Organa , secret husband of Padmé Amidala and grandfather of Kylo Ren .   Darth Vader has become one of the most iconic villains in popular culture , and has been listed among the greatest villains and fictional characters ever . The American Film Institute listed him as the third greatest movie villain in cinema history on 100 Years ... 100 Heroes and Villains , behind Hannibal Lecter and Norman Bates . However , other critics consider him a tragic hero , citing his original motivations for the greater good before his fall to the dark side .

evidence_da: George Walton Lucas Jr. -LRB- født 14 maj , 1944 -RRB- er en amerikansk filmskaber og iværksætter . Han er bedst kendt som skaberen af Star Wars og Indiana Jones franchise , samt grundlæggeren af Lucasfilm og Industrial Light & Magic . Han var bestyrelsesformand og administrerende direktør -LRB- CEO -RRB- af Lucasfilm , før han solgte det til The Walt Disney Company i 2012 .   Efter sin eksamen fra University of Southern California i 1967 , Lucas medstifter amerikanske Zoetrope med kolleger filmskaber Francis Ford Coppola . Lucas skrev og instruerede THX 1138 -LRB- 1971 -RRB- , baseret på hans tidligere studerende kort Electronic Labyrinth : THX 1138 4EB , som var en kritisk succes, men en finansiel fiasko . Hans næste arbejde som forfatter-instruktør var filmen , American Graffiti-LRB- 1973 -RRB-, inspireret af hans teenage år i begyndelsen af 1960'erne Modesto , Californien , og produceret gennem den nystiftede Lucasfilm . Filmen var kritisk og kommercielt vellykket , og modtog fem Academy Award nomineringer, herunder Best Picture .   Lucas 's næste film , en episk rumopera med titlen Star Wars -LRB- 1977 -RRB-, gik gennem en urolig produktionsproces; Det var dog et overraskende hit , at blive den mest indbringende film på det tidspunkt , samt en vinder af seks Academy Awards og et kulturelt fænomen . Efter den første Star Wars film , Lucas produceret og co-skrev følgende rater i trilogien , The Empire Strikes Back -LRB- 1980 -RRB- og Return of the Jedi-LRB- 1983 -RRB- . Sammen med Steven Spielberg , Lucas co-skabt og skrev Indiana Jones film Raiders of the Lost Ark-LRB- 1981 -RRB- , Temple of Doom-LRB- 1984 -RRB-, og The Last Crusade-LRB- 1989 -RRB- . Lucas producerede og skrev også en række film gennem Lucasfilm i 1980'erne og 1990'erne .   I 1997 genudgav Lucas den oprindelige Star Wars trilogi som en del af en Special Edition , hvor han foretog flere ændringer i filmene ; hjem medier udgivelser med yderligere ændringer blev udgivet i 2004 og 2011 . Lucas vendte også tilbage til at instruere med Star Wars prequel trilogien , bestående af The Phantom Menace-LRB- 1999 -RRB- , Attack of the Clones -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , og Revenge of the Sith-LRB- 2005 -RRB- . Han senere samarbejdede om historien for Indiana Jones efterfølger Kongerige Crystal Skull-LRB- 2008 -RRB-, og fungerede som historien forfatter og executive producer for krigen filmen , Red Tails -LRB- 2012 -RRB- .   Fem af Lucas' syv funktioner er blandt de 100 mest indbringende film på det nordamerikanske box office , justeret for billetprisinflation . Lucas er en af den amerikanske filmindustris mest økonomisk succesfulde filmskabere , og er personligt blevet nomineret til fire Academy Awards . Lucas betragtes som en betydelig figur i New Hollywood æra .
evidence_en: George Walton Lucas Jr. -LRB- born May 14 , 1944 -RRB- is an American filmmaker and entrepreneur . He is best known as the creator of the Star Wars and Indiana Jones franchises , as well as the founder of Lucasfilm and Industrial Light & Magic . He was the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer -LRB- CEO -RRB- of Lucasfilm , before selling it to The Walt Disney Company in 2012 .   Upon graduating from the University of Southern California in 1967 , Lucas co-founded American Zoetrope with fellow filmmaker Francis Ford Coppola . Lucas wrote and directed THX 1138 -LRB- 1971 -RRB- , based on his earlier student short Electronic Labyrinth : THX 1138 4EB , which was a critical success but a financial failure . His next work as a writer-director was the film , American Graffiti -LRB- 1973 -RRB- , inspired by his teen years in early 1960s Modesto , California , and produced through the newly founded Lucasfilm . The film was critically and commercially successful , and received five Academy Award nominations including Best Picture .   Lucas 's next film , an epic space opera titled Star Wars -LRB- 1977 -RRB- , went through a troubled production process ; however , it was a surprise hit , becoming the highest-grossing film at the time , as well as a winner of six Academy Awards and a cultural phenomenon . Following the first Star Wars film , Lucas produced and co-wrote the following installments in the trilogy , The Empire Strikes Back -LRB- 1980 -RRB- and Return of the Jedi -LRB- 1983 -RRB- . Along with Steven Spielberg , Lucas co-created and wrote the Indiana Jones films Raiders of the Lost Ark -LRB- 1981 -RRB- , Temple of Doom -LRB- 1984 -RRB- , and The Last Crusade -LRB- 1989 -RRB- . Lucas also produced and wrote a variety of films through Lucasfilm in the 1980s and 1990s .   In 1997 , Lucas re-released the original Star Wars trilogy as part of a Special Edition , where he made several alterations to the films ; home media releases with further changes were released in 2004 and 2011 . Lucas also returned to directing with the Star Wars prequel trilogy , consisting of The Phantom Menace -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , Attack of the Clones -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , and Revenge of the Sith -LRB- 2005 -RRB- . He later collaborated on the story for the Indiana Jones sequel Kingdom of the Crystal Skull -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , and served as the story writer and executive producer for the war film , Red Tails -LRB- 2012 -RRB- .   Five of Lucas 's seven features are among the 100 highest-grossing movies at the North American box office , adjusted for ticket-price inflation . Lucas is one of the American film industry 's most financially successful filmmakers , and has been personally nominated for four Academy Awards . Lucas is considered a significant figure in the New Hollywood era .

evidence_da: Usain St Leo Bolt , OJ , CD -LRB- -LSB- 出juיseיn -RSB- født 21 August 1986 -RRB- er en jamaicansk sprinter . Han er den første person til at holde både 100 meter og 200 meter verdensrekorder siden fuldautomatisk tid blev obligatorisk . Han har også verdensrekorden som en del af 4 × 100 meter relæ . Han er den regerende verden og olympiske mester i disse tre begivenheder . På grund af sin hidtil usete dominans og resultater i sprint konkurrence , han er almindeligt anset for at være den største sprinter af hele tiden .   En otte-tiden olympiske guldmedaljevinder , Bolt vandt 100 m , 200 m og 4 × 100 m relæ på tre på hinanden følgende Olympiske Lege , selv om han efterfølgende mistet en af guldmedaljerne -LRB- samt verdensrekorden deri -RRB- ni år efter den kendsgerning, på grund af holdkammerat Nesta Carter 's diskvalifikation for doping lovovertrædelser . Han fik verdensomspændende popularitet for sin dobbelte sprint sejr i 2008 Olympiske Lege i Beijing i verdensrekordtider . Bolt er den eneste sprinter til at vinde olympiske 100 m og 200 m titler på tre på hinanden følgende OL -LRB- 2008 , 2012 og 2016 -RRB- , en bedrift benævnt '' triple double . '' En elleve-tiden verdensmester , han vandt på hinanden følgende WORLD Championship 100 m , 200 m og 4 × 100 meter relæ guldmedaljer fra 2009 til 2015 , med undtagelse af en 100 m falsk start i 2011 . Han er den mest succesfulde atlet ved VM og var den første atlet til at vinde tre titler i både 100 m og 200 m ved konkurrencen .   Bolt forbedret på sin første 100 m verdensrekord på 9,69 med 9,58 sekunder i 2009 - den største forbedring siden starten af elektronisk timing . Han har to gange brudt verdensrekorden på 200 meter , hvilket satte 19,30 i 2008 og 19,19 i 2009 . Han har hjulpet Jamaica til tre 4 × 100 meter relæ verdensrekorder , med den nuværende rekord er 36,84 sekunder sat i 2012 . Bolt 's mest succesfulde begivenhed er 200 m , med tre olympiske og fire verdenstitler . OL i 2008 var hans internationale debut over 100 m; han havde tidligere vundet mange 200 m medaljer -LRB- herunder 2007 World Championship sølv-RRB-og holder verden under-20 og verden under-18 poster for begivenheden .   Hans resultater som sprinter har givet ham medienavnet '' Lightning Bolt '' , og hans priser omfatter IAAF World Athlete of the Year , Track & Field Athlete of the Year , og Laureus World Sportsman of the Year -LRB- fire gange -RRB- . Bolt har udtalt, at han agter at trække sig tilbage fra atletik efter VM i 2017 .
evidence_en: Usain St Leo Bolt , OJ , CD -LRB- -LSB- ˈjuːseɪn -RSB- born 21 August 1986 -RRB- is a Jamaican sprinter . He is the first person to hold both the 100 metres and 200 metres world records since fully automatic time became mandatory . He also holds the world record as a part of the 4 × 100 metres relay . He is the reigning world and Olympic champion in these three events . Due to his unprecedented dominance and achievements in sprint competition , he is widely considered to be the greatest sprinter of all time .   An eight-time Olympic gold medalist , Bolt won the 100 m , 200 m and 4 × 100 m relay at three consecutive Olympic Games , although he subsequently lost one of the gold medals -LRB- as well as the world record set therein -RRB- nine years after the fact due to teammate Nesta Carter 's disqualification for doping offences . He gained worldwide popularity for his double sprint victory at the 2008 Beijing Olympics in world record times . Bolt is the only sprinter to win Olympic 100 m and 200 m titles at three consecutive olympics -LRB- 2008 , 2012 and 2016 -RRB- , a feat referred to as the `` triple double . ''   An eleven-time World Champion , he won consecutive World Championship 100 m , 200 m and 4 × 100 metres relay gold medals from 2009 to 2015 , with the exception of a 100 m false start in 2011 . He is the most successful athlete of the World Championships and was the first athlete to win three titles in both the 100 m and 200 m at the competition .   Bolt improved upon his first 100 m world record of 9.69 with 9.58 seconds in 2009 -- the biggest improvement since the start of electronic timing . He has twice broken the 200 metres world record , setting 19.30 in 2008 and 19.19 in 2009 . He has helped Jamaica to three 4 × 100 metres relay world records , with the current record being 36.84 seconds set in 2012 . Bolt 's most successful event is the 200 m , with three Olympic and four World titles . The 2008 Olympics was his international debut over 100 m ; he had earlier won numerous 200 m medals -LRB- including 2007 World Championship silver -RRB- and holds the world under-20 and world under-18 records for the event .   His achievements as a sprinter have earned him the media nickname `` Lightning Bolt '' , and his awards include the IAAF World Athlete of the Year , Track & Field Athlete of the Year , and Laureus World Sportsman of the Year -LRB- four times -RRB- . Bolt has stated that he intends to retire from athletics after the 2017 World Championships .

evidence_da: Miami Marlins er en amerikansk professionel baseball hold baseret i Miami , Florida . Den Marlins konkurrere i Major League Baseball-LRB- MLB-RRB- som medlem af National League -LRB- NL -RRB- East division . Deres hjem park er Marlins Park. Selv om en af kun to MLB franchise sat aldrig har vundet en division titel -LRB-den anden er Colorado Rockies-RRB-, marlins har vundet to World Series mesterskaber som et wild card hold .   Holdet begyndte at spille i 1993-sæsonen som Florida Marlins og spillede hjemmekampe fra deres indledende sæson til 2011-sæsonen på Joe Robbie Stadium , som de delte med Miami Dolphins i National Football League -LRB- NFL -RRB- . Stadionet blev senere kaldt Pro Player Park , Pro Player Stadium , Dolphin Stadium , Dolphins Stadium , Land Shark Stadium, og Sun Life Stadium under deres lejemål. Siden 2012 sæsonen , har de spillet på Marlins Park i downtown Miami , på stedet af den tidligere Orange Bowl i Little Havana , Florida . Den nye park , i modsætning til Sun Life Stadium -LRB- som blev kritiseret i sin baseball konfiguration for dårligt syn linjer i nogle steder-RRB-, blev udformet først og fremmest som en baseball park . Den nye park 's navn er midlertidig, indtil navngivning rettigheder er købt . I henhold til en aftale med byen og Miami-Dade County -LRB- som ejer parken -RRB-, ændrede Marlins officielt deres navn til '' Miami Marlins '' den 11. De vedtog også et nyt logo , farveskema og uniformer .   Den Marlins har den ære at vinde en World Series mesterskab i begge sæsoner, de kvalificerede sig til postseason , gør det i 1997 og 2003 - begge gange som National League wild card team . De besejrede American League -LRB- AL-RRB-mester Cleveland Indians i 1997 World Series , som var bemærkelsesværdig for shortstop Édgar Rentería kørsel i anden baseman Craig Counsell for serien-clinching køre i 11th inning af den syvende og beslutter Spil. 2003-sæsonen var kendt for fyringen af manager Jeff Torborg efter 38 kampe . Den Marlins var på sidstepladsen i NL East med en 16 - 22 rekord på det tidspunkt . Torborgs efterfølger - 72-årige Jack McKeon - førte dem til NL-wild card-kajen i eftersæsonen . de besejrede New York Yankees fire kampe til to i 2003 World Series .
evidence_en: The Miami Marlins are an American professional baseball team based in Miami , Florida . The Marlins compete in Major League Baseball -LRB- MLB -RRB- as a member of the National League -LRB- NL -RRB- East division . Their home park is Marlins Park . Though one of only two MLB franchises to have never won a division title -LRB- the other is the Colorado Rockies -RRB- , the Marlins have won two World Series championships as a wild card team .   The team began play in the 1993 season as the Florida Marlins and played home games from their inaugural season to the 2011 season at Joe Robbie Stadium , which they shared with the Miami Dolphins of the National Football League -LRB- NFL -RRB- . The stadium was later called Pro Player Park , Pro Player Stadium , Dolphin Stadium , Dolphins Stadium , Land Shark Stadium , and Sun Life Stadium during their tenancy . Since the 2012 season , they have played at Marlins Park in downtown Miami , on the site of the former Orange Bowl in Little Havana , Florida . The new park , unlike Sun Life Stadium -LRB- which was criticized in its baseball configuration for poor sight lines in some locations -RRB- , was designed foremost as a baseball park . The new park 's name is a temporary one until naming rights are purchased . Per an agreement with the city and Miami-Dade County -LRB- which owns the park -RRB- , the Marlins officially changed their name to the `` Miami Marlins '' on November 11 , 2011 . They also adopted a new logo , color scheme , and uniforms .   The Marlins have the distinction of winning a World Series championship in both seasons they qualified for the postseason , doing so in 1997 and 2003 -- both times as the National League wild card team . They defeated the American League -LRB- AL -RRB- champion Cleveland Indians in the 1997 World Series , which was notable for shortstop Édgar Rentería driving in second baseman Craig Counsell for the series-clinching run in the 11th inning of the seventh and deciding game . The 2003 season was notable for the firing of manager Jeff Torborg after 38 games . The Marlins were in last place in the NL East with a 16 -- 22 record at the time . Torborg 's successor , 72-year-old Jack McKeon , led them to the NL wild card berth in the postseason ; they defeated the New York Yankees four games to two in the 2003 World Series .

evidence_da: Stephen Rider er en amerikansk film- og tv-skuespiller , bedst kendt for at spille admiral Stephen W. Rochon i filmen The Butler og Eric Millworth i serien Lucky 7 . Han er i øjeblikket spiller en District Attorney opkaldt Blake Tower i Marvel 's serie Daredevil .
evidence_en: Stephen Rider is an American film and television actor , best known for playing Admiral Stephen W. Rochon in the film The Butler and Eric Millworth in the series Lucky 7 . He is currently playing a District Attorney named Blake Tower in the Marvel 's series Daredevil .

evidence_da: Gourang Chakraborty -LRB- født 16 Juni 1950 -RRB-, bedre kendt under sit kunstnernavn Mithun Chakraborty ; uformelt benævnt Mithun Da , er en indisk film skuespiller , sanger, producent , forfatter , socialrådgiver, iværksætter og en Rajya Sabha medlem af Parlamentet . Han er modtager af tre National Film Awards . Han fik sin skuespillerdebut med kunsthus drama Mrigayaa -LRB- 1976 -RRB-, som han vandt sin første National Film Award for bedste mandlige hovedrolle .   Han begyndte sin karriere som junior skuespiller og fortsatte med at etablere sig som en af de største stjerner i Bollywood . Han er anerkendt som en af de bedste '' dansehelte '' i Bollywood med sin '' Disco og Desi '' fusion-stil dans, der er populær blandt masserne .   Chakraborty er bedst husket for sin rolle som Jimmy i filmen Disco Dancer, som var et superhit i Indien og også i mange andre lande i verden, især Rusland . I Rusland , Chakraborty og Raj Kapoor er de mest populære indiske aktører.   Udover ' Disco Dancer ' , Chakraborty er bedst husket for sin præstation i film som Suraksha , Saahas , Wardat , Pyar Jhukta Nahi , Dance Dance og Agneepath .  I 1991 vandt han Filmfare Best Supporting Actor award for sin rolle som Krishnan Iyer Nariyal paniwala for filmen Agneepath .   Han vandt senere yderligere to National Film Awards for sine præstationer i Tahader Katha -LRB- 1992 -RRB- og Swami Vivekananda -LRB- 1998 -RRB- . Chakraborty har optrådt i mere end 350 film, herunder Bengali , Odia , Bhojpuri , Telugu og Punjabi billeder.   Chakraborty ejer Monarch Group , som har interesser i hotel- og restaurationsbranchen og uddannelsessektoren. Han har også startet produktionshuset Paparatzy Productions I 1992 , han sammen med Dilip Kumar og Sunil Dutt , oprettet en fond til at hjælpe trængende aktører kaldet Cine & T.V Artistes Association -LRB- CINTAA -RRB- . Han var også formand for Film Studios Setting & Allied Mazdoor Union, som tager sig af velfærd en brændearbejdere og løse deres krav og problemer . Tv-show Dance India Dance, hvor Chakraborty er Grandmaster har allerede indgået i Limca Book of Records og Guinness World Records Chakraborty spillede en afgørende rolle mægler mellem Pranab Mukherjee og Mamata Banerjee , vinde kongresmedlem støtte fra Trinamool-chefen ved præsidentvalget i 2012 .   En tegneserie ved navn Jimmy Zhingchak er blevet lavet baseret på Chakraborty .
evidence_en: Gourang Chakraborty -LRB- born 16 June 1950 -RRB- , better known by his stage name Mithun Chakraborty ; informally referred to as Mithun Da , is an Indian film actor , singer , producer , writer , social worker , entrepreneur and a Rajya Sabha Member of Parliament . He is the recipient of three National Film Awards . He made his acting debut with the art house drama Mrigayaa -LRB- 1976 -RRB- , for which he won his first National Film Award for Best Actor .   He began his career as a junior actor and went on to establish himself as one of the biggest stars in Bollywood . He is recognized as one of the best `` dancing-heroes '' in Bollywood with his `` Disco and Desi '' fusion-style dancing that is popular among the masses .   Chakraborty is best remembered for his role as Jimmy in the movie Disco Dancer which was a superhit in India and also in many other countries in the world , especially Russia . In Russia , Chakraborty and Raj Kapoor are the most popular Indian actors .   Besides ` Disco Dancer ' , Chakraborty is best remembered for his performance in films like Suraksha , Saahas , Wardat , Pyar Jhukta Nahi , Dance Dance and Agneepath .  In 1991 , he won the Filmfare Best Supporting Actor award for his role as Krishnan Iyer Nariyal paniwala for the movie Agneepath .   He later won two more National Film Awards for his performances in Tahader Katha -LRB- 1992 -RRB- and Swami Vivekananda -LRB- 1998 -RRB- . Chakraborty has appeared in more than 350 films including Bengali , Odia , Bhojpuri , Telugu and Punjabi pictures .   Chakraborty owns the Monarch Group , which has interests in the hospitality sector and educational sector . He has also started the production house Paparatzy Productions In 1992 , he along with Dilip Kumar and Sunil Dutt , set up a trust to help needy actors called Cine & T.V Artistes Association -LRB- CINTAA -RRB- . He was also the Chairperson of Film Studios Setting & Allied Mazdoor Union which take care the welfare of cine workers and resolve their demands and problems . The Television show Dance India Dance where Chakraborty is the Grandmaster has already entered in Limca Book of Records and Guinness World Records Chakraborty played a crucial role of mediator between Pranab Mukherjee and Mamata Banerjee , winning the Congressman the support of the Trinamool chief in the 2012 presidential election .   A comic book named Jimmy Zhingchak has been made based on Chakraborty .

evidence_da: Heidi Klum -LRB- -LSB- haיdi יklķm -RSB- ; født 1 juni , 1973 -RRB- er en tysk-amerikansk supermodel , tv-personlighed , forretningskvinde , modedesigner , sanger , tv-producent , forfatter , og skuespiller . Hun optrådte på forsiden af Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue og i 1999 blev den første tyske model til at blive en Victoria 's Secret Angel .   Efter en succesfuld modelkarriere blev Klum vært og dommer i Tysklands Next Topmodel og realityshow Project Runway, som gav hende en Emmy-nominering i 2008 og en sejr i 2013 for Outstanding Host for a Reality or Reality-Competition Program -LRB- deles med medvært Tim Gunn -RRB- ; Klum er blevet nomineret til seks Emmy Awards . Hun har arbejdet som talsmodel for Dannon og H&M , og har optrådt i en lang række reklamer for McDonald 's , Volkswagen m.fl. I 2009 blev Klum Barbies officielle ambassadør på Barbies 50 års jubilæum . Som en lejlighedsvis skuespiller , hun havde biroller i film, herunder Blow Dry-LRB- 2001 -RRB- , Ella Enchanted-LRB- 2004 -RRB-, og gjort cameo optrædener i The Devil Wears Prada -LRB- 2006 -RRB- og Perfect Stranger -LRB- 2007 -RRB- . Hun har også optrådt på tv-shows, herunder Sex and the City , Hvordan jeg mødte din mor , Desperate Housewives og Parker og Fritid . I øjeblikket, Klum er en dommer på NBC reality show America 's Got Talent .   I maj 2011 vurderede Forbes Magazine Klums samlede indtjening for det pågældende år som . Hun er rangeret som nummer to på Forbes's liste over '' World 's Top-Earning Models '', bag Gisele Bündchen . Forbes bemærkede, at siden slutter hendes 13-årige køre som en Victoria 's Secret Angel , Klum er blevet mere af en forretningskvinde end en model . I 2008 blev hun amerikansk statsborger , samtidig med at hun bevarede sit tyske statsborgerskab .
evidence_en: Heidi Klum -LRB- -LSB- ˈhaɪ̯di ˈklʊm -RSB- ; born June 1 , 1973 -RRB- is a German-American supermodel , television personality , businesswoman , fashion designer , singer , television producer , author , and actress . She appeared on the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue and in 1999 became the first German model to become a Victoria 's Secret Angel .   Following a successful modeling career , Klum became the host and a judge of Germany 's Next Topmodel and the reality show Project Runway which earned her an Emmy nomination in 2008 and a win in 2013 for Outstanding Host for a Reality or Reality-Competition Program -LRB- shared with co-host Tim Gunn -RRB- ; Klum has been nominated for six Emmy Awards . She has worked as a spokesmodel for Dannon and H&M , and has appeared in numerous commercials for McDonald 's , Volkswagen and others . In 2009 , Klum became Barbie 's official ambassador on Barbie 's 50th anniversary . As an occasional actress , she had supporting roles in movies including Blow Dry -LRB- 2001 -RRB- , Ella Enchanted -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , and made cameo appearances in The Devil Wears Prada -LRB- 2006 -RRB- and Perfect Stranger -LRB- 2007 -RRB- . She has also appeared on TV shows including Sex and the City , How I Met Your Mother , Desperate Housewives and Parks and Recreation . Currently , Klum is a judge on the NBC reality show America 's Got Talent .   In May 2011 , Forbes magazine estimated Klum 's total earnings for that year as . She is ranked second on Forbes list of the `` World 's Top-Earning Models '' , behind Gisele Bündchen . Forbes noted that since ending her 13-year run as a Victoria 's Secret Angel , Klum has become more of a businesswoman than a model . In 2008 , she became an American citizen while maintaining her native German citizenship .

evidence_da: Ray Milland -LRB- 3 Januar 1907 - 10 Marts 1986 -RRB- var en walisisk skuespiller og instruktør . Hans skærm karriere løb fra 1929 til 1985 , og han er bedst husket for sin Academy Award-vindende portræt af en alkoholisk forfatter i The Lost Weekend -LRB- 1945 -RRB-, en sofistikeret førende mand overfor en korrupt John Wayne i Reap the Wild Wind -LRB- 1942 -RRB- , mord-plotte mand i Dial M for Murder -LRB- 1954 -RRB-, og som Oliver Barrett III i Love Story -LRB- 1970 -RRB- .   Før han blev skuespiller , milland tjente i Household Kavaleri i den britiske hær , bliver en dygtig skarpskytte , hest-rytter og flyvemaskine pilot . Han forlod hæren for at følge en karriere i skuespil og optrådte som en ekstra i flere britiske produktioner, før han fik sin første store rolle i The Flying Scotsman -LRB- 1929 -RRB- . Dette førte til en ni-måneders kontrakt med MGM, og han flyttede til USA, hvor han optrådte som en bestand skuespiller . Efter at være blevet frigivet af MGM , blev han samlet op af Paramount , der brugte Milland i en række mindre talende dele , normalt som en engelsk karakter . Han blev udlånt til Universal for en film kaldet Three Smart Girls -LRB- 1936 -RRB-, og dens succes så Milland givet en ledende rolle i The Jungle Princess-LRB- også 1936 -RRB- sammen med nye starlet Dorothy Lamour . Filmen var en stor succes og slynget både til stjernestatus . Milland forblev hos Paramount i næsten 20 år - og ud over sin Oscar-vindende rolle i The Lost Weekend , huskes han for filmene The Major and the Minor -LRB- 1942 -RRB- , The Big Clock -LRB- 1948 -RRB- og The Thief -LRB- 1952 -RRB-, hvoraf den sidste så  ham nomineret til sin anden Golden Globe . Efter at have forladt Paramount , begyndte han at instruere og sluttede sin karriere bevæger sig ind i tv .   Milland , der var på et tidspunkt Paramount Pictures 'højest betalte skuespiller , co-stjerne sammen med mange af de mest populære skuespillerinder af tiden, herunder Gene Tierney , Grace Kelly , Lana Turner , Marlene Dietrich , Ginger Rogers , Jane Wyman , Loretta Young og Veronica Lake .
evidence_en: Ray Milland -LRB- 3 January 1907  -- 10 March 1986 -RRB- was a Welsh actor and director . His screen career ran from 1929 to 1985 , and he is best remembered for his Academy Award-winning portrayal of an alcoholic writer in The Lost Weekend -LRB- 1945 -RRB- , a sophisticated leading man opposite a corrupt John Wayne in Reap the Wild Wind -LRB- 1942 -RRB- , the murder-plotting husband in Dial M for Murder -LRB- 1954 -RRB- , and as Oliver Barrett III in Love Story -LRB- 1970 -RRB- .   Before becoming an actor , Milland served in the Household Cavalry of the British Army , becoming a proficient marksman , horse-rider and aeroplane pilot . He left the army to follow a career in acting and appeared as an extra in several British productions before getting his first major role in The Flying Scotsman -LRB- 1929 -RRB- . This led to a nine-month contract with MGM and he moved to the United States where he appeared as a stock actor . After being released by MGM , he was picked up by Paramount , who used Milland in a range of lesser speaking parts , normally as an English character . He was loaned out to Universal for a film called Three Smart Girls -LRB- 1936 -RRB- , and its success saw Milland given a lead role in The Jungle Princess -LRB- also 1936 -RRB- alongside new starlet Dorothy Lamour . The film was a big success and catapulted both to stardom . Milland remained with Paramount for almost 20 years , and as well as his Oscar-winning role in The Lost Weekend , he is remembered for the films The Major and the Minor -LRB- 1942 -RRB- , The Big Clock -LRB- 1948 -RRB- , and The Thief -LRB- 1952 -RRB- , the last of which saw him nominated for his second Golden Globe . After leaving Paramount , he began directing and ended his career moving into television .   Milland , who was at one time Paramount Pictures ' highest paid actor , co-starred alongside many of the most popular actresses of the time including Gene Tierney , Grace Kelly , Lana Turner , Marlene Dietrich , Ginger Rogers , Jane Wyman , Loretta Young and Veronica Lake .

evidence_da: Egypten -LRB- -LSB- ---Dיייייי -RSB- ; Kimi -RRB , officielt Den Arabiske Republik Egypten , er et transkontinentalt land, der strækker sig over det nordøstlige hjørne af Afrika og det sydvestlige hjørne af Asien af en landbro dannet af Sinai-halvøen . Egypten er et middelhavsland omkranset af Gazastriben og Israel mod nordøst , Aqababugten mod øst , Det Røde Hav mod øst og syd , Sudan mod syd og Libyen mod vest . Over Aqaba-bugten ligger Jordan , og overfor Sinai-halvøen ligger Saudi-Arabien , selv om Jordan og Saudi-Arabien ikke deler en landegrænse med Egypten .   Egypten har en af de længste historier i noget moderne land , fremstår som en af verdens første nationalstater i det tiende årtusinde f.Kr . Det gamle Egypten blev betragtet som civilisationens vugge og oplevede nogle af de tidligste udviklinger inden for skrivning , landbrug , urbanisering , organiseret religion og centralregering . Ikoniske monumenter som Giza Nekropolis og dens Store Sfinx, samt ruinerne af Memphis, Thebes , Karnak , og Valley of the Kings , afspejler denne arv og forbliver et betydeligt fokus for arkæologiske studier og folkelig interesse på verdensplan. Egyptens rige kulturarv er en integreret del af landets nationale identitet , som har udholdt og til tider ligestillet forskellige udenlandske påvirkninger , herunder græsk, persisk, romersk, arabisk , osmannisk og europæisk . Et af de tidligste centre for kristendommen , Egypten blev islamiseret i det syvende århundrede og er fortsat et overvejende muslimsk land , om end med en betydelig kristen minoritet .   Med over 92 millioner indbyggere er Egypten det mest folkerige land i Nordafrika og den arabiske verden , det tredjemest folkerige i Afrika -LRB - efter Nigeria og Etiopien -RRB - og det femtende mest folkerige i verden . Langt størstedelen af befolkningen bor i nærheden af bredden af Nilen , et areal på omkring 40000 km2 , hvor den eneste agerjord findes . De store regioner i Sahara-ørkenen , som udgør det meste af Egyptens territorium , er tyndt beboede . Omkring halvdelen af Egyptens indbyggere bor i byområder, med de fleste spredt over de tætbefolkede centre i større Kairo , Alexandria og andre større byer i Nildeltaet .   Det moderne Egypten anses for at være en regional og mellemmagt med betydelig kulturel , politisk og militær indflydelse i Nordafrika , Mellemøsten og den muslimske verden . Egyptens økonomi er en af de største og mest diversificerede i Mellemøsten , og forventes at blive en af de største i det 21 . Egypten er medlem af FN , Alliancefri Bevægelse , Den Arabiske Liga , Den Afrikanske Union og Organisationen for Islamisk Samarbejde .
evidence_en: Egypt -LRB- -LSB- ˈiːdʒɪpt -RSB- ; مِصر , مَصر , Kimi -RRB- , officially the Arab Republic of Egypt , is a transcontinental country spanning the northeast corner of Africa and southwest corner of Asia by a land bridge formed by the Sinai Peninsula . Egypt is a Mediterranean country bordered by the Gaza Strip and Israel to the northeast , the Gulf of Aqaba to the east , the Red Sea to the east and south , Sudan to the south , and Libya to the west . Across the Gulf of Aqaba lies Jordan , and across from the Sinai Peninsula lies Saudi Arabia , although Jordan and Saudi Arabia do not share a land border with Egypt .   Egypt has one of the longest histories of any modern country , emerging as one of the world 's first nation states in the tenth millennium BC . Considered a cradle of civilisation , Ancient Egypt experienced some of the earliest developments of writing , agriculture , urbanisation , organised religion and central government . Iconic monuments such as the Giza Necropolis and its Great Sphinx , as well the ruins of Memphis , Thebes , Karnak , and the Valley of the Kings , reflect this legacy and remain a significant focus of archaeological study and popular interest worldwide . Egypt 's rich cultural heritage is an integral part of its national identity , which has endured , and at times assimilated , various foreign influences , including Greek , Persian , Roman , Arab , Ottoman , and European . One of the earliest centres of Christianity , Egypt was Islamised in the seventh century and remains a predominantly Muslim country , albeit with a significant Christian minority .   With over 92 million inhabitants , Egypt is the most populous country in North Africa and the Arab world , the third-most populous in Africa -LRB- after Nigeria and Ethiopia -RRB- , and the fifteenth-most populous in the world . The great majority of its people live near the banks of the Nile River , an area of about 40000 km2 , where the only arable land is found . The large regions of the Sahara desert , which constitute most of Egypt 's territory , are sparsely inhabited . About half of Egypt 's residents live in urban areas , with most spread across the densely populated centres of greater Cairo , Alexandria and other major cities in the Nile Delta .   Modern Egypt is considered to be a regional and middle power , with significant cultural , political , and military influence in North Africa , the Middle East and the Muslim world . Egypt 's economy is one of the largest and most diversified in the Middle East , and is projected to become one of the largest in the 21st century . Egypt is a member of the United Nations , Non-Aligned Movement , Arab League , African Union , and Organisation of Islamic Cooperation .

evidence_da: Mukesh Dhirubhai Ambani -LRB- født 19 April 1957 -RRB- er en indisk virksomhed magnat, der er formand , administrerende direktør og største aktionær i Reliance Industries Limited-LRB- RIL-RRB-, en Fortune Global 500 selskab og Indiens næstmest værdifulde selskab efter markedsværdi . Han ejer 44,7 % af aktierne i virksomheden . RIL beskæftiger sig hovedsagelig med raffinering , petrokemikalier og i olie - og gassektoren . Reliance Retail Ltd .   Han er den ældste søn af den afdøde Dhirubhai Ambani og Kokilaben Ambani og bror til Anil Ambani . I 2016 blev han rangeret 38 , og er den eneste indiske forretningsmand , på Forbes liste over verdens mest magtfulde mennesker . , har Ambani konsekvent haft titlen som Indiens rigeste person på magasinets liste i ti år . Gennem Reliance , han ejer også den indiske Premier League franchise Mumbai indianere . I 2012 kaldte Forbes ham for en af de rigeste sportsejere i verden . Han bor i Antilia-bygningen, en af verdens dyreste private boliger. Dens værdi er tæt på 1 milliard dollars . , Ambani rangeret femte blandt Indiens filantroper , ifølge Kinas Hurun Research Institute .   Han har siddet i bestyrelsen for Bank of America og det internationale rådgivende udvalg for Rådet for Udenrigsanliggender . Han var formand for bestyrelsen for Indian Institute of Management Bangalore , som er en af de førende business schools i Indien .
evidence_en: Mukesh Dhirubhai Ambani -LRB- born 19 April 1957 -RRB- is an Indian business magnate who is the chairman , managing director and largest shareholder of Reliance Industries Limited -LRB- RIL -RRB- , a Fortune Global 500 company and India 's second-most valuable company by market value . He holds a 44.7 % stake in the company . RIL deals mainly in refining , petrochemicals , and in the oil and gas sectors . Reliance Retail Ltd. , another subsidiary , is the largest retailer in India .   He is the elder son of the late Dhirubhai Ambani and Kokilaben Ambani and the brother of Anil Ambani . In 2016 , he was ranked 38 , and is the only Indian businessman , on Forbes list of the world 's most powerful people . , Ambani has consistently held the title of India 's richest person on the magazine 's list for ten years . Through Reliance , he also owns the Indian Premier League franchise Mumbai Indians . In 2012 , Forbes named him one of the richest sports owners in the world . He resides at the Antilia Building , one of the world 's most expensive private residences . Its value is close to 1 billion dollars . , Ambani ranked fifth among India 's philanthropists , according to China 's Hurun Research Institute .   He has served on the board of directors of Bank of America and the international advisory board of the Council on Foreign Relations . He was the chairman of the board of Indian Institute of Management Bangalore , which is one of the leading business schools in India .

evidence_da: Futurama er en amerikansk animeret science fiction sitcom skabt af Matt Groening for Fox Broadcasting Company . Serien følger eventyr af en slutningen af det 20 århundrede New York City pizza levering dreng , Philip J. Fry , der - efter at være uforvarende kryogent frosset i tusind år , finder beskæftigelse på Planet Express , en interplanetarisk levering selskab i retro-futuristisk 31st århundrede . Serien blev forestillet af Groening i midten af 1990'erne, mens han arbejdede på The Simpsons; han senere bragte David X. Cohen ombord for at udvikle historier og figurer til pitch showet til Fox .   I USA blev serien sendt på Fox fra 28 . Futurama også luftet i genudsendelser på Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim fra 2003 til 2007 , indtil netværkets kontrakt udløb . Det blev genoplivet i 2007 som fire direkte-til-video film; den sidste blev udgivet i begyndelsen af 2009 . Comedy Central indgået en aftale med 20th Century Fox Television til syndikat de eksisterende episoder og luft filmene som 16 nye , halv time episoder , der udgør en femte sæson .   I juni 2009 , producerer studio 20th Century Fox meddelte, at Comedy Central havde samlet op showet for 26 nye halv time episoder , som begyndte luftning i 2010 og 2011 . Showet blev fornyet for syvende sæson , med den første halvdel luftet i juni 2012 og andet sæt til midten af 2013 . Det blev senere afsløret, at den syvende sæson ville være den sidste sæson , som Comedy Central meddelte, at de ikke ville være idriftsættelse yderligere episoder . Serien finale blev sendt på September 4 , 2013 . Mens Groening har sagt, at han vil forsøge at få det samlet op af et andet netværk , David X. Cohen erklærede, at episoden '' I mellemtiden '' ville være den sidste episode af sæson 7 og også serien finale .   Futurama har gennem hele sit løb modtaget kritikerros . Showet er blevet nomineret til 17 Annie Awards og 12 Emmy Awards , vinde syv af de tidligere og seks af sidstnævnte . Det er også blevet nomineret fire gange for en Writers Guild of America Award , vinde to for episoder '' Godfellas '' og '' Fangen til Benda '', blevet nomineret til en Nebula Award og har modtaget Environmental Media Awards for episoder '' Problemet med Poppler s '' og '' Futurama Holiday Spectacular ''. Futurama-relaterede merchandise er også blevet frigivet , herunder en tie-in tegneserie og videospil , kalendere , tøj og figurer . I 2013 rangerede TV Guide Futurama som en af de 60 største tv-tegnefilm nogensinde .
evidence_en: Futurama is an American animated science fiction sitcom created by Matt Groening for the Fox Broadcasting Company . The series follows the adventures of a late-20th-century New York City pizza delivery boy , Philip J. Fry , who , after being unwittingly cryogenically frozen for one thousand years , finds employment at Planet Express , an interplanetary delivery company in the retro-futuristic 31st century . The series was envisioned by Groening in the mid-1990s while working on The Simpsons ; he later brought David X. Cohen aboard to develop storylines and characters to pitch the show to Fox .   In the United States , the series aired on Fox from March 28 , 1999 , to August 10 , 2003 , before ceasing production . Futurama also aired in reruns on Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim from 2003 to 2007 , until the network 's contract expired . It was revived in 2007 as four direct-to-video films ; the last of which was released in early 2009 . Comedy Central entered into an agreement with 20th Century Fox Television to syndicate the existing episodes and air the films as 16 new , half-hour episodes , constituting a fifth season .   In June 2009 , producing studio 20th Century Fox announced that Comedy Central had picked up the show for 26 new half-hour episodes , which began airing in 2010 and 2011 . The show was renewed for a seventh season , with the first half airing in June 2012 and the second set for mid-2013 . It was later revealed that the seventh season would be the final season , as Comedy Central announced that they would not be commissioning any further episodes . The series finale aired on September 4 , 2013 . While Groening has said he will try to get it picked up by another network , David X. Cohen stated that the episode `` Meanwhile '' would be the last episode of season 7 and also the series finale .   Throughout its run , Futurama has received critical acclaim . The show has been nominated for 17 Annie Awards and 12 Emmy Awards , winning seven of the former and six of the latter . It has also been nominated four times for a Writers Guild of America Award , winning two for the episodes `` Godfellas '' and `` The Prisoner of Benda '' , been nominated for a Nebula Award and has received Environmental Media Awards for episodes `` The Problem with Popplers '' and `` The Futurama Holiday Spectacular '' . Futurama-related merchandise has also been released , including a tie-in comic book series and video game , calendars , clothes and figurines . In 2013 , TV Guide ranked Futurama as one of the top 60 Greatest TV Cartoons of All Time .

evidence_da: Afghanistan -LRB- -LSB- æfייæn -RSB- Pashto/Dari : , Afķānistān -RRB- officielt Den Islamiske Republik Afghanistan , er et indlandsland beliggende i Sydasien og Centralasien . Det har en befolkning på 33 millioner , hvilket gør det til det 42. Det grænser op til Pakistan i syd og øst; Iran i vest; Turkmenistan , Usbekistan og Tadsjikistan i nord ; og Kina i det fjerne nordøstlige . Dens område dækker 652.000 km2 , hvilket gør det til det 41.   Menneskelig beboelse i Afghanistan går tilbage til den mellempalæolitiske æra , og landets strategiske placering langs Silkevejen forbandt den med kulturer i Mellemøsten og andre dele af Asien . Gennem tiderne har landet været hjemsted for forskellige folkeslag og været vidne til talrige militære kampagner , især af Alexander den Store , Mauryas , muslimske arabere , mongoler , britiske, sovjetiske , og i den moderne æra af vestlige magter . Landet fungerede også som den kilde, hvorfra Kushans , Hephthalites , Samanids , Saffarids , Ghaznavids , Ghorids , Khiljis , Mughals , Hotaks , Durranis , og andre er steget til at danne store imperier .   Den politiske historie i den moderne stat Afghanistan begyndte med Hotak og Durrani dynastierne i 1700-tallet . I slutningen af 1800-tallet blev Afghanistan en stødpudestat i '' Great Game '' mellem britisk Indien og det russiske imperium . Efter den tredje britisk-afghanske krig i 1919 forsøgte kong Amanullah uden held at modernisere landet . Det forblev fredeligt under Zahir Shah 's fyrre års monarki . En række kup i 1970'erne blev efterfulgt af en række borgerkrige, der hærgede store dele af Afghanistan og fortsætter den dag i dag .   Afghanistan er en enhedspræsident islamisk republik med islam som en officiel statsreligion . Det er medlem af De Forenede Nationer , Organisationen for Islamisk Samarbejde , Gruppen af 77 , Organisationen for Økonomisk Samarbejde og Den Alliancefrie Bevægelse . Landets økonomi er rangeret 108:e i verden med BNP på 64.080 millioner dollars .
evidence_en: Afghanistan -LRB- -LSB- æfˈɡænᵻstæn -RSB- Pashto/Dari : , Afġānistān -RRB- , officially the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan , is a landlocked country located within South Asia and Central Asia . It has a population of 33 million , making it the 42nd most populous country in the world . It is bordered by Pakistan in the south and east ; Iran in the west ; Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan , and Tajikistan in the north ; and China in the far northeast . Its territory covers 652,000 km2 , making it the 41st largest country in the world .   Human habitation in Afghanistan dates back to the Middle Paleolithic Era , and the country 's strategic location along the Silk Road connected it to the cultures of the Middle East and other parts of Asia . Through the ages the land has been home to various peoples and witnessed numerous military campaigns , notably by Alexander the Great , Mauryas , Muslim Arabs , Mongols , British , Soviet , and in the modern era by Western powers . The land also served as the source from which the Kushans , Hephthalites , Samanids , Saffarids , Ghaznavids , Ghorids , Khiljis , Mughals , Hotaks , Durranis , and others have risen to form major empires .   The political history of the modern state of Afghanistan began with the Hotak and Durrani dynasties in the 18th century . In the late 19th century , Afghanistan became a buffer state in the `` Great Game '' between British India and the Russian Empire . Following the Third Anglo-Afghan War in 1919 , King Amanullah unsuccessfully attempted to modernize the country . It remained peaceful during Zahir Shah 's forty years of monarchy . A series of coups in the 1970s was followed by a series of civil wars that devastated much of Afghanistan and continues to this day .   Afghanistan is a unitary presidential Islamic republic with Islam as an official state religion . It is a member of the United Nations , the Organisation of Islamic Cooperation , the Group of 77 , the Economic Cooperation Organization , and the Non-Aligned Movement . The country 's economy is ranked 108th in the world with the GDP of $ 64.08 billion .

evidence_da: IPhone 5C -LRB- markedsført med en stiliseret små bogstaver ' c ' som iPhone 5c -RRB- er en smartphone, der blev designet og markedsført af Apple Inc. . Enheden var en del af iPhone-serien og blev afsløret på September 10 , 2013 , og udgivet på September 20 , 2013 , sammen med sin højere ende modstykke , iPhone 5S .   iPhone 5C er en variant af iPhone 5, med lignende hardware specifikationer, men en hårdt belagt polycarbonat shell i stedet for aluminium af den oprindelige iPhone 5 . IPhone 5C var tilgængelig i flere farvemuligheder, og leveres med iOS 7 . IPhone 5C blev solgt til en nedsat pris punkt i forhold til 5S : i modsætning til Apples tidligere praksis med at sænke prisen på den tidligere model ved udgivelsen af en ny version , iPhone 5 blev udtrykkeligt afbrudt og erstattet af 5C . September 9 , 2014 , de 16 og 32 GB iPhone 5C modeller blev erstattet af 8 GB model med annonceringen af iPhone 6 og iPhone 6 Plus . September 9 , 2015 , 8 GB version blev afbrudt ved annonceringen af iPhone 6S .
evidence_en: The iPhone 5C -LRB- marketed with a stylized lowercase ` c ' as iPhone 5c -RRB- is a smartphone that was designed and marketed by Apple Inc. . The device was part of the iPhone series and was unveiled on September 10 , 2013 , and released on September 20 , 2013 , along with its higher-end counterpart , the iPhone 5S .   The iPhone 5C is a variant of the iPhone 5 , with similar hardware specifications but a hard-coated polycarbonate shell instead of the aluminium of the original iPhone 5 . The iPhone 5C was available in several color options , and shipped with iOS 7 . The iPhone 5C was sold at a discounted price point in comparison to the 5S : unlike Apple 's prior practice of lowering the price of the previous model upon release of a new version , the iPhone 5 was explicitly discontinued and replaced by the 5C . On September 9 , 2014 , the 16 and 32 GB iPhone 5C models were replaced by the 8 GB model with the announcement of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus . On September 9 , 2015 , the 8 GB version was discontinued upon the announcement of the iPhone 6S .

evidence_da: Glenn Close -LRB- født 19 marts , 1947 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller , sanger og filmproducent . Med en skuespillerkarriere, der strækker sig over 40 år , har hun været konsekvent rost for sin alsidighed og er bredt anerkendt som en af de fineste skuespillerinder i hendes generation . Hun har vundet tre Emmy Awards , tre Tony Awards , fire Golden Globe Awards , og har modtaget seks Academy Award nomineringer .   Close begyndte sin professionelle scenekarriere i 1974 i Love for Love , og var for det meste en New York scene skuespiller gennem resten af 1970'erne og begyndelsen af 1980'erne , optræder i både skuespil og musicals , herunder Broadway produktioner af Barnum i 1980 og The Real Thing i 1983  , som hun vandt Tony Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle i et skuespil . Hendes filmdebut var i The World Ifølge Garp -LRB- 1982 -RRB- , som hun fulgte op med biroller i The Big Chill-LRB- 1983 -RRB- og The Natural -LRB- 1984 -RRB- ; alle tre optjent hendes nomineringer til Academy Award for bedste kvindelige birolle . Hun ville senere modtage nomineringer til Academy Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle for hendes præstationer i Fatal Attraction -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , Farlige Liaisons -LRB- 1988 -RRB- og Albert Nobbs -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . Hun vandt yderligere to Tony Awards i 1990'erne , for Death and the Maiden i 1992 og Sunset Boulevard i 1995 , mens hun vandt sin første Emmy Award for tv-filmen Serving in Silence fra 1995: The Margarethe Cammermeyer Story .   Hun medvirkede som Eleanor af Aquitaine i 2003 tv-filmen The Lion in Winter , vinde en Golden Globe Award . I 2005 medvirkede hun i dramaserien The Shield . Derefter , fra 2007 til 2012 , hun spillede som Patty Hewes i FX dramaserie Damages , en rolle, der vandt hende en Golden Globe og to Emmys . Hun har givet udtryk for karakter af Mona Simpson i den animerede sitcom The Simpsons siden 1995 . Hun vendte tilbage til Broadway i november 2014, i en genoplivning af Edward Albee 's A Delicate Balance. Hendes andre film omfatter Jagged Edge -LRB- 1985 -RRB- , Hamlet-LRB- 1990 -RRB- , Tilbageførsel af Fortune -LRB- 1990 -RRB- , 101 Dalmatinere -LRB- 199 6 -RRB- , Paradise Road -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , Air Force One -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , Cookie 's Fortune -LRB- 1999 -RRB- Heights -LRB- 2005  -RRB- , Guardians of the Galaxy -LRB- 2014 -RRB- og The Girl With All The Gifts -LRB- 2016 -RRB- .   Close er en seks-tiden Academy Award kandidat , binde rekorden for at være skuespiller med de fleste nomineringer aldrig at have vundet -LRB- sammen med Deborah Kerr og Thelma Ritter-RRB- . Fra 2016 , Close har flere Oscar-nomineringer uden en sejr end nogen anden levende skuespiller . Desuden har hun været nomineret til fire Tonys -LRB- tre sejre -RRB-, fjorten Emmys -LRB- tre sejre -RRB- , tretten Golden Globes -LRB- to sejre -RRB-, to Drama Desk Awards -LRB- en sejr -RRB- og otte Screen Actors Guild Awards -LRB-one win-RRB- . Hun har også vundet en Obie pris og er blevet nomineret til tre Grammy Awards og en BAFTA . Close har modtaget en stjerne på Hollywood Walk of Fame og er blevet optaget i American Theater Hall of Fame .
evidence_en: Glenn Close -LRB- born March 19 , 1947 -RRB- is an American actress , singer and film producer . With an acting career spanning over 40 years , she has been consistently acclaimed for her versatility and is widely regarded as one of the finest actresses of her generation . She has won three Emmy Awards , three Tony Awards , four Golden Globe Awards , and has received six Academy Award nominations .   Close began her professional stage career in 1974 in Love for Love , and was mostly a New York stage actress through the rest of the 1970s and early 1980s , appearing in both plays and musicals , including the Broadway productions of Barnum in 1980 and The Real Thing in 1983 , for which she won the Tony Award for Best Actress in a Play . Her film debut was in The World According to Garp -LRB- 1982 -RRB- , which she followed up with supporting roles in The Big Chill -LRB- 1983 -RRB- and The Natural -LRB- 1984 -RRB- ; all three earned her nominations for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress . She would later receive nominations for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performances in Fatal Attraction -LRB- 1987 -RRB- , Dangerous Liaisons -LRB- 1988 -RRB- and Albert Nobbs -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . She won two more Tony Awards in the 1990s , for Death and the Maiden in 1992 and Sunset Boulevard in 1995 , while she won her first Emmy Award for the 1995 TV film Serving in Silence : The Margarethe Cammermeyer Story .   She starred as Eleanor of Aquitaine in the 2003 TV film The Lion in Winter , winning a Golden Globe Award . In 2005 , she starred in the drama series The Shield . Then , from 2007 to 2012 , she starred as Patty Hewes in the FX drama series Damages , a role that won her a Golden Globe and two Emmys . She has voiced the character of Mona Simpson in the animated sitcom The Simpsons since 1995 . She returned to Broadway in November 2014 , in a revival of Edward Albee 's A Delicate Balance . Her other films include Jagged Edge -LRB- 1985 -RRB- , Hamlet -LRB- 1990 -RRB- , Reversal of Fortune -LRB- 1990 -RRB- , 101 Dalmatians -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , Paradise Road -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , Air Force One -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , Cookie 's Fortune -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , Heights -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , Guardians of the Galaxy -LRB- 2014 -RRB- and The Girl With All The Gifts -LRB- 2016 -RRB- .   Close is a six-time Academy Award nominee , tying the record for being the actress with the most nominations never to have won -LRB- along with Deborah Kerr and Thelma Ritter -RRB- . As of 2016 , Close has more Oscar nominations without a win than any other living actor . In addition , she has been nominated for four Tonys -LRB- three wins -RRB- , fourteen Emmys -LRB- three wins -RRB- , thirteen Golden Globes -LRB- two wins -RRB- , two Drama Desk Awards -LRB- one win -RRB- and eight Screen Actors Guild Awards -LRB- one win -RRB- . She has also won an Obie award and has been nominated for three Grammy Awards and a BAFTA . Close has received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame and has been inducted into the American Theater Hall of Fame .

evidence_da: Scanline VFX er en visuel effekter selskab med kontorer i Los Angeles , Vancouver og München . Scanline var eneudvikler for Flowline , som det modtog en 2008 Scientific and Technical Achievement Academy Award . I 2008 blev virksomheden nomineret til en Oscar for bedste præstation i visuelle effekter for sit arbejde med instruktøren Clint Eastwood 's '' Hereafter '', som det var den eneste visuelle effekter sælger . Virksomheden arbejder hovedsageligt i spillefilm og tv-film, og tilbyder VFX , 3D animerede funktioner og post-produktion tjenester .   Los Angeles studiet åbnede i 2007 , under præsident og VFX Supervisor , Stephan Trojansky . Tidligere kreditter omfatter '' The Avengers '' , '' Slagskib '' , '' Immortals '' , '' 2012 '' , '' 300 '' , '' Herefter '' og '' Super 8 '' , hvor det skabte den højt respekterede togulykke sekvens , i samarbejde med ILM .
evidence_en: Scanline VFX is a visual effects company with offices in Los Angeles , Vancouver and Munich . The company is known for its proprietary , in-house fluid effects software Flowline , which is used in various fluid effects like water and fire . Scanline was sole developer for Flowline , for which it received a 2008 Scientific and Technical Achievement Academy Award . In 2008 , the company was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Achievement in Visual Effects for its work on director Clint Eastwood 's `` Hereafter '' , for which it was the sole visual effects vendor . The company works mainly in feature films and TV movies , and offers VFX , 3D animated features and post-production services .   The Los Angeles studio opened in 2007 , under President and VFX Supervisor , Stephan Trojansky . Trojanksy was one of the recipients of the 2008 Scientific and Technical Achievement Academy Award for the development of Flowline , as well as an Oscar nominee for `` Hereafter '' .   Scanline VFX/Los Angeles has worked on `` The Wolf of Wall Street '' , `` Man of Steel '' , `` 300 : Rise of an Empire '' , `` Iron Man 3 '' and `` A Good Day to Die Hard '' . Past credits include `` The Avengers '' , `` Battleship '' , `` Immortals '' , `` 2012 '' , `` 300 '' , `` Hereafter '' , and `` Super 8 '' , on which it created the highly regarded train crash sequence , in collaboration with ILM .

evidence_en: Steven Andrew Soderbergh -LRB- -LSB- ˈsoʊdərbɜrɡ -RSB- born January 14 , 1963 -RRB- is an American film producer , director , screenwriter , cinematographer and editor . His indie drama Sex , Lies , and Videotape -LRB- 1989 -RRB- won the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival , and became a worldwide commercial success , making the then-26-year-old Soderbergh the youngest director to win the festival 's top award . Film critic Roger Ebert dubbed Soderbergh the `` poster boy of the Sundance generation '' .   He is best known for directing critically acclaimed commercial Hollywood films including the crime comedy Out of Sight -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , the biographical film Erin Brockovich -LRB- 2000 -RRB- , the crime drama film Traffic -LRB- 2000 -RRB- -LRB- for which he won the Academy Award for Best Director -RRB- , the 2001 remake of the comedy heist film Ocean 's 11 and its two sequels -- known collectively as the Ocean 's Trilogy , the medical thriller Contagion -LRB- 2011 -RRB- and the comedy-drama Magic Mike -LRB- 2012 -RRB- .   He has also directed smaller , less conventional works , such as the mystery thriller Kafka -LRB- 1991 -RRB- ; the experimental comedy film Schizopolis -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , which has a non-linear narrative ; Bubble -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , which uses no script and non-professional actors ; the experimental drama film The Girlfriend Experience -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , which starred the then-active pornographic actress Sasha Grey ; and the biopic about Marxist revolutionary Ernesto `` Che '' Guevara , Che -LRB- 2008 -RRB- .  Soderbergh also directed , photographed and edited all episodes of the television drama The Knick . In addition , he has produced numerous film and television programs , and provided cinematography and editing on various projects .

evidence_da: Grevinde Rose Elizabeth Fitzgerald Kennedy -LRB- Juli 22 , 1890 - Januar 22 , 1995 -RRB- var en amerikansk filantrop, hundredårige og socialite . Hun var dybt indlejret i '' lace gardin '' irske katolske samfund i Boston , hvor hendes far var borgmester . Hun var gift med forretningsmand og investor Joseph P. Kennedy Sr. , der var USA's ambassadør ved Court of St James 's . Deres ni børn omfattede præsident John F. Kennedy , senator Robert F. Kennedy , og mangeårige senator Ted Kennedy . Hun var den sjette amerikanske kvinde, der skal tildeles titlen grevinde af Vatikanet .
evidence_en: Countess Rose Elizabeth Fitzgerald Kennedy -LRB- July 22 , 1890 -- January 22 , 1995 -RRB- was an American philanthropist , centenarian and socialite . She was deeply embedded in the `` lace curtain '' Irish Catholic community in Boston , where her father was mayor . She was the wife of businessman and investor Joseph P. Kennedy Sr. , who was United States Ambassador to the Court of St James 's . Their nine children included President John F. Kennedy , Senator Robert F. Kennedy , and longtime Senator Ted Kennedy . She was the sixth American woman to be granted the title of Countess by the Vatican .

evidence_da: The Hundred-Foot Journey er en amerikansk komedie-dramafilm fra 2014 instrueret af Lasse Hallström fra et manuskript skrevet af Steven Knight , tilpasset fra Richard Morais ' roman af samme navn . Filmen stjerner Helen Mirren , Om Puri , Manish Dayal og Charlotte Le Bon og fortæller historien om en fejde mellem to tilstødende restauranter i en fransk by : den ene drives af en nyligt flyttet indisk familie og den anden , en ophøjet Michelin-stjerne restaurant .   Produceret af Steven Spielberg og Oprah Winfrey for DreamWorks Pictures gennem deres respektive produktionsselskaber , Amblin Entertainment og Harpo Films , i samarbejde med Deltager Media og Image Nation , det blev udgivet af Touchstone Pictures august 8 , 2014 , modtager generelt positive anmeldelser og tjener næsten 90 millioner dollars på verdensplan box office .
evidence_en: The Hundred-Foot Journey is a 2014 American comedy-drama film directed by Lasse Hallström from a screenplay written by Steven Knight , adapted from Richard Morais ' 2010 novel of the same name . The film stars Helen Mirren , Om Puri , Manish Dayal and Charlotte Le Bon and tells the story of a feud between two adjacent restaurants in a French town : one operated by a recently relocated Indian family and the other , a lofty Michelin-starred restaurant .   Produced by Steven Spielberg and Oprah Winfrey for DreamWorks Pictures through their respective production companies , Amblin Entertainment and Harpo Films , in association with Participant Media and Image Nation , it was released by Touchstone Pictures on August 8 , 2014 , receiving generally positive reviews and earning nearly $ 90 million at the worldwide box office .
