evidence_en: Paweł Aleksander Pawlikowski -LRB- -LSB- ˈpavɛw alɛˈksandɛr pavliˈkɔfskʲi -RSB- ; born 15 September 1957 -RRB- is a Polish-British filmmaker , who has lived and worked most of his life in the UK . He garnered much acclaim for a string of award winning documentaries in the 1990s and for his feature films Last Resort and My Summer of Love , both of which won a BAFTA and many other European awards . His latest film , Ida , won the 2015 Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film .

evidence_da: Ægteskab mellem personer af samme køn har været lovligt i Brasilien siden den 16 . Dommen er anket til Højesteret .   Fagforeninger af samme køn var allerede blevet juridisk anerkendt siden 2004 . Efter en afgørelse fra Brasiliens højesteret havde de såkaldte stabile fagforeninger -LRB- união estável -RRB - været tilgængelig for par af samme køn siden maj 2011 . Disse fagforeninger fik de fleste af rettighederne for ægteskaber , herunder vedtagelse, velfærdsydelser , pension, arveafgift, indkomstskat, social sikring, sundhedsmæssige fordele, indvandring, fælles ejendomsret, hospital og fængsel visitation , IVF og surrogacy .  Denne beslutning banede vejen for fremtidig lovgivning om ægteskabsrettigheder mellem personer af samme køn . Før den landsdækkende lovgivning , Alagoas , Bahia , Ceará , Espírito Santo , Federal District , Mato Grosso do Sul , Paraíba , Paraná , Piauí , Rondônia , Santa Catarina , Santa Rita do Sapucaí -LRB- MG -RRB- , São Paulo , og Sergipe havde allerede tilladt af samme køn marri aldre og flere fagforeninger blev omdannet til fuld ægteskaber af statslige dommere . I Rio de Janeiro kunne par af samme køn også gifte sig , men kun hvis lokale dommere var enige i deres anmodning .   maj 2013 legaliserede Justice 's National Council of Brazil ægteskab mellem personer af samme køn i hele landet i en 14-1-afstemning ved at udstede en afgørelse, der pålægger alle civile registre i landet at udføre ægteskaber mellem personer af samme køn og konvertere eksisterende civile union i et ægteskab, hvis parret ønsker det . Joaquim Barbosa , formand for Rådet for Retfærdighed og højesteret, sagde , at notarer ikke kan fortsætte med at nægte at "" udføre et civilt bryllup eller omdannelsen af en stabil civil union til et ægteskab mellem mennesker af samme køn . »« Dommen blev offentliggjort den 15.
evidence_en: Same-sex marriage has been legal in Brazil since 16 May 2013 , following the National Justice Council decision , which orders notaries of every state to perform same-sex marriages . The ruling is on appeal to the Supreme Court .   Same-sex unions had already been legally recognized since 2004 . Following a ruling of the Supreme Court of Brazil , so-called stable unions -LRB- união estável -RRB- had been available for same-sex couples since May 2011 . These unions were granted most of the rights of marriages , including adoption , welfare benefits , pension , inheritance tax , income tax , social security , health benefits , immigration , joint property ownership , hospital and prison visitation , IVF and surrogacy .  This decision paved the way for future legislation on same-sex matrimonial rights . Before the nationwide legislation , Alagoas , Bahia , Ceará , Espírito Santo , the Federal District , Mato Grosso do Sul , Paraíba , Paraná , Piauí , Rondônia , Santa Catarina , Santa Rita do Sapucaí -LRB- MG -RRB- , São Paulo , and Sergipe had already allowed same-sex marriages and several unions were converted into full marriages by state judges . In Rio de Janeiro , same-sex couples could also marry but only if local judges agreed with their request .   Nevertheless , on 14 May 2013 , the Justice 's National Council of Brazil legalized same-sex marriage in the entire country in a 14-1 vote by issuing a ruling that orders all civil registers of the country to perform same-sex marriages and convert any existing civil union into a marriage , if the couple wish so . Joaquim Barbosa , president of the Council of Justice and the Supreme Federal Court , said that notaries can not continue to refuse to `` perform a civil wedding or the conversion of a stable civil union into a marriage between people of the same sex . '' The ruling was published on 15 May and took effect on 16 May 2013 .

evidence_da: Nike , Inc. -LRB- officielle , -LSB- יnaיki -RSB- også, ikke-AMERIKANSKE -LSB- ' naיk -RSB- -RRB- er et amerikansk multinationalt selskab, der er involveret i design, udvikling, produktion, og verdensomspændende markedsføring og salg af fodtøj, beklædning, udstyr, tilbehør og tjenester . Virksomheden har hovedkvarter nær Beaverton , Oregon , i Portland hovedstadsområdet. Det er en af verdens største leverandører af atletiske sko og beklædning og en stor producent af sportsudstyr , med en omsætning på over US $ 24.1 milliarder i sit regnskabsår 2012 -LRB- slutter 31 maj 2012 -RRB- . Pr. 2012 beskæftigede den mere end 44.000 mennesker på verdensplan . I 2014 blev mærket alene vurderet til 19 milliarder dollar , hvilket gør det til det mest værdifulde brand blandt sportsvirksomheder .   januar 1964 , som Blue Ribbon Sports , af Bill Bowerman og Phil Knight , og officielt blev Nike , Inc. maj 30 , 1971 . Virksomheden tager sit navn fra Nike , den græske gudinde for sejr . Nike markedsfører sine produkter under eget mærke, samt Nike Golf , Nike Pro , Nike + , Air Jordan , Nike Blazers , Air Force 1 , Nike Dunk , Air Max, Foamposite , Nike Skateboarding , og datterselskaber, herunder Brand Jordan , Hurley International og Converse . Nike ejede også Bauer Hockey -LRB- senere omdøbt Nike Bauer -RRB- mellem 1995 og 2008 , og tidligere ejede Cole Haan og Umbro . Ud over fremstilling af sportstøj og udstyr driver virksomheden butikker under Niketown-navnet . Nike sponsorerer mange højt profilerede atleter og sportshold rundt om i verden, med de meget anerkendte varemærker tilhørende '' Just Do It '' og Swoosh-logoet.
evidence_en: Nike , Inc. -LRB- official , -LSB- ˈnaɪki -RSB- also , non-US -LSB- ` naɪk -RSB- -RRB- is an American multinational corporation that is engaged in the design , development , manufacturing , and worldwide marketing and sales of footwear , apparel , equipment , accessories , and services . The company is headquartered near Beaverton , Oregon , in the Portland metropolitan area . It is one of the world 's largest suppliers of athletic shoes and apparel and a major manufacturer of sports equipment , with revenue in excess of US$ 24.1 billion in its fiscal year 2012 -LRB- ending May 31 , 2012 -RRB- . As of 2012 , it employed more than 44,000 people worldwide . In 2014 the brand alone was valued at $ 19 billion , making it the most valuable brand among sports businesses .   The company was founded on January 25 , 1964 , as Blue Ribbon Sports , by Bill Bowerman and Phil Knight , and officially became Nike , Inc. on May 30 , 1971 . The company takes its name from Nike , the Greek goddess of victory . Nike markets its products under its own brand , as well as Nike Golf , Nike Pro , Nike + , Air Jordan , Nike Blazers , Air Force 1 , Nike Dunk , Air Max , Foamposite , Nike Skateboarding , and subsidiaries including Brand Jordan , Hurley International and Converse . Nike also owned Bauer Hockey -LRB- later renamed Nike Bauer -RRB- between 1995 and 2008 , and previously owned Cole Haan and Umbro . In addition to manufacturing sportswear and equipment , the company operates retail stores under the Niketown name . Nike sponsors many high-profile athletes and sports teams around the world , with the highly recognized trademarks of `` Just Do It '' and the Swoosh logo .

evidence_da: Trevor Berbick -LRB- August 1 , 1954 - Oktober 28 , 2006 -RRB- var en jamaicansk canadisk professionel bokser, der konkurrerede fra 1976 til 2000 . Han vandt WBC sværvægter titel i 1986 ved at besejre Pinklon Thomas , men mistede det i sit første forsvar til Mike Tyson , som derefter var ubesejret på 20 år gammel . Berbick var også den sidste bokser til at bekæmpe Muhammad Ali , besejre ham i 1981 .   Som amatør vandt Berbick en bronzemedalje i sværvægtsdivisionen ved Pan American Games i 1975 . I både sin tidlige og sene professionelle karriere havde han den canadiske sværvægtstitel to gange , fra 1979 til 1986 og 1999 til 2001 .
evidence_en: Trevor Berbick -LRB- August 1 , 1954 -- October 28 , 2006 -RRB- was a Jamaican Canadian professional boxer who competed from 1976 to 2000 . He won the WBC heavyweight title in 1986 by defeating Pinklon Thomas , but lost it in his first defence to Mike Tyson , who was then undefeated at 20 years old . Berbick was also the last boxer to fight Muhammad Ali , defeating him in 1981 .   As an amateur , Berbick won a bronze medal in the heavyweight division at the 1975 Pan American Games . In both his early and late professional career he held the Canadian heavyweight title twice , from 1979 to 1986 and 1999 to 2001 .

evidence_da: Charles , Prins af Wales -LRB- Charles Philip Arthur George ; født 14 November 1948 -RRB- er den ældste barn og arving tilsyneladende af dronning Elizabeth II . Han er kendt alternativt i Det Sydvestlige England som hertug af Cornwall og i Skotland som hertug af Rothesay , og han er den længst siddende arving , der har været åben i britisk historie , efter at have haft stillingen siden 1952 . Han er også den ældste person til at være den næste i rækken til tronen siden Sophia af Hannover-LRB- arvingen formodede til dronning Anne-RRB-, der døde i 1714 i en alder af 83 .   Charles blev født på Buckingham Palace som det første barnebarn af kong George VI og dronning Elizabeth . Han blev uddannet på Cheam og Gordonstoun Schools , som hans far , Prins Philip , Hertug af Edinburgh , havde deltaget som barn, samt Timbertop campus Geelong Grammar School i Victoria , Australien . Efter at have opnået en bachelor grad fra Trinity College , Cambridge , Charles tjente i Royal Navy fra 1971 til 1976 .   I 1981 giftede han sig med Lady Diana Spencer, og de havde to sønner : Prins William -LRB- født 1982 -RRB- senere at blive hertug af Cambridge , og Prins Harry -LRB- født 1984 -RRB- . I 1996 blev parret skilt efter velpublicerede udenomsægteskabelige anliggender . Diana døde i en bilulykke i Paris det følgende år . I 2005 giftede Charles sig med Camilla Parker Bowles .   Charles 's interesser omfatter en række humanitære og sociale spørgsmål : han grundlagde The Prince 's Trust i 1976 , sponsorer The Prince 's Charities , og er protektor for mange andre velgørende og kunst organisationer . Charles har længe forsvaret økologisk landbrug, som han etablerede hertugdømmet Home Farm , der drives af hertugdømmet Cornwall , som producerer ingredienser til Hertugdømmet Originals mærke, som han grundlagde i 1990 . Charles har forsøgt at øge verdens bevidsthed om de farer , som det naturlige miljø , såsom klimaændringer . Som miljøforkæmper har han modtaget adskillige priser og anerkendelse fra miljøgrupper rundt om i verden . Hans støtte til alternativ medicin - herunder homøopati - er blevet kritiseret af nogle i lægekredsen . Han har været åbenhjertig om arkitekturens rolle i samfundet og bevarelsen af historiske bygninger. Efterfølgende skabte Charles Poundbury , en eksperimentel ny by baseret på hans teorier , i Dorset i 1993 . Han har forfattet en række bøger , herunder A Vision of Britain : A Personal View of Architecture i 1989 og børnenes bog The Old Man of Lochnagar i 1980 .
evidence_en: Charles , Prince of Wales -LRB- Charles Philip Arthur George ; born 14 November 1948 -RRB- is the eldest child and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II . Known alternatively in South West England as Duke of Cornwall and in Scotland as Duke of Rothesay , he is the longest-serving heir apparent in British history , having held the position since 1952 . He is also the oldest person to be next in line to the throne since Sophia of Hanover -LRB- the heir presumptive to Queen Anne -RRB- , who died in 1714 at the age of 83 .   Charles was born at Buckingham Palace as the first grandchild of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth . He was educated at Cheam and Gordonstoun Schools , which his father , Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh , had attended as a child , as well as the Timbertop campus of Geelong Grammar School in Victoria , Australia . After earning a bachelor of arts degree from Trinity College , Cambridge , Charles served in the Royal Navy from 1971 to 1976 .   In 1981 , he married Lady Diana Spencer and they had two sons : Prince William -LRB- born 1982 -RRB- later to become Duke of Cambridge , and Prince Harry -LRB- born 1984 -RRB- . In 1996 , the couple divorced , following well-publicised extramarital affairs . Diana died in a car crash in Paris the following year . In 2005 , Charles married Camilla Parker Bowles .   Charles 's interests encompass a range of humanitarian and social issues : he founded The Prince 's Trust in 1976 , sponsors The Prince 's Charities , and is patron of numerous other charitable and arts organisations . Charles has long championed organic farming for which he established the Duchy Home Farm , run by the Duchy of Cornwall , which produces ingredients for the Duchy Originals brand which he founded in 1990 . Charles has sought to raise world awareness of the dangers facing the natural environment , such as climate change . As an environmentalist , he has received numerous awards and recognition from environmental groups around the world . His support for alternative medicine , including homeopathy , has been criticised by some in the medical community . He has been outspoken on the role of architecture in society and the conservation of historic buildings . Subsequently , Charles created Poundbury , an experimental new town based on his theories , in Dorset in 1993 . He has authored a number of books , including A Vision of Britain : A Personal View of Architecture in 1989 and the children 's book The Old Man of Lochnagar in 1980 .

evidence_da: Georgia Institute of Technology -LRB - almindeligvis benævnt Georgia Tech , Tech , eller GT-RRB- er en offentlig forskning universitet i Atlanta , Georgia , i USA . Det er en del af University System of Georgia og har satellit campusser i Savannah , Georgien; Metz , Frankrig ; Athlone , Irland ; Shenzhen , Kina ; og Singapore .   Uddannelsesinstitutionen blev grundlagt i 1885 som Georgia School of Technology som en del af genopbygningenplaner om at opbygge en industriel økonomi i det sydlige USA efter borgerkrigen. I første omgang tilbød den kun en grad i maskinteknik . I 1901 var dens læseplan udvidet til at omfatte elektrisk , civil og kemisk teknik . I 1948 skiftede skolen navn for at afspejle dens udvikling fra en handelsskole til et større og mere kompetent teknisk institut og forskningsuniversitet .   I dag er Georgia Tech organiseret i seks gymnasier og indeholder ca . Det er godt anerkendt for sin grad programmer inden for teknik , computing , business administration , videnskab, design , og liberale kunst . Georgia Tech er rangeret 7:e blandt alle offentlige nationale universiteter i USA og 34:e blandt alle gymnasier og universiteter i US News & World Report rankings , Georgia Tech er også højt respekteret internationalt for sine ingeniør-og forretningsprogrammer , og er blevet rangeret som den "smarteste ' offentlige college i Amerika -LRB- baseret på gennemsnitlige standardiserede test scores -RRB- .   Student atletik , både organiseret og intramural , er en del af studerende og alumner liv . Skolens intercollegiate konkurrencedygtige sportshold , den fire-tiden fodbold nationale mester Yellow Jackets , og den nationalt anerkendte kamp sang '' Ramblin ' Wreck fra Georgia Tech '', har bidraget til at holde Georgia Tech i det nationale søgelys . Georgia Tech felter otte mænds og syv kvinders hold, der konkurrerer i NCAA Division I atletik og Football Bowl Subdivision . Georgia Tech er medlem af Kystafdelingen i Atlanterhavskysten konference .
evidence_en: The Georgia Institute of Technology -LRB- commonly referred to as Georgia Tech , Tech , or GT -RRB- is a public research university in Atlanta , Georgia , in the United States . It is a part of the University System of Georgia and has satellite campuses in Savannah , Georgia ; Metz , France ; Athlone , Ireland ; Shenzhen , China ; and Singapore .   The educational institution was founded in 1885 as the Georgia School of Technology as part of Reconstruction plans to build an industrial economy in the post-Civil War Southern United States . Initially , it offered only a degree in mechanical engineering . By 1901 , its curriculum had expanded to include electrical , civil , and chemical engineering . In 1948 , the school changed its name to reflect its evolution from a trade school to a larger and more capable technical institute and research university .   Today , Georgia Tech is organized into six colleges and contains about 31 departments/units , with emphasis on science and technology . It is well recognized for its degree programs in engineering , computing , business administration , the sciences , design , and liberal arts . Georgia Tech is ranked 7th among all public national universities in the United States and 34th among all colleges and universities in U.S. News & World Report rankings , Georgia Tech is also highly regarded internationally for its engineering and business programs , and has been ranked as the `` smartest '' public college in America -LRB- based on average standardized test scores -RRB- .   Student athletics , both organized and intramural , are a part of student and alumni life . The school 's intercollegiate competitive sports teams , the four-time football national champion Yellow Jackets , and the nationally recognized fight song `` Ramblin ' Wreck from Georgia Tech '' , have helped keep Georgia Tech in the national spotlight . Georgia Tech fields eight men 's and seven women 's teams that compete in the NCAA Division I athletics and the Football Bowl Subdivision . Georgia Tech is a member of the Coastal Division in the Atlantic Coast Conference .

evidence_da: Patrick Joseph Wilson -LRB- født 3 juli , 1973 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller og sanger . Han tilbragte sin tidlige karriere hovedrollen i Broadway musicals , der begynder i 1995 . Han er en to-tiden Tony Award nomineret for sine roller i The Full Monty -LRB- 2000 - 2001 -RRB- og Oklahoma ! -LRB- 2002 -RRB- . I 2003, han dukkede op i HBO miniserie Angels i Amerika, som han blev nomineret til Golden Globe Award og Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding birolle i en miniserie eller en film .   Wilson har også optrådt i spillefilm som The Phantom of the Opera -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , Little Children -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Watchmen -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , Snigende -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Snigende : Kapitel 2 -- LRB- 2013 -RRB- og som dæmonolog Ed Warren i James Wan 's overnaturlige horror film The Conjuring -LRB- 2013 -RRB- og The Conjuring 2 -LRB- 2016 -RRB- , de sidste fire tjener ham et ry som en '' skrige konge ''. På tv medvirkede han i CBS dramaserien A Gifted Man -LRB- 2011 -- 2012 -RRB- , og som Lou Solverson i anden sæson af FX 's antologi serie Fargo -LRB- 2015 -RRB-, som han modtog en anden Golden Globe Award nominering . Han er blevet castet som Orm Marius / Ocean Master i DC Extended Universe superhelte film Aquaman -LRB- 2018 -RRB- .
evidence_en: Patrick Joseph Wilson -LRB- born July 3 , 1973 -RRB- is an American actor and singer . He spent his early career starring in Broadway musicals , beginning in 1995 . He is a two-time Tony Award nominee for his roles in The Full Monty -LRB- 2000 -- 2001 -RRB- and Oklahoma ! -LRB- 2002 -RRB- . In 2003 , he appeared in the HBO miniseries Angels in America for which he was nominated for the Golden Globe Award and Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Miniseries or a Movie .   Wilson has also appeared in feature films such as The Phantom of the Opera -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , Little Children -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Watchmen -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , Insidious -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Insidious : Chapter 2 -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , and as demonologist Ed Warren in James Wan 's supernatural horror films The Conjuring -LRB- 2013 -RRB- and The Conjuring 2 -LRB- 2016 -RRB- , the latter four earning him a reputation as a `` scream king '' . On television , he starred in the CBS drama series A Gifted Man -LRB- 2011 -- 2012 -RRB- , and as Lou Solverson in the second season of FX 's anthology series Fargo -LRB- 2015 -RRB- , for which he received a second Golden Globe Award nomination . He has been cast as Orm Marius/Ocean Master in the DC Extended Universe superhero film Aquaman -LRB- 2018 -RRB- .

evidence_da: Gone Girl er en amerikansk psykologisk thrillerfilm fra 2014 instrueret af David Fincher og skrevet af Gillian Flynn , baseret på hendes roman af samme navn i 2012 . Filmen stjerner Ben Affleck , Rosamund Pike , Neil Patrick Harris og Tyler Perry . Set i det sydvestlige Missouri , historien begynder som et mysterium, der følger begivenhederne omkring Nick Dunne-LRB- Affleck-RRB-, der bliver den primære mistænkte i den pludselige forsvinden af sin kone , Amy-LRB- Pike-RRB-.   Filmen havde sin verdenspremiere på åbningsaftenen for 52nd New York Film Festival september 26 , 2014 , før en landsdækkende teatralske udgivelse oktober 3 . Det blev modtaget godt kritisk og var en kommerciel succes , opregning $ 369 millioner , hvilket gør det til den højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film af Fincher . Rosamund Pike 's præstation blev især rost , og hun modtog nomineringer til en Oscar , BAFTA Award , Golden Globe Award og Screen Actors Guild Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle . Yderligere nomineringer omfattede en Golden Globe Award for bedste instruktør for Fincher og Golden Globe Award , BAFTA Award og Critics ' Choice Award nomineringer til Flynn 's tilpassede manuskript , modtager prisen for sidstnævnte .
evidence_en: Gone Girl is a 2014 American psychological thriller film directed by David Fincher and written by Gillian Flynn , based on her 2012 novel of the same name . The film stars Ben Affleck , Rosamund Pike , Neil Patrick Harris and Tyler Perry . Set in Southwest Missouri , the story begins as a mystery that follows the events surrounding Nick Dunne -LRB- Affleck -RRB- , who becomes the primary suspect in the sudden disappearance of his wife , Amy -LRB- Pike -RRB- .   The film had its world premiere on opening night of the 52nd New York Film Festival on September 26 , 2014 , before a nationwide theatrical release on October 3 . It was received well critically and was a commercial success , grossing $ 369 million , making it the highest-grossing film by Fincher . Rosamund Pike 's performance was particularly praised , and she received nominations for an Academy Award , BAFTA Award , Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Actress . Further nominations included a Golden Globe Award for Best Director for Fincher and Golden Globe Award , BAFTA Award and Critics ' Choice Award nominations for Flynn 's adapted screenplay , receiving the award for the latter .

evidence_da: Eldrick Tont '' Tiger '' Woods -LRB- født December 30 , 1975 -RRB- er en amerikansk professionel golfspiller, der er blandt de mest succesfulde golfspillere gennem tiderne . Han har været en af de højest betalte atleter i verden i flere år .   Efter en fremragende junior , college og amatør karriere , Woods blev professionel i en alder af 20 , i slutningen af sommeren i 1996 . I april 1997 havde han allerede vundet sin første major , 1997 Masters . Woods vandt denne turnering i en rekordstor præstation , vinde med 12 slag, mens lommetyveri $ 486.000 . Han nåede første gang nummer et på verdensranglisten i juni 1997 , efter mindre end et år som professionel . Gennem 2000'erne , Woods var den dominerende kraft i golf; fra august 1999 til september 2004 -LRB- 264 uger -RRB- og fra juni 2005 til oktober 2010 -LRB- 281 uger -RRB-, Woods var den højest rangerede mænds golfspiller i verden .   Fra december 2009 til begyndelsen af april 2010 tog Woods orlov fra professionel golf for at fokusere på sit personlige liv, efter at han indrømmede utroskab. På trods af forsøg på forsoning blev han og hans kone Elin Nordegren til sidst skilt . Hans mange påståede udenomsægteskabelige indiskretion blev afsløret af flere kvinder , gennem mange verdensomspændende medier kilder . Dette blev efterfulgt af et tab af golf form , og hans placering gradvist faldt til et lavt niveau på Nr. 58 i november 2011 . Han sluttede en karriere-høj winless streak af 107 uger, da han triumferede i Chevron World Challenge i december 2011 . Efter at have vundet Arnold Palmer Invitational marts 25 , 2013 , han steg op til No. 1 ranking igen, holde toppen stedet indtil maj 2014 . Woods havde rygkirurgi i april 2014 og september 2015 og har kæmpet siden for at genvinde sin dominerende form . Marts 29 , 2015 , Woods var faldet til # 104 , uden for top 100 for første gang siden 1996 . I maj 2016 , Woods droppede ud af verdens top 500 for første gang i sin professionelle karriere .   Woods har brudt mange golf optegnelser . Han har været World Number One for de mest på hinanden følgende uger og for det største samlede antal uger af enhver golfspiller . Han er blevet tildelt PGA Player of the Year en rekord elleve gange , Byron Nelson Award for laveste justeret scoring gennemsnit en rekord otte gange , og har rekorden for at føre penge listen i ti forskellige sæsoner .  Han har vundet 14 professionelle store golf mesterskaber , den næsthøjeste af enhver spiller -LRB- Jack Nicklaus fører med 18 -RRB- og 79 PGA Tour begivenheder , anden hele tiden bag Sam Snead , der havde 82 sejre . Han har mere karriere store sejre og karriere PGA Tour vinder end nogen anden aktiv golfspiller . Han er den yngste spiller til at opnå karrieren Grand Slam , og den yngste og hurtigste til at vinde 50 turneringer på turné . Derudover, Woods er kun den anden golfspiller-LRB- efter Nicklaus -RRB- at have opnået en karriere Grand Slam tre gange . Woods har vundet 18 World Golf Championships , og vandt mindst en af disse begivenheder i hver af de første 11 år efter de begyndte i 1999 . Woods og Rory McIlroy er de eneste golfspillere til at vinde både Sølvmedalje og Guldmedalje på The Open Championship .
evidence_en: Eldrick Tont `` Tiger '' Woods -LRB- born December 30 , 1975 -RRB- is an American professional golfer who is among the most successful golfers of all time . He has been one of the highest-paid athletes in the world for several years .   Following an outstanding junior , college , and amateur career , Woods turned professional at the age of 20 , at the end of the summer in 1996 . By April 1997 he had already won his first major , the 1997 Masters . Woods won this tournament in a record-breaking performance , winning by 12 strokes while pocketing $ 486,000 . He first reached the number one position in the world rankings in June 1997 , after less than a year as a professional . Throughout the 2000s , Woods was the dominant force in golf ; from August 1999 to September 2004 -LRB- 264 weeks -RRB- and from June 2005 to October 2010 -LRB- 281 weeks -RRB- , Woods was the top-ranked men 's golfer in the world .   From December 2009 to early April 2010 , Woods took leave from professional golf to focus on his personal life after he admitted infidelity . Despite attempts at reconciliation , he and his wife Elin Nordegren eventually divorced . His many alleged extramarital indiscretions were revealed by several women , through many worldwide media sources . This was followed by a loss of golf form , and his ranking gradually fell to a low of No. 58 in November 2011 . He ended a career-high winless streak of 107 weeks when he triumphed in the Chevron World Challenge in December 2011 . After winning the Arnold Palmer Invitational on March 25 , 2013 , he ascended to the No. 1 ranking once again , holding the top spot until May 2014 . Woods had back surgery in April 2014 and September 2015 and has struggled since to regain his dominant form . By March 29 , 2015 , Woods had fallen to # 104 , outside of the top 100 for the first time since 1996 . In May 2016 , Woods dropped out of the world top 500 for the first time in his professional career .   Woods has broken numerous golf records . He has been World Number One for the most consecutive weeks and for the greatest total number of weeks of any golfer . He has been awarded PGA Player of the Year a record eleven times , the Byron Nelson Award for lowest adjusted scoring average a record eight times , and has the record of leading the money list in ten different seasons .  He has won 14 professional major golf championships , the second-highest of any player -LRB- Jack Nicklaus leads with 18 -RRB- , and 79 PGA Tour events , second all time behind Sam Snead , who had 82 wins . He has more career major wins and career PGA Tour wins than any other active golfer . He is the youngest player to achieve the career Grand Slam , and the youngest and fastest to win 50 tournaments on tour . Additionally , Woods is only the second golfer -LRB- after Nicklaus -RRB- to have achieved a career Grand Slam three times . Woods has won 18 World Golf Championships , and won at least one of those events in each of the first 11 years after they began in 1999 . Woods and Rory McIlroy are the only golfers to win both The Silver Medal and The Gold Medal at The Open Championship .

evidence_da: Atlantic City er en fransk-canadisk romantisk krimifilm fra 1980 instrueret af Louis Malle . Den blev filmet i slutningen af 1979 og blev udgivet i Frankrig og Tyskland i 1980 og i USA i 1981 . Scriptet blev skrevet af John Guare . Det stjerner Burt Lancaster , Susan Sarandon , Kate Reid , Robert Joy , Hollis McLaren , Michel Piccoli , og Al Waxman .   Atlantic City er blandt de 41 film, der skal nomineres til alle '' Big Five '' Academy Awards , herunder Best Picture , Bedste Instruktør, Bedste Skuespiller, Bedste Kvindelige hovedrolle og Bedste Manuskript , og en af kun otte blandt denne gruppe til ikke at tage hjem en enkelt pris .
evidence_en: Atlantic City is a 1980 French-Canadian romantic crime film directed by Louis Malle . Filmed in late 1979 , it was released in France and Germany in 1980 and in the United States in 1981 . The script was written by John Guare . It stars Burt Lancaster , Susan Sarandon , Kate Reid , Robert Joy , Hollis McLaren , Michel Piccoli , and Al Waxman .   Atlantic City is among the 41 films to be nominated for all `` Big Five '' Academy Awards , including Best Picture , Best Director , Best Actor , Best Actress and Best Screenplay , and one of only eight among this group to not take home a single award .

evidence_en: Iain Glen -LRB- born 24 June 1961 -RRB- is a Scottish film , television , and stage actor . Glen is best known for his roles as Dr. Alexander Isaacs / Tyrant in the Resident Evil films and for portraying Ser Jorah Mormont on Game of Thrones . Other notable roles include John Hanning Speke in Mountains of the Moon , Sir Richard Carlisle in Downton Abbey , the title role in Jack Taylor and Jarrod Slade in Cleverman .

evidence_en: Gianluigi `` Gigi '' Buffon -LRB- -LSB- ˈdʒiːdʒi bufˈfɔn -RSB- , Ufficiale OMRI ; born 28 January 1978 -RRB- is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper . He captains both Serie A club Juventus and the Italy national team . He is widely regarded by players , pundits and managers to be one of the greatest goalkeepers of all time , and , by some , to be the greatest ever . Buffon is one of only eighteen players to have made at least 1,000 professional career appearances ; with 168 international caps , Buffon is also the most capped player in the history of the Italian national team , the joint fifth-most capped male international footballer of all time , alongside Iván Hurtado , and the most capped European international player ever . Buffon is known for his `` outstanding shot-stopping '' and for being `` a vocal organizer of the defence and a key dressing room personality '' . He is currently the most expensive goalkeeper in history , following his $ 53 million transfer from Parma to Juventus in 2001 . Buffon holds the record for the most clean sheets in Serie A , and with the Italy national team ; he also holds the record for the longest streak without conceding a goal in Serie A history : over 12 league matches , he went unbeaten for 974 consecutive minutes during the 2015 -- 16 season , as well as having achieved the most consecutive clean sheets -LRB- 10 -RRB- in Serie A in that same season .   At club level , Buffon 's professional career began with Parma in 1995 , where he made his Serie A debut , and was soon promoted to the role of starting goalkeeper , earning a reputation as one of the most promising young goalkeepers in Italy ; during his time with the club , he won the Coppa Italia , the UEFA Cup and the Supercoppa Italiana , all in 1999 . After joining Juventus in 2001 , Buffon immediately won Serie A titles in both of his first two seasons at the club , and established himself as one of the best players in the world in his position . After winning two more consecutive league titles in 2005 and 2006 , the club were later stripped of these titles and relegated due to their involvement in the 2006 Italian football scandal . Despite rumours of his departure , Buffon remained with Juventus , contributing to the club 's Serie B title and promotion back to Serie A in 2007 . Following several trophyless seasons , Buffon later played a key role in Juventus ' resurgence , which saw the club win an Italian record of six consecutive league titles between 2011 and 2017 ; he also inherited the captain 's armband following the departure of Alessandro Del Piero in 2012 . In total , he has won eight Serie A titles , three Coppa Italia titles , and five Supercoppa Italiana titles with Juventus .   With the Italy national team , Buffon has been called up for an international record of five FIFA World Cup tournaments -LRB- 1998 , 2002 , 2006 , 2010 , 2014 -RRB- since making his debut in 1997 , featuring in four of them as Italy 's starting goalkeeper -LRB- he was an unused substitute in 1998 -RRB- . He was the starting goalkeeper of the Italian team that won the 2006 FIFA World Cup , which saw him keep a record five clean sheets , and concede only two goals , neither of which were in open play . He has also represented Italy at four European Championships , at the 1996 Olympics , and at two FIFA Confederations Cups , winning a bronze medal in the 2013 edition of the tournament .   Buffon has also won numerous , prestigious individual and team awards . He was named by Pelé in the FIFA 100 list of the world 's greatest living players in 2004 . He has been named the Serie A Goalkeeper of the Year a record eleven times . Buffon was the winner of the 2006 Yashin Award following Italy 's World Cup victory , in which he was also elected to be part of the Team of the Tournament ; an honour which he also received after reaching the quarter-finals of the 2008 European Championships , and the final of the 2012 European Championships . Buffon is the only goalkeeper to have won the UEFA Club Footballer of the Year Award , which he won in 2003 after reaching the Champions League final ; he also won the award for best Goalkeeper that year , and was voted into the UEFA Team of the Year in 2003 , 2004 , 2006 and 2016 . In 2006 , Buffon was runner-up for the Ballon d'Or and was elected to be part of the FIFPro World XI , an honour which he also achieved in 2007 . After reaching the 2015 Champions League final , he was named to the 2014 -- 15 UEFA Champions League Squad of the Season , and placed fourth in the 2015 UEFA Best Player in Europe Award . He has been named the IFFHS World 's Best Goalkeeper four times -LRB- second only to Iker Casillas , with five awards -RRB- and was also named the best goalkeeper of the 21st century , of the past 25 years , and of the decade , by the same organisation . In 2016 , he became the first goalkeeper ever to win the Golden Foot Award , which pertains to both personality and playing ability .

evidence_da: Luke Evans -LRB- født 15. april 1979 -RRB , er en walisisk skuespiller . Evans begyndte sin karriere på scenen , optræder i mange af Londons West End produktioner såsom Rent , Miss Saigon , og Piaf før at få sin Hollywood gennembrud rolle hovedrollen i Clash of the Titans 2010 genindspilning . Efter sin debut , Evans blev støbt i en sådan handling og thriller film som Immortals -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , The Raven-LRB- 2012 -RRB-, og re-forestillet De tre musketerer -LRB- 2011 -RRB- .   I 2013 medvirkede Evans som hovedantagonisten Owen Shaw i blockbusteren Fast & Furious 6 , og spillede også Bard the Bowman i Peter Jacksons tredelte tilpasning af J. R. R. Tolkiens Hobbitten . Evans også portrætteret vampyr Dracula i karakteren 's film oprindelse historie , Dracula Untold . I 2017 medvirkede Evans som Gaston i Disneys live-action tilpasning af Skønheden og Udyret .
evidence_en: Luke Evans -LRB- born 15 April 1979 -RRB- is a Welsh actor . Evans began his career on the stage , performing in many of London 's West End productions such as Rent , Miss Saigon , and Piaf before getting his Hollywood breakthrough role starring in the Clash of the Titans 2010 remake . Following his debut , Evans was cast in such action and thriller films as Immortals -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , The Raven -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , and the re-imagined The Three Musketeers -LRB- 2011 -RRB- .   In 2013 , Evans starred as the main antagonist Owen Shaw in the blockbuster Fast & Furious 6 , and also played Bard the Bowman in Peter Jackson 's three-part adaptation of J. R. R. Tolkien 's The Hobbit . Evans also portrayed the vampire Dracula in the character 's film origin story , Dracula Untold . In 2017 , Evans starred as Gaston in Disney 's live-action adaptation of Beauty and the Beast .

evidence_da: Birth of the Dragon er en amerikansk film om kampsport i 2016 instrueret af George Nolfi og skrevet af Christopher Wilkinson og Stephen J. Rivele . Filmen stjerner Philip Ng , Xia Yu , og Billy Magnussen . Den sande historie drejer sig om den unge martial kunstner Bruce Lee , der udfordrer kung fu mester Wong Jack Man i 1965 i San Francisco . Principal fotografering begyndte november 17 , 2015 i Vancouver . Det blev udvalgt til at blive screenet i Special Præsentationer sektion på 2016 Toronto International Film Festival . Filmen er planlagt til at blive frigivet på August 25 , 2017 af BH Tilt og WWE Studios .
evidence_en: Birth of the Dragon is a 2016 American biopic martial arts action film directed by George Nolfi and written by Christopher Wilkinson and Stephen J. Rivele . The film stars Philip Ng , Xia Yu , and Billy Magnussen . The true story revolves around the young martial artist Bruce Lee , who challenges kung fu master Wong Jack Man in 1965 in San Francisco . Principal photography began on November 17 , 2015 in Vancouver . It was selected to be screened in the Special Presentations section at the 2016 Toronto International Film Festival . The film is scheduled to be released on August 25 , 2017 by BH Tilt and WWE Studios .

evidence_da: Vancouver -LRB- -LSB- vængיkuיvər -RSB- , LSB- localvæķ - -RSB- -RRB- er en kysthavneby i Canada , beliggende i det nedre fastland region British Columbia . Som den mest folkerige by i provinsen registrerede folketællingen i 2016 631.486 mennesker i byen , en stigning fra 603.502 i 2011 . Greater Vancouver-området havde en befolkning på 2.463.431 i 2016 , hvilket gør det til det tredjestørste storbyområde i Canada . Vancouver har den højeste befolkningstæthed i Canada med over 5.400 mennesker pr. kvadratkilometer. Med over 250.000 indbyggere , Vancouver er den fjerde tættest befolkede by i Nordamerika bag New York City , San Francisco , og Mexico City i henhold til 2011 folketællingen . I denne folketælling var Vancouver en af de mest etnisk og sprogligt mangfoldige byer i Canada; 52 % af indbyggerne har et andet sprog end engelsk . Vancouver er klassificeret som en Beta global by.   Vancouver er konsekvent navngivet som en af de fem bedste verdensomspændende byer for livability og livskvalitet , og Economist Intelligence Unit erkendte det som den første by rangeret blandt de top-ti af verdens mest vellevende byer i fem på hinanden følgende År.  Vancouver har været vært for mange internationale konferencer og arrangementer , herunder 1954 British Empire og Commonwealth Games , FN Habitat I , Expo 86 , World Police and Fire Games i 1989 og 2009 ; og vinter-OL 2010 og paralympiske lege, som blev afholdt i Vancouver og Whistler , en udvej samfund 125 km nord for byen. I 2014 , efter tredive år i Californien , den årlige TED konference gjort Vancouver sin ubestemt hjem . Flere kampe i 2015 FIFA Women 's World Cup blev spillet i Vancouver , herunder finalen på BC Place .   Den oprindelige bosættelse , opkaldt Gastown , voksede op på clearcuts på den vestlige kant af Hastings Mill skovhugst savværk 's ejendom , hvor en interimistiske værtshus var blevet oprettet på en planke mellem to træstubbe og indehaveren , Gassy Jack , overtalt nysgerrige millworkers til bu ild ham et værtshus , den 1. Fra den første virksomhed dukkede andre butikker og nogle hoteller hurtigt op langs havnefronten mod vest. Gastown blev formelt lagt ud som en registreret bysite døbt Granville , BI -LRB- '' B.I '' stående for '' Burrard Inlet '' -RRB- . Som en del af den jord og politiske aftale, hvorved området af byens område blev gjort jernbanehovedet af den canadiske Pacific Railway -LRB- CPR-RRB-, blev det omdøbt til '' Vancouver '' og indarbejdet kort tid derefter som en by , i 1886 . I 1887 blev den transkontinentale jernbane udvidet til byen for at drage fordel af sin store naturlige havn , som snart blev en vigtig forbindelse i en handelsrute mellem Orienten , det østlige Canada og Europa .  , Port Metro Vancouver er den tredjestørste havn efter tonnage i Amerika -LRB- fortrænge New York -RRB- , 27th i verden , den travleste og største i Canada , og den mest diversificerede havn i Nordamerika .  Mens skovbrug fortsat er den største industri , vancouver er kendt som et bycentrum omgivet af naturen , hvilket gør turismen sin næststørste industri .  Store filmproduktion studios i Vancouver og Burnaby har vendt Greater Vancouver og nærliggende områder i en af de største film produktion centre i Nordamerika, tjener det filmindustrien kaldenavn , Hollywood North .
evidence_en: Vancouver -LRB- -LSB- vænˈkuːvər -RSB- , -LSB- localvæŋ - -RSB- -RRB- is a coastal seaport city in Canada , located in the Lower Mainland region of British Columbia . As the most populous city in the province , the 2016 census recorded 631,486 people in the city , up from 603,502 in 2011 . The Greater Vancouver area had a population of 2,463,431 in 2016 , making it the third-largest metropolitan area in Canada . Vancouver has the highest population density in Canada with over 5,400 people per square kilometre . With over 250,000 residents , Vancouver is the fourth most densely populated city in North America behind New York City , San Francisco , and Mexico City according to the 2011 census . In that census , Vancouver was one of the most ethnically and linguistically diverse cities in Canada ; 52 % of its residents have a first language other than English . Vancouver is classed as a Beta global city .   Vancouver is consistently named as one of the top five worldwide cities for livability and quality of life ,  and the Economist Intelligence Unit acknowledged it as the first city ranked among the top-ten of the world 's most well-living cities  for five consecutive years .  Vancouver has hosted many international conferences and events , including the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games , UN Habitat I , Expo 86 , the World Police and Fire Games in 1989 and 2009 ; and the 2010 Winter Olympics and Paralympics which were held in Vancouver and Whistler , a resort community 125 km north of the city . In 2014 , following thirty years in California , the annual TED conference made Vancouver its indefinite home . Several matches of the 2015 FIFA Women 's World Cup were played in Vancouver , including the final at BC Place .   The original settlement , named Gastown , grew up on clearcuts on the west edge of the Hastings Mill logging sawmill 's property , where a makeshift tavern had been set up on a plank between two stumps and the proprietor , Gassy Jack , persuaded the curious millworkers to build him a tavern , on 1 July 1867 . From that first enterprise , other stores and some hotels quickly appeared along the waterfront to the west . Gastown became formally laid out as a registered townsite dubbed Granville , B.I. -LRB- `` B.I '' standing for `` Burrard Inlet '' -RRB- . As part of the land and political deal whereby the area of the townsite was made the railhead of the Canadian Pacific Railway -LRB- CPR -RRB- , it was renamed `` Vancouver '' and incorporated shortly thereafter as a city , in 1886 . By 1887 , the transcontinental railway was extended to the city to take advantage of its large natural seaport , which soon became a vital link in a trade route between the Orient , Eastern Canada , and Europe .  , Port Metro Vancouver is the third largest port by tonnage in the Americas -LRB- displacing New York -RRB- , 27th in the world , the busiest and largest in Canada , and the most diversified port in North America .  While forestry remains its largest industry , Vancouver is well known as an urban centre surrounded by nature , making tourism its second-largest industry .  Major film production studios in Vancouver and Burnaby have turned Greater Vancouver and nearby areas into one of the largest film production centres in North America ,  earning it the film industry nickname , Hollywood North .

evidence_da: Nicole Scherzinger -LRB- -LSB- niיkoķl_ ייייər -RSB- født Nicole Prascovia Elikolani Valiente ; Juni 29 , 1978 -RRB- er en amerikansk musiker , skuespiller og tv-personlighed født i Honolulu , Hawaii og opvokset i Louisville , Kentucky . Hun optrådte i første omgang i high school spiller , og studerede på Wright State University, før hun droppede ud for at forfølge en musikalsk karriere sammen med det amerikanske rockband Days of the New og senere audition til Popstars , bliver medlem af den kortlivede pigegruppe Eden 's Crush . Hun steg til berømmelse som forsanger i burlesk trup-vendte-optagelse handle Pussycat Dolls , der blev en af verdens bedst sælgende pige grupper . Under deres pause , Scherzinger planlagt at gå i gang med sin solo karriere med hendes navn er Nicole , men det blev senere lagt på hylden efter fire singler undladt at påvirke hitlisterne betydeligt .   Efter gruppens opløsning , Scherzinger vovede sig ind i tv vinde den tiende sæson af Dancing with the Stars og blev en dommer på The Sing-Off og på amerikanske og britiske versioner af The X Factor . Hendes debut studiealbum Killer Love -LRB- 2011 -RRB- blev udgivet til moderat succes og blev efterfulgt af nummer et single '' Do n't Hold Your Breath ''. I 2014 udgav Scherzinger sit andet album Big Fat Lie til kommerciel skuffelse og medvirkede på West End genoplivning af musicalen Cats, som hun modtog en Laurence Olivier Award nominering bedste kvindelige hovedrolle i en birolle i en musical .   Gennem hele sin karriere , har hun haft i alt tre britiske nummer et singler , hvoraf to kommer fra pladegruppen The Pussycat Dolls og en som solo kunstner . Hun har solgt over 60 millioner plader på verdensplan, som en solo kunstner og som forsanger i Pussycat Dolls . I overensstemmelse med flere kilder har Scherzinger solgt mindst 37 millioner singler og har haft over 15 millioner samlede albumsalg . Siden sin første diagram post i 2005 , har hun scoret 20 top-20 hits på uk Singles Chart . Uden for sit arbejde i underholdningsindustrien har Scherzinger annonceret mærker, herunder Herbal Essences og Müller , og bidraget til at skabe tøjmærket Missguided . Hun er også ambassadør for UNICEF og en global ambassadør for De Særlige Olympiske Lege og er involveret i velgørende aktiviteter.
evidence_en: Nicole Scherzinger -LRB- -LSB- niˈkoʊl_ˈʃɜːzɪŋər -RSB- born Nicole Prascovia Elikolani Valiente ; June 29 , 1978 -RRB- is an American recording artist , actress and television personality born in Honolulu , Hawaii and raised in Louisville , Kentucky . She performed initially in high school plays , and studied at Wright State University before dropping out to pursue a musical career alongside the American rock band Days of the New and later auditioned for Popstars , becoming a member of the short-lived girl group Eden 's Crush . She rose to fame as the lead singer of the burlesque troupe-turned-recording act the Pussycat Dolls , who became one of the world 's best-selling girl groups . During their hiatus , Scherzinger planned to embark on her solo career with Her Name is Nicole , but it was later shelved after four singles failed to impact the charts significantly .   Following the group 's disbandment , Scherzinger ventured into television winning the tenth season of Dancing with the Stars and became a judge on The Sing-Off and on US and UK versions of The X Factor . Her debut studio album Killer Love -LRB- 2011 -RRB- was released to moderate success and was preceded by the number-one single `` Do n't Hold Your Breath '' . In 2014 , Scherzinger released her second album Big Fat Lie to commercial disappointment and starred on the West End revival of the musical Cats for which she received a Laurence Olivier Award nomination Best Actress in a Supporting Role in a Musical .   Throughout her career , she has had a total of three UK number one singles , two of which coming from recording group The Pussycat Dolls and one as a solo artist . She has sold over 60 million records worldwide , as a solo artist and as the lead singer of the Pussycat Dolls . In accordance with multiple sources , Scherzinger has sold at least 37 million singles and has had in excess of 15 million total album sales . Since her first chart entry in 2005 , she has scored 20 top-20 hits on the UK Singles Chart . Outside her work in the entertainment industry , Scherzinger has advertised brands including Herbal Essences and Müller , and helped to create the clothing brand Missguided . She is also an ambassador for UNICEF and a global ambassador for the Special Olympics and is involved in charitable activities .

evidence_da: Home Alone er en amerikansk julekomediefilm fra 1990 skrevet og produceret af John Hughes og instrueret af Chris Columbus . Filmen stjerner Macaulay Culkin som Kevin McCallister , en dreng, der fejlagtigt efterlades, når hans familie flyver til Paris for deres juleferie . Kevin oprindeligt relishes at være alene hjemme, men snart har at kæmpe med to vordende indbrudstyve spillet af Joe Pesci og Daniel Stern . Filmen indeholder også Catherine O'Hara og John Heard som Kevin 's forældre .   Culkin blev nomineret til Golden Globe Award for bedste mandlige hovedrolle - Musical eller Komedie . Efter udgivelsen blev Home Alone den mest indbringende live action komediefilm nogensinde i USA og holdt også rekorden på verdensplan , indtil den blev overhalet af The Hangover Part II i 2011 . Det er den højeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren julefilm nogensinde på det nordamerikanske box office-LRB- når justeret for inflation -RRB- . Home Alone har affødt en vellykket film franchise med fire fortsættelser , herunder 1992 filmen Home Alone 2: Lost in New York , den eneste Home Alone efterfølger til at have den oprindelige stemmer reprising deres roller .
evidence_en: Home Alone is a 1990 American Christmas comedy film written and produced by John Hughes and directed by Chris Columbus . The film stars Macaulay Culkin as Kevin McCallister , a boy who is mistakenly left behind when his family flies to Paris for their Christmas vacation . Kevin initially relishes being home alone , but soon has to contend with two would-be burglars played by Joe Pesci and Daniel Stern . The film also features Catherine O'Hara and John Heard as Kevin 's parents .   Culkin was nominated for the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor -- Musical or Comedy . After its release , Home Alone became the highest-grossing live action comedy film of all time in the United States , and also held the record worldwide until it was overtaken by The Hangover Part II in 2011 . It is the highest grossing Christmas movie of all time at the North American box office -LRB- when adjusted for inflation -RRB- . Home Alone has spawned a successful film franchise with four sequels , including the 1992 film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York , the only Home Alone sequel to have the original cast reprising their roles .

evidence_da: Curse , Inc. er en online spil portal og netværk af gaming hjemmesider grundlagt af Hubert Thieblot i 2006 . Virksomheden har hovedkvarter i Huntsville , Alabama , og har kontorer i San Francisco , New York City , Los Angeles , Brighton , UK , og Berlin , Tyskland . Hævder at være den "" nummer et ressource for centrale online gamere , '' Quantcast anslået månedlig unik trafik i 2013 over 30 millioner besøgende . Forbandelse har flere primære funktioner , den mest bemærkelsesværdige, som omfatter en add-on og modifikation service kaldet Curse Client for sådanne spil som World of Warcraft , Rift , The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim , Terraria , Kerbal Space Program , og Minecraft , en samling på over 1 000 gaming wikis kendt som Gamepedia , og en Voice over IP-LRB- VoIP -RRB-service kaldet Curse Voice .   Forbandelse tidligere sponsoreret et professionelt team , kendt i fællesskab som Team Curse , der konkurrerede i League of Legends og Call of Duty '', som ud over forskellige højt profilerede vinder har høstet sponsorering fra virksomheder som Nissan , Alienware , og Cooler Master. I januar 2015 fusionerede Team Curse med Team Liquid under navnet sidstnævnte organisation .   Mens Curse oprindeligt tilbudt ændringer og add-ons alene gennem deres Curse-Beta hjemmeside, tilbud har udvidet til at omfatte Wiki-tjenester , Curse klient , CurseForge , CurseVoice , Union for Gamers , BukkitDev , og in-house indhold produceret til YouTube .   august 2016 meddelte Curse , at den havde indvilget i at blive opkøbt af Amazon.com Inc. via datterselskabet Twitch Interactive for et ukendt beløb .
evidence_en: Curse , Inc. is an online game portal and network of gaming websites founded by Hubert Thieblot in 2006 . The company is headquartered in Huntsville , Alabama , and has offices in San Francisco , New York City , Los Angeles , Brighton , UK , and Berlin , Germany . Claiming to be the `` number one resource for core online gamers , '' Quantcast estimated monthly unique traffic in 2013 in excess of 30 million visitors . Curse has several primary functions , the most notable of which include an add-on and modification service called Curse Client for such games as World of Warcraft , Rift , The Elder Scrolls V : Skyrim , Terraria , Kerbal Space Program , and Minecraft , a collection of over 1000 gaming wikis known as Gamepedia , and a Voice over IP -LRB- VoIP -RRB- service called Curse Voice .   Curse formerly sponsored a professional team , known collectively as Team Curse , that competed in League of Legends and Call of Duty '' , which in addition to various high-profile wins have garnered sponsorship from companies such as Nissan , Alienware , and Cooler Master . In January 2015 Team Curse merged with Team Liquid under the name of the latter organization .   While Curse initially offered modifications and add-ons alone through their Curse-Beta website , offerings have expanded to include Wiki services , the Curse client , CurseForge , CurseVoice , Union for Gamers , BukkitDev , and in-house content produced for YouTube .   On August 16 , 2016 , Curse announced that it had agreed to be acquired by Amazon.com Inc. via its subsidiary Twitch Interactive for an undisclosed amount .

evidence_da: Russell Edward Brand -LRB- født 4 Juni 1975 -RRB- er en engelsk komiker , skuespiller , radiovært , forfatter , og aktivist .   Begynder sin karriere som stand-up komiker og senere bliver en MTV studievært , Brand først opnået berygtet i 2004 som vært for Big Brother 's Big Mouth , en Big Brother spin-off . I 2007 havde han sin første store filmrolle i St Trinian 's , og det følgende år landede han en stor rolle i den romantiske komedie-drama Glemmer Sarah Marshall ; filmen førte til ham hovedrollen i en spin off , rock komedie Få ham til det græske , sammen med Jonah Hill i 2010 . Han arbejdede også som stemme skuespiller i de animerede film Despicable Me i 2010 , Hop i 2011 , og Despicable Me 2 i 2013 , og spillede titelkarakter af 2011 genindspilning af den romantiske komedie Arthur . I 2013 udgav han den succesfulde stand-up særlige Messias Complex .   Siden gæsten redigere en udgave af britiske politiske ugentlige New Statesman i 2013 , Brand er blevet kendt som en offentlig aktivist og forkæmper , og har talt om en bred vifte af politiske og kulturelle spørgsmål , herunder rigdom ulighed , afhængighed , corporate kapitalisme , klimaændringer og mediebias . Dette omfatter en meget omtalt interview med Newsnight vært Jeremy Paxman i 2013 , hvor han nedgjorde det britiske politiske system som ineffektiv , opfordrede de britiske vælgere til ikke at stemme , og støttede en egalitær socialistisk revolution til at erstatte status quo . I 2014 lancerede Brand sin politiske komedie webserie The Trews , udgivet en bog med titlen Revolution , og begyndte at arbejde på en dokumentarfilm om økonomisk ulighed med Michael Winterbottom .   I løbet af sin karriere har Brand været genstand for hyppig mediedækning og kontroverser for emner som hans promiskuitet og stofbrug , hans uhyrlige adfærd ved forskellige prisuddelinger , hans afskedigelse fra MTV og fratræden fra BBC , og hans to-årigt ægteskab med sangeren Katy Perry . Han har indarbejdet mange af hans kontroversielle offentlige narrestreger i hans komiske materiale . I 2015 blev en biografisk dokumentarfilm kaldet Brand : A Second Coming udgivet .
evidence_en: Russell Edward Brand -LRB- born 4 June 1975 -RRB- is an English comedian , actor , radio host , author , and activist .   Beginning his career as a stand-up comedian and later becoming an MTV presenter , Brand first achieved notoriety in 2004 as the host of Big Brother 's Big Mouth , a Big Brother spin-off . In 2007 , he had his first major film role in St Trinian 's , and the following year he landed a major role in the romantic comedy-drama Forgetting Sarah Marshall ; the film led to him starring in a spin off , the rock comedy Get Him to the Greek , alongside Jonah Hill in 2010 . He also worked as a voice actor in the animated films Despicable Me in 2010 , Hop in 2011 , and Despicable Me 2 in 2013 , and played the title character of the 2011 remake of the romantic comedy Arthur . In 2013 , he released the successful stand-up special Messiah Complex .   Since guest editing an edition of British political weekly New Statesman in 2013 , Brand has become known as a public activist and campaigner , and has spoken on a wide range of political and cultural issues , including wealth inequality , addiction , corporate capitalism , climate change , and media bias . This includes a much publicised interview with Newsnight host Jeremy Paxman in 2013 , in which he disparaged the British political system as ineffectual , encouraged the British electorate not to vote , and endorsed an egalitarian socialist revolution to replace the status quo . In 2014 , Brand launched his political-comedy web series The Trews , released a book entitled Revolution , and began work on a documentary about financial inequality with Michael Winterbottom .   Over the course of his career , Brand has been the subject of frequent media coverage and controversy for issues such as his promiscuity and drug use , his outrageous behaviour at various award ceremonies , his dismissal from MTV and resignation from the BBC , and his two-year marriage with singer Katy Perry . He has incorporated many of his controversial public antics into his comedic material . In 2015 a biographical documentary called Brand : A Second Coming was released .

evidence_da: Mariah Carey -LRB- født 27 marts , 1969 eller 1970 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , sangskriver , pladeproducer , og skuespiller . I 1990, hun steg til berømmelse med udgivelsen af '' Vision of Love '' fra hendes eponyme debut album . Albummet produceret fire chart-topping singler i USA og begyndte, hvad der ville blive en perlerække af kommercielt succesfulde albums, som størknede sangeren som Columbias bedst sælgende handling . Carey og Boyz II Men tilbragte en rekord seksten uger på toppen af Billboard Hot 100 i 1995 - 96 med '' One Sweet Day , '', som fortsat er den længstkørende nummer et sang i USA chart historie . Efter en omstridt skilsmisse fra Sony Music hoved Tommy Mottola , Carey vedtaget et nyt billede og gennemgik mod hip hop med udgivelsen af Butterfly-LRB- 1997 -RRB- . I 1998 blev hun hædret som verdens bedst sælgende musiker i 1990'erne ved World Music Awards og senere udnævnt til den bedst sælgende kvindelige kunstner i årtusindskiftet i 2000 .   Carey skiltes med Columbia i 2000 , og underskrevet en rekordstor $ 100 millioner pladekontrakt med Virgin Records America . I ugerne før udgivelsen af hendes film Glitter og dens ledsagende soundtrack i 2001, hun lidt en fysisk og følelsesmæssig sammenbrud og blev indlagt for svær udmattelse . Projektet blev dårligt modtaget og førte til et generelt fald i sangerens karriere . Carey 's pladekontrakt blev købt ud for $ 50 millioner af Virgin, og hun underskrev en multi-million dollar aftale med Island Records det følgende år . Efter en relativt mislykket periode , vendte hun tilbage til toppen af musik hitlister med The Emancipation af Mimi-LRB- 2005 -RRB- . Albummet blev det bedst sælgende album i USA og den anden bestseller verden over i 2005 og producerede '' We Belong Together , '', som blev hendes mest succesfulde single i 2000'erne , og blev senere udnævnt til '' Song of the Decade '' af Billboard . Carey igen vovede sig ind i film med en godt modtaget birolle i Precious-LRB- 2009 -RRB-, og blev tildelt '' Gennembrud Performance Award '' på Palm Springs International Film Festival .   Gennem hele sin karriere har Carey solgt mere end 200 millioner plader på verdensplan , hvilket gør hende til en af de bedst sælgende musikkunstnere gennem tiderne . Ifølge RIAA , hun er den tredje bedst sælgende kvindelige kunstner i USA , med 63.500 tusind certificerede albums . Med udgivelsen af '' Touch My Body '' -LRB- 2008 -RRB- fik Carey sin 18. I 2012 blev sangeren nummer to på VH1 's liste over '' 100 Greatest Women in Music . '' Bortset fra hendes kommercielle resultater , Carey har vundet 5 Grammy Awards , 19 World Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards , og 14 Billboard Music Awards og er blevet konsekvent krediteret med inspirerende en generation af sangere . Hun er benævnt »« sangfuglen supreme '' af Guinness World Records og har et femoktave vokalområde , magt , melismatisk stil og signaturbrug af fløjteregistret .
evidence_en: Mariah Carey -LRB- born March 27 , 1969 or 1970 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter , record producer , and actress . In 1990 , she rose to fame with the release of `` Vision of Love '' from her eponymous debut album . The album produced four chart-topping singles in the US and began what would become a string of commercially successful albums which solidified the singer as Columbias highest selling act . Carey and Boyz II Men spent a record sixteen weeks atop the Billboard Hot 100 in 1995 -- 96 with `` One Sweet Day , '' which remains the longest-running number-one song in US chart history . Following a contentious divorce from Sony Music head Tommy Mottola , Carey adopted a new image and traversed towards hip hop with the release of Butterfly -LRB- 1997 -RRB- . In 1998 , she was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards and subsequently named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000 .   Carey parted with Columbia in 2000 , and signed a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records America . In the weeks prior to the release of her film Glitter and its accompanying soundtrack in 2001 , she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion . The project was poorly received and led to a general decline in the singer 's career . Carey 's recording contract was bought out for $ 50 million by Virgin and she signed a multi-million dollar deal with Island Records the following year . After a relatively unsuccessful period , she returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi -LRB- 2005 -RRB- . The album became the best-selling album in the US and the second best-seller worldwide in 2005 and produced `` We Belong Together , '' which became her most successful single of the 2000s , and was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard . Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received supporting role in Precious -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , and was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival .   Throughout her career , Carey has sold more than 200 million records worldwide , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time . According to the RIAA , she is the third-best-selling female artist in the United States , with 63.5 million certified albums . With the release of `` Touch My Body '' -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , Carey gained her 18th number-one single in the United States , more than any other solo artist . In 2012 , the singer was ranked second on VH1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music . '' Aside from her commercial accomplishments , Carey has won 5 Grammy Awards , 19 World Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 14 Billboard Music Awards and has been consistently credited with inspiring a generation of singers . Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World Records , she has a five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .

evidence_da: Fløjten register -LRB- også kaldet fløjte register eller fløjte tone -RRB- er det højeste register over den menneskelige stemme , liggende over modal register og falsetregister . Dette register har en specifik fysiologisk produktion , der er forskellig fra de andre registre , og kaldes såkaldte fordi klangfarve af de noter , der er fremstillet af dette register svarer til en fløjte .   I nogle sopraner kan den modale register vokalproduktion strække sig ind i , hvad der normalt opfattes som fløjteregisteret . Med ordentlig vokal træning , er det muligt for kvinder inden for alle stemmetyper til at udvikle denne del af stemmen . Nogle kvinder er dog ikke i stand til at ringe eller skabe lyd i dette register . Børn kan også ringe i fløjten register og, sjældent, nogle mænd .
evidence_en: The whistle register -LRB- also called the flute register or whistle tone -RRB- is the highest register of the human voice , lying above the modal register and falsetto register . This register has a specific physiological production that is different from the other registers , and is so called because the timbre of the notes that are produced from this register is similar to that of a whistle .   In some sopranos , the modal register vocal production may extend into what is usually thought of as the whistle register . With proper vocal training , it is possible for women within all voice types to develop this part of the voice . However , some women are unable to phonate or comfortably produce sound in this register . Children can also phonate in the whistle register and , rarely , some men .

evidence_da: Nathaniel '' Nat '' Faxon -LRB- født 11 oktober , 1975 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller , komiker og Academy Award-vindende manuskriptforfatter .
