evidence_da: Courtney Michelle Love -LRB-født Courtney Michelle Harrison ; født 9 juli , 1964 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , skuespiller , forfatter , og visuel kunstner . Produktiv i punk og grunge scener i 1990'erne , Love har haft en karriere, der spænder over fire årtier . Hun steg til fremtrædende plads som frontkvinde for det alternative rockband Hole , som hun dannede i 1989 . Kærlighed har henledt offentlighedens opmærksomhed for hendes uhæmmede live-optrædener og konfronterende tekster , samt hendes meget omtalte personlige liv efter hendes ægteskab med Kurt Cobain .   Datter af Hank Harrison og psykoterapeut Linda Carroll , Love havde en omrejsende tidlige liv . Hun tilbragte sine formative år i San Francisco og Portland , Oregon , hvor hun var i en række kortlivede bands, før de blev støbt i to film af den britiske instruktør Alex Cox . Efter at have dannet Hole i 1989 fik hun stor opmærksomhed fra den underjordiske rockpresse for gruppens debutalbum , produceret af Kim Gordon . Hole 's anden udgivelse , Live Through This-LRB- 1994 -RRB- gav hende højt profileret berømmelse med kritiske udmærkelser og multi-platin salg . I 1995 , Love vendte tilbage til handler , tjener en Golden Globe Award nominering for hendes præstation som Althea Leasure i Miloš Forman 's The People vs Larry Flynt-LRB-1996 -RRB-, som etablerede hende som en mainstream skuespiller . Det følgende år, hun oplevede yderligere mainstream succes med udgivelsen af Hole 's tredje album , Celebrity Skin-LRB- 1998 -RRB-, som blev nomineret til flere Grammy Awards .   Love fortsatte med at arbejde som skuespiller i begyndelsen af 2000'erne , optræder i big-budget billeder som Man on the Moon -LRB- 1999 -RRB- og Trapped-LRB- 2002 -RRB-, før frigive hendes første solo album , America 's Sweetheart , i 2004 . De næste par år var præget af omtale omkring Love 's juridiske problemer og stofmisbrug , hvilket resulterede i en obligatorisk lockdown rehabilitering sætning i 2005, mens hun var i færd med at skrive en anden planlagt solo album . Dette projekt blev Nobody 's Daughter , som blev udgivet i 2010 som et Hole album, men uden andre medlemmer af den oprindelige lineup . Mellem 2014 og 2015 udgav hun to solosingler og vendte tilbage til skuespil let i netværksserien Sons of Anarchy and Empire .   Love har også haft bestræbelser skriftligt , co-creating og medforfatter tre bind af en manga , Prinsesse Ai , mellem 2004 og 2006 , samt en erindringsbog , Dirty Blonde : The Diaries of Courtney Love-LRB- 2006 -RRB- . I 2012 havde hun premiere på en udstilling af blandet mediebilledkunst med titlen And She 's Not Even Pretty .
evidence_en: Courtney Michelle Love -LRB- born Courtney Michelle Harrison ; born July 9 , 1964 -RRB- is an American singer , actress , writer , and visual artist . Prolific in the punk and grunge scenes of the 1990s , Love has enjoyed a career that spans four decades . She rose to prominence as the frontwoman of the alternative rock band Hole , which she formed in 1989 . Love has drawn public attention for her uninhibited live performances and confrontational lyrics , as well as her highly publicized personal life following her marriage to Kurt Cobain .   The daughter of Hank Harrison and psychotherapist Linda Carroll , Love had an itinerant early life . She spent her formative years in San Francisco and Portland , Oregon , where she was in a series of short-lived bands before being cast in two films by British director Alex Cox . After forming Hole in 1989 , she received substantial attention from underground rock press for the group 's debut album , produced by Kim Gordon . Hole 's second release , Live Through This -LRB- 1994 -RRB- , gave her high-profile renown with critical accolades and multi-platinum sales . In 1995 , Love returned to acting , earning a Golden Globe Award nomination for her performance as Althea Leasure in Miloš Forman 's The People vs. Larry Flynt -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , which established her as a mainstream actress . The following year , she saw further mainstream success with the release of Hole 's third album , Celebrity Skin -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , which was nominated for multiple Grammy Awards .   Love continued to work as an actress into the early 2000s , appearing in big-budget pictures such as Man on the Moon -LRB- 1999 -RRB- and Trapped -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , before releasing her first solo album , America 's Sweetheart , in 2004 . The next few years were marked by publicity surrounding Love 's legal troubles and drug addiction , which resulted in a mandatory lockdown rehabilitation sentence in 2005 while she was in the process of writing a second planned solo album . That project became Nobody 's Daughter , which was released in 2010 as a Hole album but without any other members of the original lineup . Between 2014 and 2015 , she released two solo singles and returned to acting in the network series Sons of Anarchy and Empire .   Love has also had endeavors in writing , co-creating and co-authoring three volumes of a manga , Princess Ai , between 2004 and 2006 , as well as a memoir , Dirty Blonde : The Diaries of Courtney Love -LRB- 2006 -RRB- . In 2012 , she premiered an exhibit of mixed media visual art titled And She 's Not Even Pretty .

evidence_da: The People vs Larry Flynt er en amerikansk biografisk dramafilm fra 1996 instrueret af Miloš Forman med Woody Harrelson , Courtney Love og Edward Norton i hovedrollerne . Det krøniker stigningen i pornografiske magasin udgiver og redaktør Larry Flynt og hans efterfølgende sammenstød med religiøse institutioner og loven .   Filmen blev skrevet af Scott Alexander og Larry Karaszewski . Det spænder over omkring 35 år af Flynt 's liv fra hans fattige opdragelse i Kentucky til hans domstol kamp med pastor Jerry Falwell , og er delvist baseret på den amerikanske højesteret sag Hustler Magazine v. Falwell . Selvom filmen ikke var en økonomisk succes , blev den rost af kritikere og høstet Woody Harrelson , Courtney Love , Edward Norton og instruktøren Miloš Forman flere anerkendelser og prisnomineringer .
evidence_en: The People vs. Larry Flynt is a 1996 American biographical drama film directed by Miloš Forman and starring Woody Harrelson , Courtney Love , and Edward Norton . It chronicles the rise of pornographic magazine publisher and editor Larry Flynt and his subsequent clash with religious institutions and the law .   The film was written by Scott Alexander and Larry Karaszewski . It spans about 35 years of Flynt 's life from his impoverished upbringing in Kentucky to his court battle with Reverend Jerry Falwell , and is based in part on the U.S. Supreme Court case Hustler Magazine v. Falwell . Though not a financial success , the film was lauded by critics , and garnered Woody Harrelson , Courtney Love , Edward Norton and director Miloš Forman multiple accolades and award nominations .

evidence_da: The Incredibles er en amerikansk computeranimeret superheltefilm fra 2004 skrevet og instrueret af Brad Bird , produceret af Pixar Animation Studios og udgivet af Walt Disney Pictures. Filmen følger en familie af superhelte, der er tvunget til at skjule deres beføjelser og leve et roligt forstæder liv . Mr. Incredible 's ønske om at hjælpe folk trækker hele familien ind i en kamp med sin mangeårige fjende - Syndrom , der engang var hans fan og nu plotter at udslette hver eneste overmenneskelige væsen på Jorden med sin killer robot .   Bird , der var Pixar 's første uden instruktør , udviklet filmen som en forlængelse af 1960'erne tegneserier og spion film fra hans drengeår og personlige familieliv . Han slog filmen til Pixar efter box office skuffelse over hans første funktion , The Iron Giant-LRB- 1999 -RRB- og fremførte en stor del af sine medarbejdere til at udvikle The Incredibles . Animationsteamet fik til opgave at animere en helt menneskelig stemmer , som krævede at skabe ny teknologi til at animere detaljeret menneskelig anatomi, tøj og realistisk hud og hår . Michael Giacchino komponerede filmens orkesterscore .   Filmen havde premiere den 27 oktober 2004 , på BFI London Film Festival og havde sin generelle udgivelse i USA november 5 , 2004 . Filmen klarede sig godt på box office , opregning $ 633 millioner på verdensplan i løbet af sin oprindelige teatralske køre . The Incredibles blev mødt med høj kritikerros , garnering høje karakterer fra professionelle kritikere, og provokerende kommentarer til sine temaer . Filmen modtog 2004 Annie Award for bedste animerede funktion, sammen med to Academy Awards . Det blev den første helt animerede film til at vinde den prestigefyldte Hugo Award for bedste dramatiske præsentation .   En efterfølger , The Incredibles 2 , er planlagt til udgivelse juni 15 , 2018 .
evidence_en: The Incredibles is a 2004 American computer-animated superhero film written and directed by Brad Bird , produced by Pixar Animation Studios , and released by Walt Disney Pictures . The film follows a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their powers and live a quiet suburban life . Mr. Incredible 's desire to help people draws the entire family into a battle with his longtime enemy -- Syndrome , who was once his fan and now plots to wipe out every single superhuman being on Earth with his killer robot .   Bird , who was Pixar 's first outside director , developed the film as an extension of 1960s comic books and spy films from his boyhood and personal family life . He pitched the film to Pixar after the box office disappointment of his first feature , The Iron Giant -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , and carried over much of its staff to develop The Incredibles . The animation team was tasked with animating an all-human cast , which required creating new technology to animate detailed human anatomy , clothing and realistic skin and hair . Michael Giacchino composed the film 's orchestral score .   The film premiered on October 27 , 2004 , at the BFI London Film Festival and had its general release in the United States on November 5 , 2004 . The film performed well at the box office , grossing $ 633 million worldwide during its original theatrical run . The Incredibles was met with high critical acclaim , garnering high marks from professional critics , and provoking commentary on its themes . The film received the 2004 Annie Award for Best Animated Feature , along with two Academy Awards . It became the first entirely animated film to win the prestigious Hugo Award for Best Dramatic Presentation .   A sequel , The Incredibles 2 , is scheduled for release on June 15 , 2018 .

evidence_da: Overwatch er et hold-baseret online multiplayer first-person shooter videospil udviklet og udgivet af Blizzard Entertainment . Det blev udgivet i maj 2016 til Windows , PlayStation 4 og Xbox One .   Overwatch tildeler spillere i to hold på seks , med hver spiller vælger en af 24 foruddefinerede tegn , kaldet helte , hver med unikke bevægelse , attributter og evner , hvis roller er opdelt i fire kategorier : Offense , Defense , Tank , og Support . Spillere på et hold arbejder sammen om at sikre og forsvare kontrolpunkter på et kort eller eskortere en nyttelast på tværs af kortet i en begrænset mængde tid . Spillere får kosmetiske belønninger, der ikke påvirker gameplayet , såsom karakterskind og sejrudgør , når de spiller spillet . Spillet blev oprindeligt lanceret med casual play , med en konkurrencedygtig rangeret tilstand , forskellige ' arkade ' spilmodes , og en spiller-tilpasses server browser efterfølgende inkluderet efter dens udgivelse . Derudover har Blizzard udviklet og tilføjet nye figurer , kort og spilmodes efter udgivelsen , samtidig med at det hedder, at alle Overwatch opdateringer vil forblive gratis, med de eneste ekstra omkostninger for spillere at være microtransactions at tjene yderligere kosmetiske belønninger .   Overwatch er Blizzard 's fjerde store franchise og kom om efter 2014 annullering af den ambitiøse massivt multiplayer online rollespil Titan . En del af Titan holdet kom op med begrebet Overwatch , baseret på succes team-baserede first-person shooters som Team Fortress 2 og den stigende popularitet af multiplayer online kamp arenaer , at skabe en helt-baseret shooter, der understregede teamwork . Nogle elementer af Overwatch låne aktiver og koncepter fra den annullerede Titan projekt . Efter at have etableret fortællingen om en optimistisk nær fremtid Jorden indstilling efter en global krise , udviklerne har til formål at skabe en forskelligartet stemmer af helte, der strakte køn og etniciteter som en del af denne indstilling . Der blev brugt betydelig tid på at justere balancen mellem figurerne , og sikre , at nye spillere stadig ville være i stand til at have det sjovt, mens dygtige spillere ville præsentere hinanden med en udfordring .   Overwatch blev afsløret på BlizzCon 2014 i en fuldt spilbar tilstand og var i en lukket beta fra slutningen af 2015 til begyndelsen af 2016. En åben beta i maj 2016 trak i mere end 9,7 millioner spillere . Udgivelsen af spillet blev fremmet med korte animerede videoer til at indføre spillets fortælling og hver af de tegn . Efter officiel udgivelse , Overwatch modtaget universel anerkendelse fra kritikere , der roste spillet for sin tilgængelighed, forskelligartede appel af sine heltefigurer, lyse tegneserieagtige kunst stil, og underholdende gameplay . Betragtes som en af de bedste spil udgivet i 2016 , spillet modtaget talrige udmærkelser , herunder at blive tildelt Game of the Year på The Game Awards , D.I.C.E. Awards , og Game Developers Choice Awards , samt fra talrige publikationer . Siden sin udgivelse , Overwatch er blevet anerkendt som en eSport , hvor der ud over at sponsorere turneringer , Blizzard har annonceret planer om at hjælpe med at støtte professionelle liga spil starter i 2017 .
evidence_en: Overwatch is a team-based online multiplayer first-person shooter video game developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment . It was released in May 2016 for Windows , PlayStation 4 , and Xbox One .   Overwatch assigns players into two teams of six , with each player selecting one of 24 pre-defined characters , called heroes , each with unique movement , attributes , and abilities , whose roles are divided into four categories : Offense , Defense , Tank , and Support . Players on a team work together to secure and defend control points on a map or escort a payload across the map in a limited amount of time . Players gain cosmetic rewards that do not affect gameplay , such as character skins and victory poses , as they play the game . The game was initially launched with casual play , with a competitive ranked mode , various ` arcade ' game modes , and a player-customizable server browser subsequently included following its release . Additionally , Blizzard has developed and added new characters , maps , and game modes post-release , while stating that all Overwatch updates will remain free , with the only additional cost to players being microtransactions to earn additional cosmetic rewards .   Overwatch is Blizzard 's fourth major franchise and came about following the 2014 cancellation of the ambitious massively multiplayer online role-playing game Titan . A portion of the Titan team came up with the concept of Overwatch , based on the success of team-based first-person shooters like Team Fortress 2 and the growing popularity of multiplayer online battle arenas , creating a hero-based shooter that emphasized teamwork . Some elements of Overwatch borrow assets and concepts from the canceled Titan project . After establishing the narrative of an optimistic near-future Earth setting after a global crisis , the developers aimed to create a diverse cast of heroes that spanned genders and ethnicities as part of this setting . Significant time was spent adjusting the balance of the characters , making sure that new players would still be able to have fun while skilled players would present each other with a challenge .   Overwatch was unveiled at BlizzCon 2014 in a fully playable state and was in a closed beta from late 2015 through early 2016 . An open beta in May 2016 drew in more than 9.7 million players . The release of the game was promoted with short animated videos to introduce the game 's narrative and each of the characters . Upon official release , Overwatch received universal acclaim from critics , who praised the game for its accessibility , diverse appeal of its hero characters , bright cartoonish art style , and enjoyable gameplay . Considered one of the best games released in 2016 , the game received numerous accolades , including being awarded Game of the Year at The Game Awards , D.I.C.E. Awards , and Game Developers Choice Awards , as well as from numerous publications . Since its release , Overwatch has become recognized as an eSport , where in addition to sponsoring tournaments , Blizzard has announced plans to help support professional league play starting in 2017 .

evidence_en: Claire Catherine Danes -LRB- born April 12 , 1979 -RRB- is an American actress . She is the recipient of three Emmy Awards , four Golden Globe Awards , and two Screen Actors Guild Awards . In 2012 , Time named her one of the 100 most influential people in the world , and she was awarded a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 2015 .   Danes gained recognition with her role as Angela Chase in the acclaimed 1994 teen drama series My So-Called Life . The role won her a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress and a Primetime Emmy nomination for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Drama Series . She made her film debut the same year in Little Women -LRB- 1994 -RRB- . Her other films include Romeo + Juliet -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , The Rainmaker -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , Les Misérables -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , Brokedown Palace -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , the 1999 English dub of Princess Mononoke -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , Igby Goes Down -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , The Hours -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , Shopgirl -LRB- 2005 -RRB- and Stardust -LRB- 2007 -RRB- .   From 1998 to 2000 , Danes attended Yale University before dropping out to return to acting . She appeared in an Off-Broadway production of The Vagina Monologues in 2000 , and made her Broadway debut playing Eliza Doolittle in the 2007 revival of Pygmalion . In 2010 , she portrayed Temple Grandin in the highly acclaimed HBO TV film Temple Grandin , which won her a second Golden Globe and her first Primetime Emmy Award for the Outstanding Lead Actress in a Limited Series or Movie . Since 2011 , she has starred as Carrie Mathison in the Showtime drama series Homeland , for which she has won two Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Drama Series , two Golden Globe Award for Best Actress -- Television Series Drama , and the Television Critics Association Award for Individual Achievement in Drama . She is married to actor Hugh Dancy , with whom she has one child .

evidence_da: Papua Ny Guinea -LRB- PNG; -LSB-_nju -LSB- -LSB- -LB- -LSB- -LSB- -LSB- -læpjuə , _ pייpuיə -RSB- Papua Niugini Hiri Motu : Papua Niu Gini -RRB- officielt den uafhængige stat Papua Ny Guinea , er et oceanisk land, der indtager den østlige halvdel af Ny Guinea og dets offshoreøer i Melanesia , en region i det sydvestlige Stillehav nord for Australien . Dens hovedstad , der ligger langs den sydøstlige kyst , er Port Moresby . Den vestlige halvdel af Ny Guinea udgør de indonesiske provinser Papua og Vestpapua .   På nationalt plan , efter at være blevet regeret af tre eksterne magter siden 1884 , papua Ny Guinea etableret sin suverænitet i 1975 , papua Ny Guinea etableret sin suverænitet i 1975 , etableret sin suverænitet i 1975 . Dette fulgte næsten 60 års australsk administration , som startede under Første Verdenskrig . Det blev en uafhængig Commonwealth rige i 1975 med dronning Elizabeth II som sit statsoverhoved og blev medlem af Commonwealth of Nations i sin egen ret .   Papua Ny Guinea er et af de mest kulturelt mangfoldige lande i verden. Der er 852 kendte sprog i landet , hvoraf 12 nu ikke har nogen kendte levende talere . Størstedelen af befolkningen på mere end 7 millioner mennesker lever i almindelige samfund , som er lige så forskellige som sprogene . Det er også et af de mest landlige , da kun 18 procent af befolkningen bor i bycentre . Landet er et af verdens mindst udforskede , kulturelt og geografisk . Det er kendt for at have mange grupper af ukontaktede folk, og forskere mener, at der er mange uopdagede arter af planter og dyr i det indre .   Papua Ny Guinea er klassificeret som en udviklingsøkonomi af Den Internationale Valutafond . Stærk vækst i Papua Ny Guineas mine - og ressourcesektor førte til , at landet blev den sjette hurtigst voksende økonomi i verden i 2011 . Væksten forventedes at aftage , når de store ressourceprojekter kom på spil i 2015 . Minedrift er dog fortsat en vigtig økonomisk faktor . Lokale og nationale regeringer diskuterer muligheden for at genoptage mineoperationer i Panguna-minen i Bougainville-provinsen , som har været lukket siden borgerkrigen i 1980'erne - 1990'erne . Næsten 40 procent af befolkningen lever en selvbæredygtig naturlig livsstil uden adgang til global kapital .   De fleste mennesker lever stadig i stærke traditionelle sociale grupper baseret på landbrug. Deres sociale liv kombinerer traditionel religion med moderne praksis , herunder grundskoleuddannelse . Disse samfund og klaner anerkendes udtrykkeligt af Papua Ny Guinea-forfatningen , som udtrykker ønske om, at "" traditionelle landsbyer og samfund forbliver som levedygtige enheder i Papua Ny Guineas samfund "" og beskytter deres fortsatte betydning for at lokale og nationale samfund liv .
evidence_en: Papua New Guinea -LRB- PNG ; -LSB- ˈpæpuə_njuː_ˈgɪniː , _ ˈpɑː - , _ - pju - -RSB- , -LSB- ˈpæpjuə , _ pɑːˈpuːə -RSB- Papua Niugini Hiri Motu : Papua Niu Gini -RRB- , officially the Independent State of Papua New Guinea , is an Oceanian country that occupies the eastern half of the island of New Guinea and its offshore islands in Melanesia , a region of the southwestern Pacific Ocean north of Australia . Its capital , located along its southeastern coast , is Port Moresby . The western half of New Guinea forms the Indonesian provinces of Papua and West Papua .   At the national level , after being ruled by three external powers since 1884 , Papua New Guinea established its sovereignty in 1975 . This followed nearly 60 years of Australian administration , which started during World War I . It became an independent Commonwealth realm in 1975 with Queen Elizabeth II as its head of state and became a member of the Commonwealth of Nations in its own right .   Papua New Guinea is one of the most culturally diverse countries in the world . There are 852 known languages in the country , of which 12 now have no known living speakers . Most of the population of more than 7 million people live in customary communities , which are as diverse as the languages . It is also one of the most rural , as only 18 percent of its people live in urban centres . The country is one of the world 's least explored , culturally and geographically . It is known to have numerous groups of uncontacted peoples , and researchers believe there are many undiscovered species of plants and animals in the interior .   Papua New Guinea is classified as a developing economy by the International Monetary Fund . Strong growth in Papua New Guinea 's mining and resource sector led to the country becoming the sixth fastest-growing economy in the world in 2011 . Growth was expected to slow once major resource projects came on line in 2015 . Mining remains a major economic factor , however . Local and national governments are discussing the potential of resuming mining operations in Panguna mine in Bougainville Province , which has been closed since the civil war in the 1980s -- 1990s . Nearly 40 percent of the population lives a self-sustainable natural lifestyle with no access to global capital .   Most of the people still live in strong traditional social groups based on farming . Their social lives combine traditional religion with modern practices , including primary education . These societies and clans are explicitly acknowledged by the Papua New Guinea Constitution , which expresses the wish for `` traditional villages and communities to remain as viable units of Papua New Guinean society '' and protects their continuing importance to local and national community life .

evidence_da: Google Home er en smart højttaler udviklet af Google . Det blev annonceret i maj 2016 og udgivet i USA i november 2016 , med en udgivelse i Det Forenede Kongerige i april 2017 , efterfulgt af Australien , Canada , Frankrig , Tyskland og Japan i sommeren 2017 .   Google Home giver brugerne mulighed for at tale stemmekommandoer til at interagere med tjenester via Home 's intelligente personlige assistent kaldet Google Assistant . Et stort antal tjenester , både internt og tredjeparts , er integreret , så brugerne kan lytte til musik , se på videoer eller fotos eller modtage nyhedsopdateringer helt med stemme . Google Home har også integreret støtte til hjemmet automatisering funktioner, så brugerne tale kommandoer til enheden for at styre smart husholdningsapparater . Flere Google Home-enheder kan placeres i forskellige rum i et hjem til synkroniseret afspilning af musik , og en opdatering i april 2017 bragte understøttelse af flere brugere , så op til seks personer kan interagere med enheden . Selve produktet har en cylindrisk form med 4 lysdioder på toppen for visuel repræsentation af dets status , og dækslet over basen er modulopbygget , med forskellige farvemuligheder, der tilbydes via Google Store beregnet til enheden til at blande ind i miljøet . I maj 2017 annoncerede Google flere opdateringer til Google Home 's funktionalitet , herunder gratis håndfri telefonopkald i USA og Canada , proaktive opdateringer forud for planlagte begivenheder , visuelle svar på mobile enheder eller Chromecast-aktiverede fjernsyn , Bluetooth musik streaming , og evnen til at planlægge kalenderaftaler , med kommende støtte til påmindelser .   Google Home modtaget blandede anmeldelser . Dens design og lyd input / output modtaget betydelig ros , mens en mangel på interoperabilitet mellem andre Google Assistant-aktiverede enheder blev kritiseret . Kritikere gav udtryk for bekymring over Googles hensigter med enheden, især om funktioner ville være mere stramt integreret i andre Google-produkter , og en kritiker bemærkede , at Google Home 's funktionalitet var mere begrænset end dem , der tilbydes via Google Assistant på andre platforme . Anmeldere havde meget forskellige erfaringer med opsætningsprocessen , med en kritiker rose det, mens en anden kritiserede det , og Google Home 's søgebaserede svar var genstand for debat , med en korrekturlæser rose sine evner, mens en anden fremhævede flere dårlige kvalitet svar sammenlignes med falske nyheder .
evidence_en: Google Home is a smart speaker developed by Google . It was announced in May 2016 and released in the United States in November 2016 , with a release in the United Kingdom in April 2017 , followed by Australia , Canada , France , Germany , and Japan in summer 2017 .   Google Home enables users to speak voice commands to interact with services through the Home 's intelligent personal assistant called Google Assistant . A large number of services , both in-house and third-party , are integrated , allowing users to listen to music , look at videos or photos , or receive news updates entirely by voice . Google Home also has integrated support for home automation features , letting users speak commands to the device to control smart home appliances . Multiple Google Home devices can be placed in different rooms in a home for synchronized playback of music , and an update in April 2017 brought multi-user support , allowing up to six people to engage with the device . The product itself has a cylindrical shape with 4 LEDs on the top for visual representation of its status , and the cover over the base is modular , with different color options offered through Google Store intended for the device to blend into the environment . In May 2017 , Google announced multiple updates to Google Home 's functionality , including free hands-free phone calling in the United States and Canada , proactive updates ahead of scheduled events , visual responses on mobile devices or Chromecast-enabled televisions , Bluetooth music streaming , and the ability to schedule calendar appointments , with upcoming support for reminders .   Google Home received mixed reviews . Its design and sound input/output received significant praise , while a lack of interoperability between other Google Assistant-enabled devices was criticized . Critics voiced concerns about Google 's intentions with the device , particularly whether features would be more tightly integrated into other Google products and one critic noted that Google Home 's functionality was more limited than those offered through the Google Assistant on other platforms . Reviewers had very different experiences with the setup process , with one critic praising it while another criticized it , and Google Home 's search-based answers was the subject of debate , with one reviewer praising its capabilities while another highlighted multiple bad-quality answers comparable to fake news .

evidence_da: 1983 - 84 NBA sæsonen var 38th sæson af National Basketball Association . Sæsonen sluttede med Boston Celtics vinde NBA Championship , slå Los Angeles Lakers 4 kampe til 3 for anden gang siden 1969 i NBA-finalerne .
evidence_en: The 1983 -- 84 NBA season was the 38th season of the National Basketball Association . The season ended with the Boston Celtics winning the NBA Championship , beating the Los Angeles Lakers 4 games to 3 for the second time since 1969 in the NBA Finals .

evidence_da: Emily Jean '' Emma '' Stone -LRB- født November 6 , 1988 -RRB- er en amerikansk skuespiller . En af verdens højest betalte skuespillerinder i 2015 , Stone har modtaget adskillige udmærkelser , herunder en Oscar , en BAFTA Award , en Golden Globe Award og tre Screen Actors Guild Awards . Hun optrådte i Forbes Celebrity 100 i 2013 og Time 100 i 2017 , og er ofte beskrevet af medierne som en af de mest talentfulde skuespillerinder i hendes generation .   Født og opvokset i Scottsdale , Arizona , Stone begyndte at fungere som barn , i et teater produktion af The Wind in the Willows i 2000 . Som teenager flyttede hun til Los Angeles med sin mor og fik sin tv-debut i VH1 's In Search of the New Partridge Family -LRB- 2004 -RRB- et reality show, der kun producerede en usolgt pilot . Efter små tv-roller , vandt hun en Young Hollywood Award for sin filmdebut i Superbad-LRB- 2007 -RRB-, og fik positiv medieopmærksomhed for sin rolle i Zombieland-LRB- 2009 -RRB- .   Den 2010 teen komedie Easy A var Stone 's første hovedrolle og tjente hendes nomineringer til BAFTA Rising Star Award og en Golden Globe Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle . Dette gennembrud blev efterfulgt af en birolle i den kommercielt succesfulde romantiske komedie Crazy , Stupid , Love -LRB- 2011 -RRB- og derefter en co-stjernespækket rolle i den kritikerroste drama The Help -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . Stone fik bredere anerkendelse for at spille Gwen Stacy i superheltefilmen The Amazing Spider-Man fra 2012 og dens efterfølger i 2014 . Hun blev nomineret til en Oscar for bedste kvindelige birolle for rollen som en inddrive narkoman i den sorte komedie-drama Birdman-LRB- 2014 -RRB- . Hendes Broadway debut kom i en genoplivning af den musikalske Cabaret-LRB- 2014 - 2015 -RRB- . Stone vandt en Oscar , en BAFTA Award , og en Golden Globe Award for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle for at spille en håbefuld skuespiller i den meget succesfulde musikalske film La La Land -LRB- 2016 -RRB- .
evidence_en: Emily Jean `` Emma '' Stone -LRB- born November 6 , 1988 -RRB- is an American actress . One of the world 's highest-paid actresses in 2015 , Stone has received numerous accolades , including an Academy Award , a BAFTA Award , a Golden Globe Award and three Screen Actors Guild Awards . She appeared in Forbes Celebrity 100 in 2013 and the Time 100 in 2017 , and is often described by the media as one of the most talented actresses of her generation .   Born and raised in Scottsdale , Arizona , Stone began acting as a child , in a theater production of The Wind in the Willows in 2000 . As a teenager , she relocated to Los Angeles with her mother , and made her television debut in VH1 's In Search of the New Partridge Family -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , a reality show that produced only an unsold pilot . After small television roles , she won a Young Hollywood Award for her film debut in Superbad -LRB- 2007 -RRB- , and received positive media attention for her role in Zombieland -LRB- 2009 -RRB- .   The 2010 teen comedy Easy A was Stone 's first starring role and earned her nominations for the BAFTA Rising Star Award and a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress . This breakthrough was followed by a supporting role in the commercially successful romantic comedy Crazy , Stupid , Love -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , and then a co-starring role in the critically acclaimed drama The Help -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . Stone gained wider recognition for playing Gwen Stacy in the 2012 superhero film The Amazing Spider-Man , and its sequel in 2014 . She was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for the role of a recovering drug addict in the black comedy-drama Birdman -LRB- 2014 -RRB- . Her Broadway debut came in a revival of the musical Cabaret -LRB- 2014 -- 2015 -RRB- . Stone won an Academy Award , a BAFTA Award , and a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress for playing an aspiring actress in the highly successful musical film La La Land -LRB- 2016 -RRB- .

evidence_da: Natalie Portman -LRB- born Neta-Lee Hershlag , נטע-לי הרשלג June 9 , 1981 -RRB- is an actress with dual American and Israeli citizenship . Født i Jerusalem til en israelsk far og amerikansk mor , Portman voksede op i det østlige USA fra en alder af tre . Hun studerede dans og skuespil i New York , og medvirkede i Star Wars : Episode I - The Phantom Menace mens du stadig i high school på Long Island . I 1999 , Portman indskrevet på Harvard University for at studere psykologi , sammen med sit arbejde som skuespiller ; hun afsluttede en bachelorgrad i 2003 . Under hendes studier hun medvirkede i en anden Star Wars film og åbnede i New York City 's The Public Theater produktion af Anton Tjekhov 's The Seagull i 2001 .   Portman vandt en Golden Globe og blev nomineret til en Oscar for hovedrollen i 2004 drama Closer , dukkede op i Star Wars : Episode III - Revenge of the Sith det følgende år , og vandt en Constellation Award for bedste kvindelige præstation og Saturn Award for Bedste A ctress for hendes hovedrolle i den politiske thriller V for Vendetta -LRB- 2006 -RRB- . Hun spillede hovedroller i de historiske dramaer Goya 's Ghosts -LRB- 2006 -RRB- og The Other Boleyn Girl -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , og optrådte også i Thor -LRB- 2011 -RRB- og dens 2013 efterfølger . I 2010 medvirkede Portman i den psykologiske thrillerfilm Black Swan . Hendes præstation fik udbredt kritikerros, og hun fik sin første Oscar for bedste kvindelige hovedrolle , hendes anden Golden Globe Award , SAG Award , BAFTA Award og BFCA Award i 2011 .
