evidence_en: Portia Lee James DeGeneres -LRB- born Amanda Lee Rogers ; January 31 , 1973 -RRB- , also known professionally as Portia de Rossi -LRB- -LSB- ˈpɔərʃə_də_ˈrɒsi -RSB- -RRB- , is an Australian and American actress , model , and philanthropist . She appeared as a regular cast member on the American political thriller television series Scandal in the role of Elizabeth North from 2014 to 2017 . She is also known for her roles as lawyer Nelle Porter on the American television series Ally McBeal -- for which she won a Screen Actors Guild Award in 1999 -- and as Lindsay Fünke on the American television sitcom Arrested Development . She also portrayed Veronica Palmer on the ABC television sitcom Better Off Ted , and Olivia Lord on the television drama Nip/Tuck . De Rossi is married to comedian and television host Ellen DeGeneres .

evidence_da: Dangerously in Love er debut studiealbum af den amerikanske sanger Beyoncé . Det blev udgivet den 24 juni, 2003 , af Columbia Records og Music World Entertainment . Under indspilningen af Destiny 's Child 's tredje studiealbum Survivor-LRB- 2001 -RRB-, gruppen meddelte, at de ville producere solo albums, der skal frigives . Indspilninger til albummet fandt sted fra marts 2002 til marts 2003 på flere studier , under afbrydelse af hendes daværende gruppe Destiny 's Child . Som executive producer af albummet , Beyoncé tog en bredere rolle i sin produktion , co-skrivning et flertal af sangene , vælge , hvilke til at producere og dele ideer om blanding og mastering af spor .   Numrene i albummet er en blanding af uptempo sange og ballader , som dybest set er inspireret af R&B og soul genrer ; det indeholder også elementer af hip hop og arabisk musik. Selvom Beyoncé forblev diskret om hendes fortolkning af sangene , dens underliggende betydninger blev tilskrevet af musikforfattere som en hentydning til hendes intime forhold til daværende kæreste og velkendte musik mogul Jay-Z . Dangerously in Love fik positive anmeldelser fra musikkritikere efter udgivelsen , med kritikere rose Knowles ''' kunstneriske spring ''. Albummet modtog også adskillige udmærkelser , tjener Beyoncé fem Grammy Awards .   Faretruende in Love nåede en verdensomspændende kommerciel succes , tjener multi-platin certificeringer i Australien , Det Forenede Kongerige , og USA . Albummet debuterede som nummer et på den amerikanske Billboard 200 chart , der sælger 317.000 eksemplarer i sin første uge , tjener Beyoncé den højeste debut salg blandt Destiny 's Child medlemmer ' soloalbum . Faretruende in Love har solgt over 11 millioner eksemplarer på verdensplan og har produceret to nummer et Billboard singler og flere top tiere .
evidence_en: Dangerously in Love is the debut studio album by American singer Beyoncé . It was released on June 24 , 2003 , by Columbia Records and Music World Entertainment . During the recording of Destiny 's Child 's third studio album Survivor -LRB- 2001 -RRB- , the group announced that they would produce solo albums to be released . Recording sessions for the album took place from March 2002 to March 2003 at several studios , during the hiatus of her then-group Destiny 's Child . As executive producer of the album , Beyoncé took a wider role in its production , co-writing a majority of the songs , choosing which ones to produce and sharing ideas on the mixing and mastering of tracks .   The tracks in the album are a mixture of uptempo songs and ballads , which are basically inspired by R&B and soul genres ; it also features elements of hip hop and Arabic music . Although Beyoncé remained discreet about her interpretation of the songs , its underlying meanings were attributed by music writers as an allusion to her intimate relationship with then-boyfriend and well-known music mogul Jay-Z . Dangerously in Love received positive reviews from music critics upon its release , with critics praising Knowles ' `` artistic leap '' . The album also received numerous accolades , earning Beyoncé five Grammy Awards .   Dangerously in Love reached a worldwide commercial success , earning multi-platinum certifications in Australia , the United Kingdom , and the United States . The album debuted at number one on the US Billboard 200 chart , selling 317,000 copies in its first week , earning Beyoncé the highest debut sales among Destiny 's Child members ' solo albums . Dangerously in Love has sold over 11 million copies worldwide and has produced two number one Billboard singles and multiple top tens .

evidence_da: Mrigayaa -LRB- tændt . Den kongelige jagt -RRB- er en 1976 hindi-sprog indiske periode dramafilm instrueret af Mrinal Sen og produceret af K. Rajeshwara Rao . Baseret på en novelle af Bhagbati Charan Panigrahi , kaldet ' Inaam ' . Filmen portrætterede forholdet mellem de britiske kolonister og indfødte landsbyboere , og deres udnyttelse af indiske udlejere i 1920 's Indien . Det skildrer også venskabet mellem en britisk administrator , der har flair for vildtjagt , og en indfødt stammefolk , der er en ekspert bueskytte . De ledende aktører , Mithun Chakraborty og Mamata Shankar , begge gjorde deres filmiske debuterer gennem filmen .   Filmen score blev leveret af Salil Chowdhury mens KK Mahajan håndteret filmvidenskab . Ved 24th National Film Awards vandt Mrigayaa to priser - Bedste spillefilm og bedste skuespiller . Det vandt også Filmfare Critics Award for bedste film bortset fra at blive nomineret til Den Gyldne Pris på 10th Moskva International Film Festival i 1977 .
evidence_en: Mrigayaa -LRB- lit . The royal hunt -RRB- is a 1976 Hindi-language Indian period drama film directed by Mrinal Sen and produced by K. Rajeshwara Rao . Based on a short story by Bhagbati Charan Panigrahi , called ` Inaam ' . The film portrayed the relationship between the British colonialists and native villagers , and their exploitation by Indian landlords in 1920 's India . It also depicts the friendship between a British administrator , who has a flair for game hunting , and a native tribal , who is an expert archer . The lead actors , Mithun Chakraborty and Mamata Shankar , both made their cinematic debuts through the film .   The film score was provided by Salil Chowdhury while K. K. Mahajan handled the cinematography . At the 24th National Film Awards , Mrigayaa won two awards -- Best Feature Film and Best Actor . It also won the Filmfare Critics Award for Best Movie apart from being nominated for the Golden Prize at the 10th Moscow International Film Festival in 1977 .

evidence_da: Brian Douglas Wilson -LRB- født 20 juni , 1942 -RRB- er en amerikansk musiker , sanger , sangskriver , og pladeproducer bedst kendt for at være multi-tasking leder og medstifter af rockbandet Beach Boys . Efter undertegnelsen med Capitol Records i 1962 , Wilson skrev eller co-skrev mere end to dusin Top 40 hits for gruppen . På grund af hans uortodokse tilgange til sang sammensætning og arrangement og beherskelse af optagelse teknikker , han er bredt anerkendt , af kritikere og musikere både , som en af de mest innovative og indflydelsesrige kreative kræfter i populærmusik .   I midten af 1960'erne komponerede , arrangerede og producerede Wilson Pet Sounds -LRB- 1966 -RRB- betragtes som et af de største albums, der nogensinde er lavet . Den tilsigtede opfølgning på Pet Sounds , Smile , blev aflyst af forskellige årsager , som omfattede Wilson 's forværrede mentale sundhed . Da han led gentagne nervesammenbrud , Wilson 's bidrag til Beach Boys mindsket, og hans uregelmæssigadfærd førte til spændinger med bandet . Efter en domstol-bestilt fjernelse fra pleje af psykolog Eugene Landy , Wilson begyndte at modtage konventionel medicinsk behandling , og i slutningen af 1990'erne , begyndte han at udføre og optage konsekvent som en solo kunstner . Han er stadig medlem af Beach Boys ' selskab , Brother Records Incorporated .   Wilson betragtes som en stor innovator inden for musikproduktion , den vigtigste ophavsmand til California Sound , en af de første musikproducer auteurs , og en af de mest berømte eksempler på outsider musiker . Kun 21 år gammel, da han modtog frihed til at producere sine egne optegnelser med total kreativ autonomi, han antændte en eksplosion af ligesindede Californien producenter , fortrænge New York som centrum for populære optegnelser , og bliver den første rock producent til at bruge studie som sit eget instrument . Wilson skabte effektivt præcedens , der tillod bands og kunstnere at komme ind i et lydstudie og fungere som deres egne producenter eller medproducenter . Hans sange blev uløseligt forbundet med zeitgeist i begyndelsen af 1960'erne , og han hjalp med at udvikle lyden af den vemodige Flower Power æra, der fortsatte . I de senere år blev Wilson betragtet som en '' gudfar '' til en æra af indie musikere, der var inspireret af hans melodiske følelser, kammer pop orkestreringer , og optagelse udforskninger .   Hans udmærkelseomfatter at blive optaget i 1988 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame og vinde Grammy Awards for Brian Wilson Presents Smile-LRB- 2004 -RRB- og The Smile Sessions -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . På lister offentliggjort af Rolling Stone , Wilson rangeret 52 for '' 100 Greatest Singers of All Time '' i 2008 og 12 for '' 100 Greatest Songwriters of All Time '' i 2015 . I 2012 rangerede musikpublikationen NME Wilson nummer 8 på sin '' 50 Greatest Producers Ever ''-liste , der udarbejdede '' få overveje, hvor banebrydende Brian Wilsons studieteknikker var i midten af 60'erne ''. Han er en lejlighedsvis skuespiller og stemme skuespiller , der har optrådt i tv-shows , film, og andre kunstneres musikvideoer . Hans liv blev portrætteret i filmen Love & Mercy fra 2014 , som modtog en bred udgivelse i 2015 .
evidence_en: Brian Douglas Wilson -LRB- born June 20 , 1942 -RRB- is an American musician , singer , songwriter , and record producer best known for being the multi-tasking leader and co-founder of the rock band the Beach Boys . After signing with Capitol Records in 1962 , Wilson wrote or co-wrote more than two dozen Top 40 hits for the group . Because of his unorthodox approaches to song composition and arrangement and mastery of recording techniques , he is widely acknowledged , by critics and musicians alike , as one of the most innovative and influential creative forces in popular music .   In the mid-1960s , Wilson composed , arranged and produced Pet Sounds -LRB- 1966 -RRB- , considered one of the greatest albums ever made . The intended follow-up to Pet Sounds , Smile , was canceled for various reasons , which included Wilson 's deteriorating mental health . As he suffered repeated nervous breakdowns , Wilson 's contributions to the Beach Boys diminished , and his erratic behavior led to tensions with the band . Following a court-ordered removal from the care of psychologist Eugene Landy , Wilson started receiving conventional medical treatment , and in the late 1990s , he began performing and recording consistently as a solo artist . He remains a member of the Beach Boys ' corporation , Brother Records Incorporated .   Wilson is considered a major innovator in the field of music production , the principal originator of the California Sound , one of the first music producer auteurs , and one of the most famous examples of the outsider musician . Only 21 years old when he received the freedom to produce his own records with total creative autonomy , he ignited an explosion of like-minded California producers , supplanting New York as the center of popular records , and becoming the first rock producer to use the studio as its own instrument . Wilson effectively set a precedent that allowed bands and artists to enter a recording studio and act as their own producers or co-producers . His songs became inextricably tied with the zeitgeist of the early 1960s , and he helped develop the sound of the wistful Flower Power era that proceeded . In later years , Wilson was regarded as a `` godfather '' to an era of indie musicians who were inspired by his melodic sensibilities , chamber pop orchestrations , and recording explorations .   His honors include being inducted into the 1988 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and winning Grammy Awards for Brian Wilson Presents Smile -LRB- 2004 -RRB- and The Smile Sessions -LRB- 2011 -RRB- . In lists published by Rolling Stone , Wilson ranked 52 for the `` 100 Greatest Singers of All Time '' in 2008 and 12 for the `` 100 Greatest Songwriters of All Time '' in 2015 . In 2012 , music publication NME ranked Wilson number 8 in its `` 50 Greatest Producers Ever '' list , elaborating `` few consider quite how groundbreaking Brian Wilson 's studio techniques were in the mid-60s '' . He is an occasional actor and voice actor , having appeared in television shows , films , and other artists ' music videos . His life was portrayed in the 2014 biopic Love & Mercy , which received a wide release in 2015 .

evidence_da: En intelligens kvotient -LRB- IQ -RRB- er en samlet score stammer fra flere standardiserede tests designet til at vurdere den menneskelige intelligens . Forkortelsen '' IQ '' blev opfundet af psykologen William Stern for den tyske betegnelse Intelligenzquotient , hans betegnelse for en scoring metode til intelligens test ved University of Wrocław han gik ind i en 1912 bog . Historisk set er IQ en score opnået ved at dividere en persons mentale aldersscore , opnået ved at administrere en intelligenstest , ved personens kronologiske alder , både udtrykt i år og måneder . Den resulterende fraktion ganges med 100 for at opnå IQ-scoren . Når aktuelle IQ-test blev udviklet , defineres normprøvens medianrå score som IQ 100 og scorer hver standardafvigelse -LRB- SD -RRB- op eller ned defineres som 15 IQ-point større eller mindre , selv om dette ikke altid var så historisk . Ved denne definition er ca . Omkring 5 procent af befolkningen scorer over 125 , og 5 procent under 75 .   Scores fra intelligens test er skøn over intelligens, fordi konkrete målinger -LRB- f.eks afstand, masse-RRB- ikke kan opnås i betragtning af den abstrakte karakter af begrebet '' intelligens ''. IQ-scorer har vist sig at være forbundet med faktorer som sygelighed og dødelighed , forældrenes sociale status og i væsentlig grad biologisk forældreIQ . Mens iq's arvelighed er blevet undersøgt i næsten et århundrede , er der stadig debat om betydningen af arveskøn og arvemekanismerne .   IQ-scorer anvendes til uddannelsesmæssig placering , vurdering af intellektuelle handicap og evaluering af jobansøgere . Selv når eleverne forbedrer deres score på standardiserede tests , forbedrer de ikke altid deres kognitive evner , såsom hukommelse , opmærksomhed og hastighed . I forskningssammenhænge er de blevet undersøgt som prædiktorer for jobpræstationer og indkomst . De bruges også til at studere distributioner af psykometrisk intelligens i populationer og korrelationerne mellem den og andre variabler. Rå score på IQ test for mange populationer har været stigende i et gennemsnit, der skaleres til tre IQ point per årti siden begyndelsen af det 20. Undersøgelse af forskellige mønstre af stigninger i subtest score kan også informere den nuværende forskning i menneskelig intelligens .
evidence_en: An intelligence quotient -LRB- IQ -RRB- is a total score derived from several standardized tests designed to assess human intelligence . The abbreviation `` IQ '' was coined by the psychologist William Stern for the German term Intelligenzquotient , his term for a scoring method for intelligence tests at University of Wrocław he advocated in a 1912 book . Historically , IQ is a score obtained by dividing a person 's mental age score , obtained by administering an intelligence test , by the person 's chronological age , both expressed in terms of years and months . The resulting fraction is multiplied by 100 to obtain the IQ score . When current IQ tests were developed , the median raw score of the norming sample is defined as IQ 100 and scores each standard deviation -LRB- SD -RRB- up or down are defined as 15 IQ points greater or less , although this was not always so historically . By this definition , approximately two-thirds of the population scores are between IQ 85 and IQ 115 . About 5 percent of the population scores above 125 , and 5 percent below 75 .   Scores from intelligence tests are estimates of intelligence because concrete measurements -LRB- e.g. distance , mass -RRB- can not be achieved given the abstract nature of the concept of `` intelligence '' . IQ scores have been shown to be associated with such factors as morbidity and mortality , parental social status , and , to a substantial degree , biological parental IQ . While the heritability of IQ has been investigated for nearly a century , there is still debate about the significance of heritability estimates and the mechanisms of inheritance .   IQ scores are used for educational placement , assessment of intellectual disability , and evaluating job applicants . Even when students improve their scores on standardized tests , they do not always improve their cognitive abilities , such as memory , attention and speed . In research contexts they have been studied as predictors of job performance , and income . They are also used to study distributions of psychometric intelligence in populations and the correlations between it and other variables . Raw scores on IQ tests for many populations have been rising at an average rate that scales to three IQ points per decade since the early 20th century , a phenomenon called the Flynn effect . Investigation of different patterns of increases in subtest scores can also inform current research on human intelligence .

evidence_da: Oz den store og kraftfulde-LRB-arbejder titel Brick-RRB- er en 2013 amerikansk fantasy eventyr film instrueret af Sam Raimi og produceret af Joe Roth , fra et manuskript skrevet af David Lindsay-Abaire og Mitchell Kapner . Filmen stjerner James Franco som licenshaver karakter , Mila Kunis , Rachel Weisz , og Michelle Williams med Zach Braff , Bill Cobbs , Joey King , og Tony Cox i biroller . Baseret på L. Frank Baum 's Oz romaner og sat 20 år før begivenhederne i den oprindelige roman , Oz den Store og Magtfulde er en åndelig prequel til 1939 Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer film , The Wizard of Oz . Filmen fortæller historien om Oscar Diggs , en vildledende tryllekunstner, der ankommer i delstaten Oz og møder tre hekse : Theodora , Evanora , og Glinda . Oscar er derefter hyret til at genoprette ro og orden i Oz , mens kæmper for at løse konflikter med hekse og sig selv .   Kapner begyndte at udvikle en oprindelse historie for Troldmanden fra Oz efter en livslang interesse for at ville skabe en for karakter . Walt Disney Pictures bestilt filmens produktion i 2009 , med Joe Roth som producent og Grant Curtis , Joshua Donen , Philip Steuer , og Palak Patel tjener som udøvende producenter . Raimi blev hyret til at instruere det følgende år . Efter Robert Downey Jr. og Johnny Depp afviste licensrollen , Franco blev støbt i februar 2011 , med vigtigste fotografering begynder fem måneder senere . Danny Elfman komponerede filmens score .   Oz den store og magtfulde havde premiere på El Capitan Theatre februar 14, 2013 , og med generel teatralskudgivelse marts 8, 2013 , gennem Disney Digital 3-D , RealD 3D og IMAX 3D formater , samt i konventionelle teatre . Det indtjente over 493 millioner dollars på verdensplan mod en $ 215 millioner budget og er den trettende mest indtjenende film af 2013 . Filmen vandt Phoenix Film Critics Society Award for Best Live Action Family Film . Kunis , for hendes portræt som Den Wicked Witch of the West , vandt MTV Movie Award for bedste skurk .
evidence_en: Oz the Great and Powerful -LRB- working title Brick -RRB- is a 2013 American fantasy adventure film directed by Sam Raimi and produced by Joe Roth , from a screenplay written by David Lindsay-Abaire and Mitchell Kapner . The film stars James Franco as the titular character , Mila Kunis , Rachel Weisz , and Michelle Williams with Zach Braff , Bill Cobbs , Joey King , and Tony Cox in supporting roles . Based on L. Frank Baum 's Oz novels and set 20 years before the events of the original novel , Oz the Great and Powerful is a spiritual prequel to the 1939 Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer film , The Wizard of Oz . The film tells the story of Oscar Diggs , a deceptive magician who arrives in the Land of Oz and encounters three witches : Theodora , Evanora , and Glinda . Oscar is then enlisted to restore order in Oz , while struggling to resolve conflicts with the witches and himself .   Kapner began developing an origin story for the Wizard of Oz after a lifelong interest of wanting to create one for the character . Walt Disney Pictures commissioned the film 's production in 2009 , with Joe Roth as producer and Grant Curtis , Joshua Donen , Philip Steuer , and Palak Patel serving as executive producers . Raimi was hired to direct the following year . After Robert Downey Jr. and Johnny Depp declined the titular role , Franco was cast in February 2011 , with principal photography commencing five months later . Danny Elfman composed the film 's score .   Oz the Great and Powerful premiered at the El Capitan Theatre on February 14 , 2013 , and with general theatrical release on March 8 , 2013 , through the Disney Digital 3-D , RealD 3D and IMAX 3D formats , as well as in conventional theaters . It grossed over $ 493 million worldwide against a $ 215 million budget and is the thirteenth highest-grossing film of 2013 . The film won the Phoenix Film Critics Society Award for Best Live Action Family Film . Kunis , for her portrayal as the Wicked Witch of the West , won the MTV Movie Award for Best Villain .

evidence_da: Wilton Norman Chamberlain -LRB- August 21 , 1936 - Oktober 12 , 1999 -RRB- var en amerikansk basketballspiller . Han spillede for Philadelphia / San Francisco Warriors , Philadelphia 76ers , og Los Angeles Lakers af National Basketball Association-LRB- NBA -RRB- ; han spillede for University of Kansas og også for Harlem Globetrotters før du spiller i NBA . Den 7 fod 1 tommer Chamberlain vejede 250 pounds som en rookie før bulking op til 275 og i sidste ende til over 300 pounds med Lakers . Han spillede midterpositionen og er bredt betragtet som en af de største og mest dominerende spillere i NBA historie .   Chamberlain har mange NBA-rekorder i scoring , rebounding og holdbarhed kategorier . Han er den eneste spiller til at score 100 point i en enkelt NBA-kamp eller i gennemsnit mere end 40 og 50 point i en sæson . Han vandt også syv scoringer , elleve rebounding , ni field goal procent titler og førte ligaen i assists én gang . Chamberlain er den eneste spiller i NBA historie til gennemsnit mindst 30 point og 20 rebounds per spil i en sæson , en bedrift han udført syv gange . Han er også den eneste spiller til gennemsnit mindst 30 point og 20 rebounds per spil i løbet af hele løbet af sin NBA karriere . Selv om han led en lang række professionelle tab , Chamberlain havde en succesfuld karriere , vinde to NBA mesterskaber , tjener fire regulære sæson mest værdifulde player awards , Rookie of the Year tildeling , en NBA Finals MVP award , og blive udvalgt til 13 All-Star Games og ti All-NBA Første og andet hold . Chamberlain blev efterfølgende nedfældet i Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame i 1978 , valgt ind i NBA 's 35-års jubilæum Team af 1980 , og valgt som en af de 50 største spillere i NBA Historie i 1996 .   Chamberlain var kendt af forskellige øgenavne i løbet af sin basketball spille karriere . Han hadede dem, der gjorde opmærksom på hans højde som '' Goliat '' og '' Wilt den Stilt '', som blev opfundet i løbet af hans high school dage af en Philadelphia sportswriter . Han foretrak '' The Big Dipper '', som var inspireret af hans venner, der så ham dyppe hovedet, da han gik gennem døråbninger . Efter hans basketball karriere sluttede , Chamberlain spillede volleyball i den kortlivede International Volleyball Association , var formand for denne organisation, og er nedfældet i IVA Hall of Fame for hans bidrag . Chamberlain var også en succesfuld forretningsmand , forfattet flere bøger , og dukkede op i filmen Conan the Destroyer . Han var en livslang bachelor , og blev berygtet for sin påstand om at have haft samleje med så mange som 20.000 kvinder .
evidence_en: Wilton Norman Chamberlain -LRB- August 21 , 1936 -- October 12 , 1999 -RRB- was an American basketball player . He played for the Philadelphia/San Francisco Warriors , the Philadelphia 76ers , and the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association -LRB- NBA -RRB- ; he played for the University of Kansas and also for the Harlem Globetrotters before playing in the NBA . The 7 foot 1 inch Chamberlain weighed 250 pounds as a rookie before bulking up to 275 and eventually to over 300 pounds with the Lakers . He played the center position and is widely considered one of the greatest and most dominant players in NBA history .   Chamberlain holds numerous NBA records in scoring , rebounding , and durability categories . He is the only player to score 100 points in a single NBA game or average more than 40 and 50 points in a season . He also won seven scoring , eleven rebounding , nine field goal percentage titles and led the league in assists once . Chamberlain is the only player in NBA history to average at least 30 points and 20 rebounds per game in a season , a feat he accomplished seven times . He is also the only player to average at least 30 points and 20 rebounds per game over the entire course of his NBA career . Although he suffered a long string of professional losses , Chamberlain had a successful career , winning two NBA championships , earning four regular-season Most Valuable Player awards , the Rookie of the Year award , one NBA Finals MVP award , and being selected to 13 All-Star Games and ten All-NBA First and Second teams . Chamberlain was subsequently enshrined in the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in 1978 , elected into the NBA 's 35th Anniversary Team of 1980 , and chosen as one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA History of 1996 .   Chamberlain was known by various nicknames during his basketball playing career . He hated the ones that called attention to his height such as `` Goliath '' and `` Wilt the Stilt '' , which was coined during his high school days by a Philadelphia sportswriter . He preferred `` The Big Dipper '' , which was inspired by his friends who saw him dip his head as he walked through doorways . After his basketball career ended , Chamberlain played volleyball in the short-lived International Volleyball Association , was president of this organization , and is enshrined in the IVA Hall of Fame for his contributions . Chamberlain was also a successful businessman , authored several books , and appeared in the movie Conan the Destroyer . He was a lifelong bachelor , and became notorious for his claim to have had sexual intercourse with as many as 20,000 women .

Han blev kendt blandt yngre publikum som Louis Stevens i Disney Channel-serien Even Stevens , en rolle, som LaBeouf modtog en Young Artist Award nominering i 2001 og vandt en Daytime Emmy Award i 2003 . LaBeouf optrådte senere i sine efterfølgere Transformers : Revenge of the Fallen -LRB- 2009 -RRB- og Transformers : Dark of the Moon -LRB- 2011 -RRB- begge også box office succeser . I 2008 spillede han Henry '' Mutt Williams '' Jones III i Indiana Jones og Kongeriget Crystal Skull , den fjerde film i Indiana Jones franchise . Hans andre film omfatter Wall Street : Money Never Sleeps -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Lawless -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , The Company You Keep -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Nymphomaniac -LRB- 2013 -RRB- og Fury -LRB- 2014 -RRB- . evidence_en: Shia Saide LaBeouf -LRB- -LSB- ˈʃaɪ.ə _ ləˈbʌf -RSB- born June 11 , 1986 -RRB- is an American actor , performance artist , and filmmaker . He became known among younger audiences as Louis Stevens in the Disney Channel series Even Stevens , a role for which LaBeouf received a Young Artist Award nomination in 2001 and won a Daytime Emmy Award in 2003 . He made his film debut in Holes -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , based on the novel of the same name by Louis Sachar . In 2004 , he made his directorial debut with the short film Let 's Love Hate and later directed a short film titled Maniac -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , starring American rappers Cage and Kid Cudi .   In 2007 , LaBeouf starred in the commercially successful films Disturbia and Surf 's Up . The same year he was cast in Michael Bay 's science fiction film Transformers as Sam Witwicky , the main protagonist of the series . Despite mixed reviews , Transformers was a box office success and one of the highest-grossing films of 2007 . LaBeouf later appeared in its sequels Transformers : Revenge of the Fallen -LRB- 2009 -RRB- and Transformers : Dark of the Moon -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , both also box office successes . In 2008 , he played Henry `` Mutt Williams '' Jones III in Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull , the fourth film in the Indiana Jones franchise . His other films include Wall Street : Money Never Sleeps -LRB- 2010 -RRB- , Lawless -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , The Company You Keep -LRB- 2012 -RRB- , Nymphomaniac -LRB- 2013 -RRB- and Fury -LRB- 2014 -RRB- . Since 2014 , LaBeouf has pursued a variety of public performance art projects with LaBeouf , Rönkkö & Turner .

evidence_da: Indiana Jones og Kongeriget Crystal Skull er en amerikansk actioneventyrfilm fra 2008. Det er den fjerde rate i Indiana Jones serien skabt af George Lucas og instrueret af Steven Spielberg . Udgivet nitten år efter den foregående film , filmen anerkender en alder af sin stjerne Harrison Ford ved at blive sat i 1957 . Det hylder science fiction B-film i den æra , grubetæring Indiana Jones mod sovjetiske agenter - ledet af Irina Spalko -LRB- Cate Blanchett-RRB - - søger efter en telepatisk krystal kranium . Indiana er hjulpet af hans tidligere elsker, Marion Ravenwood-LRB- Karen Allen -RRB-, og deres søn , Mutt Williams -LRB- Shia LaBeouf -RRB- . Ray Winstone , John Hurt og Jim Broadbent er også en del af den understøttende stemmer .   Manuskriptforfattere Jeb Stuart , Jeffrey Boam , Frank Darabont , og Jeff Nathanson skrev udkast, før David Koepp 's script tilfreds producenterne . Skyderiet begyndte den 18. New Haven , Connecticut ; Hawaii ; og Fresno , Californien, samt på lydstadier i Los Angeles . For at opretholde æstetisk kontinuitet med de tidligere film , besætningen påberåbt sig traditionelle stunt arbejde i stedet for computer-genereret stunt double , og filmfotograf Janusz Kamiński studerede Douglas Slocombe 'stil fra de tidligere film .   Filmen havde premiere på 2008 Cannes Film Festival maj 18 , 2008 , og blev udgivet over hele verden maj 22 , 2008 til generelt positive anmeldelser fra kritikere , selv om publikum modtagelse var mere blandet . Der var betydelig ros for forestillinger, actionscener , John Williams ' musikalske score , og kostume design . Kritikken fokuserede dog på dialogen , historien , tempoet og overforbruget af CGI . Det var også en økonomisk succes som de tre foregående film i serien , opregning over 786 millioner dollars på verdensplan , bliver franchisens højest indtjenende film , når den ikke justeres for inflation , og den næsthøjeste ekstrapolationsfaktoren film af 2008 . Marketing var stærkt afhængig af offentlighedens nostalgi for serien , med produkter, der tager inspiration fra alle fire film . Kingdom of the Crystal Skull er også den sidste film i serien, der skal distribueres af Paramount Pictures , som Walt Disney Studios er blevet distributør af sine fremtidige film , siden moderselskabets overtagelse af Lucasfilm i 2012 . Det vil blive efterfulgt af en unavngiven femte film planlagt til udgivelse juli 10 , 2020 , hvor både Spielberg og Ford vil vende tilbage .
evidence_en: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull is a 2008 American action adventure film . It is the fourth installment in the Indiana Jones series created by George Lucas and directed by Steven Spielberg . Released nineteen years after the previous film , the film acknowledges the age of its star Harrison Ford by being set in 1957 . It pays tribute to the science fiction B-movies of the era , pitting Indiana Jones against Soviet agents -- led by Irina Spalko -LRB- Cate Blanchett -RRB- -- searching for a telepathic crystal skull . Indiana is aided by his former lover , Marion Ravenwood -LRB- Karen Allen -RRB- , and their son , Mutt Williams -LRB- Shia LaBeouf -RRB- . Ray Winstone , John Hurt and Jim Broadbent are also part of the supporting cast .   Screenwriters Jeb Stuart , Jeffrey Boam , Frank Darabont , and Jeff Nathanson wrote drafts before David Koepp 's script satisfied the producers . Shooting began on June 18 , 2007 , at various locations in New Mexico ; New Haven , Connecticut ; Hawaii ; and Fresno , California , as well as on sound stages in Los Angeles . To maintain aesthetic continuity with the previous films , the crew relied on traditional stunt work instead of computer-generated stunt doubles , and cinematographer Janusz Kamiński studied Douglas Slocombe 's style from the previous films .   The film premiered at the 2008 Cannes Film Festival on May 18 , 2008 , and was released worldwide on May 22 , 2008 to generally positive reviews from critics , although audience reception was more mixed . There was significant praise for the performances , action scenes , John Williams ' musical score , and the costume design . Criticism , however , focused on the dialogue , storyline , pacing , and overuse of CGI . It was also a financial success like the previous three films in the series , grossing over $ 786 million worldwide , becoming the franchise 's highest-grossing film when not adjusted for inflation , and the second highest-grossing film of 2008 . Marketing relied heavily on the public 's nostalgia for the series , with products taking inspiration from all four films . Kingdom of the Crystal Skull is also the last film in the series to be distributed by Paramount Pictures , as Walt Disney Studios has become the distributor of its future films , since its parent company 's acquisition of Lucasfilm in 2012 . It will be followed by an untitled fifth film planned for release on July 10 , 2020 , in which both Spielberg and Ford will return .

evidence_da: Horrible Bosses er en amerikansk sort komediefilm fra 2011 instrueret af Seth Gordon , skrevet af Michael Markowitz , John Francis Daley og Jonathan Goldstein , baseret på en historie af Markowitz . Det stjerner Jason Bateman , Charlie Day , Jason Sudeikis , Jennifer Aniston , Colin Farrell , Kevin Spacey og Jamie Foxx . Plottet følger tre venner , spillet af Bateman , Day og Sudeikis , der beslutter at myrde deres respektive anmassende , misbrug chefer , portrætteret af Spacey , Aniston og Farrell .   Markowitz ' manuskript blev købt af New Line Cinema i 2005 , og filmen tilbragte seks år i forskellige stater af pre-produktion , med en række aktører knyttet til forskellige roller . I 2010 havde Goldstein og Daley omskrevet manuskriptet , og filmen endelig gik i produktion .   Filmen havde premiere i Los Angeles juni 30 , 2011 , og blev udgivet den 8 juli, 2011 . Filmen oversteg finansielle forventninger - påløber over 28 millioner dollar i de første tre dage - hvilket gør den til nummer to film i USA i sin åbningsweekend - og blev den højest indtjenende sorte komediefilm nogensinde i ujusterede dollars . , at slå rekorden , der tidligere blev sat af Rosekrigen i 1990 . Filmen indtjente over $ 209 millioner på verdensplan ved udgangen af sin teatralske køre .   Filmen fik generelt positive anmeldelser , med kritikere roser ensemblet stemmer , og hver bly bliver fremhævet for deres præstationer på tværs af anmeldelser . Plottet fik et mere blandet svar; nogle anmeldere følte, at dens mørke, humoristiske forudsætning blev udforsket godt, mens andre følte vittigheder var racistiske, homofobiske og kvindefjendske . En efterfølger , Horrible Bosses 2 , blev udgivet den 26.
evidence_en: Horrible Bosses is a 2011 American black comedy film directed by Seth Gordon , written by Michael Markowitz , John Francis Daley and Jonathan Goldstein , based on a story by Markowitz . It stars Jason Bateman , Charlie Day , Jason Sudeikis , Jennifer Aniston , Colin Farrell , Kevin Spacey and Jamie Foxx . The plot follows three friends , played by Bateman , Day and Sudeikis , who decide to murder their respective overbearing , abusive bosses , portrayed by Spacey , Aniston and Farrell .   Markowitz 's script was bought by New Line Cinema in 2005 and the film spent six years in various states of pre-production , with a variety of actors attached to different roles . By 2010 , Goldstein and Daley had rewritten the script , and the film finally went into production .   The film premiered in Los Angeles on June 30 , 2011 , and was released on July 8 , 2011 . The film exceeded financial expectations , accruing over $ 28 million in the first three days , making it the number two film in the United States during its opening weekend , and going on to become the highest-grossing black comedy film of all-time in unadjusted dollars , breaking the record previously set by The War of the Roses in 1990 . The film grossed over $ 209 million worldwide by the end of its theatrical run .   The film received generally positive reviews , with critics praising the ensemble cast , and each lead being singled out for their performances across reviews . The plot received a more mixed response ; some reviewers felt that its dark , humorous premise was explored well , while others felt the jokes were racist , homophobic and misogynistic . A sequel , Horrible Bosses 2 , was released on November 26 , 2014 .

evidence_da: Pennsylvania Chronicle og Universal Advertiser var en amerikansk kolonial avis grundlagt i 1767, der blev offentliggjort i Philadelphia , Pennsylvania , før den amerikanske revolution og blev grundlagt af William Goddard og hans forretningspartnere Joseph Galloway og Thomas Wharton . Benjamin Franklin , en associeret galloway , var også en partner med Chronicle .   Avisen blev oprettet for at udfordre magt Penn familien og i sidste ende Crown myndigheder, der på det tidspunkt var at placere love og skatter på kolonisterne uden fair repræsentation i det britiske parlament .   The Chronicle blev offentliggjort en gang om ugen på en mandag , det første nummer, der frigives den 6 januar 1767 , og blev trykt fra en ny Borgerlige type, der er fastsat af Goddard 's trykkeri i Philadelphia , The New Printing Office , på Market-Street , nær Post-Office . Den årlige abonnementssats var ti shillings . Publikationen holdt i drift fra 6 .   I 1768 William 's søster , Mary Katherine Goddard, der senere blev berømt for at være den første kvinde til at være en postmaster i Maryland , senere sluttede sig til og forvaltes hendes brors trykning kontor i Philadelphia .   I 1770 pennsylvania Chronicle havde en omsætning på omkring femogtyve hundrede , hvilket gør det til en af de mest succesfulde koloniale aviser .   I midten af 1700-tallet blev de fleste trykkerier, der var i brug i de amerikanske kolonier, importeret fra England . Isaac Doolittle , en New-Haven ur og ur-maker , bygget mahogni trykpresse for Goddard 's Pennsylvania Chronicle i Philadelphia . Det var den første trykpresse bygget i de amerikanske kolonier.   Goddard 's avis var ikke uden sin konkurrence . En rivaliserende Philadelphia printer , William Bradford III , grundlægger af The Pennsylvania Journal og Weekly Advertiser i 1742 gennemført en avis krig mod Goddard, der sidespring i personlige angreb .   I løbet af denne tid Galloway og Wharton havde solgt deres aktier i Chronicle til en Robert Towne , som igen gjort mange forsøg på at overtale Goddard til at sælge sin avis til ham . Efter Goddard offentligt kritiserede Galloway og Wharton han efterfølgende befandt sig fængslet for gæld i september 1771 , ingen tvivl om tilskyndelse af den indflydelsesrige Galloway .
evidence_en: The Pennsylvania Chronicle and Universal Advertiser was an American colonial newspaper founded in 1767 that was published in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania , prior to the American Revolution and was founded by William Goddard and his business partners Joseph Galloway and Thomas Wharton . Benjamin Franklin , an associate of Galloway , was also a partner with the Chronicle .   The newspaper was established to challenge the power of the Penn family and ultimately the Crown authorities who at that time were placing laws and taxes on the colonists without fair representation in the British Parliament .   The Chronicle was published once a week on a Monday , the first issue being released on January 6 , 1767 , and was printed from a new Bourgeois type set by Goddard 's printing company in Philadelphia , The New Printing Office , on Market-Street , near the Post-Office . The annual subscription rate was ten shillings . The publication maintained operations from January 6 , 1767 , until February 8 , 1774 .   In 1768 William 's sister , Mary Katherine Goddard who later became famous for being the first woman to be a postmaster in Maryland , later joined and managed her brother 's printing office in Philadelphia .   By 1770 the Pennsylvania Chronicle had a circulation of about twenty-five hundred , making it one of the most successful colonial newspapers .   In the middle of the 18th century most of the printing presses that were in use in the American colonies were imported from England . Isaac Doolittle , a New-Haven watch and clock-maker , built the mahogany printing press for Goddard 's Pennsylvania Chronicle in Philadelphia . It was the first printing press built in the American colonies .   Goddard 's newspaper was not without its competition . A rival Philadelphia printer , William Bradford III , founder of The Pennsylvania Journal and Weekly Advertiser in 1742 conducted a newspaper war against Goddard that digressed into personal attacks .   During this time Galloway and Wharton had sold their shares of the Chronicle to a Robert Towne , who in turn made many attempts to persuade Goddard to sell his newspaper to him . After Goddard publicly criticized Galloway and Wharton he subsequently found himself jailed for debt in September 1771 , no doubt at the prompting of the influential Galloway .

evidence_da: Telangana -LRB- t-RRB- er en af de 29 stater i Indien , der ligger i det sydlige Indien. Telangana blev dannet i juni 2014 som den yngste stat i Indien - fra den nordvestlige del af den fælles stat Andhra Pradesh , Telangana har et areal på 112077 km2 , og en befolkning på 35.193.978 -LRB- 2011 folketælling -RRB- . Det er den tolvte største stat i Indien , og den tolvte mest befolkede stat i Indien . Dens større byer omfatter Hyderabad , Warangal , Khammam , Karimnagar og Nizamabad . Telangana grænser op til staterne Maharashtra mod nord og nordvest, Chhattisgarh mod nord , Karnataka mod vest og Andhra Pradesh mod øst og syd .   Telangana havde en historie som telugu-talende region i den fyrstelige stat Hyderabad , styret af Nizam of Hyderabad. Det blev medlem af Den Indiske Union i 1948 . I 1956 blev staten Hyderabad opløst som led i den sproglige omstrukturering af stater , og Telangana blev slået sammen med den tidligere Andhra-stat for at danne Andhra Pradesh . Efter en flytning for separation blev Telangana tildelt særskilt status som stat den 2 . Hyderabad vil fortsætte med at fungere som den fælles hovedstad for Andhra Pradesh og Telangana i højst ti år.
evidence_en: Telangana -LRB- t -RRB- is one of the 29 states in India , located in southern India . Formed in June 2014 as the youngest state in India , from the northwestern part of the Joint State of Andhra Pradesh , Telangana has an area of 112077 km2 , and a population of 35,193,978 -LRB- 2011 census -RRB- . It is the twelfth largest state in India , and the twelfth most populated state in India . Its major cities include Hyderabad , Warangal , Khammam , Karimnagar and Nizamabad . Telangana is bordered by the states of Maharashtra to the north and north west , Chhattisgarh to the north , Karnataka to the west and Andhra Pradesh to the east and south .   Telangana had a history as the Telugu-speaking region of the princely state of Hyderabad , ruled by the Nizam of Hyderabad . It joined the Union of India in 1948 . In 1956 , the Hyderabad state was dissolved as part of the linguistic reorganisation of states and Telangana was merged with former Andhra State to form Andhra Pradesh . Following a movement for separation , Telangana was awarded separate statehood on 2 June 2014 . Hyderabad will continue to serve as the joint capital city for Andhra Pradesh and Telangana for no more than ten years .

evidence_da: Indien , officielt Republikken Indien -LRB- Bhārat Gaṇarājya '' -RRB- er et land i Sydasien . Det er det syvendestørste land for område , det næstmest folkerige land -LRB - med over 1,2 milliarder mennesker - RRB - og det mest folkerige demokrati i verden . Det er afgrænset af Det Indiske Ocean mod syd, Det Arabiske Hav mod sydvest og Den Bengalske Bugt mod sydøst. Det deler landegrænser med Pakistan mod vest; Kina , Nepal og Bhutan mod nordøst ; myanmar -LRB- Burma -RRB- og Bangladesh mod øst . I Det Indiske Ocean ligger Indien i nærheden af Sri Lanka og Maldiverne. Indiens Andaman- og Nicobarøerne deler en maritim grænse med Thailand og Indonesien .   Det indiske subkontinent var hjemsted for den urbane Indus Valley Civilisation i det tredje årtusinde f.Kr. I det følgende årtusinde begyndte de ældste skrifter i forbindelse med hinduismen at blive komponeret . Social stratificering , baseret på kaste , opstod i det første årtusinde f.Kr., og buddhismen og jainismen opstod . Tidlige politiske konsolideringer fandt sted under Maurya- og Gupta-imperierne; den senere halvø Mellemste Kongeriger påvirket kulturer så langt som Sydøstasien . I middelalderen ankom jødedommen, zoroastrianismen , kristendommen og islam , og sikhismen opstod, hvilket alle bidrager til regionens mangfoldige kultur. En stor del af nord faldt til Delhi sultanatet; syd blev forenet under Vijayanagara Empire . Århundredets økonomi voksede i 1600-tallet i Mughal-imperiet. I midten af 1700-tallet kom subkontinentet under British East India Company-reglen og i midten af 1800-tallet under britisk kronestyre . En nationalistisk bevægelse opstod i slutningen af 1800-tallet , som senere under Mahatma Gandhi blev kendt for ikkevoldelig modstand og førte til Indiens uafhængighed i 1947 .   I 2015 var den indiske økonomi verdens syvendestørste med nominelt BNP og tredjestørste ved købekraftsparitet . Efter markedsbaserede økonomiske reformer i 1991 blev Indien en af de hurtigst voksende store økonomier og betragtes som et nyligt industrialiserede land . Den står dog fortsat over for udfordringerne i forbindelse med fattigdom , korruption , underernæring og utilstrækkelig offentlig sundhedspleje . En atomvåbenstat og regional magt , den har den tredjestørste stående hær i verden og rangerer på femtepladsen i militærudgifter blandt nationer . Indien er en forbundsrepublik, der er styret under et parlamentarisk system og består af 29 stater og 7 fagforeningsområder . Det er et pluralistisk , flersproget og multietnisk samfund og er også hjemsted for en mangfoldighed af vilde dyr og planter i en række beskyttede levesteder .
evidence_en: India , officially the Republic of India -LRB- Bhārat Gaṇarājya '' -RRB- , is a country in South Asia . It is the seventh-largest country by area , the second-most populous country -LRB- with over 1.2 billion people -RRB- , and the most populous democracy in the world . It is bounded by the Indian Ocean on the south , the Arabian Sea on the southwest , and the Bay of Bengal on the southeast . It shares land borders with Pakistan to the west ; China , Nepal , and Bhutan to the northeast ; and Myanmar -LRB- Burma -RRB- and Bangladesh to the east . In the Indian Ocean , India is in the vicinity of Sri Lanka and the Maldives . India 's Andaman and Nicobar Islands share a maritime border with Thailand and Indonesia .   The Indian subcontinent was home to the urban Indus Valley Civilisation of the 3rd millennium BCE . In the following millennium , the oldest scriptures associated with Hinduism began to be composed . Social stratification , based on caste , emerged in the first millennium BCE , and Buddhism and Jainism arose . Early political consolidations took place under the Maurya and Gupta empires ; the later peninsular Middle Kingdoms influenced cultures as far as southeast Asia . In the medieval era , Judaism , Zoroastrianism , Christianity , and Islam arrived , and Sikhism emerged , all adding to the region 's diverse culture . Much of the north fell to the Delhi sultanate ; the south was united under the Vijayanagara Empire . The economy expanded in the 17th century in the Mughal Empire . In the mid-18th century , the subcontinent came under British East India Company rule , and in the mid-19th under British crown rule . A nationalist movement emerged in the late 19th century , which later , under Mahatma Gandhi , was noted for nonviolent resistance and led to India 's independence in 1947 .   In 2015 , the Indian economy was the world 's seventh largest by nominal GDP and third largest by purchasing power parity . Following market-based economic reforms in 1991 , India became one of the fastest-growing major economies and is considered a newly industrialised country . However , it continues to face the challenges of poverty , corruption , malnutrition , and inadequate public healthcare . A nuclear weapons state and regional power , it has the third largest standing army in the world and ranks fifth in military expenditure among nations . India is a federal republic governed under a parliamentary system and consists of 29 states and 7 union territories . It is a pluralistic , multilingual and multi-ethnic society and is also home to a diversity of wildlife in a variety of protected habitats .

evidence_da: Greyson Michael Chance -LRB- født August 16 , 1997 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , sangskriver , og pianist . Hans april 2010 opførelse af Lady Gaga 's '' Paparazzi '' på en sjette klassemusikfestival gik viral på YouTube , få udbredt opmærksomhed og over 59 millioner visninger fra maj 2017 , samt en optræden på The Ellen DeGeneres Show kort efter . To af hans oprindelige kompositioner , '' Stjerner '' og '' Broken Hearts '' , fik over seks og otte millioner visninger henholdsvis på hans YouTube-kanal . Hans debutsingle , '' Waiting Outside the Lines '', blev udgivet i oktober 2010 . Chance 's debut album , Hold On 'Til the Night , blev udgivet den August 2 , 2011 .   Chance udgav sin anden EP , Somewhere Over My Head , den 13. Singlen '' Afterlife '' blev udgivet i oktober 2015 efterfulgt af henholdsvis '' Hit and Run '' og '' Back On the Wall '' i februar og april 2016 .
evidence_en: Greyson Michael Chance -LRB- born August 16 , 1997 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter , and pianist . His April 2010 performance of Lady Gaga 's `` Paparazzi '' at a sixth-grade music festival went viral on YouTube , gaining widespread attention and over 59 million views as of May 2017 , as well as an appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show shortly afterward . Two of his original compositions , `` Stars '' and `` Broken Hearts '' , gained over six and eight million views respectively on his YouTube channel . His debut single , `` Waiting Outside the Lines '' , was released in October 2010 . Chance 's debut album , Hold On 'Til the Night , was released on August 2 , 2011 .   Chance released his second EP , Somewhere Over My Head , on May 13 , 2016 . The lead single , `` Afterlife '' , was released in October 2015 , followed by `` Hit and Run '' and `` Back On the Wall '' in February and April 2016 respectively .

evidence_da: Everton F.C. -LSB- יvərtən -RSB- er en fodboldklub i Liverpool , England , der i øjeblikket konkurrerer i Premier League , den øverste flyvning af engelsk fodbold . Klubben har konkurreret i den øverste division for en rekord 114 sæsoner og vandt League Championship ni gange , og FA Cup fem gange .   Dannet i 1878 , Everton var stiftende medlemmer af The Football League i 1888 og vandt deres første League Championship to sæsoner senere . Efter fire Liga Championship og to FA Cup-sejre oplevede Everton en pause i den umiddelbare tid efter Anden Verdenskrig - indtil en genoplivning i 1960'erne , hvor klubben vandt to Liga-mesterskaber og en FA Cup . Midten af 1980'erne repræsenterede deres seneste periode med vedvarende succes , med to League Championships , en FA Cup , og 1985 European Cup Winners ' Cup . Klubbens seneste store trofæ var 1995 FA Cup .   Klubbens tilhængere er kendt som Evertonians . Everton har en rivalisering med naboer Liverpool , og de to sider bestride Merseyside derby . Klubben har været baseret på Goodison Park i Walton , Liverpool , siden 1892 , efter at være flyttet fra Anfield efter en række over sin husleje . Klubbens hjem farver er kongeblå skjorter med hvide shorts og sokker .
evidence_en: Everton F.C. -LSB- ˈɛvərtən -RSB- is a football club in Liverpool , England , that currently competes in the Premier League , the top flight of English football . The club have competed in the top division for a record 114 seasons and won the League Championship nine times , and the FA Cup five times .   Formed in 1878 , Everton were founding members of The Football League in 1888 and won their first League Championship two seasons later . Following four League Championship and two FA Cup wins , Everton experienced a lull in the immediate post World War Two period , until a revival in the 1960s , which saw the club win two League Championships and an FA Cup . The mid-1980s represented their most recent period of sustained success , with two League Championships , an FA Cup , and the 1985 European Cup Winners ' Cup . The club 's most recent major trophy was the 1995 FA Cup .   The club 's supporters are known as Evertonians . Everton have a rivalry with neighbours Liverpool , and the two sides contest the Merseyside derby . The club have been based at Goodison Park in Walton , Liverpool , since 1892 , after moving from Anfield following a row over its rent . The club 's home colours are royal blue shirts with white shorts and socks .

evidence_da: American Pie er en 1999 teen sex komedie film skrevet af Adam Herz og instrueret af brødrene Paul og Chris Weitz , i deres instruktør film debut . Det er den første film i American Pie teatralske serie . Filmen var en box-office hit og opfostrede tre direkte fortsættelser: American Pie 2 -LRB- 2001 -RRB- , American Wedding-LRB- 2003 -RRB- , og American Reunion-LRB- 2012 -RRB- . Filmen koncentrerer sig om fem bedste venner -LRB- Jim , Kevin , Oz , Finch , og Stifler-RRB- der deltager East Great Falls High . Med undtagelse af Stifler-LRB- der allerede har mistet sin mødom -RRB-, de fyre lave en pagt om at miste deres mødom før deres high school eksamen . Titlen er lånt fra sangen af samme navn og refererer til en scene i filmen , hvor hovedpersonen er fanget onanere med en tærte efter at have fået at vide, at tredje base føles som '' varm æbletærte ''. Forfatter Adam Herz har udtalt, at titlen også refererer til jagten på at miste en 's jomfruelighed i high school , som er så '' amerikansk som æbletærte . '' Filmens temasang er '' Laid '' af James , som også er temaet for hele serien .   Ud over den primære American Pie saga , der er fire direkte-til-DVD spin-off film bærer titlen American Pie Presents: Band Camp-LRB- 2005 -RRB-, The Naked Mile-LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Beta House -LRB- 2007 -RRB-, og The Book of Love -LRB- 2009 -RRB- .   Som reaktion på succesen med American Reunion , en femte teaterfilm , under arbejdstitlen American Pie 5 blev annonceret den 4 august 2012 .
evidence_en: American Pie is a 1999 teen sex comedy film written by Adam Herz and directed by brothers Paul and Chris Weitz , in their directorial film debut . It is the first film in the American Pie theatrical series . The film was a box-office hit and spawned three direct sequels : American Pie 2 -LRB- 2001 -RRB- , American Wedding -LRB- 2003 -RRB- , and American Reunion -LRB- 2012 -RRB- . The film concentrates on five best friends -LRB- Jim , Kevin , Oz , Finch , and Stifler -RRB- who attend East Great Falls High . With the exception of Stifler -LRB- who has already lost his virginity -RRB- , the guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their high school graduation . The title is borrowed from the song of the same name and refers to a scene in the film , in which the protagonist is caught masturbating with a pie after being told that third base feels like `` warm apple pie '' . Writer Adam Herz has stated that the title also refers to the quest of losing one 's virginity in high school , which is as `` American as apple pie . ''   The film 's theme song is `` Laid '' by James , which is also the theme for the entire franchise .   In addition to the primary American Pie saga , there are four direct-to-DVD spin-off films bearing the title American Pie Presents : Band Camp -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , The Naked Mile -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Beta House -LRB- 2007 -RRB- , and The Book of Love -LRB- 2009 -RRB- .   In response to the success of American Reunion , a fifth theatrical film , under the working title American Pie 5 was announced on August 4 , 2012 .

evidence_da: Musikjournalistik -LRB- eller '' musik kritik '' -RRB- er mediernes kritik og rapportering om populærmusik emner , herunder popmusik, rockmusik, og relaterede stilarter . Journalister begyndte at skrive om musik i det attende århundrede, giver kommentarer til, hvad der nu opfattes som klassisk musik . I 2000'erne er en mere fremtrædende gren af musikjournalistik et aspekt af underholdningsjournalistik , der dækker populærmusik og herunder profiler af sangere og bands , live koncert og albumanmeldelser .
evidence_en: Music journalism -LRB- or `` music criticism '' -RRB- is media criticism and reporting about popular music topics , including pop music , rock music , and related styles . Journalists began writing about music in the eighteenth century , providing commentary on what is now thought of as classical music . In the 2000s , a more prominent branch of music journalism is an aspect of entertainment journalism , covering popular music and including profiles of singers and bands , live concert , and album reviews .

evidence_da: Jim Henson Company -LRB- også kendt på forskellige tidspunkter som Muppets , LLC. , Henson Associates , Ltd, og Jim Henson Productions , Inc. -RRB- er en amerikansk underholdningsvirksomhed , en førende producent af børns og familie underholdning-LRB- på trods af nogle af selskabets værker, der indeholder modne indhold -RRB-, og bedst kendt som skaberne af de berømte Muppets tegn . Grundlagt i 1958 af dukkefører Jim Henson og udfører partner og kone Jane Henson , virksomheden er selvstændigt ejet og drevet af børn af sine grundlæggere .   Henson har produceret mange succesfulde tv-serier , herunder The Muppet Show-LRB- senere ejet af Disney-RRB-, Fraggle Rock , Dinosaurs , Bear i Big Blue House , og Farscape , og skaber Muppet tegn til den langvarige PBS tv-serie , Sesame Street . Virksomheden har også produceret mange film , herunder The Muppet Movie , The Dark Crystal , og Labyrinth . Henson driver også Jim Hensons Creature Shop , en marionet , animatronics og visuelle effekter workshop , som har skabt tegn og effekter for Henson produktioner , samt eksterne producenter .   I 1989 , selskabet trådte fusionsforhandlinger med The Walt Disney Company , men handlen faldt igennem efter Jim Henson 's uventede død i 1990 . Efter Henson 's død og aflyse af Disney fusionen , selskabet blev overtaget af Henson 's børn , Lisa , Cheryl , Brian , John , og Heather , med Brian ved roret . I 2000 blev Henson solgt til EM. TV & Merchandising AG - et tysk medieselskab - men ved udgangen af samme år - EM. TV 's lager kollapsede , og selskabet blev solgt tilbage til Henson familien i 2003 . - LRB- EM. TV havde i mellemtiden solgt rettighederne til Sesame Street Muppets til Sesame Workshop i 2001 . -RRB- I 2004 solgte Henson rettighederne til Muppets og Bear i Big Blue House til The Walt Disney Company , men bevarer rettighederne til resten af sine karakterer , programbibliotek og aktiver . , Brian , Lisa , Cheryl , og Heather Henson køre virksomheden -LRB-søskende og kolleger medejer John Henson døde i februar 2014 -RRB- . Brian Henson fungerer som formand , mens Lisa Henson fungerer som administrerende direktør .   Siden 2000 har The Jim Henson Company haft hovedkvarter på Jim Henson Company Lot , den historiske tidligere Charlie Chaplin Studios , i Hollywood , Californien .
evidence_en: The Jim Henson Company -LRB- also known at various times as Muppets , LLC. , Henson Associates , Ltd. , and Jim Henson Productions , Inc. -RRB- is an American entertainment company , a leading producer of children 's and family entertainment -LRB- despite some of the company 's works containing mature content -RRB- , and best known as the creators of the renowned Muppets characters . Founded in 1958 by puppeteer Jim Henson and performing partner and wife Jane Henson , the company is independently owned and operated by the children of its founders .   Henson has produced many successful television series , including The Muppet Show -LRB- later owned by Disney -RRB- , Fraggle Rock , Dinosaurs , Bear in the Big Blue House , and Farscape , and creates the Muppet characters for the long-running PBS television series , Sesame Street . The company has also produced many films , including The Muppet Movie , The Dark Crystal , and Labyrinth . Henson also operates Jim Henson 's Creature Shop , a puppet , animatronics , and visual effects workshop , which has created characters and effects for Henson productions , as well as outside producers .   In 1989 , the company entered merger negotiations with The Walt Disney Company , but the deal fell through following Jim Henson 's unexpected death in 1990 . Following Henson 's death and the calling off of the Disney merger , the company was taken over by Henson 's children , Lisa , Cheryl , Brian , John , and Heather , with Brian at the helm . In 2000 Henson was sold to EM.TV & Merchandising AG , a German media company , but by the end of that year , EM.TV 's stock collapsed , and the company was sold back to the Henson family in 2003 . -LRB- EM.TV had in the interim sold the rights to the Sesame Street Muppets to Sesame Workshop in 2001 . -RRB-   In 2004 , Henson sold the rights to the Muppets and Bear in the Big Blue House to The Walt Disney Company , but retains the rights to the rest of its characters , program library , and assets . , Brian , Lisa , Cheryl , and Heather Henson run the company -LRB- sibling and fellow co-owner John Henson died in February 2014 -RRB- . Brian Henson serves as chairman , while Lisa Henson serves as CEO .   Since 2000 , The Jim Henson Company has been headquartered at the Jim Henson Company Lot , the historic former Charlie Chaplin Studios , in Hollywood , California .

evidence_da: Tesla , Inc. -LRB, tidligere kaldet Tesla Motors -RRB- er en stor amerikansk bilproducent, energilagringselskab, og solpanel producent baseret i Palo Alto , Californien . Virksomheden blev oprindeligt grundlagt i 2003 af Martin Eberhard og Marc Tarpenning , selv om selskabet også mener Elon Musk , JB Straubel , og Ian Wright blandt sine medstiftere . Virksomheden har specialiseret sig i elbiler , Lithium-ion batteri energilagring, og, gennem deres SolarCity datterselskab , bolig solpaneler .   Tesla fik først udbredt opmærksomhed efter sin produktion af Tesla Roadster , den første elbil , i 2008 . Selskabets andet køretøj , Model S , en elektrisk luksus sedan , debuterede i 2012 og er bygget på Tesla Factory i Californien . Model S har været verdens bedst sælgende plug-in elbil i to år i træk , 2015 og 2016 . Det globale salg nåede milepælen på 150.000 enheder i november 2016 , fire år og fem måneder efter dens indførelse . , Model S rangerer som verdens all-time anden bedst sælgende plug-in efter Nissan Leaf . Model S blev derefter fulgt i september 2015 af Model X , en crossover SUV . Teslas næste køretøj er Model 3 , som blev afsløret i marts 2016 . Det er dømt til frigivelse i 2017 med en basispris på , før nogen regering incitamenter .   , Tesla har solgt over 186.000 elbiler på verdensplan siden leveringaf sin første Tesla Roadster i 2008 , hvilket gør bilproducenten den næststørste globale ren elbil producent efter Renault-Nissan Alliance . I to år i træk , 2015 og 2016 , Tesla rangeret som verdens næstbedst sælgende producent af plug-in elbiler efter BYD Auto . Musk , den administrerende direktør , har sagt , at han forestiller Tesla som en teknologi virksomhed og uafhængig bilproducent , der tager sigte på i sidste ende at tilbyde elbiler til priser overkommelige for den gennemsnitlige forbruger .   Tesla har et netværk af high-powered Superchargers placeret i hele Nordamerika , Europa og Asien for Tesla køretøjer . Virksomheden driver også et destinationsopladningsprogram , hvorbutikker, restauranter og andre spillesteder tilbydes hurtige opladere til deres kunder . Selv om Tesla driver en række produktions- og montageanlæg , er virksomhedens mest ikoniske anlæg Gigafactory 1 nær Reno , Nevada , hvor Panasonic bygger 21-70 celler til Tesla-batterier . Tesla fremstiller også Tesla Powerwall , Powerpack batterier, og solpaneler -LRB- i forskellige formfaktorer -RRB- til hjem og industri applikationer . Elon Musk ejede 20,8 pct.
evidence_en: Tesla , Inc. -LRB- formerly named Tesla Motors -RRB- is a major American automaker , energy storage company , and solar panel manufacturer based in Palo Alto , California . The company was initially founded in 2003 by Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning , although the company also considers Elon Musk , JB Straubel , and Ian Wright amongst its co-founders . The company specializes in electric cars , Lithium-ion battery energy storage , and , through their SolarCity subsidiary , residential solar panels .   Tesla first gained widespread attention following its production of the Tesla Roadster , the first electric sports car , in 2008 . The company 's second vehicle , the Model S , an electric luxury sedan , debuted in 2012 and is built at the Tesla Factory in California . The Model S has been the world 's best-selling plug-in electric car for two years in a row , 2015 and 2016 . Its global sales achieved the 150,000 unit milestone in November 2016 , four years and five months after its introduction . , the Model S ranks as the world 's all-time second best-selling plug-in after the Nissan Leaf . The Model S was then followed in September 2015 by the Model X , a crossover SUV . Tesla 's next vehicle is the Model 3 , which was unveiled in March 2016 . It is slated for release in 2017 with a base price of , before any government incentives .   , Tesla has sold over 186,000 electric cars worldwide since delivery of its first Tesla Roadster in 2008 , making the carmaker the second largest global pure electric car manufacturer after the Renault-Nissan Alliance . For two years running , 2015 and 2016 , Tesla ranked as the world 's second best selling manufacturer of plug-in electric cars after BYD Auto . Musk , the CEO , has said that he envisions Tesla as a technology company and independent automaker , aimed at eventually offering electric cars at prices affordable to the average consumer .   Tesla has a network of high-powered Superchargers located across North America , Europe and Asia for Tesla vehicles . The company also operates a Destination Charging program , under which shops , restaurants and other venues are offered fast chargers for their customers . Although Tesla operates a number of production and assembly plants , the company 's most iconic facility is the Gigafactory 1 near Reno , Nevada , where Panasonic builds 21-70 cells for Tesla batteries . Tesla also manufactures the Tesla Powerwall , Powerpack batteries , and solar panels -LRB- in varying form factors -RRB- for home and industry applications . Elon Musk owned 20.8 % stake in the company as of March 2017 .

evidence_da: Saturday Night Live-LRB-forkortet som SNL-RRB- er en amerikansk sene live tv-sketch komedie og sort show skabt af Lorne Michaels og udviklet af Dick Ebersol . Showet havde premiere på NBC oktober 11 , 1975 , under den oprindelige titel NBC 's Saturday Night . Showets komedie skitser , som parodi moderne kultur og politik , udføres af en stor og varierende stemmer af repertoire og nyere stemmer medlemmer . Hver episode er hostet af en berømthed gæst-LRB-der normalt leverer en åbning monolog og udfører i skitser med stemmer-RRB-og funktioner forestillinger af en musikalsk gæst . En episode normalt begynder med en kold åben skitse, der ender med nogen bryde karakter og proklamerer , '' Live fra New York , det er Saturday Night ! '' , korrekt begynder showet .   I 1980 forlod Michaels serien for at udforske andre muligheder . Han blev erstattet af Jean Doumanian , som blev erstattet af Ebersol efter en sæson med dårlige anmeldelser. Ebersol kørte showet indtil 1985 , da Michaels vendte tilbage; Michaels har været siden da . Mange af SNLs stemmer fundet nationale stjernestatus, mens optræder på showet, og opnåede succes i film og tv , både foran og bag kameraet . Andre i forbindelse med showet , såsom forfattere , har gået videre til en vellykket karriere skabe , skrive , eller hovedrollen i tv og film .   Broadcast fra Studio 8H på NBC 's hovedkvarter i Comcast Building , SNL har luftet 829 episoder siden sin debut , og afsluttede sin fyrre-sekunders sæson maj 20 , 2017 , hvilket gør det til en af de længstkørende netværk tv-programmer i USA . Showformatet er udviklet og genskabt i flere lande , møde med forskellige succesniveauer . Succesfulde skitser har set livet uden for showet som spillefilm , selv om kun to mødtes med kritisk og økonomisk succes: The Blues Brothers -LRB- 1980 -RRB- og Wayne 's World -LRB- 1992 -RRB- . Showet er blevet markedsført på andre måder, herunder hjemmemedier udgivelser af '' bedste af '' og hele sæsoner , og bøger og dokumentarfilm om bag-the-scenes aktiviteter for at køre og udvikle showet .   Gennem fire årtier på luft , Saturday Night Live har modtaget en række priser , herunder 50 Primetime Emmy Awards , to Peabody Awards , og tre Writers Guild of America Awards . I 2000 blev det optaget i National Association of Broadcasters Hall of Fame . Det blev rangeret tiende i TV Guide '' 50 Greatest tv-shows af all time '' liste , og i 2007 blev det opført som en af Time Magazine 's '' 100 Bedste tv-shows af All-TIME ''. Pr. 2012 har den modtaget 156 Emmy-nomineringer , den mest modtaget af et tv-show . Live aspekt af showet har resulteret i flere kontroverser og handlinger censur , med fejl og forsætlige handlinger sabotage af kunstnere såvel som gæster .
evidence_en: Saturday Night Live -LRB- abbreviated as SNL -RRB- is an American late-night live television sketch comedy and variety show created by Lorne Michaels and developed by Dick Ebersol . The show premiered on NBC on October 11 , 1975 , under the original title NBC 's Saturday Night . The show 's comedy sketches , which parody contemporary culture and politics , are performed by a large and varying cast of repertory and newer cast members . Each episode is hosted by a celebrity guest -LRB- who usually delivers an opening monologue and performs in sketches with the cast -RRB- and features performances by a musical guest . An episode normally begins with a cold open sketch that ends with someone breaking character and proclaiming , `` Live from New York , it 's Saturday Night ! '' , properly beginning the show .   In 1980 , Michaels left the series to explore other opportunities . He was replaced by Jean Doumanian , who was replaced by Ebersol after a season of bad reviews . Ebersol ran the show until 1985 , when Michaels returned ; Michaels has remained since then . Many of SNLs cast found national stardom while appearing on the show , and achieved success in film and television , both in front of and behind the camera . Others associated with the show , such as writers , have gone on to successful careers creating , writing , or starring in TV and film .   Broadcast from Studio 8H at NBC 's headquarters in the Comcast Building , SNL has aired 829 episodes since its debut , and concluded its forty-second season on May 20 , 2017 , making it one of the longest-running network television programs in the United States . The show format has been developed and recreated in several countries , meeting with different levels of success . Successful sketches have seen life outside of the show as feature films , although only two met with critical and financial success : The Blues Brothers -LRB- 1980 -RRB- and Wayne 's World -LRB- 1992 -RRB- . The show has been marketed in other ways , including home media releases of `` best of '' and whole seasons , and books and documentaries about behind-the-scenes activities of running and developing the show .   Throughout four decades on air , Saturday Night Live has received a number of awards , including 50 Primetime Emmy Awards , two Peabody Awards , and three Writers Guild of America Awards . In 2000 , it was inducted into the National Association of Broadcasters Hall of Fame . It was ranked tenth in TV Guide `` 50 Greatest TV Shows of All Time '' list , and in 2007 it was listed as one of Time magazine 's `` 100 Best TV Shows of All-TIME '' . As of 2012 , it has received 156 Emmy nominations , the most received by any TV show . The live aspect of the show has resulted in several controversies and acts of censorship , with mistakes and intentional acts of sabotage by performers as well as guests .

evidence_en: Sir Roger George Moore , -LRB- -LSB- mɔər -RSB- 14 October 1927 -- 23 May 2017 -RRB- was an English actor . He is best known for playing secret agent James Bond in seven feature films between 1973 and 1985 . He also played Simon Templar in the television series The Saint between 1962 and 1969 .   Moore took over the role of Bond from Sean Connery in 1972 , and made his first appearance as 007 in Live and Let Die -LRB- 1973 -RRB- . The longest serving Bond to date , he went on to portray the spy in six more films . Appointed a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador in 1991 , Moore was knighted by Queen Elizabeth II in 2003 for `` services to charity '' . In 2007 he received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for his work on television and in film , aptly located at 7007 Hollywood Boulevard . In 2008 , the French government appointed Moore a Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres .

evidence_da: Armageddon er en 1998 amerikansk science fiction katastrofe film instrueret af Michael Bay , produceret af Jerry Bruckheimer , og udgivet af Touchstone Pictures . Filmen følger en gruppe af blå-krave deep-core boremaskiner sendt af NASA for at stoppe en gigantisk asteroide på kollisionskurs med Jorden . Den er udstyret med et ensemble stemmer herunder Bruce Willis , Ben Affleck , Billy Bob Thornton , Liv Tyler , Owen Wilson , Will Patton , Peter Stormare , William Fichtner , Michael Clarke Duncan , Keith David , og Steve Buscemi .   Armageddon åbnede i teatre kun to og en halv måned efter den lignende asteroide impact-baserede film Deep Impact , som medvirkede Robert Duvall og Morgan Freeman . Armageddon klarede sig bedre på box office , mens astronomer beskrev Deep Impact som værende mere videnskabeligt korrekte . Armageddon var en international box-office succes på trods af generelt negative anmeldelser fra kritikere , bliver den højest indtjenende film i 1998 på verdensplan .
evidence_en: Armageddon is a 1998 American science fiction disaster film directed by Michael Bay , produced by Jerry Bruckheimer , and released by Touchstone Pictures . The film follows a group of blue-collar deep-core drillers sent by NASA to stop a gigantic asteroid on a collision course with Earth . It features an ensemble cast including Bruce Willis , Ben Affleck , Billy Bob Thornton , Liv Tyler , Owen Wilson , Will Patton , Peter Stormare , William Fichtner , Michael Clarke Duncan , Keith David , and Steve Buscemi .   Armageddon opened in theaters only two and a half months after the similar asteroid impact-based film Deep Impact , which starred Robert Duvall and Morgan Freeman . Armageddon fared better at the box office , while astronomers described Deep Impact as being more scientifically accurate . Armageddon was an international box-office success despite generally negative reviews from critics , becoming the highest-grossing film of 1998 worldwide .

Selvom Chopra oprindeligt stræbte efter at studere luftfartsteknik, accepterede hun tilbud om at slutte sig til den indiske filmindustri , som kom som følge af hendes festspil vinder , hvilket gør hende Bollywood debut i The Hero-LRB- 2003 -RRB- . Hun spillede den førende dame i box-office hits Andaaz -LRB- 2003 -RRB- og Mujhse Shaadi Karogi -LRB- 2004 -RRB-, og tjente ros for hendes breakout rolle i 2004 thriller Aitraaz .
