evidence_en: Shantel VanSanten -LRB- born July 25 , 1985 -RRB- is an American model and actress . As a model , she has been featured in the magazines Teen Vogue and Seventeen . On television , she played the role of Quinn James in the CW teen drama series One Tree Hill , recurred as Detective Patty Spivot in the CW show The Flash , and stars as Julie Swagger the wife of lead character Bob Lee Swagger on the USA Network series Shooter . On film , she has appeared in The Final Destination , You and I , and Something Wicked .

evidence_da: Demetria Devonne Lovato -LRB- -LSB- יdיmi_lo-יי-ייto -RSB- eller ; født August 20 , 1992 -RRB- er en amerikansk sanger , sangskriver , og skuespiller . Efter at have debuteret som barneskuespiller i Barney & Friends , steg Lovato til en fremtrædende plads i 2008, da hun medvirkede i Disney Channel tv-filmen Camp Rock og udgav sin debutsingle '' This Is Me '', som toppede som nummer ni på Billboard Hot 100 . Succesen med filmen og dens soundtrack resulterede i en pladekontrakt med Hollywood Records . Hendes debut album , Do n't Forget -LRB- 2008 -RRB-, debuterede som nummer to på den amerikanske Billboard 200 . Det følgende år , Lovato blev støbt som den titulære karakter af tv-serien Sonny med en chance, og hun udgav sin sophomore album , Here We Go Again , som blev hendes første til toppen af Billboard 200 chart .   Efter udgivelsen af yderligere tv-film og deres soundtracks i 2010 , herunder Camp Rock 2 : The Final Jam , Lovato 's personlige problemer sætte sin karriere på en pause og førte til afbrydelse af Sonny med en chance efter en anden sæson . Hun kom ind på et behandlingscenter i november 2010 for at søge hjælp til afhængighed, en spiseforstyrrelse og selvskade. Mens der, hun blev diagnosticeret med bipolar lidelse . Arbejdet med hendes tredje studiealbum , Unbroken -LRB- 2011 -RRB- begyndte, efter at hun med succes afsluttede behandlingen . Albummet adresser flere af hendes vanskeligheder . Dens ledende single , '' Skyskraber '', blev Lovato 's anden top 10 indrejse i USA, mens dens anden single , '' Giv dit hjerte en pause '' , blev certificeret tredobbelt platin i landet . Lovato var dommer og mentor på den amerikanske version af X Factor i 2012 og 2013 . Hendes tredje album , Demi -LRB- 2013 -RRB- åbnede med første uges salg på 110.000 eksemplarer . Den ledende single fra hendes eponyme album , '' Heart Attack '', blev hendes tredje top 10 i USA, og albummet opfostrede yderligere tre singler . Samtidig med at fremme projektet , Lovato udgivet en bog med titlen Staying Strong: 365 Days a Year -LRB- 2013 -RRB- . Hun vendte også tilbage til at fungere som en tilbagevendende karakter i Glee , og udgivet en erindringsbog i 2014 . Lovato 's femte album , Confident-LRB- 2015 -RRB-, nåede nummer to på Billboard 200 . Dens ledende single '' Cool for the Summer '' blev til sidst certificeret dobbelt platin af Recording Industry Association of America . Alle fem af Lovato 's albums har modtaget en guld certificering i USA .   Musikalsk betragtes Lovato som en pop - poprock og R&B-kunstner . Lovato har modtaget et betydeligt antal udmærkelser , herunder en MTV Video Music Award , 13 Teen Choice Awards , fem People 's Choice Awards , en ALMA Award , en Latin American Music Award og en Grammy Award nominering . I 2013 , Maxim rangeret hendes 26:e på sin Hot 100 liste og Billboard rangeret hendes anden på sin Social 50 Artists of the Year liste . Uden for underholdningsindustrien har Lovato været involveret i flere sociale og miljømæssige årsager siden lanceringen af hendes karriere . I maj 2013 blev hun citeret for sin dedikation som mentor for teenagere og unge voksne med mentale sundhedsudfordringer på en National Children 's Mental Health Awareness Day hostet af Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration i Washington , D.C. . Hun er også blevet fortaler for LGBT-miljøet og kvinders rettigheder . I 2014 blev hun annonceret som Grand Marshal for LA Pride uge , og samme år blev hun ansigtet for Human Rights Campaign 's americans for Marriage Equality Campaign . I april 2016 blev Lovato hædret med GLAAD Vanguard Award for at gøre en betydelig forskel i at fremme lige rettigheder for LGBT-personer .
evidence_en: Demetria Devonne Lovato -LRB- -LSB- ˈdɛmi_loʊ-ˈvɑːtoʊ -RSB- or ; born August 20 , 1992 -RRB- is an American singer , songwriter , and actress . After making her debut as a child actress in Barney & Friends , Lovato rose to prominence in 2008 when she starred in the Disney Channel television film Camp Rock and released her debut single `` This Is Me '' which peaked at number nine on the Billboard Hot 100 . The success of the film and its soundtrack resulted in a recording contract with Hollywood Records . Her debut album , Do n't Forget -LRB- 2008 -RRB- , debuted at number two on the US Billboard 200 . The following year , Lovato was cast as the titular character of the television series Sonny with a Chance and she released her sophomore album , Here We Go Again , which became her first one to top the Billboard 200 chart .   After the release of additional television films and their soundtracks in 2010 , including Camp Rock 2 : The Final Jam , Lovato 's personal issues put her career on a hiatus and led to the discontinuation of Sonny with a Chance after a second season . She entered a treatment center in November 2010 to seek help for addictions , an eating disorder , and self-harm . While there , she was diagnosed with bipolar disorder . Work on her third studio album , Unbroken -LRB- 2011 -RRB- , began after she successfully completed treatment . The album addresses several of her difficulties . Its lead single , `` Skyscraper '' , became Lovato 's second top 10 entry in the US , while its second single , `` Give Your Heart a Break '' , was certified triple platinum in the country . Lovato was a judge and mentor on the American version of The X Factor in 2012 and 2013 . Her third album , Demi -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , opened with first-week sales of 110,000 copies . The lead single from her eponymous album , `` Heart Attack '' , became her third top 10 in the US and the album spawned three more singles . While promoting the project , Lovato released a book titled Staying Strong : 365 Days a Year -LRB- 2013 -RRB- . She also returned to acting as a recurring character in Glee , and released a memoir in 2014 . Lovato 's fifth album , Confident -LRB- 2015 -RRB- , reached number two on the Billboard 200 . Its lead single `` Cool for the Summer '' was eventually certified double platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America . All five of Lovato 's albums have received a gold certification in the US .   Musically , Lovato is considered a pop , pop rock , and R&B artist . Lovato has received a considerable number of accolades , including an MTV Video Music Award , 13 Teen Choice Awards , five People 's Choice Awards , an ALMA Award , a Latin American Music Award and a Grammy Award nomination . In 2013 , Maxim ranked her 26th on its Hot 100 list and Billboard ranked her second on its Social 50 Artists of the Year list . Outside the entertainment industry , Lovato has been involved with several social and environmental causes since the launch of her career . In May 2013 , she was cited for her dedication as a mentor to teens and young adults with mental health challenges at a National Children 's Mental Health Awareness Day hosted by the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration in Washington , D.C. . She has also become an advocate for the LGBT community , and women 's rights . In 2014 , she was announced as the Grand Marshal for LA Pride week , and that same year she became the face for Human Rights Campaign 's Americans for Marriage Equality Campaign . In April 2016 , Lovato was honored with the GLAAD Vanguard Award for making a significant difference in promoting equal rights for LGBT people .

evidence_da: '' Dirty Diana '' er en sang af den amerikanske kunstner Michael Jackson . Det er det niende nummer på Jacksons syvende studiealbum , Bad . Sangen blev udgivet af Epic Records april 18 , 1988 som den femte single fra albummet . Det præsenterer en hårdere rock lyd ligner '' Beat It '' fra Thriller og en guitar solo spillet af Steve Stevens . '' Dirty Diana '' blev skrevet og co-produceret af Jackson , og produceret af Quincy Jones . Sangene tekster vedrører groupies . '' Dirty Diana '' har et moderat tempo og spilles i nøglen til G-mol .   '' Dirty Diana '' modtog blandede anmeldelser fra moderne musikkritikere , men var en kommerciel succes på verdensplan i 1988 , charting på No. 1 på USA Billboard Hot 100 . Sangen også kortlagt inden for top ti i flere lande , herunder Det Forenede Kongerige , Frankrig , Italien , og New Zealand . '' Dirty Diana '' var den femte og sidste Hot 100 nummer et single fra Bad . I 2009 , efter Jacksons død i juni , sangen genindtrådte diagrammer , primært på grund af digital download salg . En musikvideo til '' Dirty Diana '' blev filmet foran et levende publikum og udgivet i 1988 .
evidence_en: `` Dirty Diana '' is a song by American artist Michael Jackson . It is the ninth track on Jackson 's seventh studio album , Bad . The song was released by Epic Records on April 18 , 1988 as the fifth single from the album . It presents a harder rock sound similar to `` Beat It '' from Thriller and a guitar solo played by Steve Stevens . `` Dirty Diana '' was written and co-produced by Jackson , and produced by Quincy Jones . The songs lyrics pertain to groupies . `` Dirty Diana '' has a moderate tempo and is played in the key of G minor .   `` Dirty Diana '' received mixed reviews from contemporary music critics , but was a commercial success worldwide in 1988 , charting at No. 1 on the United States Billboard Hot 100 . The song also charted within the top ten in multiple countries , including the United Kingdom , France , Italy , and New Zealand . `` Dirty Diana '' was the fifth and final Hot 100 number one single from Bad . In 2009 , after Jackson 's death in June , the song re-entered charts , mainly due to digital download sales . A music video for `` Dirty Diana '' was filmed in front of a live audience and released in 1988 .

evidence_da: Venus Ebony Starr Williams -LRB- født 17 juni , 1980 -RRB- er en amerikansk professionel tennisspiller, der generelt betragtes som en af de all-time greats af kvinders tennis, og som - sammen med yngre søster Serena Williams , er krediteret med indvarsle en ny æra af pow er og atletik på kvindernes professionelle tennis tour.   Rangeret World No. 11 i single pr januar 28 , 2017 , Williams er blevet rangeret World No. 1 af Women 's Tennis Association ved tre lejligheder , i alt 11 uger . Hun blev første gang verdens nummer 1 den 25. februar 2002 , den første afroamerikanske kvinde , der gjorde det i Open Era . juni 2002 blev Venus og Serena de første søstre til at holde henholdsvis nummer 1 og Nr. 2 på singleranglisten . juni 2010 blev Venus co-No . 1 i double med Serena, efter at de vandt deres fjerde grand slam-double titel i træk på Roland Garros . I kraft af denne dobbeltgænger blev Venus en af syv kvinder til at nå nr. juni 2010 besatte Venus og Serena igen henholdsvis nr. Dette kom næsten præcis 8 år efter første gennemførelse af denne bedrift . På det tidspunkt havde Venus netop fejret sin 30 års fødselsdag og Serena var tre måneder genert af hendes 29 års fødselsdag, begge aldre, hvor mange af deres jævnaldrende var gået på pension.   Hendes syv Grand Slam singler titler binder hende tolvte på all-time listen , mere end nogen anden aktiv kvindelig spiller undtagen søster Serena . Hun har også vundet fjorten Grand Slam double titler og to mixed double titler . Hendes fem Wimbledon singler titler binder hende med to andre kvinder til ottende plads på all-time listen . Williams er en af fire kvinder, der har vundet fem eller flere Wimbledon singler titler i Open Era . Fra 2000 Wimbledon Championships til 2001 US Open , Williams vandt fire af de seks Grand Slam singler turneringer afholdt . Hun er en af kun seks kvinder i Open Era at vinde 200 eller flere vigtigste trække Grand Slam singler kampe . Ved French Open 2017 udvidede Williams sin rekord som all-time leader , mandlige eller kvindelige , i Grand Slams spillede , med 74 . Desuden satte Williams ' løb til Australian Open Women's Singles finalen i 2017 rekorden for længste span mellem singler slam finaler i den åbne æra på 20 år , i begyndelsen af som var præget af hendes optræden i single finalen ved 1997 US Open .   Williams har vundet fire olympiske guldmedaljer , en i single og tre i damedouble , sammen med en sølvmedalje i mixed double .  Hun og Serena har vundet flere OL-guldmedaljer end nogen anden tennisspiller , mand eller kvinde . Venus har også rekorden for de mest olympiske medaljer vundet af en mandlig eller kvindelig tennisspiller , delt med Kathleen McKane Godfree . Hun er den eneste tennisspiller, der har vundet en medalje ved fire separate Olympiske Lege . Ved OL i Sydney i 2000 blev Williams kun den anden spiller til at vinde OL-guldmedaljer i både single og double ved de samme Olympiske Lege , efter Helen Wills Moody i 1924 .   Med 49 singler titler , Williams er bag kun Serena blandt aktive spillere på WTA Tour . Hendes 35-match sejrsrække fra 2000 Wimbledon Championships til 2000 Generali Ladies Linz turnering finalen er den længste siden januar 1, 2000 . Hun er også en af kun tre aktive WTA spillere at have gjort finalen i alle fire Grand Slams , sammen med Serena og russiske Maria Sharapova . Ved at vinde sin 49 th karriere singler titel på 2016 Taiwan Open , Williams blev den 5th ældste WTA Tour titlist i Open Era , på 35 år , 7 måneder og 28 dage .   Williams har spillet mod sin søster i 27 professionelle kampe siden 1998 , og vandt 11 . De har spillet mod hinanden i ni Grand Slam-singler finalen , med Venus holder en 2-7 rekord . Venus har 8 runner-up finish i grand slam-singler begivenheder med Martina Hingis er den eneste spiller andre end Serena at slå Venus i en stor finale ved 1997 US Open . Begyndende med 2002 Franske Open , de modsatte sig hinanden i fire på hinanden følgende Grand Slam-singler finalen , første gang søstre havde så mødtes i Open Era . På den anden side har parret vundet 14 Grand Slam double titler spiller sammen og er ubesejret i Grand Slam-finaler .
evidence_en: Venus Ebony Starr Williams -LRB- born June 17 , 1980 -RRB- is an American professional tennis player who is generally regarded as one of the all-time greats of women 's tennis and who , along with younger sister Serena Williams , is credited with ushering in a new era of power and athleticism on the women 's professional tennis tour .   Ranked World No. 11 in singles as of January 28 , 2017 , Williams has been ranked World No. 1 by the Women 's Tennis Association on three occasions , for a total of 11 weeks . She first became the World No. 1 on February 25 , 2002 , the first African American woman to do so in the Open Era . On 10 June 2002 , Venus and Serena became the first sisters to hold the No. 1 and No. 2 spots in the singles rankings , respectively . On 7 June 2010 , Venus became co-No . 1 in doubles with Serena after they won their 4th consecutive grand slam doubles title at Roland Garros . By virtue of that doubles ascension , Venus became one of seven women to reach No. 1 in singles and No. 1 in doubles . On 21 June 2010 , Venus and Serena again occupied the No. 2 and No. 1 spots in the singles rankings , respectively . This came almost exactly 8 years after first accomplishing this feat . At the time , Venus had just celebrated her 30th birthday and Serena was three months shy of her 29th birthday , both ages at which many of their peers had retired .   Her seven Grand Slam singles titles ties her twelfth on the all-time list , more than any other active female player except sister Serena . She has also won fourteen Grand Slam doubles titles and two mixed doubles titles . Her five Wimbledon singles titles ties her with two other women for eighth place on the all-time list . Williams is one of four women to have won five or more Wimbledon singles titles in the Open Era . From the 2000 Wimbledon Championships to the 2001 US Open , Williams won four of the six Grand Slam singles tournaments held . She is one of only six women in the Open Era to win 200 or more main draw Grand Slam singles matches . At the 2017 French Open , Williams extended her record as the all-time leader , male or female , in Grand Slams played , with 74 . Furthermore , Williams ' run to the 2017 Australian Open Women 's Singles final set the record for longest span between singles slam finals in the open era at 20 years , the beginning of which was marked by her appearance in the singles final at the 1997 US Open .   Williams has won four Olympic gold medals , one in singles and three in women 's doubles , along with a silver medal in mixed doubles .  She and Serena have won more Olympic gold medals than any other tennis player , male or female . Venus also holds the record for the most Olympic medals won by a male or female tennis player , shared with Kathleen McKane Godfree . She is the only tennis player to have won a medal at four separate Olympic Games . At the 2000 Sydney Olympics , Williams became only the second player to win Olympic gold medals in both singles and doubles at the same Olympic Games , after Helen Wills Moody in 1924 .   With 49 singles titles , Williams is behind only Serena among active players on the WTA Tour . Her 35-match winning streak from the 2000 Wimbledon Championships to the 2000 Generali Ladies Linz tournament final is the longest since January 1 , 2000 . She is also one of only three active WTA players to have made the finals of all four Grand Slams , along with Serena and Russian Maria Sharapova . By winning her 49th career singles title at the 2016 Taiwan Open , Williams became the 5th oldest WTA Tour titlist in the Open Era , at 35 years , 7 months and 28 days .   Williams has played against her sister in 27 professional matches since 1998 , and won 11 . They have played against each other in nine Grand Slam singles finals , with Venus holding a 2-7 record . Venus has 8 runner-up finishes in grand slam singles events with Martina Hingis being the only player other than Serena to beat Venus in a major final at the 1997 US Open . Beginning with the 2002 French Open , they opposed each other in four consecutive Grand Slam singles finals , the first time sisters had so met in the Open Era . On the other side , the pair have won 14 Grand Slam doubles titles playing alongside each other and are undefeated in Grand Slam finals .

evidence_da: Jared Joseph Leto -LRB- -LSB- -LB-rsb- født 26. december 1971 -RRB - er en amerikansk skuespiller , singer-songwriter og instruktør . Efter at have startet sin karriere med tv-optrædener i begyndelsen af 1990'erne , Leto opnået anerkendelse for sin rolle som Jordan Catalano på tv-serien My So-Called Life -LRB- 1994 -RRB- . Han fik sin filmdebut i How to Make a American Quilt-LRB- 1995 -RRB- og fik kritisk ros for sin præstation i Prefontaine -LRB- 1997 -RRB- . Leto spillede biroller i The Thin Red Line -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , Fight Club -LRB- 1999 -RRB- og American Psycho-LRB- 2000 -RRB-, samt hovedrollen i Urban Legend -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , og tjente kritisk anerkendelse efter portrættere heroin narkoman Harry Goldfarb i R tvetydige for en drøm -LRB- 2000 -RRB- . Han begyndte senere at fokusere i stigende grad på sin musikkarriere , vender tilbage til at handle med Panic Room -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , Kapitel 27 -LRB- 2007 -RRB- og Mr. Nobody -LRB- 2009 -RRB- . I 2012 instruerede han dokumentarfilmen Artifact . I 2016 spillede han DC Comics superskurkJoker en joker i DC Extended Universe filmen Suicide Squad .   Leto 's præstation som en transseksuelle kvinde i Dallas Buyers Club -LRB- 2013 -RRB- gav ham en Academy Award , en Golden Globe Award , og en Screen Actors Guild Award for bedste mandlige birolle . Leto anses for at være en metode skuespiller , kendt for sin konstante hengivenhed til og forskning af hans roller . Han forbliver ofte helt i karakter for varigheden af skyderiet tidsplaner for hans film , selv til det punkt, at skade hans helbred . Han er også kendt for at være selektiv om sine filmroller .   Leto er den ledende vokalist , multi-instrumentalist og vigtigste sangskriver for Tredive sekunder til Mars , et band han dannede i 1998 i Los Angeles , Californien , med sin storebror Shannon Leto . Deres debut album , 30 Sekunder til Mars -LRB- 2002 -RRB-, blev udgivet til positive anmeldelser, men kun til begrænset succes . Bandet opnåede verdensomspændende berømmelse med udgivelsen af deres andet album A Beautiful Lie -LRB- 2005 -RRB- . Deres følgende udgivelser , This Is War -LRB- 2009 -RRB- and Love , Lust , Faith and Dreams -LRB- 2013 -RRB- fik yderligere kritisk og kommerciel succes . I september 2014 har bandet solgt over 15 millioner albums på verdensplan . Leto har også instrueret musikvideoer , herunder MTV Video Music Award - vindende '' The Kill '' -LRB- 2006 -RRB- ' '' Kings and Queens '' -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , og '' Up in the Air '' -LRB- 2013 -RRB- .
evidence_en: Jared Joseph Leto -LRB- -LSB- ˈlɛtoʊ -RSB- born December 26 , 1971 -RRB- is an American actor , singer-songwriter , and director . After starting his career with television appearances in the early 1990s , Leto achieved recognition for his role as Jordan Catalano on the television series My So-Called Life -LRB- 1994 -RRB- . He made his film debut in How to Make an American Quilt -LRB- 1995 -RRB- and received critical praise for his performance in Prefontaine -LRB- 1997 -RRB- . Leto played supporting roles in The Thin Red Line -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , Fight Club -LRB- 1999 -RRB- and American Psycho -LRB- 2000 -RRB- , as well as the lead role in Urban Legend -LRB- 1998 -RRB- , and earned critical acclaim after portraying heroin addict Harry Goldfarb in Requiem for a Dream -LRB- 2000 -RRB- . He later began focusing increasingly on his music career , returning to acting with Panic Room -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , Alexander -LRB- 2004 -RRB- , Lord of War -LRB- 2005 -RRB- , Lonely Hearts -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , Chapter 27 -LRB- 2007 -RRB- , and Mr. Nobody -LRB- 2009 -RRB- . In 2012 , he directed the documentary film Artifact . In 2016 , he played the DC Comics supervillain Joker in the DC Extended Universe film Suicide Squad .   Leto 's performance as a transgender woman in Dallas Buyers Club -LRB- 2013 -RRB- earned him an Academy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Supporting Actor . Leto is considered to be a method actor , known for his constant devotion to and research of his roles . He often remains completely in character for the duration of the shooting schedules of his films , even to the point of adversely affecting his health . He is also known to be selective about his film roles .   Leto is the lead vocalist , multi-instrumentalist and main songwriter for Thirty Seconds to Mars , a band he formed in 1998 in Los Angeles , California , with his older brother Shannon Leto . Their debut album , 30 Seconds to Mars -LRB- 2002 -RRB- , was released to positive reviews but only to limited success . The band achieved worldwide fame with the release of their second album A Beautiful Lie -LRB- 2005 -RRB- . Their following releases , This Is War -LRB- 2009 -RRB- and Love , Lust , Faith and Dreams -LRB- 2013 -RRB- , received further critical and commercial success . As of September 2014 , the band has sold over 15 million albums worldwide . Leto has also directed music videos , including the MTV Video Music Award -- winning `` The Kill '' -LRB- 2006 -RRB- , `` Kings and Queens '' -LRB- 2009 -RRB- , and `` Up in the Air '' -LRB- 2013 -RRB- .

evidence_da: Demens er en bred kategori af hjernesygdomme, der forårsager en langsigtet og ofte gradvis fald i evnen til at tænke og huske, at der er stor nok til at påvirke en persons daglige funktion . Andre almindelige symptomer omfatter følelsesmæssige problemer , problemer med sprog , og et fald i motivationen . En persons bevidsthed er normalt ikke påvirket . En demens diagnose kræver en ændring fra en persons sædvanlige mentale funktion og en større tilbagegang, end man ville forvente på grund af aldring . Disse sygdomme har også en betydelig indvirkning på en persons pårørende .   Den mest almindelige form for demens er Alzheimers sygdom , som udgør 50 - 70 % af tilfældene . Andre almindelige typer omfatter vaskulær demens -LRB- 25 % -RRB- , Lewy body demens -LRB- 15 % -RRB- og frontotemporal demens . Mindre almindelige årsager omfatter normal trykhydrocephalus , Parkinsons sygdom , syfilis , og Creutzfeldt - Jakobs sygdom blandt andre . Mere end én type demens kan eksistere i samme person . En lille del af tilfældene kører i familier . I DSM-5 , demens blev omklassificeret som en neurokognitiv lidelse , med forskellige grader af sværhedsgrad . Diagnosen er normalt baseret på historien om sygdommen og kognitive test med medicinsk billedbehandling og blodarbejde, der anvendes til at udelukke andre mulige årsager. Mini mental tilstand undersøgelse er en almindeligt anvendt kognitiv test . Bestræbelserne på at forebygge demens omfatter forsøg på at mindske risikofaktorer såsom forhøjet blodtryk, rygning, diabetes og fedme . Screening af den generelle befolkning for lidelsen anbefales ikke.   Der er ingen kur mod demens. Kolinesterasehæmmere såsom donepezil anvendes ofte og kan være gavnlige i mild til moderat lidelse. Den samlede fordel kan dog være mindre . Der er mange foranstaltninger, der kan forbedre livskvaliteten for mennesker med demens og deres pårørende. Kognitive og adfærdsmæssige indgreb kan være passende . Uddannelse og yde følelsesmæssig støtte til omsorgsperson er vigtigt . Træningsprogrammer kan være gavnlige med hensyn til aktiviteter i dagligdagen og potentielt forbedre resultaterne . Behandling af adfærdsmæssige problemer med antipsykotika er almindelig, men normalt ikke anbefales på grund af den lille fordel og bivirkninger, herunder en øget risiko for død.   Globalt ramte demens omkring 46 millioner mennesker i 2015 . Omkring 10 % af befolkningen udvikler sygdommen på et tidspunkt i deres liv . Det bliver mere almindeligt med alderen . Ca. 3 % af befolkningen i alderen 65 år - 74 år har demens , 19 % mellem 75 og 84 år og næsten halvdelen af personer over 85 år . I 2013 resulterede demens i omkring 1,7 millioner dødsfald fra 0,8 millioner i 1990 . Efterhånden som flere mennesker lever længere , bliver demens mere almindelige i befolkningen som helhed . For personer i en bestemt alder kan det dog være ved at blive mindre hyppigt , i hvert fald i den udviklede verden , på grund af et fald i risikofaktorerne . Det er en af de mest almindelige årsager til handicap blandt de gamle . Det menes at resultere i økonomiske omkostninger på 604 milliarder usd om året . Mennesker med demens er ofte fysisk eller kemisk tilbageholdende i højere grad end nødvendigt , hvilket rejser spørgsmål om menneskerettigheder . Social stigmatisering mod de berørte er almindelig .
evidence_en: Dementia is a broad category of brain diseases that cause a long term and often gradual decrease in the ability to think and remember that is great enough to affect a person 's daily functioning . Other common symptoms include emotional problems , problems with language , and a decrease in motivation . A person 's consciousness is usually not affected . A dementia diagnosis requires a change from a person 's usual mental functioning and a greater decline than one would expect due to aging . These diseases also have a significant effect on a person 's caregivers .   The most common type of dementia is Alzheimer 's disease , which makes up 50 % to 70 % of cases . Other common types include vascular dementia -LRB- 25 % -RRB- , Lewy body dementia -LRB- 15 % -RRB- , and frontotemporal dementia . Less common causes include normal pressure hydrocephalus , Parkinson 's disease , syphilis , and Creutzfeldt -- Jakob disease among others . More than one type of dementia may exist in the same person . A small proportion of cases run in families . In the DSM-5 , dementia was reclassified as a neurocognitive disorder , with various degrees of severity . Diagnosis is usually based on history of the illness and cognitive testing with medical imaging and blood work used to rule out other possible causes . The mini mental state examination is one commonly used cognitive test . Efforts to prevent dementia include trying to decrease risk factors such as high blood pressure , smoking , diabetes , and obesity . Screening the general population for the disorder is not recommended .   There is no cure for dementia . Cholinesterase inhibitors such as donepezil are often used and may be beneficial in mild to moderate disorder . Overall benefit , however , may be minor . There are many measures that can improve the quality of life of people with dementia and their caregivers . Cognitive and behavioral interventions may be appropriate . Educating and providing emotional support to the caregiver is important . Exercise programs may be beneficial with respect to activities of daily living and potentially improve outcomes . Treatment of behavioral problems with antipsychotics is common but not usually recommended due to the little benefit and side effects , including an increased risk of death .   Globally , dementia affected about 46 million people in 2015 . About 10 % of people develop the disorder at some point in their lives . It becomes more common with age . About 3 % of people between the ages of 65 -- 74 have dementia , 19 % between 75 and 84 and nearly half of those over 85 years of age . In 2013 dementia resulted in about 1.7 million deaths up from 0.8 million in 1990 . As more people are living longer , dementia is becoming more common in the population as a whole . For people of a specific age , however , it may be becoming less frequent , at least in the developed world , due to a decrease in risk factors . It is one of the most common causes of disability among the old . It is believed to result in economic costs of 604 billion USD a year . People with dementia are often physically or chemically restrained to a greater degree than necessary , raising issues of human rights . Social stigma against those affected is common .

evidence_da: Lee Jun-fan -LRB- ; November 27 , 1940 - 20 juli , 1973 -RRB-, kendt professionelt som Bruce Lee , var en Hong Kong og amerikansk kampsport , skuespiller , filosof , filmskaber , og grundlægger af kampsport Jeet Kune Do . Lee var søn af kantonesisk operastjerne Lee Hoi-chuen . Han er bredt betragtet af kommentatorer , kritikere , medier, og andre martial kunstnere til at være en af de mest indflydelsesrige martial kunstnere gennem tiderne , og en pop kultur ikon i det 20. Han er ofte krediteret med at bidrage til at ændre den måde asiater blev præsenteret i amerikanske film .   Lee blev født i Chinatown , San Francisco , november 27 , 1940 , til forældre fra Hong Kong og voksede op i Kowloon , Hong Kong , med sin familie indtil hans sene teenageår . Han blev introduceret til filmindustrien af sin far og dukkede op i flere film som et barn skuespiller . Lee flyttede til USA i en alder af 18 for at modtage sin videregående uddannelse , på University of Washington , i Seattle, og det var i løbet af denne tid, at han begyndte at undervise kampsport . Hans Hong Kong og Hollywood-producerede film forhøjet den traditionelle Hong Kong kampsport film til et nyt niveau af popularitet og anerkendelse , gnister en bølge af interesse for kinesisk kampsport i Vesten i 1970'erne . Retningen og tonen i hans film ændret og påvirket kampsport og kampsport film i USA , Hong Kong og resten af verden .   Han er kendt for sine roller i fem spillefilm: Lo Wei 's The Big Boss -LRB- 1971 -RRB- og Fist of Fury -LRB- 1972 -RRB- ; Golden Harvest 's Way of the Dragon -LRB- 1972 -RRB-, instrueret og skrevet af Lee ; Golden Harvest og Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon -LRB- 1973 -RRB- og The Game of Death -LRB- 1978 -RRB- , begge instrueret af Robert Clouse . Lee blev en ikonisk figur kendt over hele verden - især blandt kineserne , da han portrætterede kinesisk nationalisme i sine film . Han er uddannet i kunsten at Wing Chun og senere kombineret hans andre påvirkninger fra forskellige kilder , i en ånd af hans personlige kampsport filosofi , som han kaldte Jeet Kune Do-LRB- Vejen for intercepting Fist-RRB- .  Lee havde dobbelt statsborgerskab i Hong Kong og USA . Han døde i Kowloon Tong juli 20 , 1973 i en alder af 32 .
evidence_en: Lee Jun-fan -LRB- ; November 27 , 1940 -- July 20 , 1973 -RRB- , known professionally as Bruce Lee , was a Hong Kong and American martial artist , actor , philosopher , filmmaker , and founder of the martial art Jeet Kune Do . Lee was the son of Cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-chuen . He is widely considered by commentators , critics , media , and other martial artists to be one of the most influential martial artists of all time , and a pop culture icon of the 20th century . He is often credited with helping to change the way Asians were presented in American films .   Lee was born in Chinatown , San Francisco , on November 27 , 1940 , to parents from Hong Kong and was raised in Kowloon , Hong Kong , with his family until his late teens . He was introduced to the film industry by his father and appeared in several films as a child actor . Lee moved to the United States at the age of 18 to receive his higher education , at the University of Washington , at Seattle and it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts . His Hong Kong and Hollywood-produced films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts film to a new level of popularity and acclaim , sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s . The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced martial arts and martial arts films in the US , Hong Kong and the rest of the world .   He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss -LRB- 1971 -RRB- and Fist of Fury -LRB- 1972 -RRB- ; Golden Harvest 's Way of the Dragon -LRB- 1972 -RRB- , directed and written by Lee ; Golden Harvest and Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon -LRB- 1973 -RRB- and The Game of Death -LRB- 1978 -RRB- , both directed by Robert Clouse . Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world , particularly among the Chinese , as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films . He trained in the art of Wing Chun and later combined his other influences from various sources , in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy , which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do -LRB- The Way of the Intercepting Fist -RRB- .  Lee held dual nationality of Hong Kong and the US . He died in Kowloon Tong on July 20 , 1973 at the age of 32 .

evidence_da: Usa's Kongres er tokammerlovgivende forsamling for den føderale regering i USA bestående af to kamre : Senatet og Repræsentanternes Hus . Kongressen mødes i Capitol i Washington , DC Både senatorer og repræsentanter vælges ved direkte valg , selv om ledige stillinger i Senatet kan besættes ved en guvernørudnævnelse . Medlemmer er normalt tilknyttet det republikanske parti eller det demokratiske parti , og kun sjældent til en tredjepart eller som uafhængige . Kongressen har 535 stemmeberettigede medlemmer : 435 repræsentanter og 100 senatorer . Repræsentanternes Hus har seks medlemmer , der ikke stemmer , ud over sine 435 stemmeberettigede medlemmer . Disse medlemmer kan dog sidde i Kongressens udvalg og indføre lovgivning . Disse medlemmer repræsenterer Washington , DC , Puerto Rico , American Samoa , Guam , De Nordlige Mariana Øer og De Amerikanske Jomfruøer .   Medlemmerne af Repræsentanternes Hus tjener toårige perioder, der repræsenterer befolkningen i en enkelt valgkreds , kendt som et "" distrikt "". Kongressens distrikter er fordelt til stater af befolkningen ved hjælp af USA Census resultater , forudsat at hver stat har mindst én Kongressens repræsentant . Hver stat , uanset befolkning eller størrelse , har to senatorer . I øjeblikket er der 100 senatorer, der repræsenterer de 50 stater . Hver senator er valgt på fri fod i deres stat for en seksårig periode , med vilkår forskudt , så hvert andet år cirka en tredjedel af Senatet er op til valg .
evidence_en: The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the federal government of the United States consisting of two chambers : the Senate and the House of Representatives . The Congress meets in the Capitol in Washington , D.C. Both senators and representatives are chosen through direct election , though vacancies in the Senate may be filled by a gubernatorial appointment . Members are usually affiliated to the Republican Party or to the Democratic Party , and only rarely to a third party or as independents . Congress has 535 voting members : 435 Representatives and 100 Senators . The House of Representatives has six non-voting members in addition to its 435 voting members . These members can , however , sit on congressional committees and introduce legislation . These members represent Washington , D.C. , Puerto Rico , American Samoa , Guam , the Northern Mariana Islands and the U.S. Virgin Islands .   The members of the House of Representatives serve two-year terms representing the people of a single constituency , known as a `` district '' . Congressional districts are apportioned to states by population using the United States Census results , provided that each state has at least one congressional representative . Each state , regardless of population or size , has two senators . Currently , there are 100 senators representing the 50 states . Each senator is elected at-large in their state for a six-year term , with terms staggered , so every two years approximately one-third of the Senate is up for election .

evidence_da: Usa's Senat er det øverste kammer i USA's Kongres , som sammen med Repræsentanternes Hus i USA - det nedre kammer , komponerer den lovgivende forsamling i USA .   Senatets sammensætning og beføjelser er fastlagt ved artikel 1 i USA's forfatning . Senatet består af senatorer, der repræsenterer hver af de mange stater - hvor hver stat er ligeligt repræsenteret af to senatorer - uanset deres befolkning - der betjener forskudte perioder på seks år . med halvtreds stater i øjeblikket i Unionen , der er 100 amerikanske senatorer . Fra 1789 til 1913 blev senatorer udpeget af lovgivende forsamlinger af de stater, de repræsenterede ; Efter ratificeringen af den syttende ændring i 1913 er de nu valgt populært . Senatet kammer er placeret i den nordlige fløj af Capitol , i Washington , DC   Som overhuset har Senatet flere beføjelser til rådgivning og samtykke, som er unikke for det ; disse omfatter ratificering af traktater , bekræftelse af kabinetssekretærer , højesteretsdommere , føderale dommere , andre føderale udøvende embedsmænd , flag officerer , regulerende embedsmænd , ambassadører , og andre føderale uniformerede officerer . Ud over disse er det i tilfælde , hvor ingen kandidat modtager et flertal af vælgerne til vicepræsident , at Senatet påhviler at vælge en af de to største modtagere af vælgere til dette embede . Det har endvidere ansvaret for at gennemføre retssager mod de anklagede , som Parlamentet har anklaget . Senatet betragtes både som et mere deliberativt og mere prestigefyldt organ end Repræsentanternes Hus på grund af dets længere vilkår , mindre størrelse og statewide valgkredse , hvilket historisk set førte til en mere kollegial og mindre partipolitisk atmosfære .   Den præsiderende officer i Senatet er vicepræsident for DE Forenede Stater , der er præsident for Senatet ; i deres fravær , præsiderer præsident Pro Tempore , som sædvanligvis er det ledende medlem af det kontrollerende parti , over senatet . I begyndelsen af 1900-tallet begyndte den praksis , hvor flertal og mindretalspartier , der vælger deres gulvledere , begyndte , selv om de ikke er konstitutionelle officerer .
evidence_en: The United States Senate is the upper chamber of the United States Congress which , along with the United States House of Representatives , the lower chamber , composes the legislature of the United States of America .   The composition and powers of the Senate are established by Article One of the United States Constitution . The Senate is composed of senators who represent each of the several states , with each state being equally represented by two senators , regardless of their population , serving staggered terms of six years ; with fifty states presently in the Union , there are 100 U.S. Senators . From 1789 until 1913 , Senators were appointed by legislatures of the states they represented ; following the ratification of the Seventeenth Amendment in 1913 , they are now popularly elected . The Senate chamber is located in the north wing of the Capitol , in Washington , D.C.   As the upper house , the Senate has several powers of advice and consent which are unique to it ; these include the ratification of treaties , the confirmation of Cabinet secretaries , Supreme Court justices , federal judges , other federal executive officials , flag officers , regulatory officials , ambassadors , and other federal uniformed officers . In addition to these , in cases wherein no candidate receives a majority of electors for Vice President , the duty befalls upon the Senate to elect one of the top two recipients of electors for that office . It further has the responsibility of conducting trials of those impeached by the House . The Senate is widely considered both a more deliberative and more prestigious body than the House of Representatives due to its longer terms , smaller size , and statewide constituencies , which historically led to a more collegial and less partisan atmosphere .   The presiding officer of the Senate is the Vice President of the United States , who is President of the Senate ; in their absence , the President Pro Tempore , who is customarily the senior member of the controlling party , presides over the Senate . In the early 20th century , the practice of majority and minority parties electing their floor leaders began , although they are not constitutional officers .

evidence_da: Repræsentanternes Hus i USA er det nederste kammer i USA's Kongres , der sammen med Senatet komponerer den lovgivende forsamling i USA .   Parlamentets sammensætning og beføjelser er fastlagt ved artikel 1 i USA's forfatning . Parlamentet består af repræsentanter , der sidder i kongressens distrikter , som er afsat til hver af de 50 stater på grundlag af befolkningen målt ved den amerikanske Census , med hvert distrikt berettiget en repræsentant . Siden starten i 1789 er alle repræsentanter valgt populært . Det samlede antal stemmeberettigede repræsentanter fastsættes ved lov til 435 . Fra 2010 Census , den største delegation er, at Californien , med femoghalvtreds repræsentanter ; syv stater har den mindste delegation muligt , en enkelt repræsentant : Alaska , Delaware , Montana , North Dakota , South Dakota , Vermont , og Wyoming .   Parlamentet har til opgave at vedtage føderal lovgivning , kendt som lovforslag , som efter samstemmende udtalelse fra Senatet sendes til præsidenten til overvejelse . Ud over denne grundlæggende magt , Parlamentet har visse enekompetence, som omfatter beføjelse til at indlede alle regninger i forbindelse med indtægter , rigsretssag af føderale officerer , der er sendt til retssagen i Senatet , og i tilfælde, hvor ingen kandidat modtager et flertal af el formanden , påhviler det Parlamentet at vælge en af de tre største modtagere af vælgere til dette embede med én stemme til hver enkelt stat med henblik herpå .   Formanden for Parlamentet er formand for Parlamentet , som vælges af medlemmerne heraf og derfor traditionelt er leder af det kontrollerende parti . Han eller hun og andre gulv ledere er valgt af den demokratiske Caucus eller de republikanske konferencer , afhængigt af hvilket parti har flere stemmeberettigede medlemmer . Parlamentet mødes i den sydlige fløj af USA Capitol .
evidence_en: The United States House of Representatives is the lower chamber of the United States Congress which , along with the Senate , composes the legislature of the United States .   The composition and powers of the House are established by Article One of the United States Constitution . The House is composed of representatives who sit in congressional districts which are allocated to each of the 50 states on a basis of population as measured by the U.S. Census , with each district entitled one representative . Since its inception in 1789 , all representatives are elected popularly . The total number of voting representatives is fixed by law at 435 . As of the 2010 Census , the largest delegation is that of California , with fifty-three representatives ; seven states have the smallest delegation possible , a single representative : Alaska , Delaware , Montana , North Dakota , South Dakota , Vermont , and Wyoming .   The House is charged with the passage of federal legislation , known as bills , which , after concurrence by the Senate , are sent to the President for consideration . In addition to this basic power , the House has certain exclusive powers which include the power to initiate all bills related to revenue , the impeachment of federal officers , who are sent to trial in the Senate , and in cases wherein no candidate receives a majority of electors for President , the duty falls upon the House to elect one of the top three recipients of electors for that office , with one vote given to each state for that purpose .   The presiding officer is the Speaker of the House , who is elected by the members thereof and is therefore traditionally the leader of the controlling party . He or she and other floor leaders are chosen by the Democratic Caucus or the Republican Conferences , depending on whichever party has more voting members . The House meets in the south wing of the United States Capitol .

evidence_da: Kolyma -LRB- Колыма', -LSB- kəlķיma -RSB- -RRB- er en region beliggende i det russiske Fjernøsten . Det er afgrænset af det østsibiriske hav og Det Arktiske Ocean i nord og Okhotskhavet mod syd. Regionen får sit navn fra Kolyma-floden og bjergkæden , hvoraf dele først blev opdaget i 1926 . I dag består regionen groft fra Chukotka autonome Okrug og Magadan Oblast .   Området , hvoraf en del ligger inden for polarcirklen , har et subarktisk klima med meget kolde vintre , der varer op til seks måneder om året . Permafrost og tundra dækker en stor del af regionen . De gennemsnitlige vintertemperaturer spænder fra − 19 ° C til − 38 ° C -LRB - endnu lavere i det indre -RRB- og gennemsnitlige sommertemperaturer , fra +3 ° C til +16 ° C . Der er rige reserver af guld, sølv, tin , wolfram, kviksølv, kobber, antimon, kul, olie og tørv . 29 zoner med mulig olie- og gasakkumulering er blevet identificeret i Okhotsk-hyldens hav. De samlede reserver anslås til 3,5 milliarder tons tilsvarende brændstof , herunder 1,2 milliarder tons olie og 1,5 milliarder m3 gas .   Den vigtigste by Magadan har næsten 100.000 indbyggere og er den største havn i det nordøstlige Rusland. Det har en stor fiskerflåde og forbliver åben året rundt takket være isbrydere. Magadan betjenes af den nærliggende Sokol Lufthavn. Der er mange offentlige og private landbrugsvirksomheder. Guldminer, pasta- og pølsefabrikker , fiskefirmaer og et destilleri udgør byens industrielle base .
evidence_en: Kolyma -LRB- Колыма́ , -LSB- kəlɨˈma -RSB- -RRB- is a region located in the Russian Far East . It is bounded by the East Siberian Sea and the Arctic Ocean in the north and the Sea of Okhotsk to the south . The region gets its name from the Kolyma River and mountain range , parts of which were not discovered until 1926 . Today the region consists roughly of the Chukotka Autonomous Okrug and the Magadan Oblast .   The area , part of which is within the Arctic Circle , has a subarctic climate with very cold winters lasting up to six months of the year . Permafrost and tundra cover a large part of the region . Average winter temperatures range from − 19 ° C to − 38 ° C -LRB- even lower in the interior -RRB- , and average summer temperatures , from +3 ° C to +16 ° C . There are rich reserves of gold , silver , tin , tungsten , mercury , copper , antimony , coal , oil , and peat . Twenty-nine zones of possible oil and gas accumulation have been identified in the Sea of Okhotsk shelf . Total reserves are estimated at 3.5 billion tons of equivalent fuel , including 1.2 billion tons of oil and 1.5 billion m3 of gas .   The principal town Magadan has nearly 100,000 inhabitants and is the largest port in north-eastern Russia . It has a large fishing fleet and remains open year-round thanks to icebreakers . Magadan is served by the nearby Sokol Airport . There are many public and private farming enterprises . Gold mines , pasta and sausage factories , fishing companies , and a distillery form the city 's industrial base .

evidence_da: Guld er et kemisk element med symbolet Au -LRB- fra aurum -RRB- og atomnummer 79 . I sin reneste form er det et lyst , let rødligt gult , tæt, blødt , formbart og duktilmetal . Kemisk er guld et overgangsmetal og et gruppe 11-element . Det er en af de mindst reaktive kemiske elementer og er fast under standardbetingelser . Guld forekommer ofte i gratis elementært -LRB- native-RRB-form , som klumper eller korn , i klipper , i vener og i alluvial aflejringer . Det forekommer i en solid opløsning serie med det indfødte element sølv-LRB- som electrum-RRB- og også naturligt legeret med kobber og palladium . Mindre almindeligt , det forekommer i mineraler som guld forbindelser, ofte med tellurium-LRB- guld tellurides-RRB- .   Gold 's atomnummer 79 gør det til en af de højere nummererede, naturligt forekommende elementer . Det menes at være fremstillet i supernova nukleosyntese , fra kollision af neutronstjerner , og at have været til stede i støvet , hvorfra solsystemet dannet . Fordi Jorden var smeltet, da den blev dannet, næsten alle de guld til stede i den tidlige Jorden sandsynligvis sank ind i den planetariske kerne . Derfor menes det meste af det guld , der er til stede i dag i Jordens skorpe og kappe , at være blevet leveret til Jorden senere , af asteroidepåvirkninger under det sene tunge bombardement , for omkring 4 milliarder år siden .   Guld er resistent over for de fleste syrer , selv om det opløses i aqua regia , en blanding af salpetersyre og saltsyre , som danner en opløselig tetrachlorofad anion . Guld er uopløseligt i salpetersyre , som opløser sølv og uædle metaller , en egenskab , der længe har været brugt til at forfine guld og til at bekræfte tilstedeværelsen af guld i metalliske genstande , hvilket giver anledning til udtrykket syre test . Guld opløses også i alkaliske opløsninger af cyanid , som anvendes i minedrift og galvanisering . Guld opløses i kviksølv , danner amalgam legeringer , men dette er ikke en kemisk reaktion .   Historisk set var værdien af guld rodfæstet i dets relative sjældenhed , let håndtering og prægning, let smeltning og fabrikation , modstandsdygtighed over for korrosion og andre kemiske reaktioner -LRB- adel -RRB- og dens karakteristiske farve . Som ædelmetal er guld blevet brugt til mønt , smykker og anden kunst gennem hele historien . Tidligere blev en guldstandard ofte gennemført som en pengepolitik , men guldmønter ophørte med at blive slået som en cirkulerende valuta i 1930'erne , og verdens guldstandarden blev opgivet for et fiatvalutasystem efter 1976 .   Der findes i alt 186 700 tons guld over jorden , fra 2015 . Verdensforbruget af ny produceret guld er ca . Gold 's høje formbarhed, duktility, modstandsdygtighed over for korrosion og de fleste andre kemiske reaktioner, og ledningsevne af elektricitet har ført til dens fortsatte anvendelse i korrosionsbestandige elektriske stik i alle typer af edb-enheder-LRB-dens chef industriel anvendelse -RRB- . Guld bruges også i infrarød afskærmning, farvet glas produktion, guld blader, og tand restaurering . Visse guldsalte anvendes stadig som antiinflammatoriske i medicin. I 2014 var verdens største guldproducent langt Kina med 450 tons .
evidence_en: Gold is a chemical element with symbol Au -LRB- from aurum -RRB- and atomic number 79 . In its purest form , it is a bright , slightly reddish yellow , dense , soft , malleable , and ductile metal . Chemically , gold is a transition metal and a group 11 element . It is one of the least reactive chemical elements and is solid under standard conditions . Gold often occurs in free elemental -LRB- native -RRB- form , as nuggets or grains , in rocks , in veins , and in alluvial deposits . It occurs in a solid solution series with the native element silver -LRB- as electrum -RRB- and also naturally alloyed with copper and palladium . Less commonly , it occurs in minerals as gold compounds , often with tellurium -LRB- gold tellurides -RRB- .   Gold 's atomic number of 79 makes it one of the higher numbered , naturally occurring elements . It is thought to have been produced in supernova nucleosynthesis , from the collision of neutron stars , and to have been present in the dust from which the Solar System formed . Because the Earth was molten when it was formed , almost all of the gold present in the early Earth probably sank into the planetary core . Therefore , most of the gold that is present today in the Earth 's crust and mantle is thought to have been delivered to Earth later , by asteroid impacts during the Late Heavy Bombardment , about 4 billion years ago .   Gold is resistant to most acids , though it does dissolve in aqua regia , a mixture of nitric acid and hydrochloric acid , which forms a soluble tetrachloroaurate anion . Gold is insoluble in nitric acid , which dissolves silver and base metals , a property that has long been used to refine gold and to confirm the presence of gold in metallic objects , giving rise to the term acid test . Gold also dissolves in alkaline solutions of cyanide , which are used in mining and electroplating . Gold dissolves in mercury , forming amalgam alloys , but this is not a chemical reaction .   Historically , the value of gold was rooted in its relative rarity , easy handling and minting , easy smelting and fabrication , resistance to corrosion and other chemical reactions -LRB- nobility -RRB- and its distinctive color . As a precious metal , gold has been used for coinage , jewelry , and other arts throughout recorded history . In the past , a gold standard was often implemented as a monetary policy , but gold coins ceased to be minted as a circulating currency in the 1930s , and the world gold standard was abandoned for a fiat currency system after 1976 .   A total of 186,700 tonnes of gold is in existence above ground , as of 2015 . The world consumption of new gold produced is about 50 % in jewelry , 40 % in investments , and 10 % in industry . Gold 's high malleability , ductility , resistance to corrosion and most other chemical reactions , and conductivity of electricity have led to its continued use in corrosion resistant electrical connectors in all types of computerized devices -LRB- its chief industrial use -RRB- . Gold is also used in infrared shielding , colored-glass production , gold leafing , and tooth restoration . Certain gold salts are still used as anti-inflammatories in medicine . As of 2014 , the world 's largest gold producer by far was China with 450 tonnes .

evidence_da: William Jefferson Clinton -LRB- født August 19 , 1946 -RRB- er en amerikansk politiker, der fungerede som 42:e præsident for USA fra 1993 til 2001 . Før formandskabet var han arkansas' 40. Før det fungerede han som Arkansas Attorney General fra 1977 til 1979 . Et medlem af Det Demokratiske Parti , Clinton var ideologisk en ny demokrat , og mange af hans politik afspejlede en centrist '' Third Way '' politisk filosofi .   Clinton er født og opvokset i Arkansas og er en alumnus af Georgetown University , hvor han var medlem af Kappa Kappa Psi og Phi Beta Kappa Society ; han tjente en Rhodes Scholarship til at deltage i University of Oxford . Clinton er gift med Hillary Rodham Clinton , der fungerede som USA's udenrigsminister fra 2009 til 2013 og amerikanske senator fra New York fra 2001 til 2009 , og var den demokratiske kandidat til præsidentposten i 2016 . Bill Clinton og Hillary Rodham begge tjent grader fra Yale Law School , hvor de mødtes og begyndte dating . Som guvernør i Arkansas , Clinton revideret statens uddannelsessystem og fungerede som formand for National Governors Association .   Clinton blev valgt til præsident for USA i 1992 , besejre etablerede republikanske modstander George HW Bush . I en alder af 46 , blev han den tredjeyngste præsident -LRB- bag Theodore Roosevelt og John F. Kennedy -RRB- og den første fra Baby Boomer generation . Clinton præsiderede over den længste periode med fredstid økonomisk ekspansion i amerikansk historie og underskrevet i loven den nordamerikanske frihandelsaftale . Efter ikke at have vedtaget nationale reform af sundhedssystemet , blev Det Demokratiske Hus fortrængt , da det republikanske parti vandt kontrollen over Kongressen i 1994 , for første gang i 40 år . To år senere , i 1996 , Clinton blev den første demokrat siden Franklin D. Roosevelt at blive valgt til en anden periode . Clinton vedtog velfærdsreform og statens Børns Health Insurance Program , samt finansielle deregulering foranstaltninger , herunder Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act og Commodity Futures Modernization Act af 2000 .   I 1998 blev Clinton anklaget af Repræsentanternes Hus for mened for en stor jury og obstruktion af retfærdighed under en retssag mod ham , både relateret til en skandale, der involverer Det Hvide Hus -LRB- og senere Department of Defense-RRB-medarbejder Monica Lewinsky. Clinton blev frikendt af det amerikanske senat i 1999 og tjente sin fulde embedsperiode .   Kongressens budgetkontor rapporterede om et budgetoverskud mellem årene 1998 og 2000 , de sidste tre år af Clintons formandskab . I udenrigspolitikken beordrede Clinton USA's militære intervention i krigene i Bosnien-Kosovo , underskrevet Irak-befrielsesloven i opposition til Saddam Hussein og deltog i 2000-lejren David-topmødet for at fremme den israelske - palæstinensiske fredsproces .   Clinton forlod kontoret med den højeste end-of-office godkendelse rating af enhver amerikansk præsident siden Anden Verdenskrig . Siden da har Clinton været involveret i offentligt tale og humanitært arbejde . Han oprettede William J. Clinton Foundation til at løse internationale årsager , såsom forebyggelse af aids og global opvarmning . I 2004 , Clinton offentliggjort sin selvbiografi , My Life . Han har været aktiv i politik ved at føre kampagne for demokratiske kandidater , herunder hans kones kampagner for Demokraternes præsidentkandidat i 2008 og 2016 , og Barack Obama 's præsidentkampagner i 2008 og 2012 .   I 2009 blev Clinton udnævnt til FN's særlige udsending til Haiti , og efter jordskælvet i Haiti i 2010 , clinton gået sammen med George W. Bush til at danne Clinton Bush Haiti Fonden . Siden han forlod embedet , clinton er blevet bedømt højt i offentlige meningsmålinger af amerikanske præsidenter .
evidence_en: William Jefferson Clinton -LRB- born August 19 , 1946 -RRB- is an American politician who served as the 42nd President of the United States from 1993 to 2001 . Prior to the Presidency he was the 40th Governor of Arkansas from 1979 to 1981 and the state 's 42nd Governor from 1983 to 1992 . Before that , he served as Arkansas Attorney General from 1977 to 1979 . A member of the Democratic Party , Clinton was ideologically a New Democrat , and many of his policies reflected a centrist `` Third Way '' political philosophy .   Clinton was born and raised in Arkansas and is an alumnus of Georgetown University , where he was a member of Kappa Kappa Psi and the Phi Beta Kappa Society ; he earned a Rhodes Scholarship to attend the University of Oxford . Clinton is married to Hillary Rodham Clinton , who served as United States Secretary of State from 2009 to 2013 and U.S. Senator from New York from 2001 to 2009 , and was the Democratic nominee for President in 2016 . Bill Clinton and Hillary Rodham both earned degrees from Yale Law School , where they met and began dating . As Governor of Arkansas , Clinton overhauled the state 's education system and served as chairman of the National Governors Association .   Clinton was elected President of the United States in 1992 , defeating incumbent Republican opponent George H. W. Bush . At age 46 , he became the third-youngest president -LRB- behind Theodore Roosevelt and John F. Kennedy -RRB- and the first from the Baby Boomer generation . Clinton presided over the longest period of peacetime economic expansion in American history and signed into law the North American Free Trade Agreement . After failing to pass national health care reform , the Democratic House was ousted when the Republican Party won control of the Congress in 1994 , for the first time in 40 years . Two years later , in 1996 , Clinton became the first Democrat since Franklin D. Roosevelt to be elected to a second term . Clinton passed welfare reform and the State Children 's Health Insurance Program , as well as financial deregulation measures , including the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act and the Commodity Futures Modernization Act of 2000 .   In 1998 , Clinton was impeached by the House of Representatives for perjury before a grand jury and obstruction of justice during a lawsuit against him , both related to a scandal involving White House -LRB- and later Department of Defense -RRB- employee Monica Lewinsky . Clinton was acquitted by the U.S. Senate in 1999 and served his complete term of office .   The Congressional Budget Office reported a budget surplus between the years 1998 and 2000 , the last three years of Clinton 's presidency . In foreign policy , Clinton ordered U.S. military intervention in the Bosnian and Kosovo wars , signed the Iraq Liberation Act in opposition to Saddam Hussein , and participated in the 2000 Camp David Summit to advance the Israeli -- Palestinian peace process .   Clinton left office with the highest end-of-office approval rating of any U.S. President since World War II . Since then , Clinton has been involved in public speaking and humanitarian work . He created the William J. Clinton Foundation to address international causes , such as the prevention of AIDS and global warming . In 2004 , Clinton published his autobiography , My Life . He has remained active in politics by campaigning for Democratic candidates , including his wife 's campaigns for the Democratic presidential nomination in 2008 and 2016 , and Barack Obama 's presidential campaigns in 2008 and 2012 .   In 2009 , Clinton was named the United Nations Special Envoy to Haiti , and after the 2010 Haiti earthquake , Clinton teamed with George W. Bush to form the Clinton Bush Haiti Fund . Since leaving office , Clinton has been rated highly in public opinion polls of U.S. Presidents .

evidence_da: Boston Latin School er en offentlig '' eksamen skole '' i Boston , Massachusetts . Etableret april 23 , 1635 , det er den ældste skole samt den første offentlige skole i USA . The Public Latin School var en bastion for at uddanne sønner af Boston '' Brahmin '' elite , hvilket resulterer i skolen hævder mange fremtrædende Bostonians , Massachusetts borgere og New Englanders som alumner . Dens læseplan følger den 1700-tals latinskolebevægelse , som har de "" klassikere "" at være grundlaget for et uddannet sind . Fire år med latin er obligatorisk for alle elever, der kommer ind på skolen i 7. klasse - tre år for dem, der kommer ind i 9. I 2007 blev skolen kåret som en af de øverste tyve gymnasier i USA af det amerikanske nyheds- og verdensrapportmagasin . Det er en del af Boston Public Schools -LRB- BPS -RRB- .   Skolen blev udnævnt til en 2011 '' Blue Ribbon School of Excellence '', det amerikanske department of Education 's højeste pris .   Fra 2016 er skolen opført under '' guldmedalje '' listen , ranking 51 ud af top 100 gymnasier i USA -LRB- mere end 20.000 offentlige gymnasier fra 50 stater og District of Columbia blev analyseret -RRB- af US News & World Report magazine  .
evidence_en: The Boston Latin School is a public `` exam school '' in Boston , Massachusetts . Established on April 23 , 1635 , it is the oldest school as well as the first public school in the United States . The Public Latin School was a bastion for educating the sons of the Boston `` Brahmin '' elite , resulting in the School claiming many prominent Bostonians , Massachusetts citizens and New Englanders as alumni . Its curriculum follows that of the 18th century Latin-school movement , which holds the `` classics '' to be the basis of an educated mind . Four years of Latin are mandatory for all pupils who enter the School in the 7th grade , three years for those who enter in the 9th . In 2007 , the School was named one of the top twenty high schools in the United States by U.S. News & World Report magazine . It is a part of Boston Public Schools -LRB- BPS -RRB- .   The School was named a 2011 `` Blue Ribbon School of Excellence '' , the U.S. Department of Education 's highest award .   As of 2016 , the School is listed under the `` gold medal '' list , ranking 51 out of the top 100 high schools in the United States -LRB- more than 20,000 public high schools from 50 states and the District of Columbia were analyzed -RRB- by U.S. News & World Report magazine .

evidence_da: Star Wars er en amerikansk episk rumopera franchise, centreret om en filmserie skabt af George Lucas . Det skildrer eventyr af forskellige tegn '' lang tid siden i en galakse langt , langt væk ''.   Franchisen begyndte i 1977 med udgivelsen af filmen Star Wars -LRB- senere undertitlen Episode IV: A New Hope i 1981 -RRB-, som blev en verdensomspændende pop kultur fænomen . Det blev efterfulgt af den vellykkede efterfølgere The Empire Strikes Back -LRB- 1980 -RRB- og Return of the Jedi -LRB- 1983 -RRB- ; disse tre film udgør den oprindelige Star Wars trilogi . En prequel trilogi blev udgivet mellem 1999 og 2005 , som modtog blandede reaktioner fra både kritikere og fans . En efterfølger trilogi begyndte i 2015 med udgivelsen af Star Wars : The Force Awakens . Alle syv film blev nomineret til Academy Awards -LRB- med sejre går til de første to film -RRB-og har været kommercielle succeser , med en samlet box office indtægter på over $ 7,5 milliarder , hvilket gør Star Wars den tredje højest indtjenende filmserie . Spin-off film omfatter den animerede Star Wars : The Clone Wars -LRB- 2008 -RRB- og Rogue One-LRB- 2016 -RRB-, hvoraf sidstnævnte er den første i en kommende serie af antologi film .   Serien har affødt en omfattende mediefranchise, herunder bøger, tv-serier, computer- og videospil og tegneserier - som alle finder sted inden for samme kontinuitet som filmene - hvilket har resulteret i en betydelig udvikling af seriens fiktive universet , med de ikke-kanoniske værker falder ind under den hedengangne Star Wars Legends etiket . Star Wars har også en Guinness World Records titel til '' Mest succesfulde film merchandising franchise . I 2015 blev den samlede værdi af Star Wars franchisen anslået til USD 42 milliarder , hvilket gør Star Wars til den næsthøjest epolationsbaserede mediefranchise nogensinde .   I 2012 købte The Walt Disney Company Lucasfilm for 4,06 milliarder dollar og tjente distributionsrettighederne til alle efterfølgende Star Wars-film , begyndende med udgivelsen af The Force Awakens i 2015 . Den tidligere distributør , 20th Century Fox , bevarer de fysiske distributionsrettigheder for de to første Star Wars trilogier , ejer permanente rettigheder til den oprindelige 1977 film og fortsætter med at holde rettighederne til prequel trilogien og de første to fortsættelser til A New Hope indtil maj 2020 . Walt Disney Studios ejer digitale distributionsrettigheder til alle Star Wars film, undtagen A New Hope .
evidence_en: Star Wars is an American epic space opera franchise , centered on a film series created by George Lucas . It depicts the adventures of various characters `` a long time ago in a galaxy far , far away '' .   The franchise began in 1977 with the release of the film Star Wars -LRB- later subtitled Episode IV : A New Hope in 1981 -RRB- , which became a worldwide pop culture phenomenon . It was followed by the successful sequels The Empire Strikes Back -LRB- 1980 -RRB- and Return of the Jedi -LRB- 1983 -RRB- ; these three films constitute the original Star Wars trilogy . A prequel trilogy was released between 1999 and 2005 , which received mixed reactions from both critics and fans . A sequel trilogy began in 2015 with the release of Star Wars : The Force Awakens . All seven films were nominated for Academy Awards -LRB- with wins going to the first two films -RRB- and have been commercial successes , with a combined box office revenue of over $ 7.5 billion , making Star Wars the third highest-grossing film series . Spin-off films include the animated Star Wars : The Clone Wars -LRB- 2008 -RRB- and Rogue One -LRB- 2016 -RRB- , the latter of which is the first in an upcoming series of anthology films .   The series has spawned an extensive media franchise including books , television series , computer and video games , and comic books , all of which take place within the same continuity as the films , resulting in significant development of the series 's fictional universe , with the non-canonical works falling under the defunct Star Wars Legends label . Star Wars also holds a Guinness World Records title for the `` Most successful film merchandising franchise . In 2015 , the total value of the Star Wars franchise was estimated at USD $ 42 billion , making Star Wars the second highest-grossing media franchise of all time .   In 2012 , The Walt Disney Company bought Lucasfilm for $ 4.06 billion and earned the distribution rights to all subsequent Star Wars films , beginning with the release of The Force Awakens in 2015 . The former distributor , 20th Century Fox , retains the physical distribution rights for the first two Star Wars trilogies , owns permanent rights for the original 1977 film and continues to hold the rights for the prequel trilogy and the first two sequels to A New Hope until May 2020 . Walt Disney Studios owns digital distribution rights to all the Star Wars films , excluding A New Hope .

evidence_da: William Clark Gable -LRB- Februar 1 , 1901 - November 16 , 1960 -RRB- var en amerikansk filmskuespiller , ofte benævnt '' The King of Hollywood '' eller blot som '' The King ''. Gable begyndte sin karriere som skuespiller og optrådte som en ekstra i stumfilm mellem 1924 og 1926 , og skred til biroller med et par film for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer i 1931 . Det næste år , han landede sin første førende Hollywood rolle og i løbet af de næste tre årtier blev han en førende mand i mere end 60 film .   Gable vandt en Oscar for bedste skuespiller for det skete One Night -LRB- 1934 -RRB-, og blev nomineret til hovedroller i Mytteri på Bounty-LRB- 1935 -RRB- og for hans velsagtens bedst kendte rolle som Rhett Butler i den episke borgerkrig drama Gone with the Wind -LRB- 1939 - RRB.   Gable også fundet succes kommercielt og kritisk med film som Red Dust -LRB- 1932 -RRB- , Manhattan Melodrama -LRB- 1934 -RRB- , San Francisco -LRB-1936 -RRB- , Saratoga -LRB- 1937 -RRB- Boom Town -LRB- 1940 -RRB- , The Hucksters -LRB- 1947 -Rcoming- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- HomeRB- -LRB- 1948 -RRB- og The Misfits -LRB- 1961 -RRB- , som var hans endelige skærm udseende .   Gavgods syntes modsatte nogle af de mest populære skuespillerinder af tiden . Joan Crawford var hans foretrukne skuespiller at arbejde med , og hun var indgået et samarbejde med Gable i otte film . Myrna Loy arbejdede sammen med ham syv gange , og han blev parret med Jean Harlow i seks produktioner. Han medvirkede også med Lana Turner i fire funktioner, og med Norma Shearer og Ava Gardner i tre hver. Gable 's endelige film , The Misfits-LRB- 1961 -RRB- , forenet ham med Marilyn Monroe-LRB- også i hendes sidste skærm udseende-RRB- . Gavle betragtes som en af de mest konsekvente box-office kunstnere i historien, optræder på Quigley Publishing 's årlige Top Ten Money Making Stars Poll 16 gange . Han blev udnævnt til den syvendestørste mandlige stjerne i klassisk amerikansk film af American Film Institute .
evidence_en: William Clark Gable -LRB- February 1 , 1901 -- November 16 , 1960 -RRB- was an American film actor , often referred to as `` The King of Hollywood '' or just simply as `` The King '' . Gable began his career as a stage actor and appeared as an extra in silent films between 1924 and 1926 , and progressed to supporting roles with a few films for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1931 . The next year , he landed his first leading Hollywood role and over the next three decades he became a leading man in more than 60 motion pictures .   Gable won an Academy Award for Best Actor for It Happened One Night -LRB- 1934 -RRB- , and was nominated for leading roles in Mutiny on the Bounty -LRB- 1935 -RRB- and for his arguably best-known role as Rhett Butler in the epic Civil War drama Gone with the Wind -LRB- 1939 -RRB- .   Gable also found success commercially and critically with films such as Red Dust -LRB- 1932 -RRB- , Manhattan Melodrama -LRB- 1934 -RRB- , San Francisco -LRB- 1936 -RRB- , Saratoga -LRB- 1937 -RRB- Boom Town -LRB- 1940 -RRB- , The Hucksters -LRB- 1947 -RRB- , Homecoming -LRB- 1948 -RRB- , and The Misfits -LRB- 1961 -RRB- , which was his final screen appearance .   Gable appeared opposite some of the most popular actresses of the time . Joan Crawford was his favorite actress to work with , and she was partnered with Gable in eight films . Myrna Loy worked with him seven times , and he was paired with Jean Harlow in six productions . He also starred with Lana Turner in four features , and with Norma Shearer and Ava Gardner in three each . Gable 's final film , The Misfits -LRB- 1961 -RRB- , united him with Marilyn Monroe -LRB- also in her last screen appearance -RRB- . Gable is considered one of the most consistent box-office performers in history , appearing on Quigley Publishing 's annual Top Ten Money Making Stars Poll 16 times . He was named the seventh-greatest male star of classic American cinema by the American Film Institute .

evidence_da: Anna Helene Paquin -LRB- -LSB- יpækwķn -RSB- født 24. Født i Manitoba og opbragt i Wellington , New Zealand , Paquin studerede på Hutt Intermediate School og Wellington Girls ' College i New Zealand, før de flytter til Los Angeles i løbet af sin ungdom, hvor hun studerede på Windward School og fortsatte med at fuldføre et år på Co lumbia University før de forlader post-sekundære at fokusere på hendes skuespillerkarriere . Som barn slog hun 5000 kandidater til rollen som Flora McGrath i Jane Campions romantiske dramafilm The Piano -LRB- 1993 -RRB- på trods af at hun ikke havde lidt at spille erfaring, før hun fik rollen . For sin præstation , modtog hun Academy Award for bedste kvindelige birolle i en alder af 11 , hvilket gør hende til den næstyngste Oscar vinder i Oscar historie .   Paquin fortsatte med at blive en succesfuld barn skuespiller , modtager flere Young Artist Award nomineringer for sine roller i Fly Away Home -LRB- 1996 -RRB-, Medlem af Wedding -LRB- 1997 -RRB-, og A Walk on the Moon -LRB- 1999 -RRB-, og blev nomineret til en Screen Act ors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance af en Cast in a Motion Picture for at optræde i Cameron Crowe 's komedie-drama film Almost Famous-LRB- 2000-RRB- . Hun spillede mutant superheroine Rogue i flere film af X-Men franchisen og blev nomineret til en Saturn Award og en Screen Actors Guild Award for hendes præstation i første rate .   Paquin er også kendt for at spille hovedrollen i Sookie Stackhouse i HBO vampyr drama tv-serien True Blood -LRB- 2008 - 2014 -RRB- . For sin præstation i serien , Paquin vandt Golden Globe Award for bedste præstation af en skuespiller i en tv-serie - Drama i 2009 og blev nomineret til en ekstra Golden Globe Award i 2010 , samt tre Saturn Awards og en Screen Actors Guild Award i  2010 . Blandt andre udmærkelser , Paquin er blevet nomineret til en Primetime Emmy Award , en Golden Globe Award , og en Screen Actors Guild Award for hendes arbejde på 2007 tv-film Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee og en Golden Globe Award for hendes arbejde på 2009 tv-film The Modig hjerte af Irena Sendler . Paquin har været gift siden 2010 med skuespilleren Stephen Moyer , med hvem hun har to børn .
evidence_en: Anna Helene Paquin -LRB- -LSB- ˈpækwɪn -RSB- born 24 July 1982 -RRB- is a Canadian-born New Zealand actress . Born in Manitoba and brought up in Wellington , New Zealand , Paquin studied at Hutt Intermediate School and the Wellington Girls ' College in New Zealand before moving to Los Angeles during her youth where she studied at Windward School and went on to complete a year at Columbia University before leaving post-secondary to focus on her acting career . As a child , she beat 5000 candidates for the role of Flora McGrath in Jane Campion 's romantic drama film The Piano -LRB- 1993 -RRB- , despite having had little to no acting experience prior to getting the role . For her performance , she received the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress at the age of 11 , making her the second-youngest Academy Award winner in Oscar history .   Paquin went on to become a successful child actress , receiving multiple Young Artist Award nominations for her roles in Fly Away Home -LRB- 1996 -RRB- , The Member of the Wedding -LRB- 1997 -RRB- , and A Walk on the Moon -LRB- 1999 -RRB- , and was nominated for a Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture for appearing in Cameron Crowe 's comedy-drama film Almost Famous -LRB- 2000 -RRB- . She played mutant superheroine Rogue in multiple films of the X-Men franchise and was nominated for a Saturn Award and a Screen Actors Guild Award for her performance in the first instalment .   Paquin is also known for playing the lead role of Sookie Stackhouse in the HBO vampire drama television series True Blood -LRB- 2008 -- 2014 -RRB- . For her performance in the series , Paquin won the Golden Globe Award for Best Performance by an Actress in a Television Series -- Drama in 2009 and was nominated for an additional Golden Globe Award in 2010 , as well as three Saturn Awards and a Screen Actors Guild Award in 2010 . Among other accolades , Paquin has been nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award for her work on the 2007 television film Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee and a Golden Globe Award for her work on the 2009 television film The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler . Paquin has been married since 2010 to actor Stephen Moyer , with whom she has two children .
